The family of Grayware[Downloader]/Win32.GLDCT is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, it will connect to a specified server, download other malware to do damage to the user system.

family_cn_des: Shiotob家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多使用VB编写，运行后会修改系统设置，开放系统部分端口，可能会尝试连接远程服务器。
family_en_des:
The Win32/Shiotob family of spyware can monitor user's PC to steal their system information, user names and passwords. They are written by VB language.
They can be downloaded from the Internet or installed by other malware. They may modify the system settings after running, open parts of the ports and connect with the remote server. They can also arrive as an attachment to a spam email.

family_cn_des:
Worm[IM]/Win32.WOW是对针对网络游戏魔兽世界（World of Warcraft）用户进行侵害的蠕虫的统称，通常被攻击者用来盗取魔兽世界网络游戏帐号、密码和其他的虚拟财产信息进行牟利。
WOW的家族是一个通过行为来定性的木马家族，该家族的不同变种之间，可能除了共同的侵害目的之外没有任何的关联。
该蠕虫家族主要通过即时通信进行传播。即时通讯（Instant messaging，简称IM）是一个终端服务，允许两人或多人使用网路即时的传递文字讯息、档案、语音与视频交流。
family_en_des:
The family of Worm[IM]/Win32.WOW are worms compromising the online game of World of Warcraft (WOW) to steal accounts, passwords and other virtual belongings in order to make illegal profits.
The family is defined according to the same behavior of its members. Different variants may have nothing relevant except for the same behavior to compromise WOW.
The worm spreads mainly via Instant Messaging which is a terminal service to allow two or more people to communicate by massages, audios and videos on Internet.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.CodecPack家族是一类自动下载其他恶意程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          CodecPack家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.CodecPack is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will modify the system settings, download and execture various malware to do damage to the user system.

family_cn_des: Worm[Email]/Win32.Mydoom是一类主要利用邮件传播的蠕虫。此家族是一个通过代码基因关联定性的蠕虫家族，家族的变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                   Mydoom家族蠕虫最早发现与2004年1月26号，并成为了当时传播速度最快的蠕虫。该家族蠕虫通过垃圾邮件大量传播。几家信息安全公司认为该家族蠕虫起源于俄罗斯，但其制作者至今仍是个谜。                              MaAfee的一个职员Craig Schmugar是最早发现此家族蠕虫的人之一。他将其命名为“Mydoom”的主要原因是蠕虫代码中包含了“mydom”的字符串。
family_en_des:
The family of Worm[Email]/Win32.Mydoom is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
It was first detected on January 26 in 2004 by a McAfee employee called Craig Schmugar. He names the worm as Mydoom due to the text of “mydom” within the code. The worm then became the fastest spreading worm via junk emails. Several security companies believe that the worm was created in Russia, but until now, it is a mystery.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Ransom]/Win32.PornoAsset是一类劫持用户系统并索要赎金的木马家族的统称。此家族是一个通过通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                                                    PornoAsset家族木马主要通过勒索用户使其制作者获利。勒索类的木马一般通过下载或系统漏洞感染用户系统。部分勒索木马在运行时加密用户的数据，用户支付赎金给软件制作和后才能解密数据。另一种勒索木马不采用加密方式，直接锁定用户的系统，支付赎金后才能解锁。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Ransom]/Win32.PornoAsset is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
The Trojans in this family hijack the user systems and demands for random. Some Trojans infect the system by downloading other malwares or exploiting the system vulnerability. Some Trojans encrypt the user data or lock the user system to ask for random.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Badur的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
family_en_des: The family of Trojan/Win32.Badur is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.

family_cn_des:
Trojan/Win32.Cosmu家族是一类访问指定网站并下载执行恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。
Cosmu家族木马执行时从指定的服务器下载多种恶意软件和广告软件。该家族木马还在系统的后台定时访问指定的站点，提高了这些网站的访问量，为木马制作者获取利益。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Cosmu is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
The Trojan can download various malware and adware from some specified websites. The Trojan can also visit some specified websites regularly, increase the visiting traffic and make profits for the Trojan maker.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Diple家族是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                               Diple家族木马在用户计算机上运行时会连接到指定的服务器，通过特定的端口接收木马操纵者的命令，从而实现对用户计算机的远程控制。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Diple is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
Once running on the infected computer, the Trojan will connects to a specified server and receives commands from the Trojan controller and makes remote control of the computer.

family_cn_des: Grayware/Win32.EpicGames[AdWare]是一个强制推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是通过行为来定性的灰色软件家族，家族的不同变种之间，很有可能除了都捆绑于游戏安装文件中之外没有任何的关联。                                  EpicGames广告软件一般捆绑于游戏安装文件中。在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。
family_en_des: Grayware/Win32.EpicGames is a collection of malware that can push advertisements by force. This family is characterized by behaviors, and there might be no other relations other than being bundled with game installation files among different  variants of this family.                   This family is usually bundled in the game installation files. After installation, it appears as popup to spread advertisements.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/IRC.Zapchast是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                            Zapchast家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。                        Zapchast家族一般通过mIRC客户端获取系统权限，进而控制用户系统。mIRC是英国mIRC公司出品的IRC(Internet Relay Chat)类客户端软件，由Khaled Mardam-Bay编写，由于所占带宽极小，而且也有着极好的扩充性，所以在世界范围内都很受欢迎。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Backdoor]/IRC.Zapchast is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
When running on the infected computer, the Trojan exploits vulnerabilities to open the backdoor server and take control of the computer via the server. 
Usually, the Trojan gets access to the system via mIRC which is IRC (Internet Relay Chat) client software developed by the British company of mIRC. Due to the small traffic it consumes and its excellent scalability, it is widely welcomed all over the world.

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Bundpil是一类可以通过移动存储设备和邮件传播的蠕虫。该家族命名是由代码基因关联定性的，家族的变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
family_en_des: The family of Worm/Win32.Bundpil is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/JS.Expack家族是一类自动下载其他恶意程序的木马。此家族木马是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Expack家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Downloader]/JS.Expack is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will modify the system settings, download and execute various malware to do damage to the user system.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Bat.DNSChanger是一类劫持DNS服务器的木马。此家族是一个通过行为来定性的木马家族，家族的不同变种之间，很可能除了都劫持DNS服务器之外没有任何的关联。                    DNSChanger是一个活跃于2007至2011年的劫持DNS服务器的木马。此木马是由一家名为Rove Digital的爱沙尼亚公司制作并散布的。用户系统感染此木马后，DNS服务器的入口会被修改为Rove Digital公司控制的服务器入口。DNSChanger最活跃时控制了大约400万台计算机，为其制作公司带来了至少1400万美元的收入。                                          DNSChanger木马主要通过欺骗用户下载的方式进行传播。其通常伪装为视频编码挂在色情网站上，欺骗用户下载执行。Rove Digital公司主要通过贩卖广告获利，其推送给用户的多为虚假欺诈的广告。                                        2011年11月9日，美国纽约南区检察院执行了幽灵点击行动（Operation Ghost Click），对DNSChanger的相关人员提起了诉讼，并由爱沙尼亚政府部门执行逮捕，其在美国的服务器也被FBI收缴。
family_en_des: Trojan/Bat.DNSChanger isa collection of Trojan that hijacks DNS server and was active from 2007 to 2011. It is characterized by behaviors. There are no other relations among family Trojans except for hijacking DNS server. It is written and spread by an Estonian company known as Rove Digital, the malware infected computers by modifying a computer's DNS entries to point toward its own rogue name servers, which then injected its own advertising into Web pages. At its peak, it was estimated to have infected over 4 million computers, bringing in at least US$14 million profits to its operator from fraudulent advertising revenue.                                                          It was distributed as a drive-by download claiming to be a video codec needed to view content on a Web site, particularly appearing on rogue pornography sites. Once installed, it then modified the system's Domain Name System (DNS) configuration, directing them to rogue name servers operated through affiliates of Rove Digital. These rogue name servers primarily substituted advertising on Web pages with advertising sold by Rove.                             On November 9, 2011, as part of "Operation Ghost Click" (a collaborative investigation into this operation), the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York announced charges against six Estonian nationals and one Russian national connected to the malware and Rove Digital for wire fraud, computer intrusion, and conspiracy. Arrests were made by Estonian authorities, and servers connected to the malware located in the United States were seized by the FBI.

family_cn_des:
Worm/Java.Autorun是运行后在用户计算机磁盘上生成Autorun文件和自身副本的达到自启动和传播的目的蠕虫统称。此家族是一个通过行为来定性的木马家族，而不是基于代码基因关联、编译器或形态来命名的。
Autorun家族蠕虫运行后可以在所有盘符（主要是可移动介质）下生成自启动的配置文件autorun.inf和它自身的复制，autorun.inf文件中包含特定的代码使得用户双击受感染盘符（或被感染介质被系统挂载）后，也执行了蠕虫文件。Autorun,正如其字面意思，自动运行，是微软的windows系统的一种自动运行的文件命令，主要用于对于移动设施的自动运行，本是微软为了方便用户使用CDROM等移动设施而设置的程序，而现在却被很多病毒利用，正如Autorun蠕虫就是利用了这一特点来自动执行自己，并通过局域网和移动存储设备进行传播。
Autorun家族蠕虫非常活跃，家族变种数量众多，且破坏力也极大，蠕虫运行后可以隐藏自身、破坏系统功能、删除系统系统文件、删除服务、替换系统文件、遍历进程、在IE浏览器注入线程、添加映像劫持，在指定服务器下载病毒文件执行等多种功能。目前Autorun蠕虫病毒由于其利用Autorun.inf等文件进行自启动的特点，很容易被杀毒软件辨别，所以大多数的此类病毒都会被杀毒软件拦截且报警，但是不安装任何杀毒软件的用户还是会被感染。
AutoRun家族变种数量截至到2012年底已经超过5万8千种。
它是一种利用可移动存储介质进行传播的蠕虫分类。它能够在磁盘根目录和插入的可移动存储介质的根目录下创建一个autorun.inf的文件，并将蠕虫本体复制过去。这样，在双击磁盘时，会自动运行autorun.inf指定的蠕虫本体。
family_en_des:
Worm/Java.Autorun is a collection of worm that creates AutoRun files in computer disks after running and self-replicate.Therefore, it is characterized by virus behaviors, other than code genetic correlation, compiler or morpheme.

This family is able to generate auto-run configuration file atuorun.inf and the copy of itself in non-system disks (which are most of mobile devices) when running.The autorun.inf file contains specific codes that can execute malicious programs after users click the injected disks or devices are mounted.AutoRun, the literal meaning of which is to run automatically, is a file command for automatic operation of Windows system.Its main functionality is to make mobile devices run automatically, and is originally designed for users to use mobile devices, such as CDROM, while now it is exploited by various kinds of viruses.Therefore the worms can execute themselves and propagate by means of local networks and mobile devices.

This family is very active.It has lots of variants.After running, it can hide itself, damage system functions, delete system files, remove services, replace system files and traverse processes, inject threads into IE browser, add image hijacking, download and execute virus files from specific servers, etc.
The number of its variants had exceeded 58,000 by the end of 2012.
It is a worm that uses removable storage media to spread. It creates a autorun.inf file on the root directory of disks and removable strorage media, and replicates itself. Then, when double-clicking the disk, it operates the worm body appointed by autorun.inf.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
IM-Worm.Win32.Sohanad病毒会通过强行篡改注册表、降低当前用户操作权限的方式，来禁止用户使用“任务管理器”、“文件夹选项”、“注册表工具”等系统功能，以防止病毒自身被用户发现并查杀。此病毒可通过可移动驱动器、网络共享、即时通讯应用程序传播。
它通过将受感染的移动驱动器与系统连接起来而入侵。
它使用 Windows 任务计划程序创建可执行植入副本的预设任务。
它植入AUTORUN.INF文件，当用户访问受感染系统的驱动器时，自动执行植入的副本。
它将用户的Internet Explorer主页修改成某个网站。该操作允许恶意软件指向含有恶意软件的网站，使受感染的计算机面临感染恶意软件的更大风险。
family_en_des: Worm.Win32.Sohanad is a collection of worm that can spread via removable devices, network shares and instant message applications. It prevents users from using the functionalities of "Task Manager", "Archive Options" and "Registry Tool" through tempering the registry by force and  reducing the operatoin privileges of current user. In this way, it can protect itself being found and killed by users. It intrudes into computers through the connection between infected removable devices and system. It modifies Internet Explorer home page into some other website, which allows malware to direct to website with malware. Then the infected computer will be in front of more risks.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.KillAV[Rootkit]是一类可以关闭反病毒程序木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                               KillAV家族木马侵入系统后会修改注册表，实现开机自启。连接指定站点，下载恶意程序。利用rootkit隐藏自我，防止被查杀，并尝试关闭反病毒软件进程。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.KillAV is a Trojan collection that can shut down the antivirus programs. The Trojan family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.                              After injecting into system, it modifies registry entries to realize the boot start-up. It can carry out the following malicious actions: conneting the pointed website, downloading malicious programs, hiding itself through rootkit to avoid being detected and killed, shuting down the antivirus programs.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Xorala的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                     Xorala是一个感染性病毒，它会搜索系统中所有的PE可执行文件，将恶意代码注入到文件的尾部。感染此家族病毒后，会出现提示用户插入Office或系统安装盘的对话框，无法关闭，占用大量资源，使系统运行缓慢甚至死机。
family_en_des:
Virus/Win32.Xorala is a collection of virus that is characterized by code gene, while the variants of this family have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.
Xorala is infective virus that search all the PE executive files in the system to inject malware into the bottom of files. After being infected, dialogs of reminding users to insert Office or system installation disk, which cannot be shut down and occupies a lot of resources. As a result, systems slow down and even get crash.

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Kolabc[Net-Worm]是一类主要通过网络进行传播的蠕虫统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Kolabc家族蠕虫会尝试连接局域网的其他计算机，成功连接后自我复制过去并自动执行，实现蠕虫在局域网内的传播，并且可能会造成网络阻塞。此家族蠕虫还具有后门程序的功能，允许骇客通过指定的服务器远程控制被感染的计算机，给用户的计算机安全和个人隐私造成严重威胁。
family_en_des: Worm/Win32.Kolabc[Net-Worm] is a collection of worm that propagates via networks. This family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies. Kolabc will try to connect the other computers in the LAN and then carry out self-replicate and execution automatically after conneting. In this way, it spreads through LAN and might result in network traffic. In addition, this family also has the functionality of backdoor program, which allows hackers to control the infected computer remotely through appointed servers. This malicious action might bring severe threats to users in terms of computer security and personal private.

family_cn_des: [Backdoor]Trojan/Win32.Turkojan是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Turkojan家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。                 Turkojan是一款远程控制计算机的黑客软件，功能十分强大。其木马程序感染了目标计算机后，就可以实现远程文件管理、远程注册表管理、远程发送命令、远程查看屏幕、开启远程桌面等功能，同时还会记录用户按键信息，盗取用户的账号密码。此软件简单易用，不需要专业的黑客技术就能使用，危害性很大。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.Turkojan is a Trojan collection that can control remotely by advantage of system vulnerabilities. The Trojan family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.      This family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege. After infecting the targeted computer, it can realize the following functionalities: remote file management, remote registry management, remote sending message, remote monitoring screen, open the remote desktop and so on.Meanwhile, it can record the key information of user and steal user's account and password.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.PolyCrypt[Packed]是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              PolyCrypt家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。此家族木马可以看做是经过特殊处理的“黑防专版”灰鸽子远程控制木马。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.PolyCrypt is a Trojan collection that can control remotely by advantage of system vulnerabilities. The Trojan family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.                            This family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege. It can be regarded as another version of Hupigon with special treatment.

family_cn_des: Grayware/Win32.InstallCore[AdWare]是一个强制推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是通过行为来定性的灰色软件家族，家族的不同变种之间，很有可能除了都捆绑于其他软件安装文件中之外没有任何的关联。                                       InstallCore家族软件主要通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中进行传播，在安装时一般不告知用户其存在，在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。                                         InstallCore是一个开发和管理Windows系统PE可执行文件的平台，是为有效处理Web应用程序而设计的。现在InstallCore每月处理约1亿的安装文件。
family_en_des: Grayware/Win32.InstallCore[AdWare] is a collection of malware that can push advertisements by force. This family is characterized by behavior, and there might be no other relations other than being bundled with the installation file of other software among different  variants of this family.             This family usually propagates via bundling in the installation files of other software. It is installed without the knowledge of user. After installation, it appears as popup.                               InstallCore is a platform for developing and managing Windows Pe executive files. It is designed to deal with Web application effectively. Now it processes alomost 100 million installation files every month.

family_cn_des: AdClicer家族是木马类点击程序。通常为VB或DELPHI编写，用来推广网站，运行后通过向浏览器发送指定的命令或通过修改系统文件，自动访问指定URL地址或去网上获取URL数据,进而使木马控制者获利。
family_en_des: AdClicer is a family of Trojans clickers written in VB/DELPHI. The Trojan is usually used to prompt websites. Once executed, it sends specified commands to the web browser or makes access to specified URL address or obtains the URL data on Internet by modifying the system files so as to make profits for the Trojan maker.

family_cn_des:
Trojan/Win32.FakeSysDef是伪装成反病毒软件故意歪曲用户计算机的安全状态的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。  
FakeSysDef家族木马首先提示需要扫描系统，扫描后提示用户有威胁，并提示用户购买软件从而消除安全隐患。此家族木马通常制造虚假的安全威胁促使用户购买软件，来获取经济上的收益。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.FakeSysDef is a Trojan collection that disguises itself as antivirus software to misrepresent the safety situation of user's computer. The Trojan family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies. FakeSysDef will remind user to scan the system firstly, then reminding user that there are threats after scanning and requesting user to buy software to remove security risks. It often tricks user to buy software by making fake security threats in order to make profits.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Fareit是一类盗取用户账户密码等信息的木马统称。此家族是是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                       Fareit家族木马侵入用户系统后，会盗取用户的账户密码等信息。部分家族变种会在受害者电脑中安装“CG Miner”软件，利用其电脑来采掘比特币并发送给木马操控者。                                 比特币（BitCoin）是一种P2P形式的数字代码。比特币不依靠特定货币机构发行，它依据特定算法，通过大量的计算产生，比特币经济使用整个P2P网络中众多节点构成的分布式数据库来确认并记录所有的交易行为。P2P的去中心化特性与算法本身可以确保无法通过大量制造比特币来人为操控币值。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.Fareit is a Trojan collection that steals users' accounts and passwords. The Trojan family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.                      Fareit will steal user's information (such as accounts and passwords) after intruding into user's system. Some variants install software "CG Miner" in the infected computer to mine Bitcoins and send them to Trojan controller. Bitcoin is a kind of number code in P2P form. It is produced by large amount of calculation according to specific algorithms. Bitcoin economy uses the distributed database in the entire P2P network to confirm and record all the transactions.

family_cn_des: Trojan/HTML.JScript是一类自动下载其他恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过编译器来定性的木马家族，家族变种都是采用Jscript脚本语言编写的。                                         JScript家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。                     JScript是由微软公司开发的活动脚本语言，是微软对ECMAScript规范的实现。JScript最初是随Internet Explorer 3.0于1996年8月发布。典型的JScript源文件使用的扩展名是.js。
family_en_des: Trojan/HTML.Jscript is a Trojan collection that downloads other malware automatically. The Trojan family is characterized by compiler, the variants are witten by Jscript language.               Jscript will modify system settings, download and execute several malware after infecting user's system. JScript was a kind of scrip language developed by Microsoft, which is the realization to ECMAScript by Microsoft.JScript was first released with Internet Explorer 3.0 in August 1996. The extensive name of classic source file of JScript is .js.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.LolBot[Backdoor]是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                            LolBot家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.LolBot is a Trojan collection that uses system vulnerabilities to realize remote control. The Trojan family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.                  LolBot family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Neshta的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                             Neshta家族病毒感染Windows系统的PE可执行文件，然后收集系统的状态信息并发送到指定的服务器。
family_en_des: Virus/Win32.Neshta is a collection of virus that infects the PE executive files in Windows system. The virus family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.                  After infecting PE executive files, it then collects the status information of systems and sends to the appointed server.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Xorer家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Xorer家族病毒可以逐步感染系统的所有PE可执行文件，并且可以通过移动存储设备进行传播。此家族病毒会收集系统的配置信息并发送到指定的网站，从网站上下载一系列的恶意软件。此家族病毒使用了Rootkit技术进行隐藏，使杀毒软件难以查杀。
family_en_des: Virus/Win32.Xorer is a collection of virus that can infect all the PE executive files gradually and propagate through removable devices. This family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.                                        This family will collect the configuration information of  systems and send to the specific websites where it downloads a series of malware. This family adopts Rootkit technology to hide, which make it more difficult for antivirus software to detect and kill.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Wecod的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Wecod家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.Wecod is a colletion of Trojan that is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                              The variants of Wecod may have several risks, such as downloading other malware automatically, allowing attackers carrying out remote controls and so on.

family_cn_des: HackTool/Win32.Crypt是一类用于加密解密的黑客工具。此家族是通过行为来定性的黑客工具家族，家族的不同变种之间，很有可能除了都提供加密解密功能之外没有任何的关联。                                            Crypt黑客工具一般没有主动传播自身、感染其他文件、和直接损害当前主机安全的功能，仅作为加密解密工具来配合其他病毒或木马程序进行攻击行为。
family_en_des: HackTool/Win32.Crypt is a collection of hacktool that can carry out encryption and decryption. This family is characterized by behaviors, and there might be no other relations other than providing encryption and decryption among different  variants of this family.                   Crypt hacktool family does not have the following functionalities: spreading itself actively, infecting other files and compromising current host safety. It is only used as tool for encryption and decryption to assist other viruses or Trojans in attacks.

family_cn_des: Grayware/Win32.Ardamax[AdWare]是一个强制推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                     Ardamax广告软件一般捆绑于Ardamax的软件安装文件中。在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。
family_en_des: Grayware/Win32.Ardamax is a collection of malware that can push advertisements by force. This family is characterized by code gene,  and variants of this family have the same or similar source code or core technologies.                   This family is usually bundled in the Ardamax installation files. After installation, it appears as popup to spread advertisements.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Script.Suspic的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Suspic家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des: Trojan/Script.Suspic is characterized by code gene,  and variants of this family have the same or similar source code or core technologies.        There might be various risks of different variants, such as downloading other malware, allowing attackers to process remote control and so on.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Pasta的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Pasta家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.Pasta is characterized by code gene,  and variants of this family have the same or similar source code or core technologies.      There might be various risks of different variants, such as downloading other malware, allowing attackers to process remote control and so on.

family_cn_des: RiskWare/Win32.IMEStartup是一种具有一定风险的工具软件，通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。该软件存在一定的风险，其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。
family_en_des: RiskWare/Win32.IMEStartup is a collection of riskware that is for business, for free or open source. It has no malicious damage, but with a certain degree of risks. It can be used by other virus or Trojan writters because of its vulnerabilities.

family_cn_des: HackTool[Hoax]/Win32.FrauDrop是一类伪装欺诈用户的黑客工具。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                         FrauDrop通常对系统不具有任何危害。它通过警告信息等对用户进行欺骗，诱使用户购买其软件保护系统而使欺诈者获利，其出售的软件通常没有任何实际作用。
family_en_des: HackTool[Hoax]/Win32.FrauDrop is a collection of hacktool that can disguise itself to cheat on users. This family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same or similar source codes and core technologies.                  FrauDrop has no risks for systems. It cheats on users via warning information, inducing users to buy the so-called security software. The software it sells has no practical usages.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Constructor]/MSIL.Downloader是一类自动下载其他恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Downloader家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des: Trojan[Constructor]/MSIL.Downloader is a collection of Trojan that can download other malware automatically. It is characterized by code gene,  and variants of this family have the same or similar source code or core technologies.            After infecting user's system, it will take the following malicios actions: modifing system settings, downloading and running several malware, which makes great loss for user's system.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Pioneer是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Pioneer家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Pioneer is a collection of Trojan that uses system vulnerabilities to realize remote control. It is characterized by code gene,  and variants of this family have the same or similar source code or core technologies.  Pioneer family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Lebag的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Lebag家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.Lebag is a collection of Trojan that is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                                 Different variants of this family have several risks, such as downloading other malware automatically, allowing attackers in getting remote control and so on.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Persi是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Persi家族软件主要通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中进行传播，在安装时一般不告知用户其存在，在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。
family_en_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Persi is a collection of malware that can push advertisements by force. This family is characterized by code gene, and variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.             This family usually propagates via bundling in the installation files of other software. It is installed without the knowledge of user. After installation, it appears as popup.

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Juched是一类主要通过网络传播的蠕虫。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。
family_en_des: Worm/Win32.Juched is a collection of worm that propagates via network. It is characterized by code gene, and variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Krepper是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Krepper家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Krepper is a collection of Trojan that uses system vulnerabilities to realize remote control. It is characterized by code gene,  and variants of this family have the same or similar source code or core technologies.   Krepper family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege.

family_cn_des:
Trojan[Constructor]/Win32.Lmir是一类制作或生成其他恶意程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
Lmir木马通常被攻击者用来盗取网络游戏账号、密码和其他的虚拟财产信息进行牟利。此家族木马具有多种窃取用户信息的方法，包括劫持用户的输入，获取本地的配置信息、获取内存数据、监听网络数据包等。在获取到信息后，木马会通过电子邮件、HTTP提交、Socket接口等不同方式，将用户的信息转移给攻击者。
family_en_des: Trojan[Constructor]/Win32.Lmir is a collection of Trojan that makes or generates other malware. It is characterized by code gene,  and variants of this family have the same or similar source code or core technologies.            Lmir is usually used by attackers to steal internet game accounts and passwords so as to make profit. It can steal user's information by means of several ways, such as hijacking user's input, accessing local configuration information, accessing memory data, monitoring network data pack and so on. After accessing information, it will transfer to attackers by the following ways: e-mail, HTTP proposal, Socket port.

family_cn_des: Backdoor.Win32.Koutodoor该病毒通过病毒驱动文件修改注册表，让IE浏览器加载指定的病毒组件并过滤注册表操作来隐藏自身，最终病毒会修改IE浏览器的默认主页、收藏夹、导航和快捷键参数，使得用户打开IE浏览器就会访问黑客指定的恶意网址，因此他是基于特定行为命名的家族。
family_en_des: Backdoor.Win32.Koutodoor is a collection of malware that modifies registry key by virus driver files. It will let the IE browser download specific virus modules and filtrate registry operations to hide itself. As a result, the virus will modify IE browser's  default homepage, favorites, navigations and shortcut parameters, which leads to accessint the specific malicious websites that attackers have appointed when user opens the browser. Therefore, this family is characterized by specific behaviors.

Backdoor.Win32.Xtreme is a collection of malicious backdoor that is characterized by specific behaviors.                              After running, it will decrypt the related configuration files from itself. Then it executes the following operations step by step according to the related parameters in the configuration files. It can also inject some process files (such as svchost.exe and iexplore.exe), and connecting the specific Web server of the Internet, using dynamic domain name server to connect the computer of remote malicious attacker to let them control the compromised operation system remotely.                        In addition, this family will also force the compromised system executing the following actions: downloading and running arbitrary files, uploading files to the FTP serverl; prapagating via removable devices, recording keyboard informaiton and stealing the private information in the system; modifying system settings, running or terminating applications in the system, or installing other virus and Trojan plug-ins.

family_cn_des: Trojan-Downloader.BAT.Banload该病毒家族属木马类，病毒运行后，复制自身到%system32%\csrss\下，连接网络、下载病毒文件，修改注册表，添加启动项，以达到随机启动的目的，该病毒下载的文件可以盗取用户银行账号和密码，他是基于特定行为来命名的家族。
family_en_des: Trojan-Downloader.BAT.Banload is a collection of Trojan that is characterized by specific behaviors. After being executed, it will replicate itself to %system32%\csrss\, connecting the Internet, modifing registry key, adding startup items. The files that it downloaded can be used to steal user's accounts and passwords.

family_cn_des: 该家族为色情程序，运行后会弹出一个连接色情网络的窗口。用户可以进行连接进入色情网络，目前此连接地址不能正常打开。
family_en_des: It is a collection of porn program that can pop up a window links to the porn network. Users can connect to the porn website. Currently the link address cannot be accessed.

family_cn_des: Pakes家族是运行于X64平台下的木马程序。此木马投放器会在被感染的系统中投放并安装恶意的或是有潜在威胁的程序。通常情况下，它会在系统中安装后门，允许黑客对系统进行远程控制，并下载、安装其他恶意程序，对系统造成进一步伤害。
family_en_des: Pakes is a family of Trojans running on X64 platforms. The Trojan will drop and install malicious or potentially threatening malware. In common, it will install a backdoor in the infected system, by which the Trojan creator takes remote control of the system. After that, it will download and install other malware to do further damage to the system.
action_des: Pakes家族是木马类程序。运行于x64平台下，样本运行后会获取系统相关信息，记录用户的一些行为信息，可能会下载其它恶意程序。

family_cn_des:
Wauchos 是一类能够下载恶意程序的木马家族。该木马被执行后，会将自身以多种扩展名复制到计算机中，并修改注册表项实现开机自动运行。该家族样本多使用AutoIt脚本编写生成。具有反调试和反虚拟机的功能。
该木马会在计算中进行信息窃取等恶意操作，窃取的信息包括操作系统信息，系统设置信息，IP地址等，并将这些信息上传到远程服务器。同时，该木马还会从远程服务器中接收数据和命令，下载并执行其他恶意程序，对系统造成进一步伤害。
family_en_des:
Members in the family of Wauchos are Trojans downloading malware from Internet. Once executed, the Trojan will copy itself to the computer with various extension names. It may also modify the registry entries to realize its running on every system start. Samples of this family are usually written in AutoIt Script which gives them the abilities of anti-debugging and anti-VMware.
The Trojan will steal information about the operating system, the system settings, IP address and send these data to a remote server. Meanwhile, the Trojan will download data and execute commands from the server. After that, it will download more malware to do further damage to the system.
action_des: Wauchos家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多使用AutoIt脚本编写生成。具有反调试和反虚拟机的功能，运行后，可能会下载恶意程序，进行安装执行。

family_cn_des:
Mocton家族的木马无法自行传播，但可以在远程攻击者的控制下进行多种恶意操作。
一旦被执行，该木马便会将自身复制到系统中，并修改相关注册表项，以实现开机自动运行。该木马会在后台创建两个进程，形成守护进程，联系远程服务器发送在被感染计算中收集的信息，并下载执行多种恶意程序，对系统造成进一步伤害。
family_en_des:
Mocton is a family of malicious programs which cannot spread by themselves. The Trojan is controlled by the attacker to perform various malicious behaviors. 
Once executed, the Trojan will copy itself to the system and modify some registry entries to realize its running on every system start. The Trojan will create two processes in system and form a daemon to protect its undisrupted running in the background. The Trojan will contact some remote hosts to send the data it has gathered in the infected computer, download and execute additional malware to do further damage to the system.
action_des:
Mocton家族是木马类程序。运行后会拷贝自身到系统文件夹，会创建两个进程，形成守护进程，可能会获取用户信息，
发送到远程服务器。

family_cn_des: Backdoor.Win32.AutoIt此木马采用AutoIt打包的方式隐蔽自己的家族，因此他是基于特殊传播方式的基因关联来命名的。                           AutoIt将恶意程序与AutoIt脚本打包成一个程序，并且将图标和文件名伪装成IE浏览器。运行时会替换IE浏览器，释放恶意程序，注入恶意代码到系统进程中。同时，修改注册表指向被替换的IE浏览器，将其设置为开机执行。
family_en_des: Backdoor.Win32.AutoIt is a collection of Trojan that hides itself via AutoIt package. Therefore, it is characterized by specific propagation way.                         AutoIt puts the malicious programs and AutoIt script into one single program and disguises the icons and file names as IE browser. It will exchange IE browser, release the malicious program and inject malware into the process. Meanwhile, it sets the exchanged IE browser as boot execution.

family_cn_des:
Backdoor.MSIL.IRCBot是一个含有后门程序允许黑客通过利用Internet Relay Chat(IRC)远程控制用户电脑的病毒家族,因此它是基于特殊传播方式的基因关联来命名的家族。                      IRCBot能下载和运行黑客指定的文件.
当程序被执行后,它会拷贝自身到%windir%\winapii\winapii.exe并运行。它也会添加键值
winapii %windir%\Winapii\Winapii.exe
到注册表HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run。
该恶意代码含有自己的IRC客户端,黑客就可以通过事先设定的密码控制受感染电脑。
family_en_des: Backdoor.MSIL.IRCBot is a collection of malware that can control user's computer remotely via Internet Relay Chat (IRC). It is characterized by specific propagation way.                                                      IRCBot downloads and runs the specific files. After being executed, it copies itself to %windir%\winapii\winapii.exe and runs. It adds the key winapii %windir%\Winapii\Winapii.exe to the registry HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run. It has its own IRC client, then the attacker can control the affected computer via pre-settled passwords.

family_cn_des: 一旦用户电脑中安装了该木马，它就可以远程连接本机，记录键盘输入，释放病毒，以及更新本机的ICQ木马。
family_en_des: It is a collection of malware that can record keyboard information. Once being installed on user's computer, it will then connect to the host remotely, record keyboard input, release virus and update the ICQ Trojan.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.PEF13B是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                PEF13B木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of PEF13B is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan-Downloader.JS.Adload是一个典型的流氓软件家族，因此他基于特定行为来命名的家族。                  Adload的危害主要有：1.弹出广告；2.盗窃用户密码：3.多数安全工具无法查杀 。                              该流氓软件随其它共享软件被悄悄地安装在用户的计算机上，并且无法卸载。同时，该流氓软件采用一些病毒技术来进行自我保护，即使有经验的高级电脑用户也很难短时间内将其清除干净。该流氓软件会自动下载广告程序，并不定期地强行弹出广告窗口，影响用户正常使用电脑。
family_en_des: Trojan-Downloader.JS.Adload is a collection of rogueware. It is characterized by specific behaviors.          The harmful effects it brings include: ads popup, stealing user's passwords and making security software be unable to detect.                                                     It is installed on the computer with other shared software and cannnot be uninstalled. In addition, it uses some techniques to protect itself, so it is hard for even professional user to get rid of it in a short time. It downloads ads automatically and makes ads popup irregularly, which has influence on user's normal experience.

family_cn_des:
Win32.Swizzor是一种特洛伊病毒，通过Internet连接下载另一个应用软件，然后运行它。
下载程序的名称加密在特洛伊代码中："wayb_ao.exe"。

解压缩后在临时文件夹生成另一个程序，并运行它。这个程序的名称是任意的（如："uyh9092.TMP"）。运行时，它生成一个任意的dll文件（如："crgrzoommemsh.dll"），很多.gif文件，5个链接 ("Adult.lnk", "Gambling and Online Cassinos.lnk", "MP3 Music Search.lnk", "News and Sports.lnk", "Online Movies.lnk")，和一个包含它们图标的数据库 。
family_en_des: Win32.Swizzor is a collection of Trojan that connects the Internet to download and run another malware. The name of the downloaded program is encrypted in Trojan code "wayb_ao.exe".                    After decompression, it generates and runs another program in the temporary archive. The name of the program is in ransom. The program generates an arbitrary dll file(such as crgrzoommemsh.dll), several .gif files and 5 links("Adult.lnk", "Gambling and Online Cassinos.lnk", "MP3 Music Search.lnk", "News and Sports.lnk", "Online Movies.lnk")  and a library that covers their icons.

family_cn_des: 该病毒伪装成游戏，电影或软件来期骗KaZaA或Morpheus用户下载并运行它，从而感染系统；该病毒会随机的增加其拷贝文件的长度；如果它发现KaZaA已被安装，则将在注册表项HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareKazaaLocalContent中添加：Dir 012345:C:\%Windir%SysConfig DisableSharing 0x00000000 (0)， 它将使\%windir%SysConfig成为KaZaA的一个共享目录，使其它的KaZaA用户可以下载。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that can disguise itself as game, movie or software to trick KaZaA or Morpheus user to download and run it. It will expand the length of its copy files. If it found KaZaA has been installed, it will add Dir 012345:C:\%Windir%SysConfig DisableSharing 0x00000000 (0) in the registry HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareKazaaLocalContent.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Demp是释放恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Demp木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放安装其他恶意程序。很多容易被查杀的恶意程序通过隐藏在此类木马内部以躲过反病毒软件的检测，进而感染用户计算机。此家族的部分变种还具有强制关闭杀毒软件的能力，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。
family_en_des:
The family of Demp is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will release other malware. These malicious programs hide behind the Trojan to escape from being detected so as to compromise the user system. Some variants can even disable some anti-virus software, thus increase the threat level.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Harnig是自动下载其他恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                          Harnig木马是传播范围很广的木马下载器，功能比较单一，它在感染用户系统后，会下载多种恶意程序，通过安装付费模式获取利益，常常被用于木马的分发。
family_en_des:
The family of Harnig defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is widely spread. After infecting a system, it will download various malware and make profits by pay-per-install. It is usually used to distribute Trojans.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.AdMoke是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        AdMoke一般通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中，或是通过挂在网站上吸引用户点击进行传播。广告软件在安装进用户系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，防止被用户卸载。它一般通过系统弹窗或是修改浏览器主页进行广告，大部分的广告软件还会暗中收集用户的信息，例如浏览历史记录等，来研究用户的喜好，进而有针对性的推送广告。为了获取更多利益，该类软件制作者通常会使用很多黑客技术。
family_en_des:
The family of AdMoke is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The grayware usually spreads by being bundled with other installation file or being hooked on some websites to attract users to click and install. It displays ads via pops-up or modifying the web browser’s homepage. It collects user data secretly to explore the user’s interests so as to prompt targeted ads. To obtain more profits, it will also employ some hacking techniques.

family_cn_des: Worm[Net-Worm]/Win32.Mytob是主要通过网络传播的蠕虫。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                          Mytob蠕虫一般通过邮件传播，感染用户系统后通过IRC进行远程控制。Mytob的部分变种通过攻击系统的漏洞进行传播。
family_en_des:
The family of Mytob is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The worm usually spreads via email. After infecting a computer, it will take remote control of the system by IRC. Some variants of the family can even spread by attacking the system vulnerabilities.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Nvert是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Nvert木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Nvert is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan performs various malicious behaviors such as deleting or modifying data, monitor the network connection, allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/VBS.Redlof是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                   RedLof木马运行后会感染机器中的大量网页类型文件，并在电脑的所有文件夹中都放入两个隐藏的木马文件。只要用户观看被感染的目录，木马便可运行。该木马大量运行并进行交互感染，消耗大量的系统资源，会导致计算机系统运行速度越来越慢甚至崩溃。
family_en_des:
The family of Redlof is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After running in a computer, the Trojan will infect a lot of .html files, and release two hidden Trojan files into all folders. Once the user visits the infected folder, the Trojans are activated. These Trojans are executed and infected interactively, thus consume a lot of system resources and slow down or even crash the computer system.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Alyak是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Alyak木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Alyak is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan performs various malicious behaviors such as deleting or modifying data, monitor the network connection, allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Optix是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Optix后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过控制僵尸网络进行多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但其不能自行传播，需要攻击者的控制。
family_en_des:
The family of Optix is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Optix backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des:
StartPage是一类未经用户允许篡改网络浏览器主页的木马家族。
该木马家族会在计算机上进行各种恶意活动，其行为方式也千差万别。在很多情况下，该木马是由其他文件投放的，因此删除该木马文件本身是不够的，投放器也必须被找到并删除。该木马的启动项也必须从Windows注册表中删除。
StartPage木马通常会改变网络浏览器的页面设置，有时搜索网页的常用设置也会被篡改。此类木马中的绝大多数都会影响IE浏览器，也有部分会影响其他浏览器。StartPage是广告件幕后操作者的常用木马。
StartPage木马可以是一个脚本文件（VBS或JavaScript）或二进制应用（Javax小应用程序或Win32应用）。在REG文件格式（Windows Registry export/import file）中也会存在该木马。通常，StartPage木马修改注册表以改变浏览器的设置。然后有些木马会将自身注册为IE的组件，因此只有浏览器启动时才能激活。一旦被激活，它们会在浏览器中提取HTML页面并打开它们。
family_en_des: StartPage is a collection of Trojan that tampers Internet browser homepage. This family could carry out many different malicious actions on computers. In most cases, it is dropped by other malware; therefore, it is not enough to just delete this Trojan family, and the dropper should be deleted, too.                                        StartPage normally modifies the setting page of the Internet browser and the common settings of the search page. Most Trojans of this family have effects on IE browser, and part afftects other browsers. This family is one of Trojan families that attackers usually use.            It may be a script file (VBS OR JavaScript) or binary application (Javax app or Win32 app). It modifies the settings of browser through changing the registry. Then it injects itself into IE modules. So it is activited only when the browser is started. After being activited, it extracts and opens the HTML page and in the browser.

family_cn_des:
Qhost是一类改变Hosts文件内容以屏蔽某些网站的木马家族。该木马能够通过专门用于改变Hosts文件的黑客服务器来重定向细节,从而实现对密码信息的窃取。
Qhost一般通过挂马漏洞利用工具或其他恶意程序安装在计算机上，还可以通过间谍邮件或P2P网络进行下载。已知的被Qhost利用的文件名数量众多。在用户试图搜索网络、进入银行网站以及金融服务网站时，Qhost会通过改变Hosts文件的内容来实现将用户重定向到其他服务器。Hosts文件内容被改变后，用户无法进入安全网站或进行Windows更新，还会被提示网站认证失效。
Qhost的恶意行为因变种的存在而多种多样，其中包括：
向用户展示图片以实现对Hosts文件改变行为的隐蔽；
通过由黑客控制的服务器重定向浏览器路径；
改变网络浏览器的开始页面；
在Windows启动时自动运行；
连接到远程服务器，追踪全球范围内有多少台计算机被感染并告知攻击者；
使用具有诱惑性的文件名诱导用户进行下载，通过P2P网络进行传播；
安装其他恶意程序。
Qhost家族针对不同的平台，可以作为脚本文件（BAT、VBS或JS）或可执行文件（Win32）运行。
family_en_des: Qhost is a collection of malware that changes the Hosts file content to shield some websites. It can redirect details via specific hacker server so as to steal the passwords.                                               Qhost is installed in the computer via download-by vulnerability tool and other malware. It can be downloaded by spy e-mails or P2P network. After changing the Hosts file content, users cannot access the security websites or update Windows. Also, users will get a notice of failure of website identification.                                  There are a variety of malicious behaviors , including: showing pictures to users in order to hide the behavior of changing the Hosts file; redirecting the browser path by the servers that attackers control; changing the start page of the browser; running automatically when Windows is open.

family_cn_des:
Refroso是一类运行在操作系统后台，未经用户允许收集并下载文件的木马家族。该木马会对用户的防火墙造成威胁，可能导致远程攻击者入侵计算机系统。Refroso的入侵可能会带来可怕的后果，因此在它进行恶意行为之前必须尽快从系统上清除。
Refroso偷偷潜入用户计算机系统，最常利用间谍邮件附件以及虚假的解编码器包入侵系统，也可以在恶意网站的协助下入侵。一旦Refroso入侵成功，便会降低计算机的性能，将安全系统打开漏洞，造成其他恶意程序，比如任意件、恶意程序、间谍件和击键记录器等更容易入侵系统。所有这些恶意程序都会追踪并窃取敏感信息。除了降低系统性能外，Refroso还会毁坏文件，导致信息丢失甚至造成系统崩溃。
family_en_des: Refroso is a collection of Trojan that collects and downloads files without user's permission. It might bring risks to user's firewall and lead to the intrusion by remote attacker. Refroso is too dangerous that we should get rid of it from the system before it takes malicious actions.   Refroso uses spy e-mail attachment and false decompression package to get into user's system. It can slow down the computer's performance, open vulnerabilities of security system and make it easier for other malware to intrude. What's worse, it will bring file damages. information loss and even system crashes.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Packed]/Win32.Krap是一类盗取账号信息的木马家族的统称。此家族命名是一个通过通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                 Krap家族木马入侵用户系统后，会将自身隐藏在系统文件里，生成dll文件感染系统进程，监视正在运行的窗口标题。如果发现窗口标题有与安全有关的字符串，则尝试以发送垃圾信息等方式使其出错或自动关闭。如果发现窗口标题与特定的网络游戏有关，则利用键盘钩子、内存截取或者封包截取等方式窃取用户的游戏账号，密码和所在区服等信息。将这些信息发送到指定的服务器中，使网络游戏玩家的账号装备等丢失。Krap家族的木马不仅可以通过修改注册表实现开机自启动，还可以在后台自动更新。
family_en_des: It hides itself in the system file and generates dll file after injecting user's computer. It monitors the on-going window title. If it found the title contains security-related strings, it will shut down automatically by trying to send spam information; it the title has something to do with online games, it will steal user's accounts and passwords as well as other information by means of keyboard hook, memory interception or package interception.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Lop是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Lop广告软件在安装进用户系统后,会修改浏览器设置，添加工具条和搜索栏。该软件还会收集用户的信息，例如搜索记录等。
family_en_des:
The family of Lop is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After being installed in a computer, it will modify the web browser’s settings, add toolbar and search bar. It can also collect user data, such as the search records.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Constructor]/MSIL.AccPhish是一类能够制作或生成恶意程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。生成的AccPhish木马通常为盗取用户账户密码等信息的盗号木马，
family_en_des:
The family of AccPhish is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to make or generate malware which is used to steal user accounts and passwords.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Vanbot是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Vanbot后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过控制僵尸网络进行多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但其不能自行传播，需要攻击者的控制。
family_en_des:
The family of Vanbot is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Vanbot backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Virus/DOS.Stsv的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。Stsv病毒不是内存驻留型病毒，家族变种大多以感染系统中的.com文件为目的。
family_en_des:
The family of Stsv is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The virus is not memory resident. The variants of the family mainly infect .com files in the system.

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Shakblades是主要通过网络传播的蠕虫。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                          Shakblades蠕虫感染用户系统后，会搜索计算机的网络资源状态，根据一定规则或是随机选取计算机尝试连接，连接成功则对其进行感染。该家族的部分变种还可以通过邮件附件，IRC聊天工具进行传播。
family_en_des:
The family of Shakblades is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a compute, the worm will check the status of the network resource and try to connect a remote computer according to some rules or in a random way. Once the connection is successful, the worm will infect the target. Some variants of the family can also spread via email attachment and IRC.

family_cn_des: RiskWare/Win32.FakeLPK家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的风险软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。风险软件通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。FakeLPK修改了系统的DLL文件，很多木马程序也具有此行为，因此木马可以利用此软件进行伪装。
family_en_des:
The family of FakeLPK is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
A riskware is usually commercial, free or open-sourced. It has no malicious purpose itself, but contains vulnerabilities which may be exploited by other viruses or Trojans. FakeLPK is able to modify the dll. files in a system. Some Trojans also have this feature, so they may disguise as the FakeLPK software to avoid being detected.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Exploit]/MSWord.CVE-2012-0158是一类通过漏洞攻击用户系统的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。攻击者通常利用某一软件的或者系统的漏洞在用户的计算机上执行恶意代码，进而感染用户系统。                     攻击者通过CVE-2012-0158漏洞可以制造出畸形的.doc和rtf等文件，如果用户打开了这种恶意制作的文件，其系统就很可能被感染。
family_en_des:
The family of CVE-2012-0158 is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan exploits the vulnerabilities in a software or system to execute malicious commands. By exploiting the vulnerability of CVE-2012-0158, the Trojan can generate abnormal .doc and .rtf files. If the user opens the files, the system may be infected.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/AndroidOS.Jedan是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Jedan广告软件一般通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中，或是通过挂在网站上吸引用户点击进行传播。广告软件在安装进用户系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，防止被用户卸载。它一般通过系统弹窗或是修改浏览器主页进行广告，大部分的广告软件还会暗中收集用户的信息，例如浏览历史记录等，来研究用户的喜好，进而有针对性的推送广告。为了获取更多利益，该类软件制作者通常会使用很多黑客技术。
family_en_des:
The family of Jedan is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The grayware usually spreads by being bundled with other installation file or being hooked on some websites to attract users to click and install. It displays ads via pops-up or modifying the web browser’s homepage. It collects user data secretly to explore the user’s interests so as to prompt targeted ads. To obtain more profits, it will also employ some hacking techniques.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Ejik是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Ejik广告软件一般通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中，或是通过挂在网站上吸引用户点击进行传播。广告软件在安装进用户系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，防止被用户卸载。它一般通过系统弹窗或是修改浏览器主页进行广告，大部分的广告软件还会暗中收集用户的信息，例如浏览历史记录等，来研究用户的喜好，进而有针对性的推送广告。为了获取更多利益，该类软件制作者通常会使用很多黑客技术。
family_en_des:
The family of Ejik is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The grayware usually spreads by being bundled with other installation file or being hooked on some websites to attract users to click and install. It displays ads via pops-up or modifying the web browser’s homepage. It collects user data secretly to explore the user’s interests so as to prompt targeted ads. To obtain more profits, it will also employ some hacking techniques.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.RAdmin是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                      Radmin (Remote Administrator)是一款远程控制软件，它将远程控制、外包服务组件、以及网络监控结合到一个系统里，提供快速、强健而安全的工具包。Radmin在被控端以服务的方式运行，通过特定的IP实现远程控制，记录屏幕影像、鼠标和键盘的操作数据并加密传输给控制者。
family_en_des:
The family of RAdmin is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Radmin is short for Remote Administrator which is a fast and secure remote PC access software
. It combines remote control, outsourcing service component and network monitoring together. Radmin runs as service in the controlled terminal and makes remote control via a specified IP. It can record the screenshot, the keystroke record as well as other data, then encrypt and send them to the controller.

family_cn_des: Virus/MSExcel.Laroux的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                     Laroux是第一个为MS Excel编写的宏病毒。当用户打开被感染的Excel文档时，其它的活动文档也将被感染，文件属性部分的标题、主题、作者、关键字和内容被病毒清除。该病毒的宏不对用户隐藏，可以用Excel的工具|宏选项找到它。
family_en_des:
The family of Laroux is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Laroux is the first macro virus written by MS Excel. When a user opens the infected excel file, other 
excel files will also be infected. The title, theme, author, keywords and content in the file attribute are all cleaned. Not hidden from the user, macro of the virus can be found in options in Excel’s toolbar.

family_cn_des: Apptom家族是木马类程序。它被嵌入在微软PowerPoint数据文件的一个漏洞中。该漏洞能够在微软Office 2000、XP、2003以及Mac Office系统中运行。该家族样本多为PPT文件，运行后可能会针对特定版本的程序进行溢出，可能会执行恶意程序。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan dropper embedded within an exploit in Microsoft PowerPoint (.PPS / .PPT) data files. Most of the sample files are PPT and may overflow for programs of specific version. The exploit could execute on vulnerability systems using Microsoft Office 2000, XP, 2003 and Mac Office.

family_cn_des:
Gamevance是一类广告件，除和间谍件或跟踪件捆绑时，一般不具有威胁性。
计算机被感染Gamevance的唯一途径是通过Gamevance.com的网站。该网站通过提供给用户免费的在线游戏诱导用户同意其隐私政策和终端用户授权协议。然而终端用户授权协议是隐藏在隐私协议中的，用户需要点击单独的链接查看此协议。一旦用户受骗点击链接，就相当于允许Gamevance安装在计算机中。Gamevance的终端用户授权协议并未清楚地陈述这些情况。为了换取免费的在线游戏服务，用户同意通过Gamevance软件以文本链接、横幅广告或弹出广告的形式接受各种广告宣传。这些广告的选择是基于用户的网络浏览历史和浏览网页时的习惯和兴趣等。
Gamevance监控用户的计算机活动，将这些信息保存并发送给Gamevance。然而，还无法知晓Gamevance都收集了哪些信息，以及用户的身份等信息是否也包含在这些被收集的信息中。
family_en_des: Gamevance is a collection of adware that brings risks when being bundled with spyware or tracking software.                  The only way to infect computer of Gamevance is by website Gamevance.com. This website leads users to agree the private policy and end-user license agreement through providing free online games. The end-user license agreement is hidden in the private agreement, which means users need to click the seperated link to check it. After clicking it, Gamevance will be installed on the computer. In order to exchange for free online game service, users agreed to accept various ad promotion by Gamevance in terms of text link, banner ad or popups. The selection of ads is based on user's website browsing history and habits or interets.

family_cn_des:
KungFu系列病毒的特征非常典型，感染此病毒的手机会自动在后台静默下载并安装某些软件，造成用户流量话费损失以及系统全自动安装广告软件。当手机感染此病毒后使用常规安全软件无法彻底清除，甚至将手机恢复至出厂设置也无法解决问题。Android.KungFu整体架构由两个模块构成，第一个模块(Loader)会在宿主运行到特定场景时激活，随后执行提权操作，并加载第二个模块(Payload)，Payload模块则常驻内存，执行各种威胁手机安全的操作。
当Loader模块被激活后，首先会试图获得ROOT权限。根据宿主软件的不同，Loader会采用不同的策略，如果Loader宿主本身需要ROOT权限， Loader就会附着在宿主需要以ROOT权限执行的代码之后运行（例如一键VPN免费版，其中捆绑的Android.KungFu会嵌入在安装VPN的代码中）。如果宿主本身不需要ROOT权限，Loader会利用公开的漏洞（NPROC_RLIMIT）在后台静默获取ROOT权限（例如音乐随身听）。由于这个漏洞广泛的存在于Android2.1和2.2设备上，所以，即使手机没有ROOT权限，多数手机依然会受这个病毒威胁。
family_en_des: KungFu is a collection of malware that downloads and installs some software without user's permission, which results in traffic lose and installation of adware automatically. It is hard for normal security software to clear it out completely. Even retoring phones to factory settings cannot solve the problem. The whole architecture of Android.KungFu is consist of 2 modules. The first module -Loader- will be activated when the carrier runs under specific situation and then extracts privileges and downloads the second module (Payload). Payload module is resident memory and carries out operations that threatens the security of cellphones. When Loader module is activated, it tries to gain the ROOT privilege firstly. Loader will adopt different strategies according to the difference of carrier software. It exists widely in Android 2.1 and Android 2.2, so most cellphones are sitll being threatening by it, though these phones have no ROOT privilege.

family_cn_des: 这是一个广告软件，会修改注册表中关于浏览器的数据，弹出病毒作者指定的广告页面，干扰用户的正常工作。它的部分变种可能拥有远程控制或下载器的功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that can modify the browser data in the registry and pop out the specific ad page appointed by the virus writer. Parts of its variants might have functionalities of remote control and downloader.

family_cn_des: P2P-Worm.Win32.Picsys是一个利用Kazaa共享文件进行传播的蠕虫。“皮斯”运行后，自我复制到系统目录下，文件名是SystemConfig.exe。修改注册表，实现开机自启。在系统目录下创建Media文件夹，自我复制大量病毒文件到该文件夹下，通过修改注册表将Media文件夹保存到Kazaa共享文件夹下，实现网络共享传播。
family_en_des: P2P-Worm.Win32.Picsys is a collection of worm that spreads via Kazaa sharing files. After running, it replicates itself into system directory with SystemConfig.exe as the file name. It takes the following malicious actions: modifying the registry, reelizng boot startup, storing Media archive into Kazaa sharing file archive to realize network sharing propagation.

family_cn_des:
Shutdowner是一个专门强制关闭用户的电脑系统的木马家族。 
该病毒是一个专门强制关闭用户的电脑系统的恶意程序，运行后，它会自动地使电脑进入关机状态，给用户的电脑的正常操作造成困扰，由于电脑系统没有得以正常关闭，可能会造成大量文件数据的丢失以及文件系统出错等问题。 
该病毒运行后，会释放NetMonInstaller.exe和npf_mgm.exe等病毒文件,发送ARP攻击包，感染局域网里的其它电脑,造成无法上网。自动连接到hxxp://down.xxxx.cn/xxx站点,进行病毒下载。
family_en_des: Shutdowner is a collection of Trojan that shuts down user's computer system forcibly. After running, it  puts computer into shutdown stage automatically, which brings trouble to user's normal operation. It might result in large amounts of data lose and file system failure, because the computer system is shut down abnormally.                                             It releases malware NetMonInstaller.exe and npf_mgm.exe, infecting other computers in the LAN. It connects to hxxp://down.xxxx.cn/xxx to download malware.

family_cn_des:
P2P-Worm.Win32.SpyBot是一种在线网络聊天系统机器人（BOT）的开放性源代码蠕虫病毒，由于它的开放性和管理方式都来源于这些分布的机器人，这些广泛的机器人变量都有一些很微小的不同，通过远程用户在线聊天系统可以最多控制一台计算机的一些管理功能，同时它也有能力传播到点对点网络（P2P Networks）。
此病毒是透过 KaZaA 文件共享和mIRC 扩散的蠕虫，也会透过受感染计算机的后门而扩散。藉由连上特殊设定的IRC Server，W32.Spybot.Worm 可以执行不同后门功能，加入不同的频道倾听指令。
family_en_des: P2P-Worm.Win32.SpyBot is a collection of open source worm of online chat system BOT. Both the openess and management are from these distributed BOTs, so BOT variables have suttle difference. It can control several management functionalities of a computer, and also is able to spread to P2P Networks.                                                 It propagates via KaZaA file sharement and mIRC as well as backdoor of the compromised computer. After connecting to the specific IRC Server, it can execute different backdoor functionalities and join to various channels to stand by.

family_cn_des: 这是一个广告程序，它能收集用户计算机的信息，并弹出谎报系统漏洞的窗口恐吓用户，使用户购买上面所说的修复程序，该修复程序本身是个欺诈程序，并不能修复系统漏洞.
family_en_des: It is a collection  of malware that can collect user's computer information. It pops window of reporting system vulnerabilities to threanten user. Then it makes user buy the fixed programs which is fake and cannot fix the vulnerabilities.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Exploit]/JS.CVE-2010-0188是一类通过漏洞攻击用户系统的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                      CVE-2010-0188漏洞是Adobe Reader和Acrobat采用的开源TIFF图像解析库libtiff上存在的缓冲区溢出漏洞，远程攻击者通过诱使用户打开恶意TIFF图像文件来触发此漏洞，进而在用户系统上执行远程指令，控制用户系统。
family_en_des:
The family of CVE-2010-0188 is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
CVE-2010-0188 is the buffer overflow vulnerability existing in the open-sourced image resolver library—libtiff which is used by Adobe Reader and Acrobat. The remote attacker induces the user to open the malicious TIFF image to activate the vulnerability

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Powp是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Powp木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Powp is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Worm[Email]/Win32.Warezov是主要通过邮件传播的蠕虫。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                     Warezov（也被称为Stration或Stratio）是感染Windows系统的蠕虫。该家族的蠕虫的特点是变种生成速度非常快，最高时可达到每30分钟产生一个新变种。被感染的系统会访问指定的服务器跟新蠕虫版本。这一特点使传统的病毒特征码检测方式很难检测出此蠕虫。                        Warezov首次发现于2006年9月。该蠕虫主要通过邮件附件的方式进行传播，并且经常通过网络更新自身。网络安全公司F-Secure与网络服务商合作，关闭了蠕虫更新的服务器，防止其继续制作新变种。                                                   Warezov蠕虫采用了社会工程学的方法进行传播。带毒邮件通常声称用户系统已被感染，需要下载执行邮件附件进行修复，用户一旦打开邮件附件，其系统就被感染了。还有部分家族变种通过即时通讯工具发送URL链接进行传播。
family_en_des:
The family of Warezov is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Warezov, also called Stration or Stratio, is the family of worms infecting Windows. Its variants can be generated at an amazing speed. A new variant can be created every 30 minutes at the peak. The infected system will visit a specified server to download new variants, which makes it difficult to detect based on traditional virus-feature detection.
Warezov was first found in September 2006. It mainly spreads via email attachment and updates itself on Internet. It was due to the cooperation of F-Secure and ISPs that the update server of Warezov is shut down and prevented from generating new variants.  
Warezov employs social engineering to spread. The user may receive an email which claims that the user system has been infected and the user has to download the email attachment to recover the system. Once the email attachment is opened, the system will be compromised. Some variants of Warezov can even spread by sending URL via IM.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Tiny是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Tiny后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过控制僵尸网络进行多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但其不能自行传播，需要攻击者的控制。
family_en_des:
The family of Tiny is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Tiny backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Tolsty是自动下载其他恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                          Tolsty木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，实现开机启动。此木马能下载多种恶意程序并安装执行。此类木马常作为攻击的发起步骤，其下载的其他恶意程序作为攻击的后续，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。
family_en_des:
The family of Tolsty is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will change the system settings and realize the function of Autorun after the system booting. The Trojan is able to download and execute various malware which may do more damage to the system.

family_cn_des: RiskWare[RemoteAdmin]/Win32.WinVNC家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的风险软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                  WinVNC是VNC (Virtual Network Computing)软件的Windows版本。该软件能够通过RFB协议实现远程监视，一切键盘，鼠标的行为和显示器的数据都将被记录并传输。VNC最早是由英国剑桥的Olivetti & Oracle实验室开发的。VNC的最早版本和现在大部分的版本都是开源的。
family_en_des:
The family of WinVNC is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
WinVNC is the Windows version of VNC (Virtual Network Computing). It can use the RFB (Remote Frame Buffer) protocol to realize remote monitoring of keyboard and mouse events, record and transmit these data.   
VNC was originally developed at the Olivetti & Oracle Research Lab in Cambridge, United Kingdom. Most versions of it are open-sourced.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Scarsi是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Scarsi木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Scarsi is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Drowor的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                     Drowor家族内的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如，允破坏数据文件资料，强行终止杀毒软件运行等。
family_en_des:
The family of Drowor is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The variants in this family may have various threats such as damaging file and data, terminate antivirus functions and so on.

family_cn_des:
Trojan[FakeAV]/Win32.Onescan是伪装成反病毒软件故意歪曲用户计算机的安全状态的木马统称。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
Onescan木马感染用户系统后，将修改系统设置，弹出窗口提示用户系统存在安全威胁，并要求用户购买杀毒软件。当用户支付金钱后，恶意软件将提示用户安全威胁已经清除。实际上，用户看到的是虚假的安全提醒，购买的也是虚假的安全软件。该家族部分变种会影响系统的正常运行，以此增强其安全威胁提示的可信度。
family_en_des:
The family of Onescan is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan disguises as anti-virus software and distorts the security status of the user system. After infecting a computer, the Trojan will modify the system settings, display pop-up to warn the present threat existing in the system. The user will be induced to buy the anti-virus software. After the payment successes, the software will claim that the system is clean and safe. But in actual, the warning and the software are all false. Some variants of the family may have a negative influence on the system’s running, thus increase the reliability of its warning.

family_cn_des:
PayPal家族是一种密码窃取类木马程序。该恶意代码是使用script脚本编写的网页文件，用来欺骗用户输入银行账号密码，从而窃取用户信息。
密码窃取类木马程序被用来窃取受感染系统中的用户账户信息，例如登陆记录和密码等。成功启动后，密码窃取类木马程序会搜索存储敏感数据或注册表的系统文件。若发现这样的敏感数据，该种木马程序会立即将信息发送至“幕后操纵者”。通常采用邮件、FTP（文件传输协定）、网页或其他方式来传输所窃取的数据。
family_en_des:
PayPal is a collection of Trojan-PSW program. It is a kind of web file that compiled by script. It is used to seduce user to enter bank account and password in order to steal user’s information.
Trojan-PSW programs are designed to steal user account information such as logins and passwords from infected computers. When launched, a PSW Trojan searches system files which store a range of confidential data or the registry. If such data is found, the Trojan sends it to its “master.” Email, FTP, the web (including data in a request), or other methods may be used to transit the stolen data.
action_des: PayPal家族是木马类程序。是使用script脚本编写的网页文件，用来欺骗用户输入银行账号密码，从而窃取用户信息。

family_cn_des:
Osirdoor家族是一种后门类的木马程序。该家族样本多使用VB编写。成功运行后，该木马程序会执行以下恶意行为：拷贝自身到系统文件夹中、添加自启动项、获取系统信息并将信息发送到远程服务器。
后门类木马能够暗中提供对受感染系统的远程访问，也能被用来执行DDoS攻击或安装其他木马或其他形式的恶意软件。这种木马还能在受感染系统中开启端口，因此会给用户系统带来更大的损伤。
family_en_des:
Osirdoor is a collection of backdoor Trojan whose samples are written by VB language. After successful running, it will carry out the following malicious behaviors: replicating itself into the system archive, adding startup options, obtaining and sending system information to the remote server.
A backdoor Trojan provides remote, usually surreptitious, access to affected systems. It may be used to conduct distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks, or be used to install additional Trojans or other forms of malicious software. It might also open ports on the affected system and thus potentially lead to further damage.
action_des: Osirdoor家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多使用VB编写，运行后会拷贝自身到系统文件夹下，添加自启动项，会获取系统信息，并将信息发送到远程服务器。

family_cn_des: SpyNet家族是一种黑客工具类程序，能够帮助黑客新手制造出后门程序，进而控制受感染系统。该家族样本多为远程控制类程序控制端，可以进行多种信息的配置，如：反虚拟机、反沙箱、生成名称等。同时，它能操控被控端。
family_en_des: SpyNet is a collection of hacker tool program that helps the green hackers in producing backdoor to control the compromised system. Most samples of this family are remote-control program control terminal, which can configure several kinds of information, such as anti-virtual machine, anti-sandbox, name generations and so on. Meanwhile, it can also control and operate the controlled terminal.
action_des: SpyNet家族是黑客工具类程序。该家族样本多为远程控制类程序控制端，可以进行多种信息的配置，如：反虚拟机、反沙箱、生成名称等。同时，可以对被控端进行控制，操作。

family_cn_des: Qhost家族是木马类程序。使用JS脚本编写，该家族样本被加载之后，可能会修改系统Host信息，影响用户对网站的访问。Qhost是一类改变Hosts文件内容以屏蔽某些网站的木马家族。该木马能够通过专门用于改变Hosts文件的黑客服务器来重定向细节从而实现对密码信息的窃取。
family_en_des: Qhost is a collection of malware that changes the Hosts file content to shield some websites. It can redirect details via specific hacker server so as to steal the passwords.                It is written by JS script. When it modifies the Hosts file, it affects the access of website from users.

family_cn_des:
Bluez家族是一种运行于Linux系统下的后门类木马程序。该木马成功运行后，会执行以下恶意行为：获取系统信息、连接远程服务器、等待指令信息并执行相应操作。
后门类木马能够暗中提供对受感染系统的远程访问，也能被用来执行DDoS攻击或安装其他木马或其他形式的恶意软件。这种木马还能在受感染系统中开启端口，因此会给用户系统带来更大的损伤。
family_en_des:
Bluez is a collection of backdoor Trojan that operates on Linux system. After successful running, it may carry out the following malicious actions: accessing the system information, connecting remote servers, waiting for instructions and executing the corresponding operations.
A backdoor Trojan provides remote, usually surreptitious, access to affected systems. It may be used to conduct distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks, or be used to install additional Trojans or other forms of malicious software. It might also open ports on the affected system and thus potentially lead to further damage.
action_des: Bluez家族是木马类程序。运行于Linux系统下，运行后，会获取系统信息，连接远程服务器，等待指令信息，并执行相应操作。

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Redosdru是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Redosdru木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
Redosdru is a family of Trojans performing various malicious behaviors. Redosdru is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to modify or delete data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the infected computer. The variants of the family may be designed according to different attacking purposes. Once the Trojan compromises a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Ciadoor是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Ciadoor后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过控制僵尸网络进行多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但其不能自行传播，需要攻击者的控制。
family_en_des:
The family of Ciadoor is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Ciadoor backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers.
