This malware family can give a malicious hacker access and control of your PC. After running, it will release several executive programs and add launch option. Threats in this family can also try to steal your online banking details.
They spread via Facebook, Youtube, Skype, removable drives, and drive-by malware. When they spread via Facebook, they can posts on your wall.

family_cn_des: Farfli家族是木马类程序。该木马家族能够在系统中投放多个恶意文件。同时拥有联系远程攻击者并等待指令的后门功能。运行后会释放多个文件到系统目录下，会连接远程服务器，发送请求，长时间后台运行，不退出。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that drops various files detected as malware into a system. It also has backdoor capabilities that allow it to contact a remote attacker and await for instructions. After running, it releases several files to system directory and connects the remote server to send command.

family_cn_des: SpyAgent家族是木马类程序。该家族样本使用.NET编写，运行后，会访问恶意链接，下载其它恶意程序，安装到系统中并运行。
family_en_des: SpyAgent is a family of Trojans written in .NET. After being executed, it may visit malicious websites, download and install additional malware or potentially unwanted software onto your PC. It is a threat to the computer system.

family_cn_des: Laset家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多为下载者病毒，运行后会下载恶意程序，收集用户的信息，回传到服务器。
family_en_des: Laset is a family of Trojans. Samples of Laset are usually downloaders. After being executed, it may download malicious programs, collect user information and send it back to the server.

family_cn_des: CVE-2013-1690家族是木马类程序。该家族样本使用JS脚本编写，是针对特定程序开发的漏洞利用程序，利用相应的漏洞执行恶意代码。
family_en_des: CVE-2013-1690 is a family of Trojans written in JS language. They are vulnerability-exploiting programs developed against certain software. Each Trojan exploits certain vulnerability to execute certain malware.

family_cn_des: DocEmbed家族是木马类程序。使用VBS脚本编写，访问恶意网页，自动下载恶意程序来运行。
family_en_des: DocEmbed is a family of Trojans written in VBS. The Trojan may visit malicious websites, download and execute malicious programs.

family_cn_des: Agent家族是木马类程序。使用bat批处理编写，运行后会调用系统命令，收集用户的信息，可能会连接远程服务器，回传系统信息。
family_en_des: Agent is a family of Trojans written by batch processing. After being executed, it may invoke the system commands, collect the user information, connect with and send the collected information to the remote server.

family_cn_des: Blawk家族是木马类程序。使用.NET编写，运行后会修改系统设置，可能会开放系统端口，关闭防火墙。
family_en_des: Blawk is a family of Trojans written in .NET. After being executed, the Trojan will change the system settings, open the port and close the firewall.

family_cn_des: RatCon家族是黑客工具类程序。使用.NET编写，为后门生成工具，运行后可以用来生成后门，设置相关数据，可以对受感染机器进行控制，样本可能带有后门，具有一定风险。
family_en_des: RatCon is a family of hacktools written in .NET. They are backdoor-generating tools. After being executed, they can be used to generate backdoors, set up related data, and make control of the infected computer. Samples of RatCon may have backdoors inside and are of certain risk.

family_cn_des: Hammer家族是黑客工具类程序。借助Hammer家族，攻击者可以发起或家族对目标计算机的入侵活动。在某些情况下，还可以用于检查计算机的安全状态，可能的攻击渠道等。Hammer家族具有一定的威胁。
family_en_des: Hammer is a family of hacking tools. They are designed to enable attackers to cause or facilitate action detrimental to the target computer. Under certain circumstances, they could be used to check the security status, possible attack channels, etc. Hammer is a risk to the affected computer.

family_cn_des: Boxero家族是风险软件类程序。使用NSIS打包生成，运行后会释放可执行程序到系统文件夹，可能会带有广告，影响用户使用。
family_en_des: Boxero is a family of riskware generated by NSIS packing. After being executed, it may release executable programs into the system folder. It may pop up ads to affect the normal use of the system.

family_cn_des: Weat家族是风险软件类程序。运行后，会连接网络，下载其它软件来安装，带有广告，影响用户使用。
family_en_des: Weat is a family of riskware. After being executed, it may download additional malware. It may pop up ads to affect the normal use of the system.

family_cn_des: Aproman家族是风险软件类程序。该家族样本多为系统管理类的工具，部分工具带有广告，会影响用户使用。
family_en_des: Aproman is a family of riskware. Samples of Aproman are usually system management tools. Part of the tools have ads inside and may affect the normal use of the system.

family_cn_des: Tofsee家族是木马类程序。该家族多数样本使用VB编写。该木马允许攻击者对被感染计算机进行远程控制，安装其他恶意程序或窃取敏感信息，对用户隐私和计算机系统的正常使用造成威胁。
family_en_des: Tofsee is a family of Trojans written in VB. The Trojan allows the attacker to take remote control of the infected computer. It may install additional malware and steal sensitive information on the computer. Its malicious behavior may do harm to user privacy and affect the normal use of the computer system.

family_cn_des: Getshell家族是木马类程序。运行于Mac OS系统下，可以使用获取系统权限，修改系统设置，允许攻击者远程控制机器。
family_en_des: Getshell is a family of Trojans running in Mac OS system. It may obtain the system privilege, change the system settings and allow the attacker to take remote control of the computer.

family_cn_des: Sethift家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多为动态链接库文件，可用来进行LPK劫持，含有多个导出函数，可以用来获取系统信息。
family_en_des: Sethift is a family of Trojans. Samples of Sethift are usually DLL files which can be used to make the LPK hijacking. The Trojan contains several export functions to help obtain the system information.

family_cn_des: DNSChanger是一类木马家族，是DNS劫持软件，活跃于2007年到2011年，由爱沙尼亚一家叫做Rove Digital的公司研发。DNSChanger通过修改计算机的DNS设置，连接到远程服务器来感染计算机，在用户浏览网页时插入广告。该木马活跃时期，感染了超过400万台计算机，获得欺诈性广告收益至少1400万美元。
family_en_des: DNSChanger is a family DNS hijacking Trojans active from 2007 to 2011. The Trojan infects a computer by modifying the DNS settings and makes communication with a remote server. It injects its own advertising into Web page. At its peak, DNSChanger was estimated to have infected over 4 million computers, bringing in at least US$14 million in profits from fraudulent advertising revenue.

family_cn_des: FFox家族是木马类程序。该家族多数样本使用HTML编写。FFox能够利用浏览器的漏洞，在用户不知情的情况下，安装其他恶意程序或软件，对用户隐私和计算机系统的正常使用呢造成影响。
family_en_des: FFox is a family of Trojans written in HTML. FFox contains data or executable codes which take advantage of one or more vulnerabilities in web browser. It may install additional malware or unexpected software without the user knowledge. It is a threat to user privacy and may affect the normal use of the computer system.

family_cn_des: Cryakl家族是木马类程序。该家族多数样本使用zip图标进行伪装。运行后会调用explorer.exe加载可执行程序。会获取系统信息。
family_en_des: Cryakl is a family of Trojans. Sampls of Cryakl usually disguise as ZIP icons. After being executed, the Trojan may invoke explorer.exe to load executable programs and obtain the system information.

family_cn_des: MBP家族是感染式工具。使用脚本编写，运行后会修改系统信息，可能会查找系统文件，将自己写入正常文件进行传播。
family_en_des: MBP is a collection of infective virus tool that is written by script. After running, it will modify the system information and search for the system file. It usually propagate by writing itself into normal files.

family_cn_des: Wowlik家族是木马类程序。运行于64位系统下，该家族样本多为动态链接库文件，被加载之后，会获取系统进程信息，判断是否存在相应游戏进程，然后进行后面的操作，可能会获取游戏账号密码。
family_en_des: Wowlik is a collection of Trojan program that runs under win64 system. Most samples of this family are DLL files. After being downloaded, it will get the information of system process and determine whether there are correspoding game processes or not. Then it carries out the following operations and may get the game accounts and passwords.

family_cn_des: FtpPut家族是木马类程序。该家族样本运行后，会遍历硬盘中文件，会连接网络，会释放资源文件，连接远程ftp服务器。
family_en_des: FtpPut is a collection of Trojan program. When samples of this family start running, it will connect network and release the source files as well as connecting the remote ftp server.

family_cn_des: Cabart家族是木马类程序。运行后会释放word文件到系统文件夹并打开运行，弹出邮件内容，会连接网络，下载其它可执行程序。
family_en_des: Cabart is a collection of Trojan program. It will release word files to the system file archive and open them after running. Then email content pops up, it will connect the network to download other executive programs.

family_cn_des: Rack家族是木马类程序。运行后会释放可执行文件到Windows目录下，并伪装为explorer.exe运行，会修改桌面背景，弹出窗口，显示系统被加密，需要用户付费才可进行解密。
family_en_des: Rack is a collection of Trojan program. It will release the executive files to Windows directory and disguise as explorer.exe to operate after running. It can carry out the following malicious actions: modifying the desktop background, popping up windows, seducing users to pay for decryption by showing that the system has been encrypted.

family_cn_des: Fiseria家族是灰色软件类程序。该家族样本多为压缩包程序，部分带有数字签名，运行后会释放文件到系统文件夹，可能会带有广告，对用户使用造成一定影响。
family_en_des: Fiseria is a collection of grayware. Most samples of this family are cabinet folders with digital signatures. It will release files into system archives which may have advertisements. In this way, it affects user's normal experience.

family_cn_des: Tirrip家族是灰色软件类程序。该家族样本中含有大量的字符串处理，判断。运行后，会连接网络，会弹出广告，影响用户使用。
family_en_des: Tirrip is a collection of grayware. Samples of this family have large amounts of string determination and treatments. It will connect the network and pops out ads after running, which brings effection on user's usage.

family_cn_des: Pordwress家族是黑客工具类程序。使用PHP编写，代码使用了多种加密，运行后可以对大量邮箱发送垃圾邮件。
family_en_des: Pordwress is a collection of hacktool program that is written by PHP. The code uses several encryption modes. It can send junk mails to large amount of mail boxes after running.

family_cn_des: Kafau家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多使用PDF图标进行伪装，运行后会将自身注入到explorer.exe中，会释放批处理程序，添加注册表信息，会连接远程服务器，会被攻击者控制。
family_en_des: Kafau is a collection of Trojan that disguises by PDF icon. It injects itself into explorer.exe after running. It will execute the following malicious actions: releasing batch programs, adding registry information, connecting the remote server and being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Ads家族是木马类程序。该家族样本使用.NET编写，运行后弹出页面，引导用户点击操作，会收集用户信息，发送到远程服务器。
family_en_des: Ads is a collection of Trojan that is written by .NET. It pops up webpage to secude users clicking. In this way, it can collect user's inforamtion and send to the remote server.

family_cn_des: CVE-2008-4026-rtf家族是木马类程序。该家族样本文件格式多为RTF，会利用特定程序对文件的解析漏洞，使程序可以执行恶意操作。
family_en_des: CVE-2008-4026-rtf is a collection of Trojan program. Most sample files of this family are in RTF format. It is the analysis vulnerability that uses specific programs, which can make the program execute malicious operation.

family_cn_des: CVE-2009-0557-xls家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多为XLS文件，会利用office对文件格式的解析漏洞执行恶意操作。
family_en_des: CVE-2009-0557-xls is a collection of Trojan program. Most sample files of this family are in XLS format. It is the analysis vulnerability that can make use of office file to execute malicious operations.

family_cn_des: CVE-2013-0074家族是黑客工具类。它能在用户软件中使用漏洞来感染用户的计算机。该家族样本是针对特定漏洞开发的利用工具，使用.NET编写，可能会获取系统信息，具有一定风险。
family_en_des:
CVE-2013-0074 is a collection of Hacktool that is written by .NET. This exploit uses a vulnerability in your software to infect your PC.
It's usually used to install other malware or potentially unwanted software without your knowledge. It may obtain the system information, which brings risks to some degree.

family_cn_des: AutoHK家族是木马类程序。该家族样本为可执行程序，运行后会开放系统端口，收集信息，连接远程服务器。
family_en_des: AutoHK is a collection of Trojan program. It will open the system port to collect information after running. Then it tries to connect the remote server.

family_cn_des: AGeneric家族是蠕虫类程序。该家族样本使用JAVA编写，使用JAVA图标进行伪装，运行后会释放恶意程序到系统文件夹，添加自启动项。
family_en_des: Ageneric is a collection of worm program that is written by JAVA. It disguises by JAVA icon and releases the malicious program to the system archive. It also adds the startup option.

family_cn_des: Pilkah家族是蠕虫类程序。该家族样本运行于Linux平台下，运行后，可能会查找系统相关信息，如邮箱地址，并以此进行传播。
family_en_des: Pilkah is a collection of worm that runs under Linux platform. It may search for the system-related information after running, such as mail addresses, in order to propagate.

family_cn_des: Clown家族是蠕虫类程序。使用脚本VBS脚本编写，脚本进行了简单的加密，运行后会收集系统中邮箱地址列表，并把自身做为附件进行传播。
family_en_des: Clown is a collection of worm program that is written by VBS script. The script is encrypted simply and can collect the mail address list of the system after running. It propagates by making itself as attachment.

family_cn_des: CVE-2014-1776家族是木马类程序。使用JS脚本编写，是针对特定程序编写的漏洞利用代码，被加载运行之后，可以执行恶意代码。该威胁能够在IE6.0至IE11.0浏览器中下载并运行其他文件，包括恶意代码。当用户访问受感染网站或用户的IE浏览器出现漏洞时，此威胁就开始运行。
family_en_des:
CVE-2014-1776 is a collection of Trojan program that is written by JS. It is the vulnerability code that targets specific programs. It can execute malware.                  This threat uses a vulnerability in Internet Explorer 6 through to Internet Explorer 11 to download and run files on your PC, including other malware.
The vulnerability is addressed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS14-021. It is also described in detail in Microsoft Security Advisory 2963983.
It runs when you visit a hacked or malicious website and you have a vulnerable version of Internet Explorer.

family_cn_des: Shiotob家族是木马类程序。该家族样本使用VB编写，运行后会释放VBS脚本，会加载多个DLL，会收集用户信息，获取用户输入的数据，可能会注入到其它进程中。
family_en_des: Shiotob is a collection of Trojan that is written by VB. It can monitor and steal users' login credentials for online banking. The trojan also forces the use of Internet Explorer if users use another browser.

family_cn_des: HBot家族是木马类程序。该家族样本运行后会获取系统信息，会开放端口，可能会连接远程服务器，接收指令并执行。
family_en_des: HBot is a family of Trojans. Once executed, the Trojan will obtain the system data, make ports opened and even connect to a remote server, receive and execute the commands from the server.

family_cn_des: Bundl家族是风险软件类程序。该家族样本运行后，会下载安装程序，会弹出广告，可能会安装其它推广软件，对用户使用造成一定影响。
family_en_des: Bundl is a family of riskware. Once executed, it will download and install malicious programs, display ads. It may also install additional malware or unexpected software. It is a threat to the normal use of the computer system.

family_cn_des: Whyseeme家族是风险软件类程序。该家族样本带有壳，具有多个区段，运行后，会连接网络，下载特定程序进行安装，可能会弹出广告。
family_en_des: Whyseeme is a family of riskware. Samples of Whyseeme are packed and contain several sectors. After executed, it wil connect to the Internet, download and install specified software. It may pop up ads.

family_cn_des: Snoop家族是风险软件类程序。运行后会监控会监控用户行为，例如访问过的网站，发送的邮件等。它还会记录鼠标点击记录，并将收集到的信息发送给预设的邮件地址。
family_en_des: Snoop is a family of riskware monitoring user activity, such as URLs visited and emails sent. It also logs keystrokes and sends the logs to a predefined email address.

family_cn_des: CrawBar家族是风险软件类程序。该家族样本为安装包程序。运行后会安装浏览器工具条，可能带有捆绑程序，会收集用户使用习惯，回传到服务器。
family_en_des: CrawBar is a family of riskware. Samples of CrawBar are installation programs. After being executed, a browser toolbar will be installed. The riskware may contain a bundled program. It will monitor the user operations and upload the collected data to the server.

family_cn_des: ConvertData家族是黑客工具类程序。该家族样本可用来进行数据加密或解密操作，命令行工具，可能会带有后门程序，获取用户信息。
family_en_des: ConvertData is a family of hacktools. Samples of ConvertData can be used to encrypt or decrypt data. It may contain a backdoor inside and get access to the user data.

family_cn_des: Midav家族是黑客工具类程序。该家族样本运行于Linux平台下，运行后会开放系统端口，可能会收集用户信息，具有一定风险。                          木马程序能够窃取用户信息，下载更多恶意代码或将用户计算机的访问权限授予远程攻击者。
family_en_des:
Midav is a collection of hacktool that runs under Linux platform. It will open the system port and may collect user's information, whcih is of certain risks.                  Trojans are a type of malware that try to look innocent to convince you to install them on your PC.
They can steal your personal information, download more malware, or give a malicious hacker access to your PC.

family_cn_des: ZxrLoader家族是风险软件类程序。运行后会下载其它程序并进行安装，会带有广告，可能会捆绑恶意程序，具有一定风险。
family_en_des: ZxrLoader is a collection of riskware. It will download and install other programs with advertisements. It may be bundled with malicious program, which poses certain risks.

family_cn_des: Gigaclick家族是风险软件类程序。使用.NET编写，多为系统工具，可能带有广告，影响用户使用。
family_en_des: Gigaclick is a collection of riskware that is written by .NET. It may carry some advertisements to affect user's usage. Most of the family are system tools.

family_cn_des: Voodoo家族是感染式程序。该病毒通过将其代码写入用户计算机或网络的其他文件中进行传播。一些受感染的程序已经无法正常运行。它运行于16位系统中，会查找系统中相关文件，将恶意代码写入正常文件中。
family_en_des: Voodoo is a collection of virus that runs under 16 bit system. This virus spreads by attaching its code to other files on user's PC or network. Some of the infected programs might no longer run correctly. It searches for the related files in the system and writes the malware into normal files.

family_cn_des: DMR家族是感染式程序。运行于16位系统中，利用系统中断，将恶意程序写入正常文件。
family_en_des: DMR is a collection of infective virus that operates on 16 bit system. It writes the malware into normal files by making use of system interruption.

family_cn_des: Jedina家族是感染式程序。运行于16位系统中，会感染系统中可执行程序。该病毒通过将其代码写入用户计算机或网络的其他文件中进行传播。一些受感染的程序已经无法正常运行。
family_en_des: Jedina is a collection of infective virus that operates on 16 bit system. It can infect the executive files in the system. This virus spreads by attaching its code to other files on your PC or network. Some of the infected programs might no longer run correctly.

family_cn_des: Agent家族是感染式程序。运行于16位系统中，样本多为Access文件，会感染系统中相关文件。
family_en_des: Agent is a collection of infective virus that runs on 16 bit system. Most of the samples are Access files that can infect the related files in the system

family_cn_des: Intum家族是木马类程序。该家族样本运行后会开放本地端口，连接远程服务器，尝试获取指令信息，并执行相应的操作。
family_en_des: Intum is a collection of Trojan that can open local port and connect the remote server. It may try to get the instruction information and execute corresponding operations.

family_cn_des: Cabby家族是木马类程序。该家族样本运行后会释放doc文件并打开，会修改注册表相关信息，会获取进程相关信息，可能会执行进程注入。
family_en_des: Cabby is a collection of Trojan that can release and open doc files. It may modify the registry-related information and obtain information related to processes.

family_cn_des: Lotoor家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多为Linux层elf文件，可被应用调用来对android系统进行提权，提权后可能会对手机造成一定安全隐患，请用户谨慎使用。
family_en_des: Lotoor is a collection of Trojan that can exploit vulnerabilities in the Android operating system to gain root privileges on user's mobile device. It gives a remote hacker administrator privileges on a device running the Android operation system. It may bring certain security risks to users.

family_cn_des: Rubonds家族是木马类程序。运行后会获取系统信息，会开放系统端口，可能会连接远程服务器，向外发送大量的数据包，可能会造成DDOS攻击。
family_en_des: Rubonds is a collection of Trojan that can obtain the system information and open the system port. It may connect the remote server to send large amount of data package, which may result in DDOS attack.

family_cn_des: ExtInstall家族是木马类程序。运行后可以对exe程序进行安装，该家族样本使用.NET开发，可能会捆绑恶意程序，收集用户信息。
family_en_des: ExtInstall is a collection of Trojan that can install exe process. The samples of this family are developed by .NET. It may be bundled with malware to collect user's information.

family_cn_des: DnsAmp家族是木马类程序。运行于Linux平台，运行后可能会结束掉部分进程，释放可执行文件，会运行恶意程序，对外发送大量数据包，可能会千万DDOS攻击。
family_en_des: DnsAmp is a collection of Trojan that runs on Linux platform. It may terminate parts of the processes and release executive files. In addition, it operates malicious programs and sends large amounts of data packages.

family_cn_des: SearchSafe家族是风险软件类程序。运行后会下载安装软件，会弹出广告，部分软件可能会添加自启动项，影响用户使用。
family_en_des: SearchSafe is a collection of riskware. It can executes the following malicious actions: downloading and installing software, popping up advertisements, adding startups, which affects the usage of user.

family_cn_des: Diodih家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多为软件注册机，运行后会生成注册码，可能会获取系统相关信息，具有一定风险。
family_en_des: Diodih is a family of Trojans. Samples of Diodih are generally software keygen which is able to generate the registration number. It may get access to the system data and is of certain risk.

family_cn_des: Lzam家族是木马类程序。使用VB编写，运行后会拷贝自身到系统文件夹下，伪装为系统文件，添加自启动项，设置键盘钩子，具有自删除功能。
family_en_des: Lzam is a family of Trojans written in VB. Once executed, the Trojan will copy itself to the system folder, disguise as the system file, add Auto-Run item, set up hooks or delete itself.

family_cn_des: RegistryDefender家族是木马类程序。样本伪装为安全软件运行，具有反虚拟机功能，样本运行后会对系统进行扫描，获取系统敏感信息。
family_en_des: RegistryDefender is a family of Trojans. Samples of RegistryDefender disguise as security software. The Trojan has the function of Anti Vmware. Once executed, it will scan the system and obtain sensitive information.

family_cn_des: Chebri家族是木马类程序。运行后会将自身拷贝到系统文件夹下，添加自启动项，获取系统相关信息，代码进行了大量加密处理。
family_en_des: Chebri is a family of Trojans. Once executed, the Trojan will copy itself to the system folder, add Auto-Run item and obtain the system data. The codes of Chebri are encrypted in a large quantity.

family_cn_des: Emold家族是木马类程序。运行后会添加开机启动项，设置键盘钩子，记录键盘操作，获取系统相关信息。
family_en_des: Emold is a family of Trojans. Once executed, the Trojan will add Auto-Run item, set up hook, record the keystrokes and obtain the system data.

family_cn_des: NtldBlocker家族是木马类程序。样本运行后，系统会直接重启，引导区被锁定，系统无法开机，需要输入密码。
family_en_des: NtldBlocker is a family of Trojans. Once executed, the system will be restarted. The boot sector will be locked and the system will be disabled.

family_cn_des: Muref家族是木马类程序。运行后会拷贝自身到系统文件夹下，然后添加自启动项，会把恶意代码注入到其它进程中执行。
family_en_des: Muref is a family of Trojans. Once executed, the Trojan will copy itself to the system folder, add Auto-Run item, insert malicious code to other processes and execute it.

family_cn_des: CVE-2013-0633家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多为flash文件，利用SWF文件漏洞执行恶意代码。
family_en_des: CVE-2013-0633 is a family of Trojans. Samples in this family are usually flash files exploiting the vulnerability of SWF files. The Trojan is usually used to install other malware or potentially unwanted software without the user knowledge.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码为木马类，运行后会拷贝自身到所有用户数据目录下，并设置属性为隐藏，并连接网络。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can copy itself into all the user's data directories. Then it sets the attribute as hidden and connects the network.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码属于下载类木马，运行后会自动连网下载一个ZIP包，此包为AwardKeylogger安装程序，安装程序下载域名为：award-soft.com。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can install other malware or potentially unwanted software onto user's PC. It tries to download the ZIP package that is the installation program of AwardKeylogger. The download domain name is ：award-soft.com.

family_cn_des: 该木马通过运行快捷方式，调用CMD通过系统自带的TFTP软件连接远程服务器。下载一个VBS脚本,并执行此脚本，从而导致计算机用户系统中的重要数据信息失密窃。
family_en_des: Agent is a collection of Trojan that can connect the remote server by operating shortcuts and calling CMD. It is generic detection for files that perform various malicious actions on an affected computer. It downloads and executes VBS script, which leads to the stealth of important data in user's system.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码为C#.net开发，用来记录键盘并发送到指定信箱，以文件捆绑的方式进行传播，被感染文件为文件的附加节，运行后释放并执行。收信信箱为rockroxx@gmail.com。此信息已被查封
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus that is developed by C#.net. It is usd to record keyboard and send information to the specific mail box. It propagates through bundling with files. The infected files are the additional chapters. The received mail box is rockroxx@gmail.com, which has been sealed.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码为风险程序，可以通过此程序控制系统，此软件是一国外软件，其版本有多处最常见的为4.3,4.4,5.0,5.1和5.2.具有风险的程序名称为RManServer.exe,rutserv.exe官方主站为：http://tektonit.software.informer.com/
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that can control systems. It is foreign software with several versions. The most commonly seen versions are 4.3, 4.4, 5.0, 5.1 and 5.2. The risk program is RManServer.exe,rutserv.exe whose official website is http://tektonit.software.informer.com/.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码属于广告件，是使用JS编写的脚本广告件，其脚本中含有大量的域名地址。通过网页调用运行其脚本中的域名地址。域名为："4files.net","anyfiles.net","d1.xlget.com","elite-file.ru","filemashina.ru","file-bit.net","filefactory.com","depositfiles.com","fileserve.com","free"filesonic.com","kilofile.com",
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that is written by JS script. The scripts contain large amount of domain addresses that are called by  webpages. The domain names are "4files.net", "anyfiles.net", "d1.xlget.com","elite-file.ru", "filemashina.ru", "file-bit.net", "filefactory.com", "depositfiles.com", "fileserve.com", "free"filesonic.com" and "kilofile.com",

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码属于木马类，运行后会释放文件，并在系统中创建多个互斥量，开发语言为C#.net。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is developed by C#.net language. It will release files and create several mutex in the system.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码为风险程序，就易语言编写的一个在DLL文件，其功能是对图片和声音文件进行处理。以冒充LPK.dll文件。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of riskware that can deal with photo files and video files to disguise as LPK.dll files. Trojans are a type of malware that try to look innocent to convince you to install them on your PC.
They can steal your personal information, download more malware, or give a malicious hacker access to your PC.

family_cn_des: Bafruz是一个多组件的后门木马家族，其恶意行为包括卸载反病毒软件，截获Facebook等社交媒体的通话，安装比特币矿工挖掘软件，以及发动DDoS 攻击。Bafruz通过P2P协议在被Bafruz感染的计算机网络中进行组件传播。
family_en_des: Bafruz is a family of multi-component backdoor Trojans that can perform a number of different actions such as uninstalling antivirus software, intercepting social media websites such as Facebook to hijack conversations, installing Bitcoin mining software or making DDoS attacks. Bafruz connects with other computers in Bafruz-infected network via P2P protocol in order to spread its components.

family_cn_des: Shiz是一个窃取机密信息的木马家族。该木马再被执行后会修改并创建注册表项以实现开机自启动，搜索与虚拟机或测试环境相关的文件、用户名或路径。该威胁会阻断用户计算机与反病毒厂商网站的连接，搜索系统进程，植入恶意负载来窃取用户名和加密认证信息。该木马还会和一个远程域名进行通讯接收命令，侵害用户私密信息。
family_en_des: Shiz is a family of Trojans stealing confidential information. Once executed, The Trojan modifies and creates registry entries so as to run every time the system starts. It also checks for files, user names, or paths related to virtual machines or test environments. The threat will block connections to websites of antivirus software, search for system processes and inject malicious payload to steal passwords and cryptographic certificates. The Trojan will also connect to a domain to receive commands and compromise user confidentiality.

family_cn_des: Bv家族是感染式程序。运行于16位平台下，运行后会感染系统中正常文件，将恶意代码写入正常文件中。
family_en_des: Bv is a family of infecting programs running in 16-bit system. Once executed, it will infect and inject malicious code into normal files in system.

family_cn_des: Cyns家族是木马类程序。运行后会拷贝自身到系统文件夹，伪装为系统文件，添加自启动项，修改IE主页，获取系统相关信息。
family_en_des: Cyns is a family of Trojans. Once executed, the Trojan will copy itself to the system folder, disguise as the system file, add Auto-Run item, modify IE homepage and obtain the system information.

family_cn_des: Lickone家族是风险软件类程序。样本运行后，会下载安装下载器，推广热门电影进行下载，会弹出广告，具有一定风险。
family_en_des: Lickone is a family of riskware programs. Once executed, it will download and install downloaders, prompt popular movies and display ads. Lickone is of a certain risk.

family_cn_des: Adinf家族是感染式程序。运行于16位平台，运行后会感染系统中所有.COM文件，将恶意代码写入正常文件。
family_en_des: Adinf is a family of infecting program running in 16-bit platforms. Once executed, it will infect all .com files in the infected system by inserting malicious code to normal files.

family_cn_des: BackTrack家族是风险软件类程序。运行于MAC OS系统，可能会监控系统其它软件，修改系统部分设置，具有一定的风险。
family_en_des: BackTrack is a family of riskware programs running in MAC OS. It may monitor other software in system, modify the system settings. It is of certain risk.

family_cn_des: LockerBuilder家族是黑客工具类程序。该家族多数样本为BootLocker EXE builder，可以用来生成引导锁定程序，具有一定风险。 运行后出现一个配置BOOT引导的一个功能，具有在引导系统时候添加密码和菜单等功能。
family_en_des: LockerBuilder is a family of hacktool programs detected as BootLocker EXE builders which can be used to generate locking programs. Once executed, LockerBuilder will configurate the BOOT acquisition, add keywords and menu.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码为FTP服务程序，主站为http://www.pablosoftwaresolutions.com程序名称为Quick’nEasyFTPServer，为一个FTP服务程序，运行后会在Temp目录下生成两个MD5名称的zip文件大小为0.有的变种没有界面。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware whose main website is http://www.pablosoftwaresolutions.com. The name of this FTP service program is nEasyFTPServer. It generates two MD5 zip files with no bytes. Some of the variants do not have interfaces.

family_cn_des: 该恶文件为一个代理服务软件。为InitexSoftware公司的一个Proxifier。
family_en_des: This malicious file is a kind of proxy service software, which is a Proxifier of InitexSoftware company.

family_cn_des: 该家族为广告件程序，主要安装在浏览器上。CrawlerToolbar是由Crawler.com网站下载的，安装后会自动访问此站看是否有更新。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that is installed in browsers. CrawlerToolbar is downloaded from Crawler.com. After installation, it accesses this website automatically to check out whether there are updates or not.

family_cn_des: 该家族为广告件程序，是一个下载色情播放器的程序，但在下载时候要先点程序中的几个广告连接才行，实际上是骗取访问量的一种手法和传播色情的一种途径。此程序内部名称为“播放器vip版”。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that can download porn player. However, before downloading porns, users need to click some ad links in the program, which, in fact, is a way to get visits and propagate porns. The internal name of this program is "Player VIP version".

family_cn_des: 该家族为网络工具tor,是要用来开启匿名和代理服务，普遍是配合代理软件一起的。运行后监听本地端口。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that can open anonymity and proxy service. Generally it cooperates with proxy software. It may monitor the local port after running.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码为木马类，代码为Delphi开发,运行后会拷贝自身到所有用户数据目录下，并设置属性为隐藏，冒充PuTTY软件版本信息和图标，运行后会连接网络。其网络特征为:http.method==HTTP_GET&&http.url^stoken(ST_CMD,".php","1=","v=","q=","b=")。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is developed by Delphi. It copies itself to all the user's data directories and sets the attibute as hidden. It disguises ad PuTTY software information and icon and connects the network after running. The network characteristic is http.method==HTTP_GET&&http.url^stoken(ST_CMD,".php","1=","v=","q=","b=").

family_cn_des: Antilame是一类运行于16位系统上的木马家族。该木马能够不够用户操作数据，造成信息丢失和隐私泄露，还会影响计算机系统的正常使用，降低其安全水平。
family_en_des: Antilame is a family of Trojans running in 16-bit platforms. The Trojan is able to capture the user operations, cause loss of information and threat to user privacy. It may affect the normal use of the computer system and lower the security level of it.

family_cn_des: Dcoman家族是风险软件类。安装后会监听短信，可根据接收的短信或网络指令来进行拍照、录音、拨打电话等操作。可能造成用户隐私泄露，请谨慎使用。
family_en_des: Dcoman is family of riskware programs. Once executed, it will receive messages or network commands to take photos, record call content and dial numbers. It is a threat to the user privacy.

family_cn_des: Owner家族是黑客工具类程序。该家族样本多为使用AutoIt生成的恶意程序，会控制鼠标操作，可能会获取系统敏感信息。
family_en_des: Owner is a family of hacktool programs. Samples of Owner are usually Autolt-generated programs that are able to control the mouse operations and obtain sensitive information.

family_cn_des: Veenine家族是间谍件程序。样本运行后会释放一个下载工具到系统文件夹下并运行，会弹出广告，下载多种软件并安装，具有一定风险。
family_en_des: Veenine is a family of spyware programs. Once execute, it releases a download tool to the system folder and execute it to display ads. It also downloads and installs various software. It is of certain risk.

family_cn_des: Locator家族是间谍件程序。使用NSIS打包生成的安装程序，会释放恶意程序到系统文件夹，并运行，可能会捆绑恶意软件，会弹出广告，具有一定风险。
family_en_des: Locator is a family of spyware programs. They are installers packed by NSIS. Locator is able to release malware into the system folder and execute it. It may be bundled with other malware, display ads, download remote files and update itself. It is of certain risk and may affect the normal use of the computer system.

family_cn_des: Confuser 家族是风险类程序。该家族为安装程序，运行后会连接网络下载文件，释放文件到TMP目录下，并读取TMP目录下的111.txt配制文件进行安装程序。
family_en_des: Confuser is a family of riskware programs. Once executed, they connect with a remoter server to download files and release them into the TMP directory. They will read the 111.txt configuration file to install malware.

family_cn_des: Exe2Vbs家族是黑客工具类程序。该家族样本多为exe转vbs的工具，可以把可执行程序转换为VBS脚本，黑客经常使用这类工具，可能会捆绑恶意软件，有一定风险。
family_en_des: Exe2Vbs is a family of hacktool programs. Samples of Exe2Vbs are usually converting tools which are able to convert executable files to VBS scripts. They are often usually by hackers and may be bundled with malware. Member in this family are of certain risk.

family_cn_des: Consumed家族是感染式程序。运行于16位平台下，样本会Hook系统中多个中断，当发现符合条件的文件时，进行感染操作，将恶意代码写入文件。
family_en_des: Consumed is family of infecting programs running on 16-bit platforms. Samples of Consumed hook several system interrupts. When the proper file is found, Consumed will infect it and insert the malicious code into the file.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码为风险程序，可以通过此程序对系统进行一些设置，但存在一定的风险，对IE的理历史信息可以查看。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that can carry out system settings, which poses certain risks. It can check out the history information on IE.

family_cn_des: 该恶意代码属于木马类，运行后会拷贝自身到当前目录下。向多个域名POST数据DDOS攻击。并连接邮件服务器，发送邮件，目前邮件地址连接不上不能成功发送邮件。其网络特征为:HTTP_POST&&http.msghead0~"/^\/\?ptrxcz_[a-z0-9A-Z]{30}$/U"。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that downloads and runs files on user's PC. The downloaded files can change but usually include a Trojan that sends spam emails. It can also steal user's email names and passwords, as well as FTP credentials using a plugin detected as PWS:Win32/Fareit.gen!C.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。多数样本的源文件名称为：mognistor.exe；使用VB开发；添加浏览器工具条；对注册表操作、设置HOOK、自删除等。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is developed by VB. The source file name of most samples is mognistor.exe. It can carry out several malicious actions: adding browser toolbars, modifying the registry, setting HOOK, deleting itself and so on.

family_cn_des: 该家族为DarkComet-RAT程序。DarkComet-RAT是一款国外很强大的、免费的远程控制软件。功能包含键盘记录、视频监控、系统控制等等。其远控的上线数据和交互数据都是加密的，只有几个字节加密是固定的可做为网络检测。最新（DarkComet-RAT）网络特征：tcp.paylaod.len==12&&tcp.payload=="A57DAD495BEC"。
family_en_des: It belongs to DarkComet-RAT program. This program is a powerful free remote control software whose functions include keylogger, video monitor, system control and so on. The online data and interactive data are encrypted. The latest network characteristic is tcp.paylaod.len==12&&tcp.payload=="A57DAD495BEC".

family_cn_des: 该家族为广告件程序。家族所有文件内部名称为:YontooIEClient.dll，公司名称:YontooRuntime,该DLL文件为浏览器插件(BHO)，每次当您打开互联网浏览器它都会自动打开及启动，广告和间谍程序都会利用到这个形式来突破防火墙。
family_en_des:
This adware program shows ads as users browse the web.
It can be downloaded from the program's website or bundled with some third-party software installation programs, like SoftwareBundler:Win32/Cakeport.

family_cn_des: 该家族为广告件程序，会下载多个DLL，无其它行为表现。该家族Linkun是以样本的版权信息来命名的。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that can download several DLLs. There are no other actions.

family_cn_des: ZvuZona家族是灰色软件。运行后会执行下载操作，在系统中安装音乐在线播放软件，修改IE默认设置，会弹出广告，具有一定风险。
family_en_des: ZvuZona is a family of grayware programs. Once executed, the grayware downloads and installs an online music player, change the IE default settings, display ads and is of certain risk.

family_cn_des: Lexotran家族是感染式程序。运行于16位平台下，运行后会感染系统中.EXE和.COM文件，将恶意代码写入文件中。
family_en_des: Lexotran is a family of infecting programs running on 16-bit platforms. Once executed, the program will infect .exe and .com files and insert malicious code into the file.

family_cn_des: Heth家族是感染式程序。运行于16位平台下，运行后会感染系统中部分可执行文件，Hook系统相关中断。
family_en_des: Heth is a family of infecting programs running on 16-bit platforms. Once executed, it will infect part of executable files in system, hook related system interrupts.

family_cn_des: Coman家族是感染式程序。运行于16位平台下，代码进行了简单加密，会对系统中文件进行感染，将恶意代码写入文件中。
family_en_des: Coman is a family of infecting programs running on 16-bit platforms. The code of it is encrypted in a simple way. It infects files in system and inserts malicious code into them.

family_cn_des: Zacom家族是木马类程序中的后门程序。运行后会连接C&C服务器并发送本地计算机有关信息，等待服务器操作指定。功能有下载、访问URL、升级和DDOS等。
family_en_des: Zacom is a family of backdoor Trojans. Once executed, the Trojan will connect with the C&C server and send the collected data to the server, receive commands from the server so as to download malware, visit URL, update and make DDoS attacks.

family_cn_des: Orpedih家族是木马类程序中的RootKit程序。通常情况下rootkit都会配合其它文件一起运行，主要功能是隐藏运行文件不易被发现。绕过安全软件等能功能。
family_en_des: Orpedih is a family of rootkit Trojans. In general, a rootkit will be used together with other malware to hide some malicious files and help them escape from the detection of antivirus software.

family_cn_des: AdvancedMailer家族是洪水攻击程序。运行后会遍历系统文件，查找系统中的邮件地址，并发送大量的垃圾邮件，造成系统运行缓慢。
family_en_des: AdvancedMailer is a family of flood attack programs. Once executed, the program will traverse all the system files, search for email addresses and send numerous spam mails. It affects the productivity of the system.
action_des: AdvancedMailer家族是洪水攻击程序。运行后会遍历系统文件，查找系统中的邮件地址，并发送大量的垃圾邮件，造成系统运行缓慢。

family_cn_des: 该家族为广告件程序。会打开hao123的链接：http://ar.hao123.com/?guide=1，会下载链接已失效)，在桌面出现hao123的快捷方式，点击时，会运行hao123.1.0.0.1103.exe。
family_en_des: Hao123 is a family of adware programs. Once executed, it will visit http://ar.hao123.com/?guide=1, download hao123.1.0.0.1103.exe (invalid now). It creates shortcut of hao123 and executes haoh123.1.0.0.1103.exe.
action_des: 该家族为广告插件程序，会打开Hao123的链接，在桌面出现hao123的快捷方式。

family_cn_des: SaMon家族是灰色软件类程序。使用.NET 2.0编写，运行后会获取系统中所安装的浏览器信息，具有反调试功能，会连接网络，会弹出恶意广告，对用户有一定影响。
family_en_des: SaMon is a family of grayware programs writing in .Net 2.0. Once executed, it obtains information about the browsers installed in system. It has the function of Anti-Debugging. It connects to the Network, displays ads and affects the normal use of the computer system.
action_des: SaMon家族是灰色软件类程序。使用.NET 2.0编写，运行后会获取系统中所安装的浏览器信息，具有反调试功能，会连接网络，会弹出恶意广告，对用户有一定影响。

family_cn_des: BitCoinMiner家族是风险软件类程序。该家族样本使用批处理编写。样本为比特币加密兑换工具Eobot；并无其它恶意行为。
family_en_des: BitCoinMiner is a family of riskware programs. Samples of it are complied by patch processing tool. A sample of it is Eobot which is an encrypted Bitcoin exchange tool. It has no other malicious behaviors.

family_cn_des: KeyLogger家族是木马类程序。运行于64位系统上，运行后，会进行键盘记录，生成记录文件，发送到远程服务器。
family_en_des: KeyLogger is a family of Trojans running in 64-bit system. Once executed, it may record the keystrokes, generate record files and send them to a remote server.

family_cn_des: SneakyTrail家族是木马类程序。具有反安全软件拦截的下载并安装指定程序。主要用于下载推广的一些软件。可根据访问的网站请求来安装不同的推广软件。此家族大部分变种的User-Agent:都为TixDll。
family_en_des: SneakyTrail is a family of Trojans. The Trojan is able to escape from the detection of antivirus software, download and install specified programs to prompt unexpected products and services. The Trojan is able to install different software programs according to different website requests. The User-Agent names of most variants are TixDll.

family_cn_des: AntiFW家族是木马类程序。该家族样本运行后会伪装为播放器下载工具，连接网络，下载多个广告软件，主要用来进行推广软件。
family_en_des: AntiFW is a family of Trojans. The Trojan disguises as a player downloading tool to connect with the Internet and download adware programs to prompt software.

family_cn_des: Nhttpd家族是木马类程序。Nhttpd家族是Linux下的溢出程序，一旦被利用，可能会在用户不知情的情况下安装其他恶意程序。
family_en_des: Nhttpd is a family of Trojans. Members of Nhttpd are Linux overflow exploits. They can be exploited to install other malware or potentially unwanted software without the user knowledge.

family_cn_des: BamCompiled家族是木马类程序中的后门程序。在PHP脚本语言编写的一个后门程序，可以将某些文件上传到WEB服务器上，对服务器进行操作。具有修改文件、编辑文件和删文件等功能。
family_en_des: BamCompiled is a family of backdoor Trojans written in PHP language. The Trojan may upload some files on the WEB server and make some operations of the server. It is able to modify, compile and delete files.

family_cn_des: Tengate家族是木马类程序。Tengate家族通过邮件的形式将盗取的信息发送回使用着的。通常以DLL注入的方式进行加载。
family_en_des: Tengate is a family of Trojans stealing data and uploading the collected data to the remote serer via email. The Trojan uploads usually by DLL inserting.

family_cn_des: Agent家族是木马类程序中的后门程序。是python编写的一个开启本地代理的程序。由于是脚本编写的代码修改起来也方便，所以没有固定的端口和密码等。
family_en_des: Agent is a family of backdoor Trojans written in Python. It is a program to open local agent. It is written in script language and can be easily modified, so it has no fixed port and passwords.

family_cn_des: Katien家族是木马类程序。Katien 家族是Linux下的内核级后门程序，运行后会连接C&C服务器，并等待服务器发回的指令。
family_en_des: Katien is family of backdoor programs. They are kernel-level backdoor programs running on Linux platform. Once executed, the program will connect with a C&C server to receive and executed commands.

family_cn_des: Verti家族是风险类程序。是一个安装程序，运行后会让系统更慢并带有网络行为。
family_en_des: Verti is a family of riskware programs. Once executed, it will slow down the system and perform network-related behaviors.

family_cn_des: TidyN家族是广告软件类程序。TidyN是TidyNetwork简写它是一个浏览器插件,运行后会从TidyNetwork下载最新插件进行安装，当打开浏览器时会有弹出广告。
family_en_des: TidyN is a family of adware programs. TidyN is short for TidyNetwork which is a browser plug-in. Once executed, it downloads plug-ins from TidyNetwork and installs them. When a browser is opened, advertisements will pop up.

family_cn_des: Boogzo家族是广告软件类程序。该家族通常会安装在DCE软件目录下（Program Files\DCE\）随系统启动而启动。运行后会连接网络。此家族文件有多个版本。
family_en_des: Boogzo is a family of adware programs. These programs are usually installed under Program Files\DCE\. When the system is on, the program will also be activated and make communications on the Network. There are different program versions in the family of Boogzo.

family_cn_des: BadJoke家族是木马类恶作剧程序。通过在运行后不会对系统有任何破坏。一般都是会给用户带来一些假象如：蓝屏、不停弹窗、鼠标键盘不好使等。只需要关闭程序就可以恢复正常。
family_en_des: BadJoke is a family of Joke programs. The program performs no malicious behaviors when running. It plays jokes with the user via blue screen, annoying pop-up, and the disability of mouse or keyboard. The system can get right after closing the program.

family_cn_des: LANVisor家族是风险类程序。LANVisor程序是LAN的一个客户端运行后会出现LAN的配置选项，关闭自动运行，等待控制者连接。
family_en_des: LANVisor is a family of riskware programs. The program is a LAN client. Once it is executed, the configuration options of LAN will appear and the Auto-Run will be closed. It waits for connection to the attacker.

family_cn_des: Elex家族是灰色软件类程序。此程序通过下载器进行下载YAC病毒删除工具来推广自己。具有反虚拟机技术。官方网站为www.yac.mx。
family_en_des: Elex is a family of grayware programs. The program spreads by download the YAC virus-deleting tool. It has the function of Anti-Vmware. The official website of it is www.yac.mx.

family_cn_des: ShutDown家族是木马类恶作剧程序。运行后会自动调VBS脚本执行关机操作。
family_en_des: ShutDown is a family of Joke Trojans. Once executed, it will call the VBS script to shut down the system.

family_cn_des: WinFixer家族是广告软件类程序。一般为假冒一些安全软件自动扫描出系统一些问题，WinFixer然后提示用户购买产品。这些问题其实都不存在只是为了让用户害怕并购买产品。
family_en_des: WinFixer is a family of adware programs. The program cheats a user by making a false warning that there appear some problems in the system scanning. The user is encouraged to buy the security product provided by the program.

family_cn_des: WMFMaker家族是黑客程序。此家族为网页木马生成器，是针对Ms06-001漏洞执行EXE文件，可生成，WMF、BMP、ELF等多种格式文件。
family_en_des: WmFMaker is a family of hacktool programs. They are Trojan generators. The program exploits Ms06-001 vulnerabilities to run .exe files and is able to generate files of WMF, BMP, ELF and other formats.

family_cn_des: ZvuZona家族是风险类程序。是一个国外的播放器，运行后连接网络下载更新，安装后运行时会带有多个广告页面。并有一个过期的数字证书。
family_en_des: ZvuZona is a family of riskware programs. It is a foreign player. Once executed, it will connect with the Internet to update itself. It displays ads and contains a outdated certification.

family_cn_des: 该家族为后门程序。添加自启动项；设置自身属性为隐藏、只读；发送TCPSYN报文；会下载回假的杀毒软件可执行文件并运行，执行全盘扫描，显示有病毒，需要用户付费后，可以进行杀毒。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can add startup option. It can set the attribute as hidden and read only. It executes the full scan by downloading and running the antivirus software. Then it notices users that the existence of virus. Users need to pay to remove the virus.

family_cn_des: 该家族为x64平台下的后门，为链接库文件。会根据是否由rundll32.exe加载，执行不同的操作；遍历进程模块、创建互斥体、添加服务和注册表项等操作。
family_en_des: It is a rootkit-enabled backdoor Trojan that gathers private user data and sends it to remote attackers. The collected data might include user names and passwords, credit card numbers, bank logon credentials, or other sensitive financial information.             On NT-based systems, files and processes related to a its infection may be hidden by a kernel-mode rootkit component. It can also disable firewall software and may perform other malicious actions, such as clearing CMOS settings, destroying disk data, or shutting down Windows unexpectedly.

family_cn_des: 该家族为PHP平台环境下的，通过自动插入或手动添加来进行传播，在其代码通过base64加密。解密后代码功能为页面劫持，通过一些搜索引擎查找到该页过访问过来后会自动跳到，恶意代码作者指定好的地址。通过该方法可以实现钓鱼、挂马、刷流量等。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that spreads by automatic insertion or mannually adding. Its code is encrypted by base 64. The code functionality turns to webpage hijack after decryption. In this way, it realize phishing and drive-by downloading.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于下载者程序，从goldcentre.ru下载torrent种子文件，下载并安装chrome,下载运行GuardMailRu.exe，安装多款插件，桌面添加多个快捷方式，与mail.ru域名有关，由于语言不支持，快捷方式名称中大量乱码。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that downloads  torrent seed from goldcentre.ru. It can take the following malicious actions: downloading and installing chrome, downloading and running GuardMailRu.exe, installing several plug-ins, adding several shortcuts on the desktop.

family_cn_des: 该家族为广告件程序。版本信息为韩语、版权信息WinggoToolbar、源文件名为winggou.exe；从s.winggo.co.kr/SM5/winggou.exe下载winggou.exe并运行，添加自启动项；WingoToolbar是一款浏览器插件，功能类似百度工具栏。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware whose version information is in Korean. The source file name is winggou.exe. It can be downloaded and runned from s.winggo.co.kr/SM5/winggou.exe. It can also add startup option.                WingoToolbar is a plug-in of the browser whose functionality is alike with Baidu toolbar.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标与系统文件winlogon.exe相同；使用VB开发，具有网络下载行为、设置文件隐藏、操作注册表、判断当前系统中是否有调试工具等。有反虚拟机技术，运行后会访问一个URL地址。劫持大量安全软件，修改IE主页并通过U盘传播。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is developed by VB. The icons are the same with the system file winlogon.exe. It can carry out the following malicious actions: downloading from the Internet, setting the files as hidden, operating the registry and determinating whether there are debugging tools in the current system and so on. It has the anti-virtual machine technology, which results in accessing an URL address. It can also block large amount of software and modify the IE homepage.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标伪装为安装包样子；样本会访问网络pastebin.com/raw.php?i=ECjBwVpt（链接已失效）；具有自删除功能；会发送TCP和UDP请求。网络特征：http_method="GET"&http_url_str^".php?i="&tcp_payload~"GET\x20.*?\x20HTTP/1.1\x0d\x0aHost:\x20.*?\x0d\x0aUser-Agent:\x20.*?\x0d\x0aConnection:\x20close\x0d\x0a"
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose icon disguises as installation package. The sample will access pastebin.com/raw.php?i=ECjBwVpt which is invalid. It can also deleting itself and send TCP and UDP requests. The network characteristic is http_method="GET"&http_url_str^".php?i="&tcp_payload~"GET\x20.*?\x20HTTP/1.1\x0d\x0aHost:\x20.*?\x0d\x0aUser-Agent:\x20.*?\x0d\x0aConnection:\x20close\x0d\x0a" .

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行后拷贝自己到系统文件夹下并运行；添加多个系统服务；有网络连接；部分样本有自删除功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can copy itself into the system files. It can also execute the following actions: adding several system services, connecting the network and deleting itself.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行后会释放两个动态链接库文件和一个驱动文件，其中_Tmp0F1.dll是用来隐藏和远程连接的后门；具有网络行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can release two DLL files and a drive file. _Tmp0F1.dll is used to hide the backdoor that connects the remote attacker, which owns the network behaviors.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于蠕虫类。添加开机启动项；从远程服务器获取指令，如：邮件传播、下载执行文件、DDOS攻击、网络钓鱼等；会检测各种安全软件，从而决定自己是否继续运行。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that can add startup option. It gains the command from the remote server, such as email propagation, downloading executive files, DDOS attack, network phishing and so on. It detect different kinds of security software to decide whether to continue to operate.

family_cn_des: 该家族为后门程序。运行后会在%system32%下释放一个名为win(随机3位)32.dll文件，并注入到IEXPLORE.EXE进行连接网络。等待网络命令，功能有DDOS和远程获取信息等。网络特征：http_method="GET"&http_url^".php?c="&http_url[0r]^"\26v="&http_url[0r]^"\26b="&http_url[0r]^"\26id="&http_url[0r]^"\26cnt="&http_url[0r]^"\26q="
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can release the file named win32.dll under %system32%. It injects into IEXPLORE.EXE to connect the network. The functionalities are DDOS and getting remote information. The network characteristic is http_method="GET"&http_url^".php?c="&http_url[0r]^"\26v="&http_url[0r]^"\26b="&http_url[0r]^"\26id="&http_url[0r]^"\26cnt="&http_url[0r]^"\26q=" .

family_cn_des: 该家族为后门程序。伪装成微软SafeNetwork的DLL文件，文件大小30多MB为了过一些云安全。释放文件到%ProgramFiles%\InternetExplorer\SafeNet下，其目录下的SafeCredential.DAT为配置文件，向C&C服务器POST数据。网络特征：http_metnod="POST"&http_url^".php"&http_user_agent="Fantasia"&http_url_str~"^/.*?\.php$"
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that disguises ad the DLL file of Microsoft SafeNetwork. It can release files to %ProgramFiles%\InternetExplorer\SafeNet. The SafeCredential.DAT under its directory is configuration file which posts data to C&C server. The network characteristic is http_metnod="POST"&http_url^".php"&http_user_agent="Fantasia"&http_url_str~"^/.*?\.php$" .

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标伪装为PDF；运行后会在%Temp%文件夹下释放Cohegeruro.nek、Dahevihi.dll、Docasufujiza.dll、qaweweqesop.dll、wuwatutiwaq.dll、zibadapexide.exe，并启动zibadapexide.exe，修改注册表IE相关设置。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose icon disguises as PDF file. It can release Cohegeruro.nek, Dahevihi.dll, Docasufujiza.dll, qaweweqesop.dll, wuwatutiwaq.dll and zibadapexide.exe after running. It can also modify the IE related settings.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。该后门名称为GayOL；黑客可以通过该后门访问计算机，记录被感染计算机的活动，窃取AOL（美国在线）和ICQ聊天程序的密码；黑客还可以操作用户的AOL邮箱、控制ICQ等。
family_en_des:
This backdoor trojan can give a malicious hacker access to your PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于黑客工具类，家族名字来源于样本版本中的源文件名qqnukeall.exe，其主要功能是QQ远程攻击，但此家族样本攻击的是很老的QQ版本，现在没有效果了。
family_en_des: This trojan can use your PC for distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks without your knowledge. The family name comes from the source file name qqnukeall.exe. The main functionality of this family is QQ remote attack. The QQ it attacked is in old version and gets invalid now.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于VBS脚本编写的病毒，使用VBscripts脚本编写，写入多个系统开机启动项目，具有收集用户的语言类型、计算机名、用户名、系统类型、插件信息、反病毒程序信息并回传至指定主机，同时还能够下载其他恶意程序到感染的主机执行。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that is written by VBS scrip. It can carry out the following malicious actions: collecting user's language type, computer name, user name, system type, plug-in information and antivirus program information. Then it sends information back to the host and downloads other malware to the infected host to execute.

family_cn_des: Ariss家族是邮件蠕虫类程序。是一种利用Microsoft Outlook来发送大量邮件的蠕虫，程序采用Borland C++编写，以ASPack格式压缩的win32 PE文件。会遍历驱动器，把自己复制到各个驱动器下，并且还会查找本机存在的一些其它病毒，同时会删除这些病毒，来保护自己，病毒会为用户到symantec去下载一个对W32.Serflog病毒的专杀，来麻痹用户，以为机子上没有病毒了，来达到病毒长期留在机器上，修改注册表来达到下次启动自己。
family_en_des: Ariss is a family of mass-mailing worms. The worm sends emails by Microsoft Outlook. The program is written in Borland C++ and is a win32 PE file packed by ASPack. Once executed, it traverses the drivers and copies itself to all drivers. It searches and deletes the viruses it has found in system to protect itself. It may even download a W32.Serflog-deleting tool from Symantec to cheat the user and help itself stay for a long time in the computer.  It changes the registry settings to release the function of Auto-Run every time the system in on.

family_cn_des: Trsh家族是宏病毒，宏病毒是属于一种脚本型病毒，主要感染版本较低的OFFICE文档。
family_en_des: Trsh is a family of macro viruses which are a kind of script viruses. They mainly infect OFFICE files of low versions.

family_cn_des: Kromeser家族是木马类程序中的捆绑程序。该家族是用批处理编写的一个脚本文件，通过在批处理中写入可执行文件。并运行、添加，删除等打操作。
family_en_des: Kromser is a family of Trojans. They are software bundlers which are batch script files. The Trojan writes executable files in patch processing to perform malicious behaviors.

family_cn_des: Feri家族是木马类程序中的后门程序。使用DELPHI编写的，UPX加壳。具有连接远程服务器等待控制指令。有打开文件管理、文件下载上传、升级和DDOS等功能。
family_en_des: Feri is a family of backdoor Trojans written in DELPHI and packed by UPX. The Trojan connects with a remote server to receive and execute commands. The Trojan is able to open the file manager, upload and download files, make update and make DDOS attacks.

family_cn_des: Gertr家族是木马类程序。该家族为DLL文件，通常以注入的方式运行。运行后会判断系统进程中是否有浏览器并通过注入到这些浏览器中访问一些指定的URL地址进行获取数据。
family_en_des: Gertr is a family of Trojans. They are DLL files running in inserting manner. Once executed, the Trojan decides whether browsers are in the system processes and insert itself into the browsers to visit specified URL and obtain data.

family_cn_des: Ubup家族是木马类程序。添加系统自启动项，运行后无明显行为。一般配合其它程序一起执行。
family_en_des: Ubup is a family of Trojans. The Trojan adds Auto-Run item in system and has no obvious malicious behaviors. It is usually executed together with other programs.

family_cn_des: CVE-2013-1347家族是溢出程序。此家族为微软IE溢出程序， Internet Explorer 访问尚未正确初始化或已被删除的对象的方式中存在一个远程执行代码漏洞，该漏洞可能以一种攻击者可以在当前用户的上下文中执行任意代码的方式损坏内存。攻击者可能拥有一个特制的网站，旨在利用此漏洞通过IE浏览器，然后诱使用户查看该网站。
family_en_des: CVE-2013-1347 is a family of overflow programs in IE browser. The vulnerability enables the attacker to execute random code in current user context to do damage to memory. The attacker exploits the vulnerability to encourage the user to visit a specified website.

family_cn_des: Datcaen家族是木马类程序中的后门程序。该程序未经授权访问受感染的计算机。它发送系统信息和可以接受命令从远程C&C服务器。主要功能有上传、下载、升级、关机、删除和修改文件等。端口和C&C服务器不是固定的。
family_en_des: Datcaen is a family of backdoor Trojans. The Trojan makes access to the infected computer without the user authorization. It receives and executes commands from a remote C&C server, uploads the system data to the server. It has the functions of uploading, downloading, updating, shutting down the system, deleting and modifying files. It has varied and unfixed ports and servers.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行于java平台下；目前得到的该家族的样本为java编译的类文件；具有下载特征。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under JAVA platform. The current sample of this family is class file compiled in JAVA, which has the downloading characteristic.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行于x64系统下；具有下载并运行可执行程序、回传日志、更新主程序、更新选项、多种方法注入进程等功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under x64 system. It can carry out the following malicious actions: downloading and running the executive programs, uploading logs, updating the main program and options, injecting process with multiple methods.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。多数样本版本信息源文件名为DiskDefrag.exe（磁盘清理工具）；该家族样本使用vb编写；部分样本带有UPX壳；数据经过加密处理；暂无其它行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is written by VB. The source file names of most sample version information are DiskDefrag.exe. Some samples have UPX shell. The data is encrypted. There are no other malicious actions.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于黑客工具，为国外著名隐藏运行批处理脚本的命令行工具。一般配合其他恶意软件使用，达到隐藏恶意行为的目的。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that usually assists other malware to realize the purpose of hiding its mailiciou actions. It is the foreign command tool that hide the running batch scripts

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。运行于PHP网站环境下；具有执行命令、上传文件、文件管理，查看系统信息、SQL操作、自删除、MD5加密、BASE64加密等功能，黑客在入侵网站的过程中使用该类文件从webshell来获取系统权限。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under PHP network environment. Hackers can get the system privilege from webshell when they intruding websites by using the class file. It can carry out the following mailicious actions: executing commands, uploading files, file management, MD5 encryption, BASE64 encryption and so on.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于网络工具类。家族IEEN是以该工具名称命名。IEen是一款专业的远程控制软件，该工具能够借助135端口轻松连接到其它工作站，并监控其IE浏览器，在浏览器中的任何操作都会被监控。
family_en_des: It is a collection of nettool that collects your personal information, such as your browsing history, and uses it without adequate consent. IEEN is a kind of professional remote control software which can connect other work ports by 135 port and monitor their IE browser.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于蠕虫类，伪装自身图标为Facebook图标，具有UpdatesLTD数字签名，通过Facebook社交网站传播，运行后衍生多个文件，安装浏览器插件，可能会窃取Facebook用户信息。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that disguises itself as Facebook icon. It spreads by the socializing website Facebook with UpdatesLTD digital signature. It derives several files after running and installs the browser plug-in. It may steal user's Facebook information.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于64位平台下的风险程序类。运行于64位平台下；样本为比特币加密兑换工具Eobot；并无其它恶意行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that runs under win64 platfor. The samples of this family is the exchange tool Eobot with Bitcoin encryption. There are no other malicious behaviors.

family_cn_des: 该家族运行于DOS平台下，可感染DOS下16位程序。
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus that runs under DOS platform. It can infect the 16 bit programs in DOS system.

family_cn_des: 该家族为木马类，使用VBS脚本编写的。其功能是关闭系统中一些安全软件，例如：avp.exe、nod32.exe、nod32kui.exe等
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that opens a named pipe for communication with a remote attacker and attempts to terminate the Windows shell "explorer.exe" process. It is written by VBS. It can shut down some security software in the system, such as avp.exe, nod32.exe and nod32kui.exe.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标伪装为Facebook的Logo；该家族为自解压格式，将所有文件解压到%Temp%文件夹下，但由于可执行程序丢失，导致无后续行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is in self-decompression mode. The icon disguises as the logo of Facebook. It can decompress all the files into %Temp% archive. However, due to the miss of executive programs, it results in non-continuious actions.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于广告类软件。PricePeep可以收集私人信息和浏览器数据如浏览器历史记录等，中此广告件后浏览器会自动弹出广告并把用户指向PricePeep网站。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that can collect personal information and browser data (such as the history records of the browser). After being infected by it, the browser will pop ads up automatically and direct users into PricePeep website.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行后，弹出伪装窗口，显示需安装.net4.0，样本后台运行，释放可执行文件到%Temp%文件夹下；添加注册表启动项；具有网络行为。回传本地系统基本信息。网络特征：http_method="GET"&http_url_str^".php?ip="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26os="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26name="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26id="
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that pops fake window after running. It can release the executive files into %Temp% archive and add the registry option. Then it sends the basic information back to the local. The network characteristic is http_method="GET"&http_url_str^".php?ip="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26os="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26name="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26id=" .

family_cn_des: 该家族属代理木马类，运行时,会根据用户权限级别随机释放一个随机命名代理DLL组件并添加自启动项。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that installs a proxy, detected as TrojanProxy:Win32/Hioles.C, to intercept communication from an affected computer with web email services provided by Hotmail, Yahoo! and Gmail. It can release a proxy DLL component by random and add the startups according to user's privilege level.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于蠕虫类。可以通过IRC等即时通信软件、可移动驱动器、邮件等进行传播；它会下载安装其它恶意程序；会窃取用户机密信息回传给服务器；会禁用杀毒软件等。
family_en_des:
This family of worms can steal your user names and passwords by spying on what you do online. They can block websites that are related to security updates and launch a limited denial of service (DoS) attack.
They spread via USB flash drives, instant messaging programs, and social networks.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行后会安装一个键盘记录器KeyloggerDiagnosticTool，记录键盘操作，并将计算机名称和log文件上传到http://www.mykeyloggeronline.com，弹出页面，并以pdf形式提供受害者机器上的记录下载。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that installs KeyloggerDiagnosticTool to record the keyboard operations and upload the computer name and log file to website http://www.mykeyloggeronline.com. Then it pops the pages and provides the download record of the infected computer.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于手机类恶意代码，该程序安装后无图标显示，运行时会屏蔽特定号码的短信，同时会后台下载安装未知软件，造成用户流量等资费的消耗。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that can shield messages from the specific numbers. There is no icon of it after being installed. It can download and install the unknown software at the backend, which results in the large comsumption of user traffic fee.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。该家族样本均为动态链接库文件，少量样本带有ASP壳，使用VC++编写；具有基本木马的特征：提升权限、访问远程链接、创建文件、创建进程等并具有窃取银行账号功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose samples are DLL files. Some of the samples have ASP shells. It is wirtten by VC++ with basic Trojan characteristics, such as promoting privileges, accessing the remote links, creating files, establishing programs and so on.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于风险程序类。图标伪装为360杀毒；运行出弹出伪装directdownloader的下载界面；释放多个可执行程序；添加注册表启动项；下载安装假的安全软件；提示用户注册后缴费使用。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware whose icon disguises as 360 antivirus software. It can pop up the download interface of directdownloader, adding the startup options of the registry, downloading and installing the fake software. Then it reminds users to pay for usage after registration.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于邮件类黑客工具。Homicide具有邮箱炸弹功能，使用Winsock通信，可用来发送垃圾邮件。
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that has the functionality of mail bomb. It communicates through Winsock and can be used to send junk mails.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于脚本类，通过嵌入到网页中时行传播。此脚本内部代码为加密的。运行后会弹也一个图片，内容为假冒的安全软件让用户购买。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that spreads by being embedded into web pages. The internal code is in cryption. It will pop a picture, of which the material is fake security software.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于手机广告类。该程序提供反向电话查询服务，但运行过程中会启动后台服务，会无提示私自获取用户联系人信息并通过FTP方式上传，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile adware that can provide reverse phone search service. It may launch the backend service during running. It will obtain user's contact information automatically and upload it by FTP, which results in privacy leaks.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于手机广告类。该程序捆绑了startapp广告件，该广告件可能会创建桌面快捷方式，修改用户浏览器书签，并获取手机设备等信息，同时修改手机的默认浏览器主页为searchmobileonline.com，建议用户谨慎使用。不过该广告件，一般会在程序启动时给出提示信息。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile adware that is bundled with startapp adware (It may create desktop shortcut, modify the browser bookmark and get the information of mobile device.). It changes the default browser homepage into searchmobileonline.com. It can give notice information when the program is lauched.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于风险程序类。它是一个下载程序，运行后连接网络访问多个页面，并下载可升级的程序。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that is a installation program. It connects the network to access several webs and downloads the programs that can update.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。已发现样均为EXE可执行程序；部分函数和数据以加密形式存在；具有添加服务、设置启动项、等待并接收服务器指令、回传信息、自删除等功能；该家族最重要的功能是下载并运行可执行程序，具有下载者类恶意代码特征。
family_en_des:
This backdoor Trojan can give a malicious hacker access to your PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标伪装为jpg格式图标；释放三个文件到%RECYKLER%\SYS64，分别为cmd.jpg（为配置文件）、dwm.exe（可执行恶意程序）、RealtkHDpnl.lnk（用于实现开机启动）；会发送TCP请求。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose icon disguises as jpg formate. It may release three files into %RECYKLER%\SYS64, which are cmd.jpg（configuration file）、dwm.exe（executive malicious program）、RealtkHDpnl.lnk. It may also send TCP request.

family_cn_des:
该族样本运行后，会经常弹出广告信息，还有可能会对破坏计算机数据；设置网络监听；生成配置文件；有网络下载行为。
该家族属于风险类。该家族的样本多带有ASP或UPX壳；会对计算机进程进行遍历，注入恶意代码到explorer.exe中；弹出IE窗口，显示广告；添加注册表启动项；会访问远程服务器，有网络行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus that pops up ads information. This program is used for malware-related actions. It may damage the computer data, setting network monitor, generating configuration files and downloading from the internet.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标伪装为“我的电脑”，带有UPX壳；在C盘下无限创建文件夹，文件名格式如下：S2Khackedyou%dtimes（%d为数据，从0开始逐次加1）。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose icon disguises as "My Computer" with UPX shell. It may create unlimited archives under C drive with the file name formate as follows: S2Khackedyou%dtimes（%d refers to data）.

family_cn_des: LOIC是一款面向于web应用程序的DoS/DDoS攻击工具，它可以用TCP数据包、UDP数据包、HTTP请求对于目标网站进行DoS/DDoS测试，不怀好意的人可能利用LOIC构建僵尸网络。LOIC是一个非常好的DoS/DDoS攻击工具。该工具来源为：http://sourceforge.net/projects/loic/files/loic/
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that targets web application. It can carry out DoS/DDoS tests on target websites by using TCP data pack, UDP data pack and HTTP request. People with evil purposes will make use of LOIC to establish botnet. The source of it is http://sourceforge.net/projects/loic/files/loic/ .

family_cn_des: 该家族为广告类。是Volaro工具栏，运行后会主动连接网络访问指定网页，有自动更新功能。
family_en_des:
This adware program displays ads as you browse the web.
It can be downloaded from the program's website, or it may be installed when you install other software.
It can open advertisements that appear independently and outside the context of the program, website, or other source the advertisements are promoting. After being executed, it may connects the network to access the specific websites automatically.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。MasterParadise是典型的木马工具，具有服务端与客户端；具有较多的恶意功能，如：具有获取被感染用户屏幕截图、文件操作功能、安装恶意软件、获取系统信息等等。
family_en_des:
This backdoor Trojan can give a malicious hacker access to user's PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information. It has several malicious functionalities, such as obtainning the screenshot of the infected users, file operation, install malicious software, stealing the system information and so on.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于风险程序类。该家族会自我复制到%windir%\AccessSolution\access.exe，并在桌面创建快捷方式，图标为IE，同时将快捷方式添加到IE浏览器收藏夹中；在IE缓存文件夹下释放ocx插件。
family_en_des:
This threat is part of the Win32/Banload family. Trojans in this family can download other malware onto your PC, including Win32/Banker and Win32/Bancos.
They can also steal your banking user names and passwords and send them to a remote attacker.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。样本运行后会加载一个驱动文件，创建系统服务；会加载一个动态链接库文件；由于两个文件缺失，导致后续分析无法进行。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that will download a drive file after running. It creats system service and downloads a DLL file. Due to the loss of two files, the following analysis cannot be carried out.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。使用JAVA作为开发语言；现有该家族的样本格式类型多样，如.jar、.class等；具有向系统文件夹自我复制能力；添加开机自启动；通过修改DNS来实现后门；删除样本原始文件。
family_en_des: It is a collection of backdoor Trojan that is developed by Java language. There are a variety of sample format types, such as .jar and .class. It has the capability of self-replicating to the system files. It realizes the backdoor function by modifying DNS and deleting the original files of sample.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。样本均为动态链接库；具有创建服务、等待并接收远程服务器指令、回传日志、添加相应注册表信息实现启动等功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of backdoor Trojan whose samples are DLLs. It has the following functionalities: creating services, waiting and receiving the remote server command, uploading logs, adding the corresponding registry information to launch.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于64位平台下的木马类。此家族具有捆绑功能，并含有后台自动下载功能。部分数据是经过加密处里的。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under 64-bit flatform. It has the functionality of bundling and downloading from the backend automatically. Part of the data is dealt with encryption.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于手机类恶意代码，该软件安装无图标，会拦截短信并将拦截的短信号码、内容及用户手机号等隐私信息上传到指定的网址，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can block the SMSs. Then it sends the blocked private information (such as SMS number, content and user's cell phone number) to the specific website, which results in privacy information leaks.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于广告类软件。DomaIQ家族名是根据其释放的文件名而来。运行后会弹出广告含有下载升级功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware. The family name DomaIQ is named according to the name of released file. It will pop out ads after running. It also has the functionality of downloading and upgrading.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。使用BorlandC++编写；部分样本带有ASP壳；具有连接C&C服务器、下载文件等功能。
family_en_des:
This backdoor Trojan can give a malicious hacker access to your PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于64位平台下的木马类。此家族具有勒索用户功能，部分数据是经过加密处里的。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under 64-bit flatform. It has the functionality of blackmailing users. Parts of its data is under encryption.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于蠕虫类。增加开机启动项；具有联网行为；枚举系统磁盘，在磁盘生成隐藏文件；对外发送垃圾邮件；通过邮件进行传播。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that can carry out many malicious actions, such as adding startup option, connecting the network, enumerating system disks, creating hidden files on disks, sending junk emails and spreading through emails.

family_cn_des: Carej家族是手机类恶意代码，应用被利用签名漏洞植入了恶意包，后台下载恶意apk，联网获取指令，静默发送短信，同时会拦截指定短信，拦截指定来电。
family_en_des: This family is a collection of mobile malware that uses signature vulnerability to inject malware. It can download the malicious apk at the backend, connecting the network to gain commands, sending SMSs and blocking specific messages and calls.

family_cn_des: Svpeng家族是手机类恶意代码，感染其它应用程序，启动后激活设备管理器。联网接收远程指令控制，会获取用户短信，联系人，通话记录等信息并上传远程服务器，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: Svpeng is a collection of mobile malware that can infect other programs. It can activate the device manager. Then it receives the remote command controls by connecting the network. It also gets the information of user's SMSs, contacts and phone records and uploads the remote server, which results in privacy leaks.

family_cn_des: Cova家族是手机类恶意代码，软件运行后会隐藏图标，会在用户运行时后台发送扣费短信，并拦截回馈短信，拨打特定号码时会转向扣费号码，造成用户资费的消耗，同时也会上传用户收到的短信，泄露用户的隐私。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that can hide icons after running. It can carry out the following malicious actions: sending charging SMSs, blocking the feedback SMSs, turning to charging numbers when calling the specific numbers, uploading the SMSs that user has received to disclose user's privacy.

family_cn_des: Jokedoor家族是木马类程序，它是一个后门程序Joke软件生成的。可以用来进行分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击,或者是被用来安装其它的木马。例如：它可能被用来安装一个下载者、代理或键盘记录等。它还可能影响系统开放的端口,从而有可能导致进一步的其他攻击。
family_en_des:
This backdoor Trojan can give a malicious hacker access to your PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information.

family_cn_des: Saonet家族是木马类程序，拷贝到系统文件夹下，通过修改注册表，实现添加IE按钮插件，实现广告推广。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of Trojan that can carry out ads promotion. It can add the IE button plug-in by modifying the registry.Trojans are a type of malware that try to look innocent to convince you to install them on your PC.
They can steal your personal information, download more malware, or give a malicious hacker access to your PC.

family_cn_des: Mogap家族是手机类恶意代码，程序伪装成系统应用，运行后删除图标，激活设备管理器使用户无法正常卸载，拦截短信，接受短信指令控制将收到的短信息以邮件的形式上传，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that disguises as system app. It deletes the icon after running and activates the device manager to make it harder for users to uninstall. It uploads the received SMSs in the form of email, which results in user's privacy leak.

family_cn_des: Badok家族是手机类恶意代码，app伪装为系统应用程序，运行后访问特定网址并且隐藏桌面图标。后台私自发送短信，拦截特定短信并上传至远程服务器，上传用户手机号码。删除特定短信并上传至远程服务器，造成隐私泄漏以及资费消耗。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that disguises as system app. It hides the desktop icon after running. Also, it carries out the following malicious actions: sending SMSs automatically, blocking specific SMS and sending to the remote server, which results in privacy leaks and fee charging.

family_cn_des: Engeneer家族运行后添加自启动项，拷贝到指定目录下，并以系统文件命名，开启本地大量端口对外发送UDP请求。
family_en_des: Engeneer is a collection of Trojan that can add startup option. Then it transfers to the specific directory and names the option in terms of system file. It can open large amounts of local ports and send UDP requests.

family_cn_des: Gumen家族是手机类恶意代码，运行后添加自启动项，拥有自动在后台联网下载推广软件并静默安装的能力，给用户造成资费消耗。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that can add startup option. It has the capability of downloading and installing adware at the backend, which brings economy consumption to users.

family_cn_des: Proxy家族是木马类程序，运行后会在系统文件夹下释放VBS脚本文件，并添加到开机启动项，会建立一个提供匿名访问互联网的代理服务器，VBS脚本向C&C服务器发送UDP请求，下载文件等操作。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can release VBS script file and add startup option. Then it creats a proxy server that provides anonymous access to the Internet. The VBS script sends UDP request to C&C server and downloads files.

family_cn_des: Steckt家族是蠕虫类。运行后该家族样本会拷贝自己到系统文件夹下并启动，设置文件属性为隐藏、只读，设置开机启动项，将样本添加到防火墙可通行列表，降低IE安全属性。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that can copy itself to the system archive. Then it sets the file attribute as hidden and read only. It then adds the sample to the practicable list of firewall to reduce security arribute.

family_cn_des: Neurevt家族是木马类程序，运行后添加自启动项，劫持Windows系统还原程序，拷贝自己到系统文件夹下伪装为系统文件启动，设置进程保护，防止进程被结束，向服务器发送信息。网络特征：http_method="POST"&http_url_str^".php"&http_msgbody="ps0="&http_msgbody[0r]^"\26ps1="&http_msgbody[0r]^"\26cs1="&http_msgbody[0r]^"\21cs2="&http_msgbody[0r]^"\26cs3="
family_en_des: Trojan:Win32/Neurevt.A is a trojan that changes some of your computer's settings and steals sensitive information from your computer. It might also allow a remote attacker to access your computer.

family_cn_des: Agent家族是木马类程序，运行后会调用ipconfig命令检测当前所在环境，运行C:\svchost.exe，并将其添加自启动项。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can call ipconfig command to detect the current environment. Then it runs C:\svchost.exe and adds the startup option.

family_cn_des: Tedroo家族是后门类程序，样本没有壳，但使用大量的加密的加解密运算。访问远程服务器，根据返回结果，执行相应的操作。带有无效的数字签名。网络特征：Match=http_method="GET"&http_url_str^"s_get_host.php?ver="
family_en_des: Tedroo is a collection of Trojan that sends spam email. It retrieves commands and configuration data from a remote server. It can access the remote server and carry out the corresponding operations according to the return result. The network  characteristic is  Match=http_method="GET"&http_url_str^"s_get_host.php?ver=" .

family_cn_des: Winlock家族是木马类程序，运行后，创建并运行批处理文件，添加自启动项，禁用进程管理器、关闭桌面、锁定cmd.exe。
family_en_des: Winlock is a collection of Trojan that can create and run batch file. It can carry out the following malicious actions: adding the startip options, disabling the program server, closing the desktop and locking cmd.exe.

family_cn_des: Dybalom家族是木马类程序，该家族样本具有反调试功能，用来窃取用户信息，禁用已安装的安全软件，安装其它恶意软件，会对一些应用程序进行监控，窃取数据。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that carrries the characteristic of anti-debugging to steal user's information. Then it disables the installed software and installs other malware. It can monitor the progress and steal data.

family_cn_des: Crazh家族是EXCE宏病毒,感染对象为MS-OFFICE文档EXCE格式文件,通过感染EXCE格式文件来执行一些特定的命令。
family_en_des: It is a collection of micro virus that can infect EXCE format file of MS-OFFICE document. In this way it can carry out some specific commands.

family_cn_des: Hisp家族是一个Office宏病毒。Office宏病毒感染数据文件创建使用应用程序在微软Office套件,包括微软的Word,Excel。宏病毒是已知的可执行其它程序，一旦被感染的文件被打开，一些宏病毒甚至可以通过电子邮件传播。宏病毒通常也经由交换被感染的文件或使用受影响的应用程序。宏观病毒可以修改默认的模板应用像MicrosoftWord来确保成功创建或打开的文件也被感染。
family_en_des: Hisp is a collection of micro virus. Office micro virus can infect data files and create applications, including Word and Excel.

family_cn_des: Crypt家族是VBS脚本木马类。此脚本为VBS脚本语言编写，内容中含有大里的加密代码。本身不具备自动传播，一般通过网络下载或是捆绑在其它程序中。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is written by VNS script language. There are large amount of encypted codes. It spreads by downloading from network or bundling with other programs.

family_cn_des: TPE-based家族是DOS系统下的感染式病毒。它感染系统中的EXE和COM格式文件。在无意中损坏或覆盖它们的主程序。具有高度破坏性,如破坏系统无法正常使用。
family_en_des: It is a collection of infectious virus that can infect EXE and COM files of the system. It can inadvertently damage or covert the main program, which is highly destructive, such as damaging the system to function unproperly.

family_cn_des: SpyMob家族是手机类恶意代码，该应用无实际功能，启动后会向用户推广一款间谍软件MobileSpy，传播恶意代码。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware with no practical functionalities. It will promote a kind of spyware named MobileSpy after being started so as to spread the malware.

family_cn_des: DarkManko家族是DOS系统下的感染式病毒。这并不是一个危险的非内存常驻加密寄生病毒。它在搜索到.com文件后，将自身写入到文件末尾。根据生成的新病毒显示一条中文消息，并终止计算机运行。该病毒包括以下文本字符串：JapanReseachInstituteOfSelfReproducingProgram[JRIOSRP-6]DarkManko3/5/95
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus under DOS system. It does not belong to the kind of dangeous non-memory-resident encrypted parasitic virus. When searched .com files, it writes itself into the end of the files. It shows a piece of chinese message according to the new virus and terminates the operation of computer. The virus contains the following text strings: JapanReseachInstituteOfSelfReproducingProgram[JRIOSRP-6]DarkManko3/5/95.

family_cn_des: Logon家族是木马类程序。该家族样本以服务的方式添加到系统中，设置自启动项，用来窃取用户信息，如：游戏帐号、银行信息、个人信息等，并回传到指定服务器。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that adds services to the system. It sets startup option to steal user's information, such as game accounts, bank information, personal information, and sends back to specific server.

family_cn_des: Sysrater家族属于盗号木马，其伪装成一个游戏外挂程序，在后台盗取指定的时候账号和密码。还会弹出一些指定的URL地址进行推广。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that disguises as a game cheating program to steal the specific accounts and passwords. It can also pops some specific URL addresses to promote.

family_cn_des: MS05-020家族是漏洞利用工具。该漏洞利用工具可以生成利用微软MS05-020中的分级审查内存损坏漏洞进行破坏的病毒文件，InternetExplorer由于其处理分级审查文件的方法而存在一个远程执行代码漏洞。攻击者可以通过构造特制的分级审查文件来利用此漏洞。该工具运行后，会生成一个名称为rsaci.rat的病毒文件．这是一个安装恶意分级审查文件，如果用户继续点击，则可能允许远程执行代码。成功利用此漏洞的攻击者可以完全控制受影响的系统。
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that can exploit tools to generate virus file. The generated file can make damage to the vulnerability by using the content advisor memory of Microsoft MS05-020. There is a remote executive code vulnerability due to the approach of dealing with the content advisor files. The attackers can exploit the vulnerability by forming a special content advisor file. After being executed, it will generate a virus file named rsaci.rat.If users click it, the remote code will be executed. The attackers that exploit this vulnerability can control the affected system completely.

family_cn_des: Krolol家族是木马类。基于.NET平台开发，运行后拷贝自身到系统文件夹下，伪装为系统文件并启动，设置键盘钩子函数，获取键盘输入，对外发送TCP请求。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is developed on .NET platform. It will copy itself into the system file archive after running. It can also carry out the following malicious actions: disguising as system file , setting the keyboard hook function, obtaining the keyboard input, sending TCP request and so on.

family_cn_des: Zhelatin家族是蠕虫类程序，运行后复制自身到系统文件下并添加自启动项，降低IE安全属性。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that copies itself to the system file and adds the startup option to decrease I.E. security attribute.

family_cn_des: FlyStudio家族是间谍件，运行后会添加自启动项，软件中含有加密算法，会释放广告程序。
family_en_des: This threat can perform a number of actions of a malicious hacker's choice on user's PC. It can add startup option with encryption algorithm, which can release adware.

family_cn_des: Forav家族是手机恶意代码。该应用伪造银行激活码程序诱导用户下载安装，运行时会在后台私发短信激活应用，并能接受短信指令实现发送短信、拦截转发特定短信息、卸载自身等功能，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that disguises as bank activition program to lure users to download and install. It can send messages to activate applications and receive messages to realize the following functions: sending messages, blocking specific messages, uninstalling itself, which will result to privacy leaks.

family_cn_des: Kodbos家族是木马类程序。具有基于时间判断的反调试，代码中含有大量的ip地址。程序运行后对外发送大量网络数据包，具有DDOS攻击的特征。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that has anti-debugging function based on time determination. There are lots of IP addresses. It can send network data packages. It carries the characteristic of DDOS attack.

family_cn_des: Fsysna家族是木马类程序。在%Temp%文件夹下释放恶意代码，添加自启动项，发送网络请求。该家族部分样本是使用脚本语言AutoIt编写的，版本为3.3.8.1，代码中含有大量的加密。
