Safe Operation has infected 12,000 IP addresses in more than 100 countries since October 2012. The victims include government departments, science and technology companies, media, academic research institutes and non-government organizations. 
Safe Operation makes use of spear phishing send a malicious e-mail to the target. When the e-mail is opened, the computer will download malware to communicate with remote relay station.
To lower the risk of being detected, the attacker employs two different C&C servers based on different targets. In addition, the attacker makes the locations of IP addresses belonging to network service vendors more diversified via VPN and other agents. 
The malware used in the spying activities of Safe Operation is not only designed for stealing data, but also integrated with other components to improve its performance including stealing passwords stored in IE and Firefox, stealing Remote Desktop Protocol (PDP) stored in Windows. According to the market evidence, the attackers have some relationship with Chinese underground cyber criminal groups. Some technique they used even relates to the research in a famous Chinese university and the source-code database belonging to a Chinese network service vendor. Although it can be not confirmed what’s the aim and identity of those attackers, it is certain that the actions involves China.
action_des: 该恶意软件为针对性攻击，利用鱼叉式网络钓鱼手法进行攻击和盗取重要资料

family_cn_des:
Flame 恶意软件是一个大型的由多个模块组成的攻击工具包。其中一个主要的模块被命名为火焰——这个模块负责攻击和感染增加的机器。                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           卡巴斯基实验室的专家们是在参与国际电联（ITU）发起的一项技术分析调查中发现Flame的。Flame被用来执行网络间谍活动。它可以盗取重要信息，包括计算机显示内容、目标系统的信息、储存的文件、联系人数据甚至音频对话记录。其复杂性和功能性已经超过其它任何已知的网络武器。                                                                                                                                                  Flame是迄今发现为止程序最大的网络武器，其设计结构让其几乎不能被追查到。然而，一般的恶意程序都比较小，因此方便隐藏。而庞大的Flame程序竟然能够让其未被发现。Flame通过复杂先进的技术感染计算机，而这些技术仅在之前的一个网络武器中被用到——Stuxnet。尽管Flame早在2010年3月就开始活动，但直到卡巴斯基实验室发现之前，没有任何的安全软件将其检测到。它几乎重新定义了网络战争和网络间谍活动。                                                                                                                                    Flame是一种高度复杂的恶意程序，被用作网络武器并已经攻击了多个国家。  Flame的攻击目标包括个人计算机、国家机关甚至教育机构。Flame是一种复杂的恶意程序，可以盗取大量的数据和各种各样的信息。
首先,Flame是一个巨大的包模块，当它完全展开时，它包括近20 MB的大小。正因为如此,它是一个极其难以分析的恶意软件。为什么Flame如此之大，这是因为它包含许多不同的库,诸如压缩(zlib,libbz2,ppmd)和数据库操作(sqlite3),连同一个Lua虚拟机。                                                                                                                                                                       Lua是一种脚本语言(编程),它可以很容易地扩展和以及对C代码。许多地区的火焰有高阶逻辑写在Lua -有效攻击子程序和库从c++编译。                                                                                                                                                                                                    有效的Lua代码部分与整体代码相比是相当小的。我们估计的发展“成本”在Lua中超过3000行代码,开发人员应该采取平均大约一个月来创建和调试。                                                                                                                                                                                 同时,有内部使用的本地数据库与嵌套SQL查询,多个方法,各种压缩算法的加密,使用Windows管理规范的脚本,批处理脚本和更多。
Flame病毒是一个最复杂的蠕虫,它使用Lua脚本和数据库等多个组件，是有史以来最复杂的蠕虫之一。它在中东地区通过多种方式大规模传播。它能够回传各类文件和其他信息，包括设计图纸和屏幕截图。Flame病毒已经被证实与震网病毒具有同源关系。                                                                                                                                                                                                    Flame病毒是一个复杂的工具包，它比Dequ病毒复杂多了。它是一个后门，一个木马，它具有蠕虫的特性。                                                                                                                                                             一旦系统被感染,Flame就开始了一系列复杂的操作,其中包括嗅探网络流量、截图、记录音频对话、拦截键盘等等。所有这些数据都通过链接到火焰的指挥和控制服务器来提供给操作员。                                                                                                                 接下来，操作员可以选择上传模块来进一步扩大火焰病毒的功效。总体来讲，大约有20个模块，而且它们中绝大多数的目的仍旧是用于研究。
            
火焰病毒以Lua和C++语言写成，使用了数据库和Lua脚本等多个组件，被称为有史以来最复杂的恶意软件，在中东大范围传播。它在中东地区通过多种方式大规模传播，回传各类文件和其他信息，包括设计图纸和屏幕截图等。
family_en_des:
Flame is a large and multiple-module toolkit. One module named Flame is responsible for attacking and infecting additional computers. 
Flame was found by Kaspersky Labs in a technical analysis research launched by ITU. By spying activity, Flame steals important and sensitive data. It is more complex than any known cyber weapons. 
Flame has sophisticated design and structure, which make it difficult to detect although it is so huge in size. The complex technology used by Flame is only used once in a former cyber weapon—Stuxnet. Flame began its actions as early as March 2010, but no antivirus software had detected it before Kaspersky found it. The appearance of Flame almost redefined what cyber warfare is and what cyber espionage is. 
Flame has been used to attack several countries with the aim for PC, national organizations and even education institutes to steal various types of data. 
Flame is a huge module of 20 MB including different libraries and a Lua virtual machine, which make it one of the most complex worms. Flame spread in Middle East via different approaches in a large scale. It has been proved to be homologous with Stuxnet. 
Flame is even more complex than Duqu. It is a backdoor and Trojan, which has worm-like features. Once a system is infected, Flame will perform malicious operations including including sniffing the network traffic, taking screenshots, recording audio conversations, intercepting the keyboard, and so on. All these data are sent to attackers via link to C&C server. Then, some modules are uploaded to further improve its performance. Functions of the total 20 modules are still under investigation.


Flame is one of the most complex worm that uses database, Lua script and other components. It spreads in large scale through multiple ways in the Middle East. It can return various forms of documents and other information including design drawings and screenshots. （Flame has been proved to be homologous with Stuxnet.）
action_des: 无

en_name: 对叙利亚外交部的针对性攻击
family_cn_des: 此次攻击发生在2012年11月30日，叙利亚外交部的大量文件被泄露在一个由匿名组织管理的网站（Par:AnoIA）中。该攻击使用的恶意代码都相对简单，有基本的连接C&C服务器以下载额外部件的功能。该攻击属于典型的鱼叉式网络钓鱼类型，它在邮件中将一个具有漏洞（CVE-2010-0188）的PDF文件作为附件。而该邮件的IP地址是123.140.57.166，属于韩国首尔的一个代理地址。
family_en_des: Happened on 30th of November in 2012, the attack leads to the exposure of a mass of files belonging to Syrian Minster for Foreign Affairs in a website called “Par:AnoIA” controlled by anonymous organizations The malicious code used in the attack is comparatively easy and is able to communicate with C&C servers to download additional components. The attack belongs to classical spear phishing type. It attaches a PDF file with the CVE-2010-0188 vulnerability. The IP address of the e-mail is 123.140.57.166 which is an agent one in Seoul South Korea.

family_cn_des:
Skuller是一类针对塞班操作系统的木马家族。被Skuller木马感染的手机中，应用软件的图标会被替换为骷髅头和腿骨，因此得名“skull”（骷髅）。
Skuller木马最早出现在2004年11月，在一些手机论坛上通过将自身伪装成名为“Extended theme.SIS”的恶意SIS文件进行传播。
Skuller木马主要针对运行塞班S60操作系统的设备，也可以影响运行塞班系统的其他设备，比如Nokia 9500，该款手机运行塞班S80操作系统。然而， 在Nokia9500上安装该木马时，系统发出警告信息，因此减少了被感染的风险。
一旦安装成功，Skuller木马就会将正常的系统文件替换掉，并用骷髅头和头骨图标替换正常的应用程序图标，而该图标并不指向正常的应用文件，因此手机上安装的正常程序无法开启。一旦手机被感染就只能用于呼叫和接听电话。短信、彩信、相机和网络浏览等功能都将无法使用。
family_en_des:
Skuller is a family of Trojans targeted against Symbian operating system. The icons of application in a infected mobile phone will be replaced with skull and cross bones. 
Skuller first appeared in November 2004. It disguised itself as a SIS file named “Extended theme.SIS” to spread in some mobile forums.  
Skuller mainly infects mobile phone running S60 or other Symbian devices, such as Nokia 9500 which runs S80. The installation of the Trojan in Nokia 9500 will cause a warning message, so risk of infection becomes lower. 
Once installation successes, Skuller will replace normal system files with skull and cross bones which does not direct to normal application files. Therefore, normal applications cannot be opened, only calling and answering calls works. SMS，MMS，camera and web browser no longer function.
action_des: skuller木马伪装成一个主题文件供人下载，安装后会替换塞班s60系统的应用程序的图标为骷髅头和骷髅腿。

family_cn_des:
Vienna是一种感染.COM文件的执行档型病毒。该病毒最早出现在1987年，是由奥地利维也纳的一名中学生在实验中编写出来的，故名“Vienna”（维也纳）。
Vienna病毒于1988年4月在莫斯科最先被隔离出来，Ralph Burger是第一个获取该病毒副本的人，他将病毒进行了拆解和分析，并在他的著作“Computer Viruses: a High-tech Disease”（《计算机病毒：高技术的瘟疫》）中公布了该病毒的反汇编代码，并详细介绍了计算机病毒的工作原理和编写方法。此后，该病毒的变种规模迅速扩大。Rolf Burger将病毒副本发送给Bernt Fix，后者成功地开发出用于消灭该病毒的软件。Vienna是第一个被反病毒程序消灭的病毒。
Vienna病毒以感染文件为传播途径，被该病毒感染的文件运行时，会搜索并感染系统上的.COM文件，并将磁盘目录中该文件的时间戳的秒数设置为“62”，这是一个不可能实现的值。病毒附在受感染文件的末端，使文件长度增加648字节。Vienna病毒选择的文件中，有1/6都不会被该感染。相反，被选择的.COM文件的前五个字节都会被重写为十六进制的字符串“EAF0FF00F0”，文件时间戳的秒数被设置成“62”。当这些程序随后执行时，系统会进行软启动。由于这些被损毁的文件实际并不包含Vienna病毒，大多数反病毒软件都无法检测到它们，被Vienna感染的系统将会继续经历无法预期的重启动，直到所有被损毁的.COM文件都被清洁的文件替代。
family_en_des:
Vienna is the first direct action virus. First appeared in 1987, it was written in an experiment by a high school student in Vienna Austria. So it got the name “Vienna”. 
Vienna was first isolated in April, 1988, in Moscow. Ralph Burger was the first to receive a copy of the virus. He disassembled and analyzed the virus, and published the finding in his writing “Computer Viruses: a High-tech Disease”. After that the variants of it spread widely and quickly. Vienna is also the first virus destroyed by an antivirus program. Rolf Burger sent a copy of the virus to Bernt Fix, who managed to develop antivirus software pointing to the virus.
Vienna spreads by infecting files. When an infected file executes, it will search and infect .com files in system and set the second field on file timestamp as the impossible value of “62”. The virus is attached in the file end and increases the file length by 648 bytes. 1/6 of the files chosen by Vienna will not be infected. In contrast, the first five bytes of the chosen .COM file will be rewritten as the hex character string "EAF0FF00F0" and the second field will be set as “62”. When these programs afterwards execute, the system will boot warmly. As these destroyed .COM files do not contain the Vienna virus, most antivirus software cannot detect them. The system infected by Vienna will go on experience unexpected reboot until all those .COM files are replaced by clean files.
action_des: Vienna病毒以感染文件为传播途径，被该病毒感染的文件运行时，会搜索并感染系统上的.COM文件

family_cn_des: Virus/Win9x.CIH病毒是一种能够破坏计算机系统硬件的网络恶性病毒，因此他是基于特定传播方式的基因关联来命名的家族。                                               CIH病毒产自台湾，最早随国际两大盗版集团贩卖的盗版光盘在欧美等地广泛传播，随后进一步通过Internet传播到全世界各个角落。1998年9月，雅马哈公司为感染了该病毒的CD-R400驱动提供一个固件更新。1998年10月，用户传播的Activision公司游戏SiN的一个演示版因为在某一用户的机器上接触被感染文件而受到感染。这个公司的传染源来自IBM1999年3月间发售的已感染CIH病毒的一组Aptiva品牌个人电脑。1999年4月26日，业界开始关注CIH时，这些电脑已经运出一个月了。这是一宗大灾难，全球不计其数的电脑硬盘被垃圾数据覆盖，甚至破坏BIOS，无法启动。至2000年4月26日，亚洲报称发生多宗损坏，但病毒没有传播开来。2001年3月发现Anjulie蠕虫病毒，它将CIH v1.2植入感染的系统。当然，CIH对BIOS的破坏，也并非想像中的那么可怕。 仅使用只读存储器存储BIOS数据的用户，没有必要担心CIH病毒会破坏BIOS。 但最新出产的计算机，特别是Pentium以上的计算机基本上都使用了E2PROM存储部分BIOS。E2PROM又名“电可改写只读存储器”。一般情况下，这种存储器中的数据并不会被用户轻易改写，但只要施加特殊的逻辑和电压，就有可能将E2PROM中的数据改写掉。使用PC机的CPU逻辑和计算机内部电压就可轻易实现对E2PROM的改写，这正是我们通过软件升级BIOS的原理，也是CIH破坏BIOS的基本方法。                                 虽然CIH并不会破坏所有BIOS，但CIH在“黑色”的26日摧毁硬盘上所有数据远比破坏BIOS要严重得多——这是每个感染CIH病毒的用户不可避免的。
family_en_des:
CIH is a family of viruses that do damage to hardware in a computer system. 
Created in Taiwan, CIH originally spread via pirated CD and then via Internet. In September 1998, Yamaha provided an update to the virus’ driver CD-R400. In October 1998, the SiN game produced by Activision was infected by CIH which originated from the infected IBM’s Aptiva PC. When people began to pay attention to CIH on 26th of April in 1999, these PC had run for a month. It was a big disaster in which the countless hardwares were covered by junk data and BIOS was destroyed. By 26th of April 2000, several damage events had been reported. In March 2001, Anjulie was found to insert CIH v1.2 to infect systems. Of course, the damage of CIH to BIOS is not that terrible. Users who use ROM to store BIOS data do not need to worry about CIH. The newly produced computers, especially those that have Pentium CPUs, almost employ E2PROM to store pat of BIOS. In common condition, data stored in E2PPOM cannot be easily modified by users, but special logic and voltage will make it easy. This is the basis principle for CIH.  Although CHI does not destroy all BIOS, but its damage to all the data in hardware is more terrible than its damage to BIOS.
action_des: CIH病毒是一种能够破坏计算机系统硬件的网络恶性病毒

family_cn_des:
StrangeBrew是Symantec公司在1998年8月发现的首个Java平台病毒。由于该病毒能够在各种支持Java的平台（从Windows 95 PC机到Unix服务器及Cray大型计算机）上运行，因此也被认为是首例跨平台Java病毒。 
StrangeBrew病毒能够感染Java小程序文件和Java应用程序文件，但只有当被感染的Java应用程序启动时才能进行传播。该病毒在进行了安全设置的网络浏览器上运行时，由于Java小程序文件无法通过浏览器的安全检查而立即终止，因此该病毒无法通过网上冲浪的方式传播。该病毒通过运行被感染的Java应用程序进行传播，然而很少有公司或个人用户安装Java应用程序，这也减小了感染的风险。
StrangeBrew病毒是一种执行文档病毒，一旦获取对被感染程序的控制，便会立即感染其他文件，获取对主程序的控制并终止自身。由于该病毒并不包含任何有效荷载，除了感染和破坏Java可执行文件以外，不会驻留在内存中继续进行感染活动或造成进一步的危害。还尚未有该病毒感染实际用户的案例发生，因此该病毒不构成对终端用户的威胁。
family_en_des:
StrangBrew was the first Java virus found in August 1998 by Symantec. As the virus is able to run in various Java platform (from Windows 95 PC to Unix servers to Cray large-scale computer), it is also believed as the first cross-platform Java virus. 
StrangeBrew infects Java applets and Java applications, but can only spread when the infected Java application executes. As Java applets cannot pass the security detection of a web browser, the virus will stop immediately when it runs in browser. Due to the above fact, the virus cannot spread via Internet surf. As is stated above, the virus spreads via infecting Java applications，but the fact that few companies or personal users install Java reduce the infecting risk. 
StrangBrew is a kind of direct-action virus. Once it controls the infected program, it will go on to infect other files and get the control for the host program and terminate itself. As the virus do not contain any effective payload, except for infecting Java executable files, it will not stay in memory to make further infection or harm. There are not known infection events happened, so the virus is not a threat for end users.
action_des: trangeBrew病毒能够感染Java小程序文件和Java应用程序文件，有跨平台功能

family_cn_des:
TAO是Tailored Access Operations的简称，是美国国家安全局内部的秘密组织——“定制入口组织”。其主要任务是通过入侵全球各个国家的网络和通信系统来窃取情报，而主要的入侵目标是中国。该组织成立于1997年，隐藏在美国国家安全局（NSA）位于马里兰州米德堡的总部内，其办公区域与NSA其他机构隔离。
该机构收集了大量的情报信息，包括关于恐怖分子财政网络、国际洗钱和毒品交易、外国军事信息，甚至包括潜在竞争国家的国内政治争论。
“定制入口组织”通过黑客攻击和窃听，掌握了伊拉克战争叛军的身份和移动路线、伊朗核武器动向等重要情报。
2013年6月10日，美国《外交政策》网站发表文章披露称，已经陷入“窃听门”窘境的美国国家安全局的秘密机构“定制入口组织”在过去的15年里，已成功入侵中国的计算机系统并获得了中国国内所发生的最好的情报。[1]
family_en_des:
TAO is short for Tailored Access Operation which is a secret organization belonging to NSA. Its major task is to steal data by intruding worldwide network and communication systems. Found in 1997, it is hidden in an office which is separated from other NSA offices in Fort Meade, Maryland. This organization has collected much intelligence data including the finance network of terrorists, international money laundering and drug dealing, foreign military data and even political controversy of potential opponent countries. 
This organization obtained the identity and moving path of Iraq rebel forces as well as Iran nuclear weapon tendency via hacker attack and monitoring. 
On 10th of June 2013, it was reported by Foreign Policy that this organization had acquired the best data of China in the past 15 years.

family_cn_des:
Happy是一种蠕虫病毒,发作时，电子邮件消息的主题就显示出“1999年新年快乐! !”和以下附件“:HAPPY99.EXE。”
Happy没有破坏作用,但在屏幕上显示出来的图案却烟花。这种蠕虫病毒可能像洪水一样大规模地向电子邮件账户发送邮件。                                                                                                                               其包含消息的文本试图让用户相信这只是一张贺卡，从而吸引用户去打开附件。                                                                             Happy是不被认为是危险的,因为它唯一的目的就是传播到其他计算机，而不引起任何破坏性影响。它能够以极快的速度蔓延,所有的动作都是为了通过电子邮件来传播其他电脑。      
Happy有以下影响:
它通过电子邮件传播到其他计算机。
它创建了文件系统的影响,这使它可以收集电子邮件地址,它将发送自己。
它将显示一个窗口的标题新年快乐1999,模拟一个烟花。                                
Happy具有以下额外的特点:
1.由于一些错误的代码，所以Happy是无法在Windows NT系统中传播的。                                                                                  2.HAPPY99.EXE 文件只有10kb大小。                                                                                                        3.它的代码包含以下文本字符串,其中有些是加密的。然而,他们是不会显示在任何时刻:                                                                        Is it a virus, a worm, a trojan? MOUT-MOUT Hybrid (c) Spanska 1999.
Happy New Year 1999 !!
begin 644 Happy99.exe end
\Ska.exe\ liste.ska
\wsock32.dll\ Ska.dll\ Ska.exe                                                                                                                         它会发送的电子邮件包含文本X-Spanska:是的,这是对用户不可见的。
family_en_des:
Happy is a collection of worm that arrives in an e-mail message with the subject “Happy New Year 1999!! “ and the HAPPY99.EXE attachment.
Happy has no destructive effects, but displaying fireworks graphics on the screen. It might send flooding flow of emails to the accounts. The text included in the message entices users to open the attachment, by trying to convince them it is just a greeting card. 
Happy is not considered as dangerous, as its only objective is to spread to other computers without causing any destructive effects. It is capable of spreading at a rapid speed, as all the actions it carries out aimed at propagating to other computers by e-mail. 
Happy has the following effects:
1.It spreads to other computers by e-mail.
2.It creates files on the affected system, which allows it to gather the e-mail addresses to which it will send itself out.
3.It displays a window with the title “Happy New Year 1999”, which simulates a firework display.                                                              
Happy has the following additional characteristics:
1.It is unable to spread on Windows NT systems, due to some bugs in its code.
2.The HAPPY99.EXE file is 10 Kbytes in size.
3.Its code contains the following text strings, some of which are encrypted. However, they would not show any moments of any time:
Is it a virus, a worm, a trojan? MOUT-MOUT Hybrid (c) Spanska 1999.
Happy New Year 1999 !!
begin 644 Happy99.exe end
\Ska.exe\ liste.ska
\wsock32.dll\ Ska.dll\ Ska.exe

family_cn_des:
Subseven是一类可远程控制用户系统，进行信息、密码窃取等操作的木马家族。
Subseven木马最初发现在1999年5月。该木马在系统中运行后，会将自身复制到Windows系统目录下，再将一个DLL文件释放到该目录中，并安装Windows注册表的补丁，最后修改某些注册表值，这样每次系统重启时，它都能够保证自动运行。该木马还可以通过修改WIN.INI或SYSTEM.INI文件的方式将自身安装到系统中。
SubSeven木马的进程在内存中被激活后，它会寻找TCP/IP连接，然后通过端口监听来自客户端的命令。SubSeven还会试图使用ICQ、IRC以及不同的邮箱账号来告知木马作者被入侵系统正处在在线状态。
Subseven木马通过远程监控，对被入侵系统和用户造成如下影响：
修改桌面设置和系统时间等属性；隐藏任务栏和Windows启动按钮；监听提供聊天服务的软件——网络呼叫器（ICQ）；记录并监控用户的键盘操作（Keylogging）；获取被感染及其的安装信息；通过机器的麦克风和摄像头记录声音和视频；
family_en_des:
Subseven is a family of Trojanswhich allows a remote attacker to control the system to perform the action of stealing information and keywords.  
Subseven was first discovered in May 1999. When the Trojan runs in system, it will copy itself into Windows system directory, release a DLL file into the directory, install Windows registry patch, and finally modify some registry value to ensure it can run automatically every time the system reboots. The Trojan can also install itself into a system by modifying WIN.INI or SYSTEM.INI files.
Once the process of Subseven is activated in memory, it will find TCP/IP connection and monitor thecommand from the client via port. Subseven will also try to use ICQ, IRC anddifferent email accounts to notify the victim is now on line. 
By remote monitoring, Subseven may influence the system in the following aspects:
Change the desktop setting and system time; Hide the taskbar and Windows Start button; Monitor ICQ; Record and monitor Keylogging; Acquire the installation condition of the infected computer; Record sound and video images via microphone and camera.
action_des: 木马运行后通过远程控制用户系统，进行信息、密码窃取等操作的木马家族。

family_cn_des: 它是一种Word宏病毒，向Outlook的联系人发送带有.DOC文件附件的邮件传播。爆发后，它迅速席卷额全球的计算机网络，大量邮件服务器被迫关闭。                                                                                      梅丽莎病毒一般通过邮件传播，邮件的标题通常为“这是给你的资料，不要让任何人看见”。一旦收件人打开邮件，病毒就会自动向用户通讯录的前50位好友复制发送同样的邮件。                                                   4月2日，美国新泽西州警方宣布，Melissa电子邮件病毒的制造者已经被抓获。这位30岁的新泽西州男子名叫大卫·史密斯，人称“电脑小子”，是一家电脑公司的网络程序员。他被指控包括妨碍公共通信在内的多项罪名。新泽西州检察长的发言人称，史密斯是星期四晚上在邻近的伊顿城他哥哥家中被捕的。                                                                                                                                                                 梅丽莎病毒邮件的标题通常为“这是你要的资料，不要让任何人看见”。一旦收件人打开邮件，病毒就会自我复制，向用户通讯录的前50位好友发送同样的邮件。因为它发出大量的邮件形成了极大的电子邮件信息流，它可能会使企业或其它邮件服务端程序停止运行，尽管Melissa病毒不会毁坏文件或其它资源。1999年3月26日爆发，感染了15%-20% 的商业计算机。                                                              Melissa病毒是一种快速传播的能够感染那些使用MS Word 97 和 MS Office 2000 的计算机宏病毒。病毒通过 E－mail传播，传播速度非常快，从1999年3月26日首次发现它到3月29日，它已经到达了100,000多个计算机。一些站点不得不让他们的主系统离线。据某站点称，他们的系统在45分钟之内就收到了32,000份包括Melissa病毒的邮件信息。                 　                                                                          Melissa病毒通常以“Important Message From……（来自……的重要信息）”为主题。从表面上看，像是熟人或朋友发来的邮件。邮件的正文上写道：“Here is the message you asked for…… don't tell anyone else ;－)”（这是你向我要的那份文件……不要让别人看到）。邮件的附件是一个Word文档。如果收到邮件的人打开了这个文档，病毒就会窜入他的电子通讯簿中，选择最前面的50人将染有病毒的邮件发出。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of Word macro virus that spreads by sending emails with .DOC file attachment to contacts of Outlook. After the outbreak，it swept the whole computer networks quickly around the world. And there were numerous email servers were shut down.  Melissa virus is usually spread by email, and mail title is usually "This is for your information, don't let anyone see". Once the recipients open the mail, the virus will automatically copy and send the same email to the the top 50 friends in the user’s contacts.
In spite of Melissa would not destroy files or other resources, it might make the programs of enterprises and other mail servers stop running due to the fact that it forms a powerful email information flow. It outbreak on March 26, 1999 and has infected 15% to 20% business computers.
Melissa can infect the computers with MS Word 97 and MS Office 2000 by email rapidly. Three days after it was first discovered, it has infected hundreds of thousands computers. Some sites have to make their main system offline. According to a certain site, their system received 32000 email messages in 45 minutes
Melissa usually has the theme as “Important Message from…”. It will look like a email coming from friends or acquaintances. The body of the email wrote:” Here is the message you asked for… Don’t tell anyone else”. The attachment is a Word document. The virus will intrude into the electronic contacts if the recipients open the document and send the malicious emails to the top 50 people.
action_des: Melissa是一种word宏病毒。通过邮件进行传播，通过发送带有.DOC文件附件的邮件传播。邮件被触发后，病毒会进行自我复制，向用户通讯录中前50位好友发送同样的文件，病毒本身并不进行任何破坏，但是发出的邮件形成了巨大的电子邮件信息流，致使邮件服务端程序停止运行。

family_cn_des: Worm[Email]/VBS.LoveLetter，是一种主要借助邮件传播的蠕虫病毒，该病毒借助ILOVEYOU的虚假外衣，欺骗相关用户打开其内存的VBS附件从而感染病毒，因此他是基于特殊传播方式的基因关联来命名的家族。                                    LoveLetter又称“蠕虫ILOVEYOU”，中文俗称“情书病毒”。  LoveLetter病毒是用VB Script程序语言编写的，传播途径类似美丽杀病毒，主要透过一封信件标题为 "ILOVEYOU"(我爱你) 的电子邮件散播，附件为 "LOVE-LETTER-FOR-YOU.txt.vbs" (献给你的情书)，一旦打开邮件，该病毒会通过Outlook通讯簿向外传播，造成企业mail server瘫痪，并且在本机中大量搜索相关账号和密码，并发给开发者，是一种恶性病毒。                                       LoveLetter于2000年5月4日出现，由于其强大的传播能力，一度造成大量企业网络瘫痪，导致商业损失达100亿美元左右。
family_en_des:
LoveLetter is a kind of worm spreading via e-mail in which ILOVEYOU is displayed to seduce uses to open and download the malicious VBS attachment. 
LoveLetter is written by language of VB Script. The spreading approach of it is similar to that of Melissa. The e-mail headline is “ILOVEYOU” and the attachment is named “LOVE-LETTER-FOR-YOU.txt.vbs”. Once the e-mail is opened, the virus will be spread via Outlook Address Book. Large accounts and passwords are searched to send the e-mail. Appeared on 4th of May in 2000, LoveLetter resulted in the failure of countless enterprise networks. The commercial loss is about 10 billion dollars.
action_des: 一种主要借助邮件传播的蠕虫病毒，该病毒借助ILOVEYOU的虚假外衣，欺骗相关用户打开其内存的VBS附件从而感染病毒，因此他是基于特殊传播方式的基因关联来命名的家族。附件为 "LOVE-LETTER-FOR-YOU.txt.vbs" (献给你的情书)，一旦打开邮件，该病毒会通过Outlook通讯簿向外传播，造成企业mail server瘫痪，并且在本机中大量搜索相关账号和密码，并发给开发者，是一种恶性病毒。

family_cn_des: Phage 是第一个感染移动手机设备的病毒，它覆盖Palm OS操作系统中的.PRC格式可执行文件的开头部分。遭到感染的文件会被破坏。                                                       它的程序表现为在你的个人电脑中插播广告。                                             注意,许多网站都有自己的广告，这与广告软件无关。                                       广告软件是任何软件应用程序中,广告显示在程序运行时。作者的这些应用程序包括额外的代码,提供广告,可以查看通过弹出窗口或通过一个栏,显示在计算机屏幕上,有时通过文本链接或在综合搜索结果。广告软件可能或不可能追踪个人信息。它也可以收集信息匿名或骨料只有。用户应检查EULA和隐私政策,以确保如果广告软件机器上符合他们的标准。   其表现为使用（部分）公开可用的木马程序代码回收。安装itselfs的LSP堆栈的Windows，它可以监视的不只是IE浏览器的流量，而且也可以是任何浏览器。根据配置的不同，它会到一个控制服务器发送流量的详细信息。弹出窗口总是出现在IE浏览器中。许多版本也安装其他广告产品（虽然有效载荷出现不同随机/地理位置）。
family_en_des: Phage is the first virus that infects mobile phone devices and covers the start part of .PRC executable file of Palm operation system. The infected file would be compromised. It will insert advertisements in your personal computers.
action_des: 该病毒感染Palm操作系统中.PRC格式的可执行文件，遭感染的文件被破坏并且它会在PC中插入广告。当病毒作用时，被感染的应用界面会变灰，而这时它是在感染其他文件，被感染的文件大小会变为约原来的一半。该病毒并不感染数据库文件，所有的应用都可以通过备份进行恢复。

family_cn_des:
Net-Worm/Win32.CodeRed，中文俗称“红色代码”，该蠕虫是通过微软公司IIS系统漏洞进行感染，因此他是基于特定传播方式的基因关联来命名的家族                                CodeRed病毒是2001年一种新型网络病毒，其传播所使用的技术可以充分体现网络时代网络安全与病毒的巧妙结合，将网络蠕虫、计算机病毒、木马程序合为一体，开创了网络病毒传播的新路，可称之为划时代的病毒。如果稍加改造，将是非常致命的病毒，可以完全取得所攻破计算机的所有权限并为所欲为，可以盗走机密数据，严重威胁网络安全。                        （2001年）7月中该病毒在美国等地大规模蔓延，引起了恐慌，国外通讯社连续报道该病毒的破坏情况；8月初，该病毒做了一些修改，针对中文操作系统加强了攻击能力，导致在国内大规模蔓延，特别是北京等信息化程度较高的地区，受灾情况相当严重，公安部发布紧急通告，要求对该病毒严加防范。
CodeRed蠕虫采用了一种叫做"缓存区溢出"的黑客技术，利用网络上使用微软IIS系统的服务器来进行蠕虫传播。这个蠕虫使用服务器的端口80进行传播，而这个端口正是Web服务器与浏览器进行信息交流的渠道。
与其它病毒不同的是，CodeRed 蠕虫不同于以往的文件型病毒和引导型病毒，并不将有害代码写入被攻击服务器的硬盘。它只存在于内存，传染时不通过文件这一常规载体，而是借助这个服务器的网络连接攻击其它的服务器，直接从一台电脑内存传到另一台电脑内存。当本地IIS服务程序收到某个来自“CodeRed”发送的请求数据包时，由于存在漏洞，导致处理函数的堆栈溢出。当函数返回时，原返回地址已被蠕虫数据包覆盖，程序运行线跑到有蠕虫的数据包中，此时蠕虫被激活，并运行在IIS服务程序的堆栈中。
family_en_des:
CodeRed is a collection of worm that uses Microsoft IIS system vulnerability to spread.
CodeRed is a new kind of virus that firstly appeared in 2001. The propagation method of it could embody the ingenious combination of network security and virus in the era of network. It combines worms, computer viruses and Trojan programs to break a new path of network virus spread.
CodeRed uses a hacker technology that called “buffer overflow” and the servers that use Microsoft IIS system to spread. It uses port 80 which is the communication channel between web service and browser.
What is different from other viruses is that it would not write the malicious code into the hard disk of targeted server. It is spread by the server network to attack other servers instead of using normal carrier-files, transferred from one computer memory directly to another’s. When the local IIS service program receives one request data package from “CodeRed”, the stack that deals with functions will overflow due to the vulnerability. When the functions return, the original address is already covered by the worm data, then the worm is activated and runs in the IIS service program stack.
action_des: 该蠕虫的传播是通过TCP/IP协议和端口80，利用微软IIS漏洞产生缓冲区存溢出，它使IIS服务程序处理请求数据包时溢出，导致把此“数据包”当作代码运行，病毒驻留后再次通过此漏洞感染其它服务器。

family_cn_des:
肆虐全球的CodeRed红色代码蠕虫病毒的余波尚未平息，又一种破坏力极强的新病毒已经开始象野火一样开始在互联网上蔓延开来，这种名为NimdaW32.Nimda.A@mm或者W32.Nimda.A@mm(html)或者W32.Nimda.A@mm(dll)的病毒于2001年9月18日上午9：08被发现，半小时之内就传遍了世界，其传播范围和破坏程度大大超过前一段时间极度肆虐的“红色代码”病毒。                                尼姆达通过互联网迅速传播，在当时是传播最快的病毒。尼姆达病毒的主要攻击目标是互联网服务器。尼姆达可以通过邮件等多种方式进行传播，这也是它能够迅速大规模爆发的原因。                                           尼姆达病毒会在用户的操作系统中建立一个后门程序，使侵入者拥有当前登录账户的权限。尼姆达病毒的传播使得很多网络系统崩溃，服务器资源都被蠕虫占用。从这种角度来说，尼姆达实质上也是DDOS的一种。                                                                       这种蠕虫病毒的传播通过电子邮件、文件感染、网络漏洞。它在iframe漏洞曝光一天后就被公开，实现了高自动化的邮件传播。它让零日漏洞被公众所认识。                                    Nimda的蠕虫病毒与以往的蠕虫病毒有很大不同，它可通过三种方式传播：Email附件、HTTP、硬盘共享，并且能感染所有32位Windows操作系统：Windows 98/Me，NT，2000, XP。                                               这种新病毒也是利用运行于视窗NT或视窗2000上的微软互联网服务器软件存在的安全隐患展开攻击，这一点与“红色代码”病毒相同,但它同时也可以感染客户端。即用户在浏览染毒的网页时就可能会受到感染。此病毒还通过Ooutlook，Outlook Express邮件客户端传播，会在用户访问带毒的邮件时在用户毫不知晓的情况下感染用户的系统，这一点又与前一段时间流行的邮件蠕虫病毒Happytime很相似。此外，它对系统共享也作了手脚，为每个盘符创建网络共享。在Win9x/ME系统上，该共享被设置为完全共享，无需密码。在WinNT/2K系统上，GUEST用户被赋予管理员权限，并得到共享权限。在网络共享这一方面，又与Funlove病毒相似。
Net-Worm/Win32.Nimda是一类利用邮件，HTTP和硬盘共享传播的蠕虫，该家族蠕虫具有相同或相似的源码或核心技术实现方法，因此该家族命名是由代码基因关联定性的。                   Nimda家族蠕虫利用运行于windows NT或2000上的微软互联网服务器软件存在的漏洞展开攻击，感染客户端。用户在浏览染毒的网页时就可能会受到感染。它还可以通过Ooutlook，Outlook Express邮件客户端传播，会在用户访问带毒的邮件时在用户毫不知晓的情况下感染用户的系统。Nimda家族蠕虫会将用户系统内的所有盘符设定为网络共享，而且会创建Guest用户并赋予其管理权限。此外，每隔30s，Nimda家族蠕虫就会重复一次感染程序，这种反复传播的方式会消耗大量系统和网络资源，可以导致系统崩溃或网络瘫痪。
family_en_des:
Nimda is a collection of worm that discovered on September 18, 2001. It was spread to the whole world within half an hour. Both the propagation range and damage degree exceed the former virus CodeRed.

Nimda spreads rapidly via internet. The main targets of it are the internet servers. It can spread by several ways, such as emails, which is the reason for its large-scale outbreak.
Nimda would build a backdoor in users’ operation system to make the attacker gain the access of current login account. The spread of Nimda have led to many network system crashes and the server resources being occupied by the worm. From this aspect, in fact, Nimda is also a kind of DDoS.
Nimda spreads through emails, file infections and network vulnerabilities. It was published one day after the iframe vulnerability was exposed, which realized highly automatic mail spread. It made the 0day vulnerability known to the public.
Nimda is different from former worm; it can be spread by the following three ways: email attachment, HTTP and hard disk share; it can infect all the 32-bit Windows operation systems: Window 98, Windows Me, Windows 2000 and Windows XP.
Net-Worm/Win32.Nimda is a collection of worm that spreads via e-mails, HTTP and removable devices. This family is characterized by code gene, and variants have the same or similar source code and core technologies.                                        Nimda makes use of the vulnerabilities of Microsoft Internet server softeware on Windows NT or Windows 2000 to attack and infect the clients. In addition, it can spread via Outlook and Outlook Express Client and infect the system without the knowledge of user. It can set all the drive letters as network sharings and create Guest account which is given the administrative privileges. Also, it repeat the infection program every 30 seconds, which will comsume large amounts of system and network resources and lead to system crashes or network meltdown.
action_des: Nimda 是一种具有很强的传播感染特性的蠕虫病毒，具有多个变种，每个变种都具有显著特点，它通过email、文件感染、网络共享、HTTP以及Code Red II和Sadmind/IIS蠕虫留下的后门进行传播，能感染当时所有32位Windows操作系统：Windows 98/Me，NT，2000, XP。并能够利用IIS服务器漏洞进行攻击

family_cn_des:
APT1是来自中国的20多个APT团伙之一，它是一个独立的行动者组织，该组织自2006年以来一直执行网络间谍运动，在过去的7年中已经入侵了近150个受害者。
Madiant的研究员认为，该组织受到了政府的资助，它是中国网络威胁执行者中最有持久性的。
APT1已经从至少141个组织（来自20个主要行业）中窃取了近百万兆字节的数据。它拥有组织良好的攻击方法，使用了其他组织未曾使用过的工具和技术（GETMAIL和MAPIGET）。它主要针对英语国家的大部分行业，以感染各个机构。
family_en_des: It is an Advanced Persistent Threat attack that was exposed and analyzed by Mandiant, which triggered a series of diplomatic, political and economic chin reactions.

family_cn_des:
别名: max++  Sirefef
ZeroAccess是一类影响windows操作系统，在被感染计算机上下载其他恶意程序形成僵尸网络以进行比特币挖掘和点击欺诈等恶意活动，并利用先进的rootkit技术隐藏自身的木马家族。
ZeroAccess最先在2011年7月被发现，之所以命名为“ZeroAccess”是因为在其内核驱动程序代码中发现了一个字符串，指向名为“ZeroAccess”的原始项目文件夹 （f:\VC5\release\ZeroAccess.pdb）；由于它会创建一个名为“_max++>”的新的内核设备对象，因此该木马也有别名“max++”。
ZeroAccess木马可以通过数种方式进行传播。有些网页被感染后，会将流量重定向到木马所在的恶意网站，并通过Blackhole Exploit Toolkit和Bleeding Life Toolkit工具进行传播。这属于经典的挂马下载方式。该木马还会通过对等网络进行更新，让木马作者不断添加新的恶意功能。
ZeroAccess木马的主要威胁是通过pay per click（点击付费）广告获取经济利益。它能够下载恶意程序用于控制网页搜索和点击结果，也就是人们熟知的“点击欺诈”。ZeroAccess木马还可以在被感染计算机上下载软件用于挖掘比特币。在单一计算机上进行比特币挖掘的产量就是十分丰富的，当一个巨大的僵尸网络联合起来时，它的产出能力是相当可观的。此外，ZeroAccess还能够开启后门，连接到远程命令与控制服务器，让远程攻击者获取被感染系统的权限，进行各种恶意操作，使计算机成为僵尸网络的“僵尸机”。
ZeroAccess木马的上述行为都可以实现隐秘操作，因为利用高级的rookit技术进行隐藏。它会在计算机的文件系统中创建一个加密的隐藏卷用以存储自身的组件和它下载的各种恶意软件。
family_en_des:
ZeroAccess is a family of Trojans that affect Windows operating system, perform the actions of Bitcoin mining and click fraud by building a botnet via downloading other malwares in the infected computer and use advanced rootkit technique to hide itself. As it creates a new kernel device object called __max++>, it is also known as max++. 
ZeroAccess was first found in July 2011. It was named as ZeroAccess due to a string pointing to the original project folder called ZeroAccess was found in its kernel driver code.  
ZeroAccess spreads via several approaches. It will redirect the traffic to a malicious websites containing the Trojan by an infected website. It also spreads via Blackhole Exploit Toolkit and Bleeding Life Toolkit. This is the classical drive-by download. The Trojan can also upgrade itself by P2P network to add new functionality. 
ZeroAccess makes money by pay per click. It downloads malware to control the searching results of a web browser. This is the well-known fraud click. 
Otherwise, ZeroAccess is able to open backdoor to communicate with remote C&C server to help the attacker control the system and make malicious operations. 
All the above behaviors of ZeroAccess are away from users’ eye as it makes use of advanced rootkit technique to hide itself. It creates an encrypted and hidden volume to store its components and various malware downloaded by it.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
Slammer是一类内存驻留型蠕虫家族。该蠕虫最早出现在2003年1月25日，随后便以极快的速度遍布全球，大量金融、交通和政府部门的服务器遭到攻击。
Slammer蠕虫的目标并非终端计算机用户，而是服务器，该病毒利用运行MSDE 2000或SQL Server系统且未安装微软安全补丁MS02-039的计算机上解析端口1434的缓冲区溢出漏洞对目标服务器进行攻击。Slammer蠕虫的传播方式类似于2001年出现的红色代码（Code Red）病毒，它并不将程序写到硬盘中，而是以网络数据包的方式驻留在内存进程中。
该病毒最显著的特点是传播速度快，仅需要3分钟，便可获得全扫描速率，每秒钟的扫描次数在五千五百万次以上，一旦成功入侵带有漏洞的系统，便会开启无限的扫描循环，继续寻找潜在的攻击对象。因此它能够显著增加网络流量，延缓服务器的运行速度，消耗服务器及网络资源，直到SQL服务器停机或重启，同时整个网络由于不堪重负而陷入瘫痪。
family_en_des:
Slammer is a family of memory-resident worms. It first appeared on January 25 in 2003, and then spread all over the world. A mass of servers in finance, communication and government are attacked. 
Slammer aims not for terminal computers but for servers. It attacks the targeted server by making use of a buffer overflow in Port 1434 in computers running MSDE 2000 or SQL Server without Microsoft security patch MS02-039. The spreading means of Slammer is similar to that of Code Red which appeared in 2001. It does not write its program into a disk, but stay in memory process as network packet. 
The most significant feature of Slammer lies in its spreading speed. The full-scanning rate can be realized in 3 minutes. It means that the rate is over 55,000,000/s. Once it infects a vulnerable system, it will start an infinite loop to search for potential objects. It will increase the network traffic notably and consume the network resource until the SQL server stops or reboots. At the same time, the whole network gradually collapses.
action_des: 该病毒利用SQL SERVER 2000的解析端口1434的缓冲区溢出漏洞对其服务进行攻击。它的目标并非终端计算机用户，而是服务器。它是一个单包的、长度为376字节的蠕虫病毒，它随机产生IP地址，并向这些IP地址发送自身。如果某个IP地址恰好是一台运行着未打补丁的微软SQL服务器桌面引擎(SQL Server Desktop Engine)软件的计算机

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Dvldr是一个新型的攻击型蠕虫病毒，因此他是基于攻击目的的行为来命名的家族。                                 这种病毒会于2003年3月9日被瑞星公司监测到，并命名为“猜谜者”。                                               该病毒传播方式是通过Bios协议攻击网络上没有设置密码或者仅有简单密码保护的Windows机器，通过枚举人们常用的85种密码来猜测被选中电脑的管理口令，如果猜中便会感染对方，感染后病毒会将被感染的远程系统C:,D:,E:,F:,ADMIN$,IPC$等共享删除，导致管理员无法进行正常的远程管理。 同时，会在远程主机上安装并运行后门程序，使得远程主机被攻击者完全控制；并且使远程主机将发送、并接收大量数据包，从而造成局域网严重阻塞拥塞、系统瘫痪，服务器无法接受任何服务。                                                此病毒用VC++高级编程语言编写，并用ASPack压缩，有很强的隐蔽性和兼容性。
family_en_des:
Dvldr is a collection of new attacking worm. It was detected by the Rising Company on March 9 2003 and named “Caimizhe” in Chinese. 
It attacked the Windows computers without passwords or with simple passwords by Bios protocol. It guessed the administration token of the targeted computers by means of the commonly used 85 passwords. If it was right, it would infect the computer; after infection, it would delete the infected remote system share (C:,D:,E:,F:,ADMIN$,IPC$), which made administrators cannot execute remote control. Meanwhile, it would install and run backdoor programs on the remote hosts which were completely controlled by the attackers. Then the remote hosts would send and receive large amount of data packages, which resulted in severe LAN block and system crash.
It is written by VC++ advanced compiling language and archived in ASPack with powerful concealment and compatibility.
action_des: 这是一种利用NetBios弱口令攻击目标的一种蠕虫病毒，病毒尝试85种弱口令，成功后删除远程管理员开通的共享服务，安插自己的后门，控制服务器，制造足以使服务器瘫痪的流量。通过VC编写，ASPack压缩。

family_cn_des: Worm[Net]/Win32.Lovesan是是一种散播于Microsoft操作系统，Windows XP与Windows 2000的蠕虫病毒，因此他是基于传播环境的基因关联来分类的家族。                             蠕虫Lovesan 也称为Worm.Blaster，中文俗称“冲击波蠕虫”，也有译为“疾风病毒”的。该蠕虫第一次被注意并迅速散布，是在2003年的8月11日。在8月13日达到散布高峰，之后借助ISP与网络上散布的治疗方法阻止了此蠕虫的散布。在2003年8月29日，一个来自明尼苏达州的十八岁年轻人Jeffrey Lee Parson由于创造了Blaster.B变种而被逮捕；他在2005年被判处十八个月的有期徒刑。                                                 蠕虫Lovesan借由一个在DCOM远程过程调用（RPC）出现的缓冲区溢位漏洞而在受影响的操作系统上散布。                       蠕虫Lovesan在2003年8月15日曾试图发动一波SYN资讯洪水，目标是windowsupdate的80埠，借此对此网站做出分散式阻断服务攻击（DDoS）。微软则暂时关闭windowsupdate网站以降低此蠕虫对网站造成的可能影响。                                    感染蠕虫Lovesan的基本影响为系统资源被大量占用，有时会弹出RPC服务终止的对话框，并且系统反复重启, 不能收发邮件、不能正常复制文件、无法正常浏览网页，复制粘贴等操作受到严重影响，DNS和IIS服务遭到非法拒绝等。
family_en_des:
Lovesan is a collection of worm that spreads on Microsoft operation system (Windows XP and Windows 2000).
Lovesan is also called Worm.Blaster and “Chongjibo” in Chinese. It was noticed and spread rapidly for the first time on August 11, 2003. It arrived the spread peak on August 13. After that, using ISP and the methods published on the internet have prevented the spread of it. On August 29, 2003, a 18-year-old teenager who comes from Minnesota Jeffrey Lee Parson was arrested for writing the variant Blaster.B; he was sentenced to 18 month in prison in 2005.
Lovesan uses the buffer overflow vulnerability in DCOM remote process call to spread on the infected systems.
The basic impact of being infected by Lovesan is as follows: the system resources would be occupied, there would pop up the dialogue of RPC service termination, the system would frequently restart, users cannot copy files and browse websites, DNS and IIS servcies would be rejected illegally and so on.
action_des: “冲击波”是一种蠕虫病毒。病毒运行时会不停地利用IP扫描技术寻找网络上系统为Win2K或XP的计算机，找到后就利用DCOM RPC缓冲区漏洞攻击该系统，一旦攻击成功，病毒体将会被传送到对方计算机中进行感染，使系统操作异常、不停重启、甚至导致系统崩溃。另外，该病毒还会对微软的一个升级网站进行拒绝服务攻击，导致该网站堵塞，使用户无法通过该网站升级系统。

en_name: Black Bag Operation/ Black Bag Jobs
family_cn_des:
“黑袋”行动是美国国土安全局和中央情报局合作的一个监听项目，主要由美国中央情报局执行实施。“黑袋”小组能够入侵目标机器，不留痕迹地在目标电脑中安装间谍软件，在电话中安装窃听器，甚至能够攻击数据交换中心或拷贝备份文件和硬盘，从而完成“棱镜”计划以及其他电子窃听无法驾驭的监听工作。
有消息人士称[1]，近10余年来，利用“黑袋”行动，中情局和国土安全局已经入侵世界许多重要目标，特别是东亚、中东和南亚等国家。该行动的目标范围甚广，既包括外国政府和军队的通信和计算机系统，也涉及跨国公司的计算机网络以及与恐怖组织有染的个人。
family_en_des:
Operation Black Bag is a monitoring project that aims to obtain information for human intelligence. It is organized by the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) and CIA and is operated mainly by CIA. The “Black Bag” team could compromise the targeted computers and install the espionage software in the computers without any traces, installing tapping devices in the phones and even attacking the data exchange center or copying backup files and hard disks, so as to finish the PRISM Plan and monitoring jobs that other electric device cannot finish. The term “black bag” refers to the little black bag in which burglars carry their tools. 
According to some sources, CIA and DHS have intruded into many important targets in the world in the past 10 years, especially the countries in the East Asia, the Middle East and the South Asia. The objectives of this operation is rather wide, including not only the communication and computer systems of foreign governments and military, but also the computer networks of international companies and individuals who is related with Terrorist.

family_cn_des:
2004年感染量最大的蠕虫。它在被感染主机开启FTP服务，通过一个远程代码执行漏洞驱使其他计算机通过下载蠕虫自身，从而传播。它会攻击Isass.exe进程，导致计算机重启。                                                                                     Sasser通过微软的系统漏洞攻击计算机。与其他蠕虫不同的是，它不通过邮件传播，病毒一旦进入计算机，会自动寻找有漏洞的计算机系统，并直接引导这些计算机下载病毒文件并执行，因此整个传播和发作过程不需要人为干预。病毒会修改用户的操作系统，不强行关机的话便无法正常关机。
该病毒是一个利用微软操作系统的Lsass缓冲区溢出漏洞（ MS04-011漏洞信息）进行传播的蠕虫，中文名为“震荡波”蠕虫，也有人称之为“杀手”蠕虫。由于该蠕虫在传播过程中会发起大量的扫描，因此对个人用户使用和网络运行都会造成很大的冲击。尽管该蠕虫在Windows2000、WindowsXP上发作，不会感染安装Windows 95/98/Me操作系统的计算机，但可以在这些操作系统上运行，而成为传播源。可以利用防火墙阻止该电脑蠕虫的传播，但安全专家建议，给系统打上MS04-011补丁是最根本的解决措施。2004年4月30日爆发，给全球带来数千万美元损失。                                                                                2004年5月7日，一位来自德国下萨克森州罗滕堡的18岁少年Sven Jaschan因涉嫌编写该蠕虫而被捕。在接下来的讯问中，该少年已经承认此前的蠕虫是他编写的。2005年7月8日，德国Verden市法院认定他制造震荡波蠕虫，四次改变数据和三次对计算机实施破坏有罪，判处1年零9个月的缓刑，在缓刑期间必须完成30个小时的感化工作。                                                                                                                该病毒是一个利用微软操作系统的Lsass缓冲区溢出漏洞（ MS04-011漏洞信息）进行传播的蠕虫。由于该蠕虫在传播过程中会发起大量的扫描，因此对个人用户使用和网络运行都会造成很大的冲击。2004年4月30日爆发，给全球带来数千万美元损失。
family_en_des:
Sasser is a collection of worm that uses the Lasss buffer overflow vulnerabilities (MS04-011 vulnerability information) of MS operation system to spread, whose Chinese name is “shockwave”, some people also call it the “killer” worm. It would lauch a large number of scans during the spread process; therefore it would have a big impact on individual uses and network operations. In spite of that it attacked on Windows2000 and Windows XP and would not infect the computers with Windows 95/98/Me operation systems, it could operate on these platforms to be the infection origin.
Sasser got outbreak on April 30, 2004 and brought tens of millions losses to the whole world. On May 7, 2004, an 18-year-old teenager from the German state of lower Saxony luo rastenburg Sven Jaschan was arrested on suspicion of writing the worm. In the interrogation, the teenager has admitted that the worm is his writing. On July 8, 2005, in the German city court Verden sentenced him guilty of writing Sasser, modifying data for 4 times and compromising computers for 3 times, and sentenced to one year and nine months of probation, 30 hours’ reforming must be completed during the period of probation.
action_des: 在被感染主机开启FTP服务，通过一个远程代码执行漏洞驱使其他计算机通过下载蠕虫自身，从而传播。它会攻击Isass.exe进程，导致计算机重启。

family_cn_des:
网络旅行者行动（Net Traveler），最早发现于2004年，在2010年至2013年间最为活跃。目前该攻击的受害者已经超过350个，遍及40个国家，并主要集中在中亚国家。名称Net Traveler取自该恶意代码之前的内部字符串。该攻击行动的任务是窃取敏感信息、键盘记录，并检索文件系统列表和多种PDF文件。它利用鱼叉式网络钓鱼电子邮件，以恶意的微软办公文档为附件。目前，C&C服务器上已经存储了22亿多字节的窃取信息。
已知的该攻击的目标包括藏族或维吾尔族活跃分子、石油产业公司、科研中心和机构、大学、私营企业、政府和政府机构、大使馆及军事承包商。
family_en_des:
Net Traveler is an Advanced Persistent Threat attack. It was discovered in 2004 and very active in recent years. Currently, there are more than 350 victims scattered in 40 countries suffered this attack, mainly centering in the Middle Asia. The name “Net Traveler” comes from its former internal strings. The missions of this attack are stealing sensitive information, keylogger records and retrieval the file system lists and several PDF files. It uses spear-phishing emails with malicious Microsoft Office documents as attachments. Currently, the C&C server has stored more than 2.2 billion bytes of stolen data.
The known targets of this attack include Tibetan or Uighur activists, oil industry companies, scientific & research institutions, universities, private enterprises, governments and agencies, embassies and military contractors.

family_cn_des: 熊猫烧香是一种经过多次变种的蠕虫病毒，2006年10月16日由25岁的中国湖北人李俊编写，2007年1月初肆虐网络。这是一波计算机病毒蔓延的狂潮。在极短时间之内就可以感染几千台计算机，严重时可以导致网络瘫痪。那只憨态可掬、颔首敬香的“熊猫”除而不尽。反病毒工程师们将它命名为“尼姆亚”。在汉语中，它被命名为“熊猫烧香”。                                                                                               危险级别：★★★★★                                                                                                                                   影响系统：Win 9x/ME、Win 2000/NT、Win XP、Win 2003 、Win Vista 、Win7、Win8                                                                                                   病毒变种使用户计算机中毒后可能会出现蓝屏、频繁重启以及系统硬盘中数据文件被破坏等现象。同时，该病毒的某些变种可以通过局域网进行传播，进而感染局域网内所有计算机系统，最终导致企业局域网瘫痪，无法正常使用，它能感染系统中exe，com，pif，src，html，asp等文件，它还能终止大量的反病毒软件进程并且删除扩展名为gho的备份文件。被感染的用户系统中所有.exe可执行文件全部被改成熊猫举着三根香的模样。                                                                                                                    熊猫烧香使用PE捆绑进行感染，U盘自动运行方法传播，技术粗糙。但因源码被大量买卖而变种繁多，传播范围相当广泛。但原病毒只会对EXE图标进行替换，并不会对系统本身进行破坏。而大多数是中的病毒变种，用户电脑中毒后可能会出现蓝屏、频繁重启以及系统硬盘中数据文件被破坏等现象。病毒会删除扩展名为gho的文件，使用户无法使用ghost软件恢复操作系统。                                                                                                                                 同时，该病毒的某些变种可以通过局域网进行传播，进而感染局域网内所有计算机系统，最终导致企业局域网瘫痪，无法正常使用，它能感染系统中exe，com，pif，src，html，asp等文件，它还能终止大量的反病毒软件进程并且会删除扩展名为gho的备份文件。被感染的用户系统中所有.exe可执行文件全部被改成熊猫举着三根香的模样。
family_en_des:
Fujack is a collection of worm that experienced many times of variants. It is written by Li Jun who is from Chian, Hubei on October 16, 2006. It was spread widely in the networks on January 2007, which was a huge wave of computer virus spread. It could infect thounsands of computers within a very short time and even lead to system crash. The lovely “panda” cannot be removed. The antivirus engineers called it “Nimya” and it was named “Xiongmaoshaoxiang” in Chinese.

There might be blue screen, frequent restart, compromising data files after the users’ computers were infected. Meanwhile, some certain variants of this virus could spread through LAN to infect the computer systems within LAN, which ultimately leads to enterprise LAN crash and cannot work. It can infect the files of the system, including exe, com, pif, src, html, asp and so on; it can also terminate large amounts of antivirus processes and delete the backup file named gho. All the exe. executable files in the compromised systems were changed into the appearance of a panda holding three sticks.

It infects through PE binding and spreads via USB auto run. Although its technology is rough, it has numerous variants and spreads widely because of code trade.  But the original virus can only replace .EXE icon and will not damage the system itself.

family_cn_des:
类型:间谍软件                                                                                   影响：它收集在互联网的使用和安装在计算机中的应用程序方面的信息，同时利用它来显示弹出的广告。                                                                               受影响的平台:Windows 2003/XP/2000/NT/ME/98/95                                         广告是指利用各种手段来进行广告的程序:弹出窗口、横幅、更改浏览器的主页或搜索页面等广告。这种广告可以与程序编写者或第三方所提供的相关的产品或提供的服务产生一定的联系。                                                                  这种广告软件可以利用很多种途径进行安装,例如在用户不同意的情况下,或者用户不知情的情况下。                                  DesktopMedia访问一些网站下载文件,然后运行。一般情况下，它是恶意软件，但也可能是任何类型的文件。
DesktopMedia使用下列传播或分配方式:通过用户的参与来实现漏洞利用，通过文件格式或应用程序来实现漏洞利用。为了成功的实现漏洞利用，它需要用户的参与:打开文件、浏览恶意网页、阅读电子邮件等。                                                                           它被删除或下载到电脑的其他恶意软件样本,例如:MultiDropper、小轮车、MultiDropper.BNH。
family_en_des:
DesktopMedia is a collection of spyware that collects the application information on Internet usage, which is used to display pop-up advertisements.                          The affected platforms include Windows 2003, Windows XP, Windows 2000, Windows NT, Windows ME, Windows 98 and Windows 95.
DesktopMedia accesses some websites to download files, which it then runs. In general situation, DesktopMedia is a kind of malicious software, but it could be any type of file. 
DesktopMedia uses the following propagation or distribution methods: exploiting vulnerabilities with users’ intervention, exploiting vulnerabilities in file formats or applications. To exploit them successfully, it needs users’ intervention, such as opening files, viewing malicious web pages, reading emails, etc.
It is dropped or downloaded to the computer by other malware specimens, for example: MultiDropper.BMX, MultiDropper.BNH.

family_cn_des:
Stuxnet是一种Windows平台上的计算机蠕虫，2010年6月首次被白俄罗斯安全公司VirusBlokAda发现，其名称是从代码中的关键字得来。
Stuxnet蠕虫的传播时间起始于2009年6月，甚至更早。它是世界上首个以关键工业控制系统为攻击目标的蠕虫病毒，特别针对西门子公司SIMAT WinCC数据采集与监视控制系统（SACDA）中存在的漏洞进行攻击。与以往病毒不同的是，Stuxnet蠕虫的代码结构非常复杂和精密，具有超强的隐蔽性。该病毒感染了多个国家及地区的工业系统和个人用户，截止2011年，全球共有超过45000个网络被感染，伊朗遭到的攻击最为严重，60%的个人电脑都遭到了攻击。据报道，该病毒成功入侵并袭击了伊朗的纳坦兹铀浓缩工厂等核设施的电脑控制系统，并导致两层离心机失效，延迟了伊朗的核计划。
Stuxnet蠕虫采用了复杂的多层攻击技术，能够利用微软操作系统和西门子SIMATIC WinCCH系统的7个漏洞进行攻击，此外，该蠕虫还会利用两种合法的数字证书（Realtek和JMicron），增强自身的隐蔽性。
据卡巴斯基的分析，Stuxnet病毒的幕后操作者不是一般的以获取经济利益为目的的网络犯罪团伙，他们的目的旨在发动大规模的网络破坏活动。该蠕虫的开发者很可能得到了某些具备强大数据收集和处理能力的国家力量的支持。
震网（Stuxnet）是第一个直接攻击现实世界工业设施的恶意代码，它利用微软Windows操作系统的多个漏洞和西门子公司工业控制系统的漏洞，攻击伊朗核工业设施，以干扰浓缩铀的生产过程，最终造成该国核计划的推迟。
family_en_des:
Stuxnet is a kind of worms running in Windows platforms. It was first discovered by VirusBlokAda in June 2010. 
Stuxnet first appeared in June 2009 or earlier. It was the first worm in the world to target against key industrial control systems, especially against the vulnerability in SIMAT WinCC SACDA. Different from precious viruses, the worm of Stuxnet has complex code structure which has great hidden ability. Stuxnet infected many industrial systems and personal users in some countries. By the end of 2011, more than 45,000 networks are influenced. In Iran, 60% personal computers are attacked. It was reported that Stuxnet had successfully attacked the uranium enrichment infrastructure in Iran. 
Stuxnet applied complex multi-layer attacking technique which can make use of 7 vulnerabilities in Microsoft System and SIMATIC WinCCH system. Moreover, the worm can make use of two legal credentials (Realtek and JMicron) to hid in a more smart way. 
According to the analysis of Kaspersky, the attackers are not regular cyber-criminal groups with financial purpose, but aim for large-scale attacking and destroying actions. They may be supported by some national powers which have great data analyzing and processing ability.  
Stuxnet is the first malware that attacks industrial network in real world. It exploits several vulnerabilities of Windows and Siemens’ products to attack nuclear infrastructure of Iran. Finally, it disturbs Iran’s uranium enrichment and delays its nuclear plan.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
Storm是一类通过电子邮件传播，影响运行微软操作系统计算机的蠕虫家族。因其最初感染宿主的电子邮件都有一行与风暴相关的主题，比如“风暴侵袭欧洲造成230人死亡”而被芬兰公司F-Seucre命名为“Storm”（风暴）。
Storm蠕虫最早出现在2007年1月，并在当年建立起空前庞大的僵尸网络。随着微软在2008年初发布的Malicious Software Removal Tool (MSRT)，该蠕虫病毒几乎绝迹。
被感染了Storm蠕虫的电子邮件中包含恶意的可执行文件，其中的rootkit恶意代码具有反病毒检测能力，能够躲避病毒扫描引擎的追踪。成功入侵后该蠕虫会访问一个秘密的P2P网络，下载升级包，上传窃取的用户资料，并进行硬盘扫描，查找电子邮件地址用于继续发送邮件。Storm蠕虫采用P2P技术进行命令和控制信息的传递，将被感染计算机组成大规模的僵尸网络，肆意传播。
family_en_des:
Storm is a family of worms that spread via e-mail and infect computers running Microsoft operating systems. As the e-mail it infected will contain a subject line such as "230 dead as storm batters Europe", it was named by F-Secure as “Storm”.
Storm first appeared in January 2007 and developed an unprecedented huge botnet. Due to Microsoft’ publication of Malicious Software Removal Tool (MSRT), Storm almost disappeared. 
The infected e-mail contains malicious EXE files. The rootkit code in it has the ability to evade antivirus detection and scanning. The worm visits a secret P2P network, download upgrade packet, upload stolen data, and scan the disk for potential e-mail address to go on its malicious behaviors. Employing P2P technique to make C&C communications, the worm can develop a large-scale botnet to spread in a wanton manner.

family_cn_des: PcClient是以一种复杂的应用程序。PcClient是一个恶意程序。它伪造成自己是合法软件是为了欺骗用户安装他们。
family_en_des: PcClient is a collection of trojan with complex application programs. It disguises itself as legal software in order to lure users to download and install it.

family_cn_des:
红色十月（Operation Red October）是一个有五年历史的大规模间谍活动。它始于2007年，使用了1000多个可区分的模块，利用了3个已知的不同漏洞（Microsoft Excel‘CVE-2009-3129’，Word‘CVE-2010-3333’和‘CVE-2012-0158’），并根据目标进行定制攻击。它的攻击目标包括至少39个国家的外交使馆、政府和科研机构，目标国家包括美巴澳俄。其规模和复杂程度与针对伊朗的Flame病毒不相上下。
该行动的主要目的是窃取机密信息和地缘政治情报。它的一个特别之处是，能在入侵计算机上安装Adobe Reader和Microsoft Word的扩展模块。成功安装后，如果未来恶意程序被移除，模块就为攻击者提供了一个重新控制计算机的安全渠道。
研究人员表示，目前还没有证据证明这是一起国家资助的攻击行动。[1]
family_en_des:
Operation Red October is a large-scale cyber espionage campaign that has lasted for five years. It started from 2007 and used more than 1000 identifiable modules and 3 known different vulnerabilities (Microsoft Excel‘CVE-2009-3129’, Word‘CVE-2010-3333’ and ‘CVE-2012-0158’), making custom attacks according to the difference of targets. The main focus of this operation includes diplomatic embassies, governments and scientific & research institutions of 39 countries, containing America, Brazil, Australia and Russia. The scale and complexity of this operation is comparable to virus Flame that is against Iran.
The main objective of the attackers is to gather confidential information and geopolitical intelligence. What is unique is that it can install the extension module of Adobe Reader and Microsoft Word in the compromised computers. After successfully installation, if the malware is removed, the module would then provide a safe channel for attackers to re-control the computer.
Researcher said that, there is no evidence to prove it is a state-sponsored operation.

family_cn_des:
Worm/Win32.Conficker，也被称作Downup，Downadup或Kido，Conficker蠕虫是最早于2008年11月20日被发现的以微软的windows操作系统为攻击目标的计算机蠕虫病毒，因此他是基于攻击目标的行为来命名的家族。                                       Conficke早期是通过本地网络和可移动存储设备进行传播的，并且通过微软的MS08-067漏洞对计算机进行感染，同时也能借助任何有USB接口的硬件设备来感染。最新的变种虽无法通过自身进行传播，但是可以通过在线更新的方式来进行升级。                                                Conficke病毒创建了一个十分强大的僵尸网络，这个僵尸网络由大量的受感染的计算机组成。通过这个僵尸网络，网络罪犯便有能力对任何的网络资源发动DDos攻击，从“肉鸡”中盗取大量的隐私数据，并大范围发布垃圾数据（如垃圾邮件等）。        Conficke病毒迄今已出现了A、B、C、E四个版本，至2009年底，国家互联网应急中心CNCERT检测到Conficker病毒已经感染全球超过7000万台主机，在中国，每月感染主机IP数量约1800万个。

Conficker又名Kido，利用微软Windows操作系统的MS08-067漏洞，感染了约七百万台计算机，创造了有史以来最大的僵尸网络。
family_en_des:
Conficker (It is also named Downup, Downadup or Kido) is a collection of worm that was discovered at 20th November, 2008 and targeted Windows operation system. 
It was spread through local network and removable storage devices initially, infecting computers by means of Microsoft’s vulnerability MS08-067 or any hardware devices with USB interfaces. The latest variant cannot spread by itself, but it can update through online upgrade.
Conficker established a powerful botnet which was consisted of a large number of compromised computers. Cybercriminals were able to do DDoS attack against any network resources by this botnet and steal large amount of private data and publish junk data (such as junk mails) widely.
There are four versions of Conficker (version A, B C and E) so far. CNCERT has detected that more than 70 million hosts have infected it until the end of 2009, the amount of infected host IP is 18 million every month in China.
Conficker is also named Kido. It has infected about 7 million computers and created one of the largest botnet in the history through exploiting MS08-067 vulnerability.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
Worm[Net]/Win32.Koobface是一类借由Facebook等交友网站内的信息留言系统向用户发动攻击，以达到入侵电脑盗取信用卡号码等个人资料的目的，因此他是基于特定攻击方式的行为来命名的家族。                                              
Koobface一词源自facebook的倒裝形式，因其2008年首次被发现时是通过facebook的信息系统来传播的，直至2009年，Myspace及Twitter两个社交网站亦受到影响。                       感染Koobface病毒的用户会向其他朋友发出信息，信息的抬头会是「你在这部新短片中看来棒极了」（You look just awesome in this new moive）之类的句子，以吸引你点击连结。用户一旦点击，就会被要求下载Adobe的Flash Player更新版，按下「安装」後电脑就会中毒。之後每当你打算前往Google、Yahoo等搜寻器网站时，都会被强行导向一些有病毒的网站。                       
Koobface家族具有多组恶意程序以使不同的计算机妥协，并引导这些程序完成攻击者的不同目的，其中包括使受其影响的机器分发其他恶意软件、 每次点击进入付费的广告页面已获得利益、 窃取敏感数据（如信用卡号码）、 打破 captcha，和颠覆受影响的用户的在线体验等。

HackTool/Win32.Koobface家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的黑客工具家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。              Koobface黑客工具被用于攻击各种社交网站，主要是Facebook，其名字是facebook的变形，koob倒过来便是book。该黑客软件的目标是窃取用户的账户密码等资料，并组成一个点对点传播的僵尸网络。通过其点对点的结构，该僵尸网络能够传播大量广告信息或者发送其他恶意软件。Koobface被发现于2008年。调查显示其在09到10年间获取了超过2百万美元的利润。
family_en_des:
Koobface is a collection of worm that uses the information message systems of social networks (such as Facebook) to attack users so as to compromise computers and steal personal materials (such as credit card numbers).
The name Koobface comes from the inversion of Facebook, because it was spread by using the information system of Facebook when it was discovered the first time. Until 2009, two other social sites (Myspace and Twitter) have also affected.
The users that infected koobface would send messages to other friends. The title was sentence like [You look just awesome in this new movies], trying to lure you to click the links. Once clicked, users would be asked to download the upgrade version of Adobe Flash Player; once you click [install] button, the computer would be infected then. After that, every time you are going to search sites, such as Google and Yahoo, you would be redirected to some sites with viruses.
Koobface family has multiple malicious programs to compromise computers, it would instruct these programs to finish the different goals of attackers, including spreading other malicious software, obtaining profits, stealing sensitive data (such as credit card numbers), break captcha, affecting the online experience of the infected users and so on.

Koobface ultimately attempts, upon successful infection, to gather login information for FTP sites, Facebook, Skype, and other social media platforms. It then uses compromised computers to build a peer-to-peer botnet. A compromised computer contacts other compromised computers to receive commands in a peer-to-peer fashion. The botnet is used to install additional pay-per-install malware on the compromised computer as well as hijack search queries to display advertisements. Its peer-to-peer topology is also used in showing fake messages to other users with the purpose of expanding the botnet. It was first detected in December 2008 and a more potent version appeared in March 2009. A study by the Information Warfare Monitor has revealed that the operators of this scheme have generated over $2 million in revenue from June 2009 to June 2010.
Koobface originally spread by delivering Facebook messages to people who are 'friends' of a Facebook user whose computer has already been infected. Upon receipt, the message directs the recipients to a third-party website (or another Koobface infected PC), where they are prompted to download what is purported to be an update of the Adobe Flash player. If they download and execute the file, Koobface is able to infect their system.

family_cn_des: Flocker是一类由Python脚本语言编写的针对Symbian操作系统的木马家族。该木马在2009年1月攻击一家印度尼西亚的移动电话运营商时被Kaspersky实验室发现。                                                          Flocker木马的脚本文件是嵌在一个SIS安装包中的。SIS安装程序会伪装成“CPUup”、“Icq_reggerNEW”、“Kaspersky AV (Mobile)”、“SMSfree”或“SiStail”等应用程序诱骗用户安装，并和正常程序一样，安装后图标会出现在菜单栏中。                                                        该木马通过向预设号码发送带有指令的短消息的方式将用户手机银行账户中的部分资金转移非法转移到网络犯罪分子的账户中，转移金额从0.45美元到0.90美元不等，如果大量手机被感染，那么转移金额将非常巨大。很明显该木马作者的目的是为了牟取经济利益。在移动通讯产业中进行金融诈骗已经越发普遍，渐成国际性问题。用户在使用手机浏览网页时，应提高警惕，并随时更新病毒数据库。
family_en_des:
Flocker is a kind of Trojan family written by the Python scripting language for Symbian OS. It is discovered by Kaspersky lab when attacking a mobile phone operator in Indonesia in January 2009.                                                                  
Its script file is embedded in a SIS installation package. SIS will be disguised as "CPUup", "Icq_reggerNEW", "Kaspersky AV (Mobile)" and "SMSfree" or "SiStail" application to lure users to install, and as well as normal process; after installation, icon will appear in the menu bar. 
It makes parts of the user's phone bank account funds illegally transferred to the account of cybercriminals by sending a text message with instructions to the default number, the transfer amounts range from $0.45 to $0.90. If a large number of cell phones become infected, then the transfer amount will be very huge. Clearly the author's purpose is to pursue economic interests.
To carry on the financial fraud actions in the mobile communication industry has become increasingly common, as international issues. Users should raise their awareness and update virus database in the use of mobile phones to browse the web.

family_cn_des:
HeartBeat是一种高级持续性威胁（APT），由趋势科技（TrendMicro）在2012年发现并公布。HeartBeat从2009年（或许更早）开始试图攻击韩国政府及其相关机构的网络，尤其针对韩国的政党、政府分支、军队派别、媒体以及国家政策研究机构。
HeartBeat在2012年6月利用远程管理工具（Remote administration tool）入侵韩国某新闻网站时开始暴露。深入研究表明，该RAT工具的最早版本出现于2009年11月，在2011年也出现过。该工具将自身伪装成正常文件，一旦运行，看似毫无疑问，而恶意活动已经在后台悄悄进行了。该文件的方式暂不知晓，但研究人员认为鱼叉式钓鱼邮件很可能是其传播渠道。该RAT工具会安装一个.DLL文件，然后将其植入svchost.exex进程中，并利用被植入的组件和恶意程序的C&C服务器进行通讯，发送确认入侵成功消息以及接收远程指令。
这些指令包括：为当前进程及其ID命名；记录并运行文件；卸载或更新恶意程序；对进程进行额外的破坏；为现有的固定的/可拆分的驱动命名；为原始文件及其创建日期命名；删除/下载文件；利用命令窗口加速远程连接；重启计算机设备。当所有这些命名都被执行后，攻击者也就掌握了整个计算机的控制权。
family_en_des:
HeatBeat is an Advanced Persistent Threat attack that was discovered and published by Trend Micro in 2012. Since the year of 2009 (or earlier before), it tried to attack the networks of Korean government and other related agencies, especially for the political parties of Korea, government branches, military factions, media and National Policy Research Agency. 
HearBeat was exposed when it used Remote Administration tool to attack a news site of Korea in June 2012. Deep research indicates that the first version of this RAT tool appeared in November 2009 and also has occurred in 2011. This tool fakes itself as normal file, once executed, the malicious activity will run at the backend. The pattern of the file is unknown, but researchers believe that the spread route might probably be spear phishing email. This RAT tool installs a .DLL file and then implants to the svchost.exex process, communicating by using the implanted componets and C&C server to send the confirming message of successful intrusion and receive remote instructions. The instructions include: naming the current process and its ID, recording and running documents, uninstalling or updating the malicious programs, naming the existed fixed /detachable driver, naming the original file and creation date, speeding remote connection by instruction window and restarting computer. After all the naming is executed, the attacker then takes the whole control of the computer.

family_cn_des:
极光行动（Operation Aurora），又称欧若拉行动，是2009年12月中旬可能来源于中国的一次网络攻击行动。其名称Aurora（意思是欧若拉、极光）的由来，是取自攻击者计算机中恶意文件所在路径的一部分。
在这次攻击行动中，除Google公司外，还另有20多家公司遭到攻击，其中包括Adobe Systems、Juniper Networks、雅虎、Symantec等。攻击行动之后，Google提出了新的运营计划，它将“在必要的法律范围内”在中国运营一个完全不受过滤的搜索引擎；同时Google也承认，如果计划实施不了，它将可能撤出中国市场并关闭其在中国的办事处。Goole的计划声明引起了众多媒体的关注和报道。英国Guardian引述香港大学新闻及传媒研究中心助理教授麦康瑞的话提到，Google的这一决定为其他企业树立了一个榜样，即多为用户着想而不仅仅是考虑商业利益。[1]
攻击过后，多家安全厂商开发了针对性的防御措施。例如McAfee，针对该攻击的多阶段的特性，提供了在多个不同阶段用以保护用户的不同产品和解决方案。

极光行动或欧若拉行动是2009年12月中旬开始的，其名称“Aurora”（意为极光、欧若拉）来自攻击者电脑上恶意文件所在路径的一部分。
遭受攻击的除了Google外，还有20多家公司：其中包括Adobe Systems、Juniper Networks、Yahoo、Symante等企业。
family_en_des:
Operation Aurora is a network attack that might originated from China in mid December 2009. Aurora is named after the part route of malicious files in the attackers' computer.    In this attack, except for Google, there are more than 20 other companies were compromised, including Adobe Systems, Juniper Networks, Yahoo, Symantec and so on. After the attack, Google promoted a new operation plan, it would carry out a search engine without being filtrated "in the necessary law scope". Meanwhile, Google also admitted that it might be off the Chinese market and close the office in China if the plan is failed. This attracts many focues and reports from the media world. The Guardian quoted what Mai Kangrui (the assistant professor of the Journalism and Media Study Center of Hongkong University), the decision Google made sets a good example for other enterprises, which is thinking more for your clients instead of only taking econimic profits into account.                          After the attack, several secruty vendors begin to develop targeted prevention splutions. For example, McAfee provides different products and solutions for different stages.

It is an APT attack that named after the part route of malicious files in the attackers' computer. In this attack, except for Google, more than 20 other companies were compromised, including Adobe Systems, Juniper Networks, Yahoo, and Symantec and so on.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
“Winnti”可能是来自中国的一个黑客团体，这群黑客在近4年的时间里不断地窃取游戏公司的游戏原始代码并入侵游戏服务器，迄今已有35家游戏开发商惨遭窃取。一旦这些黑客拿到源代码，他们会以两种方式来处理，一是在中国黑市四处兜售，二是直接用这些源代码制作山寨游戏，从中谋取利益。
卡巴斯基发表报告称，遭受黑客攻击的厂商大多位于东南亚、韩国，也包括德国、美国、白俄罗斯、日本、巴西等国家。“这群黑客的最主要目标是网络游戏(MMO)开发商，因为除了源代码可窃取之外，他们也可以轻易地操作游戏货币，来与在线玩家做非法交易。”

Winnti组织专门针对游戏公司托管的服务器，窃取源代码创建私服，同时盗窃钱财或虚拟货币。根据卡巴斯基的分析报告可知，它已攻击了超过30家网络游戏公司。
family_en_des:
It is a persistent attack that uses Trojans to steal the original codes and signatures from game companies. According to Kaspersky Lab, "Winnti" might be a hacker group from China and has stolen more than 35 companies until now. Once hackers got the codes, they would deal with the codes in two ways: saling the codes at the black markets; using the codes directly to develop made-in-China games to make profits.    Kaspersky's report said, most of the compromised vendors were in the Southeast Asia, Korea, including Germany, America, Berlarus, Japan, Brazil and so on."The main targets of these hackers are online-game developers, because they can easily control the game coins to do illegal transactions with online users.  

It is a collection of APT attacks that can steal the original code and signatures from game companies. According to Kaspersky Lab, the hacker group "Winnti" has attacked more than 30 companies until now.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
Geinimi是一种后门程序，基于Android平台，通过各种伎俩植入到多款流行手机游戏软件中，生成新的软件安装包后在手机论坛、手机软件下载站进行传播，诱骗用户下载安装。                                                                        网秦手机安全中心再次发布安全预警，一组基于Android平台的BIT.GeiNiMi病毒被截获。经检测，此病毒正是“Geinimi”后门程序的变种，而此次拦截的变种竟多达十种。从11月底网秦率先发现Geinimi后门程序到现在，此病毒变种正在以每月90%的速度激增。据不完全统计，目前该病毒感染的手机用户预计达90万以上。                                                                                                                                                感染用户手机后，Geinimi后门程序会自动在手机后台启动，并定期连接到Geinimi网站，上传用户的位置信息，并根据所在地域，推广各类恶意广告短信，在用户不知情的情况下，自动下载各类恶意推广软件。                                                                                                                                                         此“后门”程序具备多组隐蔽代码，可能存在上传用户通讯录、短信箱内容的行为，威胁用户的隐私安全。同时，其加入了“自我保护”机制，导致用户无法停止其服务来终止程序运行，由于“后门”程序采用了代码混淆方式，对病毒分析也增加了难度。                                                                                   Geinimi后门程序使用惯用的伎俩植入最新流行的“棒球巨星2010”、“超级猴子跳”、“植物大战僵尸”、“仿真打火机”、“手机测心率”等多款流行手机游戏软件中，生成新的软件安装包后在手机论坛、手机软件下载站进行线上分发。
Geinimi是最复杂的Android木马之一，采用了代码混淆和加密等技术以避免被分析和检测。它连接主控服务器（C&C server），并回传用户隐私数据。它有较多的变种。                                                                                   为防止更多用户感染此后门程序，避免更多的手机用户遭受经济损失，手机安全专家提醒广大Android用户：
1、提高手机安全意识，如果用户发现手机出现自动连接互联网，自动下载陌生软件和不断弹出恶意广告提示时，可能已感染“给你米” (geinimi)后门程序。可下载专业的手机杀毒软件进行查杀
2、手机病毒大多通过软件论坛、小型下载站这样验证机制薄弱，严重缺乏安全审核的平台分发，通过诱人标题，伪装成常用软件来骗取用户下载。对此，专家建议用户，下载手机软件时应选择官方网站、专业手机软件下载站和包括Market商城等官方软件商店。同时，也呼吁更多站点和专业移动安全厂商进行合作，积极构建下载渠道端的安全验证体系。
3、用户在发现可能存在安全风险的手机程序后，可及时向专业手机安全公司举报，寻求解决方法。
family_en_des:
Geinimi is a collection of backdoor that is based on the Android platform. It is implanted into several polular mobile game software through a variety of tricks and generates new software installation kit to spread on mobile phone BSS, luring users to download and install.According to incomplete statistics, at present the virus infection of mobile phone users is expected to reach more than 900000.
After infecting users’ cell phones, Geinimi would start automatically at backend and connect Geinimi websites regularly, uploading the users’ location information and promote different kinds of advertising messages according to the areas, automatically downloading malicious software.
It has multiple sets of stealthy codes and might uploading user contacts and SMS contents, threatening users’ privacy. At the same time, it joins the self-protection mechanism, so users cannot terminate the program by disabling the services. As it adopts method of code obfuscating, it raises the difficulty of virus analyzing.
Geinimi is one of the most complex Trojans of Android, adopting code obfuscating and encryption technologies to avoid being detected and analyzed.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Android.FakePlayer是专门针对Android操作系统的一种木马程序，因此他是基于特定攻击目标的行为来命名的家族。         这种木马通常伪装成媒体播放器程序，诱惑用户下载并安装这个程序，一旦开始运行，该程序会在后台没有通过许可或通知的情况下秘密向收费号码发送SMS短信,从而帮助收费号码的所有者获利。
family_en_des: FakePlayer is a collection of trojan horse that targets Android operation system exclusively. It usually is disguised as media player program to lure users to download and install it. Once started execution, it would send SMS message to chargable numbers to make the holder of the number gain profits.

family_cn_des:
ZtiMo是”ZeuS-in-the-Mobile”（ZeuS Trojan for mobile platforms）的缩写，也就是运行在移动平台的Zeus木马。该木马出现在2010年9月，是第一个窃取移动交易认证码（mobile transaction authentication numbers）（缩写为mTAN）的恶意程序，能够在Android、Symbian和WinCE等移动平台上进行非法的在线银行交易。
Zitmo木马的设计目的只有一个，就是在手机用户不知情的情况下，快速窃取mTAN码。Zitmo木马的传播方式和PC平台的Zeus木马如出一辙：手机用户在被入侵前会收到一个安装新版安全认证的短信，短信中提供下载该安全认证的链接，该链接指向移动版本的Zeus木马。如果用户点击、下载并安装了该应用程序，其手机就感染了Zitmo木马。
Zitmo木马随后利用PC版ZeuS木马窃取的用户账号信息，进入手机上的银行系统进行非法的转账交易。交易所需的验证信息会通过短信发送给用户，而该信息被Zitmo木马截取，转发到指定手机号码上，从而实现交易认证。
它是流行的网银木马Zeus的手机版，出现在多个移动平台之上。Zitmo与Zeus合作，窃取银行账户和短信验证码（mTan），成功地攻击了网银的双因素认证技术。
family_en_des:
Zitmo is short for “ZeuS-in-the-Mobile” which is ZeuS Trojan for mobile platforms. First appeared in September 2010, it is the first malware to steal mobile transaction authentication numbers (mTAN). It makes illegal online bank business in mobile platforms like Symbian, Android and WinCE. 
The design of Zitmo is to steal mTAN without user knowledge. The spreading manner of Zitmo is quite similar to that of Zeus in PC. The mobile user will receive a message to install new version of security certificate in which the certificate URL points to the Trojan. After clicking and installation of the application, a mobile phone is infected.  
Then Zitmo makes use of the user account information stolen by Zeus to make illegal transferring business. The certificate message which should be sent to the user will be sent to the attacker instead. So the business is done. 

Zitmo is Zeus’s mobile version and appears on several mobile platforms. Zitmo cooperates with Zeus to steal mTAN and bank accounts, so they can successfully defeat the current 2-factor authentication of online banking.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
Hangove名称的由来，是因为多数病毒样本的文本字符串中都包含“hangove”这一词语。该威胁行动来源于印度，并已经持续进行了近两年的时间。该行动的目标有两个：第一，检索与印度相关的国家安全信息；第二，参与工业间谍活动。包括从世界上的不同组织机构中窃取敏感信息，特别是位于巴基斯坦的信息。
Hangove是一种高级可持续威胁，其样本包含了“hangove”的文本。此次攻击来源于印度并已持续了2年多的时间。此次攻击有两个基本目标：检测并收集与印度有关的国家安全信息；参与工业间谍活动。
family_en_des:
Hangover is an APT attack whose name is originated from the fact that most of its virus samples contain the text string "hangover". This threat attack came from India and has lasted for almost 2 years. There are two basic goals of the attack: detect and collect national security information related to India; participating in the industry espionage activities, including stealing sensitive information from different organization in the world, especially the information located in Pakistan.
It is an APT attack whose samples contain the text string "hangover". It came from India and has lasted for almost 2 years. There are two basic goals: detect and collect national security information related to India; participating in the industry espionage activities.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: Trojan/OSX.Coinbitminer是一种通过Torrent种子传播的恶意木马程序，因此他是基于特定传播方式的基因关联来命名的家族。                                                   Coinbitminer也被命名为OSX/Miner-D 或Backdoor:OSX/DevilRobber，它除了能够获取电脑的任何用户名和密码，并且能够通过截图来监视用户的活动，将截图发送到预订地点之外，还能控制电脑GPU，从而获取Bitcoin虚拟货币。目前这种木马存在于某些网站的GraphicConverter BitTorren 7.4版本。                                              Coinbitminer发现于2011年11月初，由于它具有接管MAC的GPU来挖比特币的特性，其成为威胁苹果电脑用户安全的重要木马之一，11月8日苹果公司更新了MAC系统的Lion和Snow Leopard系统的病毒库，用以对付此木马。
family_en_des: Coinbitminer is a collection of trojan horse that spreads by Torrent seeds. Coinbitminer is also called OSX/Miner-D or Backdoor:OSX/DevilRobber. It was discovered in early November 2011. As it has the characteristic of taking over Mac GPU, it becomes the one of the important trojans that threaten Apple computer users.                It can not only obtain the accounts and passwords of computers, oversee users' activities by screenshots which are sent to the default location, but also control the computer GPU in order to gain Bitcoin virtual currency. Currently, it exists in the GraphicConverter BitTorren 7.4 version of some sites.

family_cn_des:
Madi是一种被用于特定活动的木马，并于2011年12月被发现。其目的是渗透整个中东地区的计算机系统，以伊朗、伊拉克、阿富汗及世界其它地区的个人为目标。大量的收集数据显示出，该运动的着重点在于中东地区的基础设施工程公司、政府机构、金融机构和学术界。
Seculert的研究员说，目前还不清楚这一运动是否受到了政府的资助。而该运动还需要投入大量的调查和财政支持。[1]
该木马家族被用于特殊的活动中，其目的是渗透到整个中东，并针对性地扩散到伊朗、以色列和阿富汗等国家的个人计算机系统，
family_en_des:
Madi is a collection of Trojan horse that is used for special avtivities. It was discovered in December 2012. Madi's aim is to penetrate the whole computer systems in Middle East, with the individuals of Iran, Iraq, Afghanistan and other locations as targets. The large amount of collective data indicates Madi's focus is on the infrastructure companies, governmental agencies, financial agencies and academic fields in Middle East.                         The researcher of Seculert said, whether Madi is sponsored by government is unknow and we should invest more financial supports and investigations.

It is a Trojan that is used for special activities. Its aim is penetrating the whole computer systems in the Middle East, with the individuals of Iran, Iraq, Afghanistan and other locations as main targets.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
Trojan/Android.DroidDream是一种盗取手机用户个人信息的恶意程序，因此是基于特殊目的的行为来命名的家族。           
此病毒最先由手机应用安全公司Lookout命名，DreamDroid 采用 rageagainstthecage 方法来取得用户手机的根用户权限（Root Access），然后就偷偷上传用户信息，包括 IMEI，IMSI，手机型号，国家地区，语言等等。而且，这木马还会自动下载安装其他的有害程序，并和一个位于加州 Fremont 的服务器（http://184.105.245.17:8080/GMServer/GMServlet）联络，随时准备执行服务器发过来的指令。                    2011年3月4日，　Google Android Market(谷歌安卓官方应用商店)下架50款感染该病毒的手机应用程序，使整个网络安全业界为之震惊。
family_en_des: Trojan/Android.DroidDream is a collection of malware that steals users' personal information. The virus was first names by the mobile application company Lookout. It adopts rageagainstthecage method to obtain the Root Access and then uploads user information secretly, including IMEI, IMSI, cellphone model, country location, language and so on. Moreover, it can automatically download and install other malicious programs, and communicate with a server that locates in CA Fremont(http://184.105.245.17:8080/GMServer/GMServlet) to be ready to execute the instructions  sent by the server.                            In March 4th, 2011, Google Android Market took 50 compromised mobile apps off the shell, which astonished the whole network security world.

family_cn_des: 它是一种能够使用户系统出现异常行为，威胁用户缴纳一定费用来解除系统异常的敲诈类木马。
family_en_des: It is a collection of ransom Trojan that is able to make user’s system be abnormal and threaten user to pay fees to lift system abnormalities.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 该木马可以用被感染的电脑来盗取用户账户信息（用户名、密码）。它能通过垃圾邮件、可疑链接、恶意网站等侵入目标机器。它能通过下载不同的寄生网站、修改系统设置、更改或删除重要文件的方式感染计算机。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that can steal user’s accounts and passwords on the compromised computer. It can invade the targeted machine via spam emails, suspicious links and malicious websites and so on. （It may compromise PC severely by downloading various parasites and modify system setting and change/delete important files.）
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: Trojan/Android.AnserverBot是一类旨在远程控制用户手机的手机木马，因此他是基于特定目的的行为来命名的家族。      AnserverBot是目前已知的感染Android设备最为复杂的木马之一。这一特定的木马搭载在合法的apps中，并且可以同远程的指挥控制服务器（Command and Control (C&C) servers） 通信，以获得进一步的指示。AnserverBot正在注入一定数量（20+）的合法apps中，然后被分散在中国不同的Android Market中。   与之前像Pjapps和BaseBridge这样具有bot能力的程序不同的是，这个程序利用了好几种技术，包括深度代码混淆（deep code obfuscating）和（Plankton-lile）动态代码加载，用来阻止逆向工程分析以及防篡改以保护自己。
family_en_des: Trojan/Android.AnserverBot is a collection of mobile Trojan horse that aims to remote control  users' cellphones.                             AnserverBot is one of the most complex known Trojans that have infected Androind devices. This specific trojan is equipped in legitimate apps, and can communicate with the remote C&C server to get further instructions. It is injected into some legitimate apps (20+), then it will be distributed to different Android markets. Unlike Pjapps and Bridge that have bot capability, it uses several technology, including deep code obfuscating and Plankton-lite dynamic code loading, to prevent reverse engineer analysis and tampering to protect itself.

family_cn_des: 2011年4 月 4 日，Dr.Web 公司声称发现了一个 Mac 机组成的蠕虫网络，感染数量有五十五万之多。当天下午，该公司一个分析师发推表示数量已经激升到六十万，其中苹果总部所在城市 Cupertino 至少有 274 台 Mac 被感染。其实，Flashback 木马在 2011 年就已经出现，当时是伪装成 Flash Player 安装程序让用户亲手把病毒种到 Mac 上。而最新 Flashback 变种利用了 Mac OS X 中 Java 部件的一个漏洞，只要访问恶意网页，病毒在无知觉中就能感染系统。苹果公司也是在病毒爆发的消息被广泛报道之后才放出 OSX Java 部件升级补丁，为时已晚。                                                  它是一种专门感染mac OS X的后门程序，感染数量超过60万，甚至打入苹果的总部。此程序用java编写，伪装成flash播放器更新程序，从主控机下载恶意代码并且传播，据称不需要密码即可感染。                                                       Flashback木马在2012年的新变种利用了java漏洞进行攻击，在4月上旬感染了超过50万台Mac主机。该木马的爆发体现出Apple公司在安全策略上的不足，也让人们意识到Mac平台安全形势的严峻。                              Mac 无病毒的神话已经被彻底正式终结了。Flashback 是当下最流行的 Mac 病毒，全球已经有 50 万台 Mac 被报告感染了该病毒或变种，数目还在不断增长中。这个病毒最强悍的地方在于，不需用户任何操作（不提示、不需输入管理员密码），自动侵入系统。基本上，Flashback 病毒之于 Mac, 如同冲击波病毒之于 Windows.。
family_en_des:
Flashback is a collective of Trojan horse that infects Mac OS X. At first, it was disguised as a Flash Player installation program to let users have the virus on the Mac, which had appeared in 2011. The latest Flashback variant used one of the Java component exploits in Mac OS X, once accessing the malicious webpages, the virus would infect the systems silently. Apple released OSX Java component upgrade patch after the news of virus outbreak was widely reported, but it is too late.
The infection amount is more than 600000, and it even intruded into the Apple headquarters. It is written in Java, disguised as a flash player to update the program, download malicioud codes from the main control machines and spread. It is said that it does not need passwords to infect.
The new variant of Flashback in 2012 makes use of Java exploits to attack, infecting more than 500000 Mac hosts in early April.
The outbreak of it indicates the shortcomings of Apple in security policies, which also makes people realize the severe situation of Mac platform.
Flashback is the most popular Mac virus currently, there are 500000 Mac has been infected by it or its variants and the number is increasing continually. The most powerful thing of it is that it can automatically intrude into systems without any users’ operations (No notices and no need to input the Administration password). Basically, Flashback is to Mac what Sasser is to Windows.

family_cn_des:
高斯是由卡巴斯基实验室在2011年6月被发现的，它是一种主要针对黎巴嫩银行账户的新型网络病毒，该病毒是Stuxnet、 Flame和Duqu的进一步延伸。不过，该病毒并未被称为“Stuxnet之子”，而是以代码中发现的名字“高斯”命名。它包含一些与Flame相同的代码，但是在很多其它方面与Flame明显不同，尤其是在窃取银行账号的能力方面。目前，已经有超过2500台电脑遭受“高斯”侵入，其中大部分位于黎巴嫩境内。
该病毒能够窃取浏览器cookie和密码、社交网络和即时通讯工具中的账号信息，拦截银行账号确认信息。而这些信息多来自中东银行和在线支付平台PayPal、花旗银行和瑞士银行。
卡巴斯基实验室的高级病毒研究专家Roel Schouwenberg说，Gauss可能还有潜藏的能力未被发现。[1]
Gauss是出现在中东地区的一个新的网络间谍软件，根据卡巴斯基实验室的描述，该病毒可以窃取浏览器保存的密码、网银账户、Cookies和系统配置信息等敏感数据。此外，Gauss似乎和Stuxnet（超级工厂）病毒来自同一个国家，而Stuxnet病毒和最复杂病毒Flame关联紧密。
