family_en_des:
Gauss is a new kind of malware against mainly Lebanese bank accounts, which was discovered by Kaspersky Lab at June 2011.                    It is the further extension of Stuxnet, Flame and Duqu. However, it is named after the name occured among the codes instead of being called "Son of Stuxnet". Part of the codes it contains is the same with Flame's, but it is different from Flame at many aspests, especially the ability of stealing bank accounts. Currently,there are more than 2500 computers sufferred the virus, most of which are located in Lebanon.                                    It is able to steal browsers' cookie and passwords, the accounts of social networks and IM tools, to block the confirming information of bank accounts. Most of the information came from Middle East banks and online payment platform "PayPal", Citibank and The Swiss Bank.  The Senior Researcher of Kaspersky Lab Roel Schouwenberg said, Gauss may have some potential capabilities that we havn't discover.

Gauss is a Trojan that appears in the Middle East. According to Kaspersky Lab’s description, it can steal confidential data. Moreover, it might come from the same country as Stuxnet and have a close relationship with virus Flame.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
此次攻击主要针对俄罗斯。该攻击的C&C服务器渠道被嵌入在一个合法的页面中，从中很容易看出HTTP POST并发现数据库的密码是1917qaz。该恶意代码包含一个回拨机制，即如果不能获取信息公告，它就会试图通过韩语的雅虎邮件服务器核对邮箱的连接情况。数据被发送至无需验证的公共信息公告中，所以所有受害者的信息都是可见的。它的目标是从受害者机器中窃取大量的不同类型的密码或凭据。此外，它还通过收集到的受害者的相关信息对受害者进行分类。
FireEye的研究员在报告中称，借助一系列的证据（SMTP邮箱服务器和C&C服务器均位于韩国；文档中使用的部分词语是韩文；攻击者选择韩语信息公告作为C&C服务器这一行为说明，他/她的母语是韩语或者至少能够熟练掌握韩语），他们怀疑韩国是这起攻击事件的发起者。[1]
family_en_des: The attack "To Russia With Targeted Attack" is mainly against Russia. The C&C (Command and Control) server channel is embedded in a legitimate page, among which it is easy to find out HTTP POST and the password of database is 1917qaz. The malware contains a callback mechnism that if it cannot obtain information bulletin, it will check the mail connection condition through a Korean Yahoo mail server. The data is sent to public information platform without authentication, therefore all the information of the victims is available. The goal of the malware is stealing large amount of different types passwords or creditials from the compromised computers. Moreover, it will classify the victims according to the collected information.                                   The researcher from FireEye said, according to the evidences (both the SMTP mail server and C&C server are located in Korea; part of the documents is in Korean; the action that attackers choosed Korean information bulletin as C&C server indicates his/her mother language is Korean or at least can master Korean), they doubt that Korea is the attacker behind this attack.

family_cn_des: 使用社交网站发动针对一些抵制盗版品组织的分布式拒绝服务攻击（DDoS）的攻击行动。
family_en_des: Operation Payback is a group of APT attacks that are coordinated and decentralized. This operation started as retaliation to DDoS (Distributed Denial of Service) attacks on sites; then piracy proponents decided to take DDoS attacks on piracy opponents. The original reaction snowballed into a large number of attacks against major pro-copyright and anti-piracy organizations and individuals.

family_cn_des: 它是一种能够窃取账号与密码的木马程序，主要窃取网站会员、游戏会员等账号与密码。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can steal users' accounts and passwords, especially those of the website members and game members.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种被称为“危鬼”的木马，能够在未经用户许可的情况下下载安装并运行其他恶意程序。它还具有窃取计算机的敏感帐号和密码等信息、连接远程控制和点击广告网络等行为。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that can download and install other malware without user's permission. It can also steal accounts and passwords, connect remote controls, click adware networks and so on.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种能够接受远程控制的木马。它能通过仿冒FLASH广告、垃圾邮件、被感染的ZIP包进行传播，同时可以收集和记录系统和用户的信息。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that can receive remote control. It is spread by counterfeiting FLASH advertisements, junk mails and infected ZIP package. It can also collect and record the information of system and user.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
从2011年起持续对日本以及韩国的政府机构、防务公司进行APT攻击的相关事件。 

Icefog是一种自2011年开始非常活跃的高级可持续威胁，它主要以日本和韩国为攻击目标。这些特定攻击多依靠鱼叉式钓鱼邮件进行传播并诱导接收人打开恶意附件或点击恶意网站。已知的目标包括政府机构、军事承包商、海事和造船集团、电信运营商、工业和高科技企业以及大众媒体。
family_en_des:
ICEFOG is an Advanced Persistent Threat that has been active since 2011 with Japan and South Korea as its main targets. The known targets include governmental institutions, telecom operators, military contractors, high-tech companies and mass media. The name “ICEFOG” names after a string used in the C&C server in one sample.
These targeted attacks rely on spear-phishing emails that try to trick the victim into opening a mailicious attachment or clicking a website. The spear-phishing emails used several types of exploits against the targets, including Microsoft Office, Java, HLP and HWP.
The attacks involved multiple command and control servers. Most of them were on shared hosting platforms, while some others were using dedicated hosting.
ICEFOG have both Windows and Mac OS X backdoors at their disposal. And the Mac OS X backdoor remains undetected by security solutions currently and has infected hundreds of victims. One of the unusual things of ICEFOG is the nature of “hit and run”. Once the information is obtained, the victim will be dumped.

It is a collection of APT attacks that has been active since 2011 with Japan and South Korea as main targets. These targeted attacks rely on spear-phishing emails that try to trick the victim into opening a malicious attachment or clicking a website.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种非常危险的内存驻留型病毒。它拦截INT3，21h并将自身写入已关闭的.EXE文件的末尾。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of dangerous memory resident parasitic virus that secretly and maliciously integrates itself into program or data files. It hooks INT 3, 21h and writes itself to the end of .EXE files that are closed. It spreads by integrating itself into more files each time the host program is run.
It writes a part of its code into each 16th .COM file that is closed. These files cannot be recovered due to the reason that the original information is not saved. When such file is executed the virus will display "AIDS" in large letters.

family_cn_des: PC-Write木马是X86架构的第一个木马程序。
family_en_des: PC-Write is the first Trojan of X86 architecture.

family_cn_des: 1988年5月13号星期五，一些国家的公司和大学遭到了“耶鲁撒冷”(Jerusalem)病毒的拜访。在这一天，病毒摧毁了电脑上所有想要执行的文件。从某种意义上，“耶路撒冷”病毒首次通过自己的破坏引起了人们对电脑病毒的关注。从欧洲到美洲以及中东都有“耶路撒冷”病毒的报告，该病毒因攻击了耶路撒冷大学而得名。                                耶路撒冷是变种最多的DOS平台病毒。它驻留在内存中，并感染.COM文件和.EXE文件。一些变种也感染.SYS、.BIN和.PIF文件。它每逢13号星期五发作，因此又名“黑色星期五”。
family_en_des:
Jerusalem is a collection of virus that can destroy all the files to be executed. It is named due to the reason that it attacked the Jerusalem University. On May 13, 1988 Friday, some countries’ companies and universities were subjected to "Yale Salem" (Jerusalem) virus. On this day, the virus destroyed all the files you want to perform. 
In some respects, virus Jerusalem attracted the people’ attention for computer virus by its own destroy actions. Reports about it were all over the world from Europe to America and even the Middle East.
Jerusalem is DOS platform virus with the most variants. It stays in memory and infects .com files and .exe files. Some of the variants also infect .sys files, .bin files and .pif files. It attacks on each Friday, the 13th, therefore, it is also known as “The Black Friday”.

family_cn_des: Morris 是第一个由NSA首席科学家莫里斯所写的蠕虫病毒。自从它所拥有的99条代码感染了6000节点并传播后，造成了其大规模爆发并使得互联网崩溃以来，蠕虫病毒就变得众所周知。
family_en_des: Morris is the first worm that written by Morris Sr. (The Chief Scientist of NSA). It had only 99 lines of code which infected 6000 nodes after spreading and made the Internet crash. Since then, worm was well known.

family_cn_des: 它是一种可以接受远程控制、组建僵尸网络、窃取用户信息的间谍木马。它能够持续的通过邮件的方式进行投放。
family_en_des: It is a spy Trojan that is able to receive remote control, organize botnet and steal user’s information. It is dropped through e-mail constantly.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种利用MAX++远程控制软件生成的后门程序，可以利用高级rootkit的特点来隐藏自身。它还能创建一个隐藏的文件系统，下载更多的恶意代码并在受感染计算机中开启后门。
family_en_des: It is a backdoor Trojan that generated by MAX++ remote control software. It uses an advanced rootkit to hide itself. It can also create a hidden file system, download more malware, and open a backdoor on the compromised computer.

family_cn_des:
它是一种通过将自身伪装为安全软件来传播的木马，以发现虚假威胁诱使用户在线充值为目的。
Trojan/J2ME.FakeAV是伪装成反病毒软件故意歪曲用户计算机的安全状态的木马统称。这类木马发出危险信号来恐吓用户，并提示用户购买软件来获取经济上的收益。
FakeAV类家族命名是根据行为来定性的一种家族名，因此这个家族的不同变种之间，很有可能除了仿冒反病毒软件相同行为之外没有任何的关联。
。
FakeAV木马通常利用论坛、邮件连接、网页挂马甚至是驱动下载等方式，欺骗用户安装，运行后释放恶意文件到用户系统目录下，弹出带有安全威胁提示的窗口，并提示用户如果想彻底查杀病毒必须购买软件。当用户真正支付金钱后，恶意软件将删除威胁提示，提示用户电脑完全处于健康的的状态。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of Trojan that disguises itself as security software. The goal of the Trojan is to find fake threats and lure users for online recharging.
FakeAV is a family of Trojans defined according to the same behavior of different variants. It disguises as anti-virus software and deliberately sends fake security warnings to prompt users to purchase anti-virus software so as to make illegal profits.
FakeAV cheats users to install it usually via forum, email, drive-by download or even drivers. After running on a computer, the Trojan will release malicious files to the system directory and pop up security warnings. Then the cheating behavior begins. After the user pays the money, it will tell that the threat has been solved and the computer state is perfect.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
Debris是一种能够在受感染计算机中执行多种恶意活动以窃取个人信息并拦截重要系统共用程序（如任务管理器和注册表编辑器）的蠕虫。
Worm/Win32.Debris是一类主要利用邮件传播的蠕虫。该家族是一个通过代码基因关联定性的蠕虫家族，家族的变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of worm that performs a number of unwanted activities on the compromised system in order to steal the personal information and blocks important system utilities such as task manager and registry editor.
The family of Worm/Win32.Debris is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. The worm mainly spreads via email.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种能够利用P2P、可移动存储介质进行传播的蠕虫病毒，伴生后门功能。它能给攻击者提供对受感染机器的远程访问权限。它由C++语言编写，也是一种Windows应用程序（PE EXE文件）。
family_en_des: It is a worm that spreads by P2P and removable storage media with backdoor functionality associated. It provides attackers with remote access to an infected machine. It is also a Windows application (PE EXE file) and written in C++.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种能够感染不同驱动器中的EXE文件并从受感染计算机中收集用户凭证的病毒家族。它还允许对受感染计算机的后门访问和控制权限，并降低了I.E.的安全设置。此感染型病毒的感染代码中包含窃取信息的例程，这一行为在感染型病毒中并不常见。
family_en_des: It is a virus that infects EXE files in all drives and collects user credentials from an infected computer. It also allows backdoor access and control to the infected computer, and lowers I.E. security settings. The infective code contains routines of stealing information.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一个通过网络驱动和可移动驱动器来传播的蠕虫家族。它也能下载并执行任意文件，还能利用7004接口联络远程主机，以便向该蠕虫的作者报告新的感染体并接收远程黑客的指令。
family_en_des: It is a family of worms that spreads via network drives and removable drives. It may also download and execute arbitrary files. It may contact a remote host using port 7004 to report a new infection to its author and receive instruction from a remote hacker.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种多态感染型病毒，以Windows可执行文件为目标。同时它可以利用微软的快捷方式漏洞传播(MS10-046)，快捷方式漏洞也可能通过邮件到达被感染客户端。一些变种还可通过可移动设备的自动运行来传播。
family_en_des: It is a family of polymorphic file infectors targeting Windows executable files. It can run a damaging payload deleting files with specific extensions while also killing security-related processes and services. It spreads by using the Microsoft shortcut vulnerability (MS10-046).
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种多线程的多态感染型的网络蠕虫，能够传播至其他连接了本地网络的计算机中并对特定的远程网站进行拒绝服务攻击。它利用网络共享进行传播，它能够在网络中通过发送完整且独立的副本来完成自我复制。
family_en_des: It is a multi-threaded, polymorphic network worm that can spread to other computers connected to a LAN and performing DoS attacks against targeted remote web sites. It replicates by sending complete and independent copies of itself over networks.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种多态的文件感染型病毒，能够在本地文件系统和可写网络共享中，感染Windows可执行性文件。反过来，受感染的文件会通过执行操作来感染其他文件。
family_en_des: It is a family of polymorphic file infectors that infects Windows executable files with .exe and .scr extensions on the local file system and writeable network shares. In turn, the infected files perform operations that cause other files to become infected. (When it is executed in the first time, it would create a temporary file and the file name is on random.)
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种文件感染型病毒，能够感染受损系统中的.exe和.scr文件。它还能通过连接IRC服务器来开启后门，允许远程攻击者在受感染计算机中下载并运行文件。
family_en_des: It is a family of file infecting viruses that target and infect .EXE and .SCR files on infected systems. It also opens a backdoor by connecting to an IRC server, allowing a remote hacker to download and run files on the infected computer.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
它是一种多态感染型病毒，能够感染Windows可执行文件。它利用文件感染、邮件附件、网络共享、可移动驱动器和刻录光盘等方式进行传播。它包含一个基于日期的负载，能够以特殊扩展名对文件进行加密处理。
Worm/Win32.Mabezat是一类利用邮件，HTTP和移动存储设备传播的蠕虫，Mabezat家族蠕虫具有相同或相似的源码或核心技术实现方法，因此该家族命名是由代码基因关联定性的。                  成功感染用户计算机之后，Mabezat家族蠕虫搜索计算机中的有效邮件地址，并群发带毒邮件。邮件内容是随机生成的，可以引诱收件人打开邮件附件。此家族蠕虫加密用户硬盘中的大量文件并在硬盘分区创建autorun文件使本家族蠕虫可以随着用户打开硬盘分区而启动。Mabezat蠕虫可以通过局域网和移动存储设备进行传播。
family_en_des:
It is a polymorphic virus that infects Windows executable files. It attempts to spread via file infection, e-mail attachments, network shares, removable drives and CD-burning. It contains a date-based payload that encrypts files with particular extensions.
Worm/Win32.Mabezat is a collection of worm that spreads via e-mails, HTTP and removable devices. This family is characterized by code gene, and variants have the same or similar source code and core technologies.                                        After infecting user's computer, it will search the available e-mail addresses and sends malicious e-mails. The a-mail content is generated randomly, which leads the addressees to open the attachment. It propagetes via LAN and removable devices.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: Bound家族是感染式程序。使用VBS编写。该病毒通过将代码植入计算机或网络中的其他文件而传播。被其感染的程序可能无法正常运行。
family_en_des: Bound is a family of infecting programs written in VBS. This virus spreads by attaching its code to other files on your PC or network. Some of the infected programs might no longer run correctly.

family_cn_des:
它是一种利用邮件进行传播的蠕虫。其中文名为“路德尔”。它也是蠕虫和感染PE文件的文件感染型病毒的结合体。它还能感染.RAR文件夹（无论该文件夹是否包含exe文件）。这一病毒家族的样本存活历史较长，并且感染量较多。
Worm/Win32.Luder家族蠕虫具有相同或相似的源码或核心技术实现方法，因此该家族命名是由代码基因关联定性的。此家族蠕虫具有多种传播方式，它可以通过移动存储设备传播，捆绑在恶意网站上，或者由其他木马文件下载。                                 该家族蠕虫参与了2013年5月对巴西银行用户的攻击。它捆绑在银行专用的浏览器上，当用户下载并使用该浏览器登陆网上银行时，蠕虫窃取用户的银行账户密码等信息并发送给指定的服务器。
family_en_des:
It is a worm that spreads via e-mail and also a combination of worm and file infector of PE files. It can also infects .RAR archive files (no matter if they contain EXE files or not). The family has a long history and is still active with large amount of infections.
Worm/Win32.Luder is a collection of worm that spreads via several ways, such as removable devices, bundling with malicious websites or downloading by other malwre. This family is characterized by code gene, and variants have the same or similar source code and core technologies.                                             It is involved with the attack against Banco do Brazil in May, 2013. It is bundled with the dedicated browser. When users downloads and uses the browser to log on their online bank, it will steal user's accounts and passwords and send to the appointed server.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一种多态文件感染型病毒，通过感染本地文件和网络驱动器进行传播。它能感染Windows可执行文件（PE）。当感染文件时，该病毒会利用入口点模糊技术（EPO）。
family_en_des: It is a family of polymorphic file viruses that spread by infecting local files and network drives. It infects Windows executable files (PE). When infecting files the virus uses an entry point obscuring (EPO) technique.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
该家族是近年来安卓平台上最为活跃的恶意代码家族之一，该家族的恶意软件有诱导用户发送扣费短信，同时拦截回执短信，私自下载未知文件，上传手机固件信息、收件箱短信等行为，会给用户造成资费消耗和隐私泄露。
此类病毒通常会伪装成流行的合法应用程序引诱用户下载，如：流行游戏、播放器或浏览器等。一旦感染这类病毒，它会在不经用户同意的情况下向付费号码发送短信，给用户造成经济损失，而且它有大量的变种。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of Trojan that is one of the most active families on Android. It has the following malicious actions: luring users to send charging SMSs and intercepting return SMSs, downloading unknown files, uploading mobile phone firmware information and the SMSs in the inbox and so on.
It is a collection of Trojan that disguises itself as legal appliacion (such as popular games, media player or browser) to seduce user into downloading. After infecting user's device, it sends messages to the paid number without user's notice. This family owns a lot of variants.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 该家族的恶意软件会利用安卓系统签名漏洞，伪装成正常程序的合法签名。该家族的主要恶意行为表现在自动向通讯录联系人发未知短信，有拦截短信并自动回复短信的能力，可能会给用户造成恶意扣费的影响。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that uses Android signature vulnerability to disguise as legal signature of normal programs. The main malicious actions include: sending unknown SMSs to the contacts automatically, intercepting and replying SMSs and so on.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 该家族是安卓平台一款专门针对银行类的伪装应用。该恶意软件可能会给用户带来较大的经济损失。该应用运行后通过诱导用户输入相应账户、密码等信息进行验证，会上传以上重要的隐私信息至远程服务器，给用户带来隐私泄露，继而可能带来较大的经济损失。
family_en_des: It is a kind of camouflage application on Android against banks exclusively. It makes great economic loss for users. After executing, it verifies by luring user to input the corresponding accounts and passwords and uploads the important privacy information to the remote server.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 此家族是流氓应用的典型代表。主要恶意行为表现在未经用户允许后私自下载推广软件，给用户造成资费损耗。
family_en_des: It is a typical collection of rouge application. It is able to download marketing software without user’s permission, which leads to fee-consumption for users.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 该家族的恶意软件会窃取用户好友的qq号码，qq音乐内的播放记录，用户联系人信息，用户浏览器书签等隐私信息。此外部分变种还利用了安卓系统短信欺诈漏洞。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan on Android that steals privacy information, including QQ number, the play records of QQ Music, the browser bookmarks and so on. Parts of it use Android SMS vulnerability to cheat users by disguising as SMSs.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 此家族对用户手机安全的影响较大。该家族的恶意软件会开机自启动，拥有自动在后台联网下载推广软件并静默安装的能力，给用户造成资费消耗。
family_en_des: It is a mobile Trojan that has great effects on the mobile phone safety. It is able to auto-start, download and install the marketing software automatically on the backend, which results in fee-consumption.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 它是一款带有恶意推广应用的软件。通过欺骗，强制推广等方式来诱导用户点击进行下载推广软件，具有一定的流氓性质，给用户手机安全带来不良影响。
family_en_des: It is a kind of malware with malicious marketing application. It lures users to click and download the marketing software by cheating and forced promotion. It has the rouge nature to a certain degree and adversely affects the safety of user’s mobile phone.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: Trojan[Spy]/Win32.Lydra是监视盗取用户信息的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。Lydra感染用户系统后，会收集系统的记录和用户信息，并将这些数据发送给指定的服务器。
family_en_des:
The family of Lydra is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will collect and record user data, then send the data to a specified server.

family_cn_des: 它是近年较活跃，而且对用户危害较大的家族之一。此家族的恶意软件的特点在于会首先判断该手机是否安装了安全软件，以此决定是否运行恶意软件。主要的恶意行为表现在上传用户隐私信息，后台私自发送扣费信息订阅付费服务，屏蔽回执短信等等，给用户造成资费消耗和严重的隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan on Android that poses high risks for users. It will determine whether the mobile phone installs security software firstly, then deciding whether to execute malware or not. It leads to fee-charging and great privacy leaks.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 该家族的恶意软件主要行为是通过上传用户手机电话号码、IMEI号等隐私信息至远程服务器，诱导用户安装其他恶意软件，对用户的隐私安全和造成一定程度的威胁。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan on Android that discovered on July 2, 2012. It lures users to install other malware by uploading the mobile phone numbers and IMEI numbers of user to remote servers. It threatens user’s privacy security to a certain degree.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 该家族到目前为止共有11个变种。此恶意软件有私自下载其他恶意软件，上传用户个人隐私信息及执行发送短信等行为，给用户造成资费消耗和隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that has 11 variants by now. It can download other malware without notice, upload user personal information and send SMSs, which will lead to fee-consumption and privacy leaks.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 该家族主要是利用安卓短信漏洞，通过联网获取伪造的短信内容和号码，可能向用户发送广告短信，弹出恶意广告，诱导用户点击后下载推广软件，给用户带来经济等方面的损失，危害性较大。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that mainly makes use of Android SMS vulnerabilities. It gains the disguised contents and numbers by networking. It may send ads to users, pop-up malicious ads, lure users to download marketing software. It may bring economic loss to users with high risks.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
2011年2月美国安全公司McAfee报告称，夜龙行动是一些针对西方能源公司进行的有组织、隐蔽的且有针对性的网络间谍活动。报告将这些袭击事件命名为“夜龙”，并称“夜龙”行动至少在2009年末就已在进行，而实际发生时间甚至可能早在2007年，并称袭击活动目前仍在继续。
夜龙攻击与极光行动以及其他高级可持续威胁非常相似，都将社会工程学与特定的网络攻击相结合，利用木马、远程控制软件及其它恶意代码。不同于Stuxnet的是，该攻击所使用的工具和技术并不是特定针对基础设施的，可用来对任一行业发起攻击。迈克菲公司的首席技术官George Kurtz说，此次行动的攻击者使用了各种不同的黑客技术，但是使用的方法和工具都相对简单。[1]
据美国《华尔街日报》2011年2月10日的报道，美国网络安全公司迈克菲发表报告称，已经有5家西方跨国能源公司遭到“来自中国”的黑客“有组织、隐蔽 有针对性”的攻击。
超过千兆字节的敏感文件被窃取，包括油气田操作的机密信息、项目融资与投标文件等。迈克菲公司发表报告称，这场网络间谍行动代号为夜龙（night dragon）最早可能可能开始于2007年，而目前该攻击行动仍在持续。
family_en_des:
According McAfee’s report, it is an “organized, stealthy and targeted” APT attack mainly against energy companies of the western countries. These attack incidents were named as “night dragon”. It might have started from 2007 and is still continuing currently.
Operation Nighe Dragon is an Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) that are similar with Operation Aurora and other APTs in combining the social engineering with targeted network attacks. It makes use of Trojan, remote control software and other malware. What is different from Stuxnet is that the tools and techniques it uses can attack any industries instead of targeting infrastructures specifically. George Kurtz ( CTO of McAfee ) said, the attacker behind this operation used different kinds of hacker skills, but the methods and tools were relatively simple.
According to the report of The Wall Street Journal (February 10, 2011), American network security company McAfee said in its report that there were 5 western international companies suffered this “organized, stealthy and targeted” attack. More than gigabytes data has been stolen, including the confidential information of oil and gas fields, project financing, tender documents and so on. McAfee also said in its report that this operation that named Night Dragon might have started from 2007 and is still continuing currently.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 这次被称为Kimsuky的攻击行动范围有限，但具有极高的针对性。根据技术分析，攻击者的攻击目标主要为11个位于韩国的组织。其中包括世宗研究院、韩国国防分析研究所(KIDA)、韩国统一部、现代商船公司以及一些支持朝鲜半岛统一的组织。
family_en_des: Kimsuky is a kind of highly targeted APT attack with limited operation scope. According to the technical analysis, the main objectives are 11 organizations located in Sorth Korea. The targets contain the Sejong Institute, KIDA and so on.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 过去三年来 Trojan.Taidoor 被普遍应用在具有针对性的攻击上面，尤其是在 2011 年5 月过后，其攻击活动大幅增加，其目前的主要目标为与美国和台湾安全事务上有关的私人企业和具有影响力的国际智囊团，在这些组织中的服务部门的设施也有可能成为目标之一，也就是作为攻击主要对象的攻击传播媒介。
family_en_des: It is an APT attack that has lasted for 3 years. There is a substantial increase of attack activities after May 2011. The main objectives are the private enterprises and powerful international think tanks that are related with national security affairs between America and Taiwan.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 红色十月是一次高级网络间谍行动，攻击者至少从2007年就开始活动，主要集中针对全球多个国家的外交和政府机构发动攻击。它利用了1000多个可识别的模块和3个已经的微软漏洞，并根据目标的不同制造特定的攻击行为。
family_en_des: It is a large-scale cyber espionage campaign that has lasted for 5 years. It uses more than 1,000 identifiable modules and 3 known different Microsoft vulnerabilities, making custom attacks according to the difference of targets.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: APT是当前企业和组织面临的最严峻的安全威胁。在APT攻击中，攻击者投入大量人力、财力和时间，综合运用社会工程学以及零日漏洞，进行目的明确的针对性攻击，造成严重的损失。在APT攻击中，恶意代码，尤其是利用漏洞的恶意代码，扮演了极其重要的角色。
family_en_des: APT is the most dangerous threat that both enterprise and organization confront. During APT attack, the attacker invests many human and financial resources and a lot of time, comprehensively using social engineering and zero-day vulnerability to carry out targeted attacks with clear purposes, which will result in heavy damages. The malware, especially the one that uses vulnerabilities, plays a significant role during APT attack.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: 泛化威胁是指在各类非通用操作系统、工业控制系统、网络设备、其他基础硬件设施、可穿戴设备中相继出现的相关恶意代码威胁和漏洞。
family_en_des: It refers to the related malware threats and vulnerabilities that have appeared one after another in various non-generic operation systems, industrial control systems, network devices, other hardware infrastructure and wearable devices.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Bagle[Email-Worm]是一类主要通过邮件进行传播的蠕虫统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                    Bagle也被称为Beagle，是一个通过邮件大量传播的蠕虫病毒。它感染了计算机后，会将自身拷贝到系统目录，并且在TCP端口开启一个后门。此家族蠕虫会自动搜索特定扩展名的文件，如邮件地址簿、文本文件、网页类型文件等，从中分析并提取邮件地址，然后通过自带的发送引擎自动对外发送病毒邮件。其发送的邮件一般主题为“Hi”，邮件附件为.exe可执行类型文件。
family_en_des:
The family of Worm/Win32.Bagle[Email-Worm] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
Bagle is also called Beagle. The worm spreads by email. After infecting a computer, it copies itself into the system directory and opens a backdoor in TCP port. It searches files with specified extension names, extracts email addresses from these files and sends malicious email via its own engine. The subject is usually “Hi” and the attachment is usually an executable file.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Geral[Downloader]是一类自动下载其他恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Geral家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Geral[Downloader] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will change the system settings, download and execute various malwares.

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Fipp是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                    Fipp家族蠕虫一般具有多态性，主要感染计算机中的.exe可执行文件。该家族蠕虫可以通过开放的远程共享进行传播。它能够搜索到开启了远程桌面的系统并将其感染。
family_en_des:
The family of Worm/Win32.Fipp is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The worms in this family are usually polymorphic. They mainly infect .exe files and spread via open remote sharing. They are able to find the system which has opened the function of remote desktop and infect it.

family_cn_des: Trojan/JS.Twetti[Exploit]是一类通过漏洞攻击用户系统的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                         Twetti家族木马利用了Twitter网站服务的跨网站脚本漏斗对用户进行攻击。当用户登录到Twitter时，攻击者可以利用此漏洞读取用户浏览器的cookies，盗取用户信息。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/JS.Twetti[Exploit] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
The Trojan exploits the cross-site scripting vulnerabilities of Twitter web service. When a user logs in Twitter, the attacker is able to read the cookies of web browser and steals user data.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Boot.SST[Rootkit]是一类使用了Rootkit技术的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                  RootKit本身并不具有破坏行为，它通常用来隐藏其他木马等恶意程序，使之逃过反病毒软件的检测。它功能强大，能够隐藏文件，注册表信息，网络连接信息，甚至是程序执行时的内存信息。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Boot.SST[Rootkit] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
The Trojan employs Rootkit technique which is not malicious itself. But Rootkit usually hides other malware to escape from detection of antivirus software. It is so powerful to hide files, registry, Network Connections and even the memory data when a program running.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Clons[Dropper]是一类释放恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Clons家族木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放出其他恶意程序，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Clons[Dropper] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
After infecting a system, the Trojan will release other malware to make the attack.

family_cn_des: Virus/BeOS.Kate是一类在BeOS系统下运行的病毒。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。       BeOS的设计理念是专门用于多媒体处理的“多媒体操作系统”，采用先进的64位BeFS文件系统，支持多处理器，其多媒体性能异常优越。其官方最后的版本是5.03版，随后Be公司于2001年被Palm公司以1100万收购，不再发布官方版本。
family_en_des:
The family of Virus/BeOS.Kate is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. The viruses of this family run in BeOS. 
BeOS is a multimedia operating system equipped with advanced 64-bit file system. It has excellent multimedia performance. The latest official version is 5.03. The Be corporation was taken over by Palm in 2000. No official version is published after that.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.PePatch[Constructor]是一类能够自动释放或生成其他恶意程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                      PePatch家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，释放或生成其他恶意程序，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.PePatch[Constructor] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a system, the Trojan will change the system settings, releases or generates other malware and make the attack.

family_cn_des: HackTool/Win32.FraudLoad[Hoax]是一类伪装欺诈用户的黑客工具。此家族是一个通过行为来定性的黑客工具家族，因此这个家族的不同变种之间，很有可能除了都存在伪装数据加载的行为之外没有任何的关联。                                      Fraudload通常对系统不具有任何危害。它主要感染那些经常免费下载电影和软件的用户。被感染的网页声称可以让用户下载想要的内容，但用户首先需要发送一条付费信息。但是，用户发送后，只会受到虚假的文件或者是恶意程序。
family_en_des:
The family of Hacktool/Win32.FraudLoad[Hoax] is defined according to the same behavior of the family members. Different variants may have nothing relevant except for the same behavior of fraud load. 
Fraudload is not harmful to the system. It mainly infects those users who download movies and software for free. The infected website claims that the user can get what they want to download from it. But when the user finishes sending a charged message, what he gets may be only a false file or a malicious program.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Hidrag的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                      Hidrag病毒是一个内存驻留型病毒。它会感染本机固定磁盘上的所有PE可执行文件，并加密原文件的资源节，导致被感染后的文件不能正常运行。
family_en_des:
The family of Virus/Win32.Hidrag is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
It is a memory-resident virus which is able to infect all PE files in fixed disk and encrypt the resource section of the original file. It is resulted that the infected file cannot run normally.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.BlackHole[Backdoor]是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              BlackHole家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。    BlackHole是一个木马入侵的工具软件。此软件允许攻击者对受害者的电脑进行远程控制，它还带有追踪信息的功能，会显示受害者的电脑状态信息，例如操作系统版本，浏览器版本等。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.BlackHole[Backdoor] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan exploits vulnerabilities to open the backdoor server when running on a computer. The attacker takes over the computer via the client. 
BlackHole is tool software which allows the attacker to make remote control of the infected computer. It also has the tracking capability to expose the system data.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Mapler[PSW]是一类盗取用户账户密码等信息的木马统称。此家族是是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                       Mapler家族木马侵入用户系统后，会搜索存储账户密码信息的文件，找到后会通过邮件，FTP上传等方式将文件传送给木马操控者。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Mapler[PSW] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a system, it will search user accounts and passwords, and then send the data to the attacker via email, FTP or other approaches.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Azbreg[Backdoor]是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Azbreg家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Azbreg[Backdoor] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
When running on a computer, the Trojan exploits vulnerabilities to open backdoor server and the attacker takes over the computer via the client.

family_cn_des: RiskWare/Win32.ProcPatcher是一种具有一定风险的工具软件，通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。该软件存在一定的风险，其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。                                                       ProcPatcher是一个替代Windows资源管理器的软件，它包含了更强的功能，并允许用户直接读取内存中的内容。该软件可以创建，管理和终止任务进程。它内部的十六位编辑器可以将内存中的数据以16进制形式或者是文档形式输出。在Debug模式下，它可以关闭任何系统服务。
family_en_des:
The family of RiskWare/Win32.ProcPatcher are software tools of certain risk. They are usually commercial, free and open-sourced. The software itself has no malicious functions, but its vulnerability may be exploited by other viruses or Trojans.  
ProPatcher is a software substituted for Windows Explorer. It is so powerful to allow the user to read the memory data. It is able to create, manage and terminate any process. Its 16-bit editor can output data with 16-bit or file form. In Debug module, it can even terminate any system service.

family_cn_des: Trojan/DOS.PS-MPC-based是一个通过编译器来定性的病毒家族，家族变种都是采用PS-MPC病毒制作器编写的。                                      PS-MPC自身不具有感染文件或破坏系统的行为。它是一个病毒制作工具，可以制作具有多种破坏能力的病毒。
family_en_des:
The members in the family of Virus/DOS.PS-MPC-based are all written by PS-MPC virus creator. 
PS-MPC can not infect any file. It is a virus creator which is able to produce many malicious and harmful viruses.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Invader的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Invader家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Invader is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Different variants of the family may have different risks such as downloading other malware and allowing the attacker to make remote control.

family_cn_des: EICAR是一个测试文件。测试文件是一种通过测试手段达到某种目的的文件，其本身并不具有任何破坏的功能。                                        EICAR测试文件是由欧洲计算机防病毒研究所（EICAR）和计算机反病毒研究组织（CARO）共同提出的用来测试杀毒软件反应的文件。相比于使用真正的恶意程序来测试，这种方法没有风险，因为测试文件不具有任何破坏功能。
family_en_des:
A test file is a harmless file used to achieve some purpose through the testing process. 
The EICAR test file is a computer file developed by the European Institute for Computer Antivirus Research (EICAR) and Computer Antivirus Research Organization (CARO). It is created to test antivirus programs. The test file is able to replace a real virus to finish the test process without doing any damage.

family_cn_des: HackTool/Win32.SecurityShield[Hoax]是一类伪装欺诈用户的黑客工具。此家族是一个通过行为来定性的黑客工具家族，因此这个家族的不同变种之间，很有可能除了都伪装为SecurityShield软件之外没有任何的关联。                                         SecurityShield通常对系统不具有任何危害。它通过警告信息等对用户进行欺骗，诱使用户购买其软件保护系统而使欺诈者获利，其出售的软件通常没有任何实际作用。
family_en_des:
The members in the family of HackTool/Win32.SecurityShield[Hoax] are hacktools tricking users via displaying warning information. The hacktool prompts the user to buy the specified software to protect the system and makes profits. But the software is usually of no actual use. 
Different variants of this family may have nothing relevant except for the same behavior of disguising as SecurityShield.

family_cn_des: Trojan/DOS.Andromeda的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Andromeda家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。                                                   Andromeda代表仙女座，希腊神话中古埃塞俄比亚的公主。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/DOS.Andromeda is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The variants of this family may have such risks as downloading other malware and allowing the attacker to make remote control. 
Andromeda is the representative of the medieval princess of Ethiopia in Greek mythology.

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Fujack[Constructor]的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                            Fujack蠕虫可以感染文件和在网页上添加恶意链接。它可以通过移动存储设备和局域网进行传播。该家族蠕虫具有反查杀的能力，它可以关闭杀毒软件的进程并禁用Windows的任务管理器。
family_en_des:
The family of Worm/Win32.Fujack[Constructor] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The worm is able to infect files and add malicious link on Internet. It spreads via USB and LAN. It has also the ability to terminate the process of antivirus software and disable the task manger of Windows.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Chydo的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Chydo家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Chydo is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Different variants may have different risks, such as downloading other malware and allowing the attacker to make remote control.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Tenga的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。          Tenga病毒是一个典型的感染病毒，主要感染PE可执行文件，被感染的文件长度将增加。此家族病毒还具有蠕虫的部分特性，能够通过开放的网络共享进行传播。
family_en_des:
The family of Virus/Win32.Tenga is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After a PE file being infected by the virus, the length of the file will be increased. The viruses in this family also have some worm-like features which spread via open network sharing.

family_cn_des:
Trojan[GameThief]/Win32.Pincav是对针对网络游戏用户进行侵害的木马的统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
Pincav木马通常被攻击者用来盗取网络游戏账号、密码和其他的虚拟财产信息进行牟利。此家族木马具有多种窃取用户信息的方法，包括劫持用户的输入，获取本地的配置信息、获取内存数据、监听网络数据包等。在获取到信息后，木马会通过电子邮件、HTTP提交、Socket接口等不同方式，将用户的信息转移给攻击者。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[GameThief]/Win32.Pincav is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan steals the account, passwords and other virtual belongings to make profits. It has many stealing methods including hijacking user input, obtaining local configuration data and memory data as well as monitoring network data package. After getting these data, the Trojan send them to the attacker via email, HTTP, Socket and other approaches.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Constructor]/Win32.LdPinch是一类能够制作或生成恶意程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                       LdPinch家族木马主要用来窃取用户的账户密码等信息。在侵入用户系统后，它会搜索存储账户密码信息的文件，然后会通过邮件，FTP上传等方式将文件传送给木马操控者。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Constructor]/Win32.LdPinch is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a system, it will search the file with accounts and passwords in it and send them to the attack via email, FTP or other approaches.

family_cn_des: Worm[Email]/Win32.Brontok是一类主要通过邮件进行传播的蠕虫统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                Brontok家族蠕虫会在系统中的许多关键位置储存一份自身的备份，把自己伪装成视窗自带的文件，修改注册表实现开机自启动。它会收集计算机里的邮箱地址，并发送带有感染文件的邮件。 此家族蠕虫具有反删除能力，在特定条件下会重新启动计算机。                                       Brontok蠕虫产自印度尼西亚。它的名字源于一种生活在东南亚的鸟——凤头鹰雕。因为代码中存在一段文字信息显示出部分社会团体观点，所以此家族蠕虫被认为是黑客行动主义（指因政治或社团目的而进行黑客行为）的代表。
family_en_des:
The family of Worm[Email]/Win32.Brontok is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The worm stores its backup in many key system locations, disguises as a Widows file, changes the registry to realize the self-starting function when machine is on. It will also collect the emal addresses in a computer and send infected file as attachment. The worm is able to protect itself from being deleted and restart the computer in specified condition. 
The worm, born from Indonesia, is named after a South East Asian bird. The worm shows in it codes the opinions of some social groups, thus believed as the representative of Hacktivism which hacks for political reason.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.ArcadeWeb是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是通过行为来定性的灰色软件家族，家族的不同变种之间，很可能除了都推送ArcadeWeb网站的广告之外没有任何的关联。                                       ArcadeWeb软件是服务于ArcadeWeb网站的广告软件，其不仅进行广告推送，还会收集系统中的用户信息。ArcadeWeb网站提供多种免费的网页游戏以吸引用户。
family_en_des:
The family of GrayWare[AdWare]/Win32.ArcadeWeb is defined according to the same behavior of its variants.
The software serves in the website of ArcadeWeb. The major feature of the grayware is to displays ads. Otherwise, it collects the user data in system by providing various free web games.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.RivalGame是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        RivalGame家族软件主要通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中进行传播，在安装时一般不告知用户其存在，在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。
family_en_des:
The family of GrayWare[AdWare]/Win32.RivalGame is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
It spreads by being bundled with other software and is installed in a system quietly. After being executed, it will display pop-ups.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Sahat是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Sahat家族软件主要通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中进行传播，在安装时一般不告知用户其存在，在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。
family_en_des:
The family of GrayWare[AdWare]/Win32.Sahat is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
It spreads by being bundled with other software and is installed in a system quietly. After being executed, it will display pop-ups.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Lipler是一类自动下载其他恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Lipler家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Lipler is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a system, the Trojan will change the system settings, download and execute various malware.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Rootkit]/Win32.Bancos是一类使用了Rootkit技术的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。  Bancos家族木马主要用来盗取用户的账户密码等机密信息。其侵入用户系统后，会搜索存储账户密码信息的文件，找到后会通过邮件，FTP上传等方式将文件传送给木马操控者。                                                                RootKit本身并不具有破坏行为，它通常用来隐藏其他木马等恶意程序，使之逃过反病毒软件的检测。它功能强大，能够隐藏文件，注册表信息，网络连接信息，甚至是程序执行时的内存信息。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Rootkit]/Win32.Bancos is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a system, it will search user accounts and passwords, and then send the data to the attacker via email, FTP or other approaches. 
The Trojan employs Rootkit technique which is not malicious itself. But Rootkit usually hides other malware to escape from detection of antivirus software. It is so powerful to hide files, registry, Network Connections and even the memory data when a program running.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Packed]/Win32.NSAnti家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。            NSAnti是由启发式扫描引擎发现的一类病毒，启发式扫描能够主动发现被NSAnti压缩的新型病毒。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Packed]/Win32.NSAnti is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The family of NSAnti is detected by heuristic scanning engine which is able to find new types of zip viruses.

family_cn_des: SMA家族是一类寡态隐藏式病毒，能够影响运行Win9X系统的程序。SMA是网络病毒，能够特定IP地址或许任意代码并执行。
family_en_des: SMA is a family of oligomorphic stealth virus infecting programs running in Win9X system. It is network-aware and has a payload that runs arbitrary code that originates from a specific IP address.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Ransom]/Win32.Birele是一类劫持用户系统并索要赎金的木马家族的统称。此家族是一个通过通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                                                    Birele家族木马主要通过勒索用户使其制作者获利。勒索类的木马一般通过下载或系统漏洞感染用户系统。部分勒索木马在运行时加密用户的数据，用户支付赎金给软件制作者后才能解密数据。另一种勒索木马不采用加密方式，直接锁定用户的系统，支付赎金后才能解锁。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Ransom]/Win32.Birele is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojans in this family hijack the user systems and demands for random. Some Trojans infect the system by downloading other malwares or exploiting the system vulnerability. Some Trojans encrypt the user data or lock the user system to ask for random.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Ransom]/Boot.Mbro是一类劫持用户系统并索要赎金的木马家族的统称。此家族是一个通过通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                                                    Mbro家族木马主要通过勒索用户使其制作者获利。勒索类的木马一般通过下载或系统漏洞感染用户系统。部分勒索木马在运行时加密用户的数据，用户支付赎金给软件制作者后才能解密数据。另一种勒索木马不采用加密方式，直接锁定用户的系统，支付赎金后才能解锁。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Ransom]/Boot.Mbro is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojans in this family hijack the user systems and demands for random. Some Trojans infect the system by downloading other malwares or exploiting the system vulnerability. Some Trojans encrypt the user data or lock the user system to ask for random.

family_cn_des: Worm[Email]/Win32.Klez是一类主要通过邮件进行传播的蠕虫统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。            Klez蠕虫侵入系统后，会搜索当前用户的地址簿文件中的邮件地址，或随机生成邮件地址，通过SMTP服务器发送自己，该邮件会在OUTLOOK EXPRESS下自动执行，无需用户打开，危害性很大。                       Klez被称为“求职信”的原因是其代码中有一段作者自述的文字，此文字写到作者想要找份好工作。作者还向反病毒研究员指出了各个变种新增加功能的技术特征，以显示自己的技术水平。
family_en_des:
The family of Worm[Email]/Win32.Klez is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a system, the worm will search the email addresses in present address book or it will generate new addresses randomly. The worm then sends itself via the SMTP server and executes itself in OUTLOOK EXPRESS without user operation.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Wabot是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Wabot家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Wabot is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
When running on a computer, The Trojan exploits the system or other vulnerabilities to open the backdoor server and make remote control.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.PEF13C的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                PEF13C家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.PEF13C is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The members in this family may have various malicious behaviors such as downloading other malware, allowing the attacker to make remote control and so on.

family_cn_des: Grayware[Monitor]/Win32.Perflogger是一个监视系统行为的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                  Perflogger灰色软件在安装进系统之后会监视记录系统的状态信息，例如进程状态，网络流量等。其本身除了收集数据外并没有其他破坏能力，但是此软件可能被攻击者利用对用户系统进行监视。
family_en_des:
The family of GrayWare[Monitor]/Win32.Perflogger is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After running in a system, the grayware will monitor the system status information such as the process status, the network traffic and so on. Except for collecting data, the grayware has no other malicious purpose, but it may be used by the attacker to monitor the system.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Plite是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Plite家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Plite is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
When running on a computer, The Trojan exploits the system or other vulnerabilities to open the backdoor server and make remote control.

family_cn_des: PlagSoft家族是风险软件类程序。该家族样本是使用NSIS打包生成的安装包程序，运行后会释放文件到系统文件夹，可能会捆绑其它软件，具有一定风险。
family_en_des: PlagSoft is a collection risktool program. Samples of this family are installation programs generated by using NSIS package. It will release files to the system archive after running. It may be bundled with other kind of software, which poses risks to some degree.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Skillis的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Skillis家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Skillis is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The members in this family may have various malicious behaviors such as downloading other malware, allowing the attacker to make remote control and so on.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Elkern的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Elkern病毒具有多态性，并且具有通过网络传播的能力。它通常由Klez蠕虫携带进入用户系统，因此两个恶意程序的作者应为同一人。于Klez相比，Elkern的破坏力更加强大。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Elkern is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Elkern is polymorphic and is able to spread on Internet. Usually, it is dropped by KLez to a user system. It is reasonable to believe that the writer of the two kinds of viruses is the same person. Compared with Klez, Ellkern is more powerful and destructive.

family_cn_des:
Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Bifrose一类是利用TCP协议通信实现远程控制的后门类木马，亦称“Bifrost”。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
Bifrose木马是发现时间较早且非常流行的一种后门，和曾经猖獗一时的“灰鸽子”近似，都可以入侵的计算机，执行管理运行的进程、修改文件或注册表数据、获取安装程序细节、记录击键，屏幕捕获、系统关机或重新启动等操作，有些变种会偷录用户使用的的麦克风，控制用户摄像头等
Bifrose后门一般自身并没有主动传播能力，一般通过“文件捆绑”、“邮件伪装”、“游戏外挂”等方式进行传播。病毒主要目的为设立后门，控制用户的计算机，进而组建起庞大的僵尸网络，发起DDoS攻击或者贩卖受控主机。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Bifrose is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The backdoor Trojan gets remote control of the infected computer via TCP protocol communication. 
Detected quite early, the Trojan is widely spread. Similar to Huigon, Brifrose is also able to infect the computer, execute processes, modify files or registry data, obtain the installation program details, record keystrokes, capture screenshots, shut down or reboot the system. Some variants of the family can even record the microphone data and control the camera. 
In general, the Trojan can’t propagate by itself. It usually spread via being bundled with files, email attachments and game plug-ins. The main purpose is to establish backdoors, control the infected computer, and then set up a large botnet, launch DDoS attacks or sell the controlled host.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Crytex家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
family_en_des: The family of Virus/Win32.Crytex is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Yakes家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                      Yakes家族木马可以通过白名单的机制绕过系统防火墙，获取系统的最高权限，具有下载恶意程序，监控用户操作等行为。此家族木马会在执行完后删除自身，隐秘性很高。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Yakes is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to bypass the firewall via whitelist and obtain the highest permission level. After infecting a computer, it will download malicious programs, monitor the user operations or perform other malicious behaviors. After executing itself, it will delete itself totally.

family_cn_des: Trojan[FakeAV]/Win32.SmartFortress2012是一类伪装成反病毒程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                        SmartFortress2012家族木马一般自身并没有主动传播能力，其往往基于伪装成反病毒程序或其他应用软件欺骗用户下载执行。此家族木马执行之后会发出虚假警报，提示用户计算机有安全威胁，并锁定整个系统，使任何程序都不能运行。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[FakeAV]/Win32.SmartFortress2012 is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan cannot propagate by itself.  It usually disguises as an antivirus program or other application to induce the user to download and execute it. Once running in the computer, the Trojan will make a false alarm to warn the user of potential security threats and lock the system to disable the whole processes.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Blocker是一类释放恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          该家族木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放出其他恶意程序，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Blocker is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will release other malware to do damage to the user system.

family_cn_des: Menti能够通过执行恶意行为来删除、屏蔽、修改或复制数据，破坏计算机或网络性能，但上述行为都这不能用于分类。Menti包含了能够在同一时间执行多种行为的多用途木马程序，它还能在一个单独的程序中展示一些木马行为。
family_en_des: Menti performs malicious actions to delete, block, modify, or copy data, disrupt computer or network performance. Menti covers multipurpose Trojan programs which is able to conduct several actions at one time and demonstrate some Trojan behaviors in a single program.

family_cn_des: Worm[Emial]/Win32.Runouce家族蠕虫中文名为“中国黑客”，是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                        Runouce家族蠕虫主要通过邮件传染，具备自启动功能，用户只要用Outlook预览邮件就能使蠕虫启动。同时，该家族蠕虫还能利用局域网进行传播。一旦它进入局域网中的某台机器，就会在“网上邻居”中搜索共享文件夹。只要搜索到某个可写共享文件夹，就会生成以被感染机器名开头的.eml文件，因此最后导致局域网的所有机器都成为病毒邮件的“发送基地”。          Runouce家族蠕虫采用汇编语言开发，用了非常多的反跟踪技巧，并首创了“三线程”结构，使该家族蠕虫很难被查杀。
family_en_des:
The family of Worm[Emial]/Win32.Runouce is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The worm mainly spreads by email and has the AutoRun facility. It can be activated once the user previews an email in Outlook. The worm can also spread via LAN. After infecting a computer in LAN, it will search the writeable ones in shared folders through Network Place and generate an .eml lfile with the infected file’s name as beginning. In the end, all the computers in the LAN become bases to send malicious emails. 
The worm is written in assembly language and adopts many anti-debug techniques. The tri-thread structure is first created and applied in the worm, which makes it very difficult to detect.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Simda是一类远程控制后门类的木马，后门类木马通常利用漏洞等缺陷在用户计算机开启木马的服务端，木马操纵者通过木马的客户端操纵用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。此家族是一个通过代码基因关联来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。           Simda家族具有多种功能的变种，包括后门木马，密码盗取器，木马下载器和文件感染者。拥有多种功能变种的木马家族较为罕见。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Simda is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
When running on a computer, the Trojan exploits vulnerabilities to start the backdoor server and makes remote control of the infected computer.
The variants of the family include backdoor Trojans, keyloggers, Trojan downloaders and file infectors. Such multifunctional Trojan families are rare.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Packed]/Win32.Katusha家族木马中文名为“喀秋莎”，是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。          Katusha木马通常伪装成常用软件的更新程序，通过电子邮件传播，伺机感染用户计算机。邮件中会提示用户有软件需要更新，要求用户使用附件中的程序进行更新。Katusha家族木马会自动下载其他恶意软件，伪造病毒提示，欺骗用户进行付费。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Packed]/Win32.Katusha is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan usually disguises as the update program of a common software and spreads via email. The email content will prompt the user to make the update with the program in the attachment. The Trojan will download other malware automatically and cheat the user to pay the fees.

family_cn_des:
Trojan/Win32.Swisyn是一类访问指定网站并下载执行恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。
Swisyn木马可以开启用户计算机上特定的端口，从指定的服务器自行下载多种恶意软件和广告软件。该家族木马还在系统的后台定时访问指定的站点，提高了这些网站的访问量，为木马制作者获取利益。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Swisyn is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to open some specified port in a computer, download various malware and adware. The Trojan can also visit the specified website regularly, increase the visiting traffic and make profits for the Trojan maker.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Daws家族是一类释放恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          该家族木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放出其他恶意程序，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Daws is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will release other malware to do damage to the user system.

family_cn_des:
Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Buterat是一类远程控制后门类的木马，后门类木马通常利用漏洞等缺陷在用户计算机开启木马的服务端，木马操纵者通过木马的客户端操纵用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。

Buterat家族命名的意思是"卑鄙的老鼠"，该木马一旦执行，在用户目录下复制自身的拷贝，同时释放出特定的DLL文件，通过修改注册表达到自启动的目的，同时将释放的DLL代码注入到火狐、IE等浏览器进程的地址空间，HOOK特定的API函数，达到监控浏览器发送和接受的流量，并在木马操纵者的控制下将用户的搜索查询等信息发送到远程服务器。亦可以将浏览器的搜索结果重定向到特定的网址。

Buterat家族比较新的变种甚至可以通过修改PE头文件数据，来改变哈希值，使基于文件哈希值识别的方法失效，或者通过加壳的方法给文件特征识别的杀毒软件造成迷惑。然而Buterat家族更多的行为还是下载其他的容易软件到用户的计算机，执行木马操纵者的指令，盗取用户的网上账号信息。

Buterat家族一般通过浏览器和插件的漏洞被安装到用户的系统，如果用户的计算机系统存在相应的漏洞，则会增加感染该病毒的风险。从病毒的原产地来看，更多的作者来自于俄罗斯。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Buterat is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. The Trojan exploits vulnerabilities to open the backdoor server and makes remote control of the computer.
Once the Trojan (also called "bad rat") is executed, it will copy itself into the user directory, release a specific DLL file and modify the registry to realize the function of auto-run when the system starts up. The released DLL codes will be injected to the address space of the browser process such as Firefox and IE. Then it hooks specific API functions to monitor the traffic sent or received by the browser. It can even upload the user's search and query information to a remote server, and redirect the search results to a specific URL.   
The new variants of the family can even modify the data in PE header to change the hash value in order to invalidate hash-based recognition methods. Or they can pack the virus files to confuse the file-signature-based anti-virus software. However, most Trojans in the family can download more malware into the user's computer, and execute the command of Trojan controller to steal online account information.  
Generally, the Trojans are installed in the system via the vulnerabilities of browsers and plug-ins. If the user's computer system has such vulnerabilities, the risk to infect this virus will rise. According to the original creation places, most writers come from Russia.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Fesber是一类释放恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          该家族木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放出其他恶意程序，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Fesber is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will release other malware to do damage to the user system.

family_cn_des: Virus[Rootkit]/Boot.Qvod家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                             Qvod家族病毒是鬼影6病毒的变种。鬼影6病毒主要用来盗取用户的网游账号，具有极强的免杀能力。鬼影6运行后，使杀毒软件无法正常启动，或者查杀过程中崩溃，即使重装系统也无法恢复。                          鬼影病毒主要的特点是感染硬盘主引导记录（MBR），并用多种方法防止用户修复。该病毒会早于操作系统内核先行加载，当病毒成功运行后，在系统进程中和启动加载项里找不到任何异常。
family_en_des:
The family of Virus[Rootkit]/Boot.Qvod is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Qvod is the variant of Ghost 6 which mainly steals the accounts of online games. It has powerful anti-detection ability to disable anti-virus software.
The major feature of Ghost is to infect MBR and prevent it from being restored. It will load itself earlier than the system kernel with the user finding no exception in the system process and add-ins.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Dapato家族是一类自动下载其他恶意程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Dapato家族木马感染用户系统之后，会自动连接到指定的网站，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of TTrojan[Downloader]/Win32.Dapato is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will connect to a specified website to download and execute various malware.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Pakes是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                  Pakes家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Pakes is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
When running on a computer, the Trojan exploits vulnerabilities to start the backdoor server and makes remote control of the infected computer.

family_cn_des: Trojan/MSIL.Disfa家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                           Disfa家族也被称为Bladabindi家族，在感染用户系统之后，该家族木马将窃取用户的机密信息。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/MSIL.Disfa is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Disfa is also called Bladabindi. After infecting a computer, the Trojan will steal confidential data in the system.

family_cn_des: GrayWare[AdWare]/Win32.DownloadWare是一类自动推送广告的灰色软件。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          DownloadWare灰色软件进入用户系统之后，会自动连接到指定的服务器，根据服务器的命令进行广告推送。
family_en_des:
The family of GrayWare[AdWare]/Win32.DownloadWare is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a system, it will connect to a specified server and display adware according to the command of the sever.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Remora家族是一类自动下载其他恶意程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Remora家族木马感染用户系统之后，会自动连接到指定的网站，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Remora is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will connect to a specified website to download and execute various malware.

family_cn_des: [Downloader]Trojan.Win32.Zlob是一类自动下载其他恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Zlob家族木马下载器感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。                                                      Zlob家族木马最早于2005年发现，但在2006年中才引起重视，它伪装成ActiveX的视频编码欺骗用户下载安装。安装之后，用户会收到伪装成微软警告信息的弹窗，提示用户系统中存在间谍软件，需要下载反病毒程序进行清除。用户点击弹窗后，将下载实为木马的假反病毒程序。                                   根据PHSDL对Zlob家族木马传播域名的调查发现，大部分的域名指向色情网站或其他视频网站，木马伪装成视频编码文件欺骗用户下载。部分家族变种通过Java的cab文件进行传播。Zlob家族起源于俄罗斯。
family_en_des:
Trojan.Win32.Zlob is a Trojan collection that automatedly downloads other malware. The Trojan family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same of similar source codes and core technologies.                      It is a Trojan that masquerades as a needed video codec in the form of ActiveX. It was first detected in late 2005, but only started getting attention in mid-2006.

Once installed, it displays popup advertisements with which appear similar to real Microsoft Windows warning popups, informing users that their computers are infected with spyware. Clicking these popups will trigger the download of a fake anti-spyware program in which the Trojan is hidden.

Project Honeypot Spam Domains List (PHSDL) tracks and catalogs Zlob spam domains. Parts of the domains on the list are redirects to porn sites and various video watching sites that display a number of inline videos. Playing the video activates a request to download an ActiveX code ( which is malware). It prevents users from closing the browser in the usual manner. Other variants of Zlob Trojan installation come in the form of a Java cab file masquerading as a computer scan.

There is evidence that the Zlob Trojan might be a tool of the Russian Business Network or at least of Russian origin.

family_cn_des: [Backdoor]Trojan.Win32.Prorat是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                 ProRat是一个后门木马程序，也被称为远程控制工具（RAT）。它使用了客户服务器的模式，在服务端开启了特定的端口以允许客户端对服务端进行远程控制。ProRat有两个版本，免费版本只能连接局域网的计算机，而不能连接广域网的计算机。收费版具有完整功能。
family_en_des: Trojan.Win32.Prorat is a  collection of Trojan that uses system vulnerabilities to realize remote control. The Trojan family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same of similar source codes and core technologies.                      ProRat is more commonly known as a RAT (Remote Administration Tool). As with other Trojans, it uses a client and server. It opens a port on the computer which allows the client to conduct numerous operations on the server (the machine being controlled). ProRat is available in a free version, and a paid version. In the free version, ProRat cannot connect to users over wide area networks (WANs), only over LANs (Local Area Networks). While the paid version owns complete functionalities.

family_cn_des: [Backdoor]Trojan.Win32.Autoit是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过编译器来定性的木马家族，家族变种都是采用AutoIt语言编写的。    Autoit家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。                           AutoIt是微软Windows系统的一个免费自动化脚本语言生成工具。在早期的版本中，这个工具主要是为了自动生成程序的脚本，但之后的版本不仅增强了其编程语言的设计，还提升了工具的整体性能。
family_en_des: Trojan.Win32.Autoit is a  collection of Trojan that uses system vulnerabilities to realize remote control. The Trojan family is characterized by compiler, the variants are written by AutoIt language.                         AutoIt is a freeware automation language for Microsoft Windows. In its earliest release, the software was primarily intended to create automation scripts for Microsoft Windows programs but has since then grown to make enhancements in both programming language design and overall functionality.

family_cn_des: [Email]Worm.Win32.Zhelatin是一类主要通过邮件进行传播的蠕虫统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。              Zhelatin蠕虫又名“风暴蠕虫”，其组成了风暴僵尸网络。风暴僵尸网络于2007年1月被首次侦测到。它与其蠕虫被称为“风暴”的原因是它早期传播的带毒邮件标题为“风暴侵袭欧洲，230人死亡”。信息安全专家们怀疑某些知名在逃的垃圾邮件大王，例如Leo Kuvayev，可能参与或控制风暴僵尸网络的运作。根据Patrick Runald的研究，风暴僵尸网络有明显的美国风格，很有可能在美国有专人组织并支持其运作。另一些专家认为风暴僵尸网络控制者是俄罗斯人，幕后黑手很有可能是俄罗斯商业网络。因为在风暴蠕虫代码中包含一个俄语单词"buldozhka"，即“斗牛犬”，显示出制作者对卡巴斯基公司的憎恶。                                                              风暴僵尸网络及其变种拥有多种攻击方法，而且也有多样的自我防护能力。风暴网络控制者随时监控着网络以进行防御或反击。它对那些提供在线反病毒扫描服务的公司进行DDoS攻击，进而保护自己。风暴网络控制者曾经在互联网上释放上百上千种它自己的版本，意图以一次密集性攻击来压垮反病毒程序厂商。           风暴僵尸网络于2008年逐步停止运作。一个原因是新出现的名为Stormfucker的工具可以夺取风暴僵尸网络的部分控制权。
family_en_des: Worm.Win32.Zhelatin is a  collection of worm that uses emails to spread. The family is characterized by code gene, the variants have the same of similar source codes and core technologies.  It is called "Storm Worm" and became part of the Strom Botnet. First detected on the Internet in January 2007, the Storm botnet and worm are so-called because of the storm-related subject lines its infectious e-mail employed initially, such as "230 dead as storm batters Europe." It is suspected by some information security professionals that well-known fugitive spammers (such as Leo Kuvayev) may have been involved in the operation and control of the Storm botnet. According to Patrick Runald, the Storm botnet had a strong American focus, and likely had agents working to support it within the United States. However, some experts believe the Storm botnet controllers were Russian, some pointing specifically at the Russian Business Network, citing that the Storm software mentions a hatred of the Moscow-based security  company Kaspersky Lab, and includes the Russian word "buldozhka," which means "bulldog."                                       The Storm botnet and its variants employ several attack vectors, and a variety of defensive steps exist as well. The Storm botnet was sending out spam for more than two years until its decline in late 2008. One factor of the decline is the new tool named Stromfucker can take parts of the Strom Botnet control.

family_cn_des:
Trojan.Win32.Monder家族是一类投放广告并下载执行任意文件的木马统称。
一旦用户的电脑感染了此木马，木马就会在用户计算机上开启特定的端口，从木马操纵者指定的服务器下载更多的恶意软件和广告软件到用户的计算机里，Monder的家族命名是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族。

Monder木马运行后会开启进程，为实现自启动会修改计算机的注册表，在木马操纵者指定的服务器上下载特定的文件放到用户目录中执行。通常这种行为严重影响了用户的上网状态，会使用户的计算机运行速度变慢，甚至导致计算机CPU使用率达到百分百。另外此家族的有些变种亦作为一个DLL文件被分发，并在用户不知情的情况下，作为浏览器辅助对象（BHO）被安装到用户的计算机，不断弹出各种广告，同时还可以修改用户浏览器的默认主页地址或重定向搜索结果。

Monder木马一般自身并没有主动传播能力，往往通过捆绑正常软件，伪装成流行软件作为下载资源，散布在各个提供软件下载的站点，或将自身下载链接附在邮件中，欺骗用户下载。Monder木马家族样本在2012年底家族变种数量已经超过9万5千中，从木马的原产地来看，更多的作者来自于俄罗斯。
family_en_des:
Trojan.Win32.Monder is a collective name of the Trojans that can drop advertisements, download and execute any file.The family is characterized by code gene.
Once the computer is infected, it will open a specific port and then download more other malware and adware into the computer from severs specified by the Trojan controller.
After execution, it will open the process and modify the registry to start up when the system boots.It can download specific files from specified severs, then place the files into the user directory and execute them.This malicious activity will seriously slow down the running speed of the computer, or even account for 100% occupation.Some variants it can be distributed as a DLL file and installed in the computer as BHO without the notice of the user.They continously pop up ads.Meanwhile, the Trojan can change the default homepage address of the user's browser and redirect the search results.
Generally, it cannot spread by itself.It is always bundled with normal software, disguises as commonly used software, or attaches its download link in e-mails to induce users to download it as security ones.
The number its variants had exceeded 95,000 by the end of 2012.According to the original creation places, most writers of it are from Russia.

family_cn_des:
Injector是一种IT工具，其唯一的用途是具备破坏性行动的能力。Injector病毒不会自动传播，而是用自己的方式来执行破坏性行动。例如，程序会自动创建病毒、木马等。 其影响的平台包括：Windows XP / 2000 / NT /ME/ 98/95，威胁等级较低。                                                                      它需要攻击者的干预来与受影响的计算机产生联系。使用的传输方式包括软盘、CD -ROM光盘、带附件的电子邮件、网络下载、 FTP 、 IRC通道、点对点网络（P2P ）网络共享文件等。
它是一种植入者木马，是可以注入其他进程隐藏自身的木马的统称。它的部分变种可以释放其他恶意代码。                                                 Injector是用于对指定文件或程序注入代码或线程的黑客工具软件。该软件对于系统一般没有主动破坏能力，主要配合其他恶意程序进行入侵活动。
family_en_des:
Injector is an IT tool whose only function is its capacity for carrying out damaging actions.It does not spread automatically, while using its own means to carry out damaging actions, such as establishing virus or Trojan automatically.                                                                                                     It needs attacker's intervention to reach the affected computer. The means of transmission used include, among others, floppy disks, CD-ROMs, email messages with attached files, Internet downloads, FTP, IRC channels, peer-to-peer (P2P) file sharing networks, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                    
It is a collection of implant Trojan that can hide itself by injecting other programs. Parts of its variants can release other malware.
Injector is a software tool used to inject codes or threads to specified files or programs. It is not malicious itself. Together with other malware, it can be used to make an attack.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des: VB是一个后门特洛伊木马程序，允许对受影响的计算机进行未经授权的访问。该木马程序能够下载和执行由远程攻击者指定的任意文件。 VB分为木马下载器下载程序和安装了新版本的恶意程序两种，其中包括在受感染的电脑中的木马和广告软件。一旦从因特网下载了VB，该木马程序就会在系统启动时自动运行。有关该木马的信息都包含在代码中或从互联网下载的木马中（通常是从网页中下载）。有关下载的木马代码中的该程序的名称和位置的信息或者是从网络资源中被木马所下载(通常是一个web页面)。 这种类型的恶意代码通常会在用户访问具有漏洞的网站时感染计算机。
family_en_des: VB is a collection of Trojan that allows remote attacker to make access to the infected computer, and then download and execute arbitrary files.It is able to download and install new versions of malware including Trojan and Adware on the infected computer by remote attacker's command. Once downloaded, these malware will run automatically when the system boots up and information about them are contained in the Trojan code or downloaded by the Trojan from Internet (usually from a webpage). This type of malware often infects computers when users visits vulnerable websites.

family_cn_des:
Trojan.Win32.Inject是自身以某种方式注入到其他进程隐藏自身默默的在后台执行恶意行为的木马程序统称。
Inject家族通常是一个看似合法却偷偷的执行功能的恶意软件，将自身以某种方式注入到其他进程以避免用户和杀毒软件的感知清除，因此Inject的家族命名是一个通过行为来定性的木马家族。
Inject家族木马是个流行时间长而且样本数量多的大家族。它通常运行后会将自身复制到系统目录里，并重新命名为与系统程序相似的名称，通过修改注册表实现开机自启动，将自身注入到其他的进程中，可以实现隐藏自身，以免被查杀，它可以在后台连接黑客指定的服务器，下载其他的网游盗号木马、后门程序、下载器、广告插件等恶意程序。
Inject家族木马有些变种可以进行自我的U盘传播，有些变种木马运行后会修改系统时间、试图关闭多种杀毒软件、木马还能从黑客指定的网址上下载多个病毒执行，将自身复制到所有磁盘进行传播。

Inject家族变种非常多，截至到2012年底已经超过7.5万种。
family_en_des:
Trojan.Win32.Inject is a collection of Trojan that  executes malicious behaviors in the background after injecting itself into other processes. The family is characterized by behaviors.
It seems to be legal but it performs malicious behaviors secretly. The Trojan has been in the wild for a long time and has lots of variants. After execution, it copies itself to the system directory and rename itself to one that resembles a system program. Then it modifies the registry to realize auto-run when the system boots and inject itself into other processes to evade detection from users and anti-virus products. Moreover, it connects to a specific sever to download other malware, including online game hacking Trojans, backdoors, downloader, adware, etc.
Some variants of it can spread by USB drivers. Some of them are able to modify system time, try to close security software, as well as download and execute other viruses from specific URLs. They copy themselves into all disks to propagate.

family_cn_des:
Trojan.Win32.Small是一类本身只占用很小字节的木马程序的统称。这个木马家族的最主要特点是文件占用字节非常小，从几K到几十K不等，因此Small这个家族命名是一个通过形态来定性的木马家族，而不是基于基因关联或编译器来命名的。因此这个家族的不同变种之间，除了较小的文件大小之外，很有可能没有任何的关联。
Small家族中的木马一般自身并没有主动传播能力，一般是伪装成正常文件欺骗用户下载或者通过一些恶意网页的辅助，通过浏览器和插件的漏洞被安装到用户的系统中。也有些变种由其他恶意软件释放或下载得到。
family_en_des:
Trojan.Win32.Small is a collection of Trojan that is with a small size from several kilobytes to dozens of kilobytes. So this family is characterized by its morphological conditions, other than genetic correlation or compiler, and there may be no more correlation among the variants except for the difference in file sizes.
Trojans in this family can't spread by themselves. They disguise as normal files to cheat users to download or installed into the system by web browsers and plug-ins via some malicious web pages. Some variants are released and downloaded by other malware.

family_cn_des:
Trojan.Win32.Buzus是一类注入系统进程执行恶意操作的木马统称，Buzus的家族命名是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，因此家族变种之间具有相同的源码和核心技术。
 
Buzus也叫“Window内鬼”，主要因仿冒系统进程执行恶意操作而得名，Buzus家族运行后劫持系统文件、添加注册表、利用漏洞、产生大量冗余进程、联络黑客指定的服务器下载大量的病毒到用户计算机执行。

Buzus木马家族有些变种较强的破坏性和防御性，木马运行后它会修改IE的安全设置来降低计算机的安全水平，删除用户数据，破坏计算机或网络性能，替换系统文件，添加注册表来达到自启动目的，连接黑客指定的服务器下载大量其他木马、后门等恶意软件执行。并且该木马有反虚拟机能力，为了避免被安全软件检出，Buzus木马判读自身运行环境是否在虚拟机中，如果在虚拟机中则放弃执行。

Buzus木马家族自身并没有传播能力，它可以通过电子邮件将自身以附件形式添加分发、利用移动介质复制自身来传播或者通过浏览器或其插件的漏洞被安装到用户的系统中。Buzus家族木马截至到2012年已经超过17万8千种。
它是一种独特的网络僵尸木马程序，也是第一批使用缩短网址的僵尸网络，目的是隐藏垃圾邮件中的恶意链接地址。这么做可以有效增加邮件中链接的点击率。另外它看上去还被分割成了几个独立的小部分，每个小的僵尸网络负责发送不同类型的垃圾邮件。
family_en_des:
Trojan.Win32.Buzus is a collective name for the Trojans which can inject their components into system processes and execute malicious operations. This family is characterized by the virus behaviors. Thus the variants of Buzus employ the same or similar source code or core technology.
Buzus, also known as “Ghosts in Windows”, is known for counterfeiting system processes to carry out malicious operations. After executed, it hijacks system files, adds registry entries, exploits vulnerabilities, generates a large number of redundant processes, and downloads more viruses from specified severs into computers and then executes them.
Some variants of this family are strongly destructive as well as defensive. After running, it will modify the security settings of IE to reduce the security level of the computer. Then it will delete users’ data, destroy the computer or network performance, replace the system files, add the registry entries to auto-start, download large amounts of Trojans, backdoors and other malicious programs from specified server, and then execute them. Besides, the Trojan has anti-VM ability. In order to evade detection from anti-virus software, it determines whether it executes in virtual machine or not; if so, it will stop execution.
The Trojan in this family usually can’t spread by itself. The Trojan spreads via email attachments and removable devices. It can be installed in the user’s system via vulnerabilities in browsers or plug-ins. The number of variants in Buzus family had exceeded 178,000 by the end of 2012. 
It is a botnet Trojan that uses shortened websites to hide malicious links. It can effectively increase the clicking rates. Meanwhile, it is separated into several independent parts, each of which is responsible for sending different kinds of junk mails.
action_des: 无

family_cn_des:
Hb是一款恶性木马下载器，该木马一旦执行，会在瞬间下载上百个木马。 这些木马首次以“集群作战”的方式，从各个途径彻底破坏用户电脑安防体系，同时恶意弹出广告。该病毒传播途径广泛，针对几乎市面上所有网络游戏展开疯狂盗窃。
该木马主要通过网页挂马、流行病毒下载器传播。而传播此盗号木马的下载器一般会对抗杀毒软件，造成杀毒软件不能打开、电脑反应速度变慢等影响。
family_en_des:
Hb is a collection of Trojan downloader. Once executed, it will download hundreds of Trojans instantly. These Trojans as a group destroys the security system of a computer in various ways and pop up advertisements in a malicious manner. 
It is widely spread in almost all online games and steals accounts and passwords wildly.  
It spreads via drive-by download and popular virus downloader which may defeat and disable antivirus software. The infected platforms are Windows 2000, Windows XP and Windows2003.

family_cn_des:
Ikee是iPhone操作系统的第一个恶意软件。澳大利亚学生Ashley Towns创造了这个名为“艾克”(Ikee)的病毒，该病毒入侵手机后，会将手机屏幕的背景换成1980年代英国流行歌Rick Astley的照片。Ashley Towns表示，编写这个病毒是为了提高大家对手机安全的警觉性。这个病毒能透过无线网络，在手机间传播。
