family_cn_des: Trojan[Exploit]/MSWord.CVE-2012-0158是一类通过漏洞攻击用户系统的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。攻击者通常利用某一软件的或者系统的漏洞在用户的计算机上执行恶意代码，进而感染用户系统。                     攻击者通过CVE-2012-0158漏洞可以制造出畸形的.doc和rtf等文件，如果用户打开了这种恶意制作的文件，其系统就很可能被感染。
family_en_des:
The family of CVE-2012-0158 is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan exploits the vulnerabilities in a software or system to execute malicious commands. By exploiting the vulnerability of CVE-2012-0158, the Trojan can generate abnormal .doc and .rtf files. If the user opens the files, the system may be infected.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/AndroidOS.Jedan是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Jedan广告软件一般通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中，或是通过挂在网站上吸引用户点击进行传播。广告软件在安装进用户系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，防止被用户卸载。它一般通过系统弹窗或是修改浏览器主页进行广告，大部分的广告软件还会暗中收集用户的信息，例如浏览历史记录等，来研究用户的喜好，进而有针对性的推送广告。为了获取更多利益，该类软件制作者通常会使用很多黑客技术。
family_en_des:
The family of Jedan is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The grayware usually spreads by being bundled with other installation file or being hooked on some websites to attract users to click and install. It displays ads via pops-up or modifying the web browser’s homepage. It collects user data secretly to explore the user’s interests so as to prompt targeted ads. To obtain more profits, it will also employ some hacking techniques.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Ejik是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Ejik广告软件一般通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中，或是通过挂在网站上吸引用户点击进行传播。广告软件在安装进用户系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，防止被用户卸载。它一般通过系统弹窗或是修改浏览器主页进行广告，大部分的广告软件还会暗中收集用户的信息，例如浏览历史记录等，来研究用户的喜好，进而有针对性的推送广告。为了获取更多利益，该类软件制作者通常会使用很多黑客技术。
family_en_des:
The family of Ejik is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The grayware usually spreads by being bundled with other installation file or being hooked on some websites to attract users to click and install. It displays ads via pops-up or modifying the web browser’s homepage. It collects user data secretly to explore the user’s interests so as to prompt targeted ads. To obtain more profits, it will also employ some hacking techniques.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.RAdmin是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                      Radmin (Remote Administrator)是一款远程控制软件，它将远程控制、外包服务组件、以及网络监控结合到一个系统里，提供快速、强健而安全的工具包。Radmin在被控端以服务的方式运行，通过特定的IP实现远程控制，记录屏幕影像、鼠标和键盘的操作数据并加密传输给控制者。
family_en_des:
The family of RAdmin is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Radmin is short for Remote Administrator which is a fast and secure remote PC access software
. It combines remote control, outsourcing service component and network monitoring together. Radmin runs as service in the controlled terminal and makes remote control via a specified IP. It can record the screenshot, the keystroke record as well as other data, then encrypt and send them to the controller.

family_cn_des: Virus/MSExcel.Laroux的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                     Laroux是第一个为MS Excel编写的宏病毒。当用户打开被感染的Excel文档时，其它的活动文档也将被感染，文件属性部分的标题、主题、作者、关键字和内容被病毒清除。该病毒的宏不对用户隐藏，可以用Excel的工具|宏选项找到它。
family_en_des:
The family of Laroux is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Laroux is the first macro virus written by MS Excel. When a user opens the infected excel file, other 
excel files will also be infected. The title, theme, author, keywords and content in the file attribute are all cleaned. Not hidden from the user, macro of the virus can be found in options in Excel’s toolbar.

family_cn_des: Apptom家族是木马类程序。它被嵌入在微软PowerPoint数据文件的一个漏洞中。该漏洞能够在微软Office 2000、XP、2003以及Mac Office系统中运行。该家族样本多为PPT文件，运行后可能会针对特定版本的程序进行溢出，可能会执行恶意程序。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan dropper embedded within an exploit in Microsoft PowerPoint (.PPS / .PPT) data files. Most of the sample files are PPT and may overflow for programs of specific version. The exploit could execute on vulnerability systems using Microsoft Office 2000, XP, 2003 and Mac Office.

family_cn_des:
Gamevance是一类广告件，除和间谍件或跟踪件捆绑时，一般不具有威胁性。
计算机被感染Gamevance的唯一途径是通过Gamevance.com的网站。该网站通过提供给用户免费的在线游戏诱导用户同意其隐私政策和终端用户授权协议。然而终端用户授权协议是隐藏在隐私协议中的，用户需要点击单独的链接查看此协议。一旦用户受骗点击链接，就相当于允许Gamevance安装在计算机中。Gamevance的终端用户授权协议并未清楚地陈述这些情况。为了换取免费的在线游戏服务，用户同意通过Gamevance软件以文本链接、横幅广告或弹出广告的形式接受各种广告宣传。这些广告的选择是基于用户的网络浏览历史和浏览网页时的习惯和兴趣等。
Gamevance监控用户的计算机活动，将这些信息保存并发送给Gamevance。然而，还无法知晓Gamevance都收集了哪些信息，以及用户的身份等信息是否也包含在这些被收集的信息中。
family_en_des: Gamevance is a collection of adware that brings risks when being bundled with spyware or tracking software.                  The only way to infect computer of Gamevance is by website Gamevance.com. This website leads users to agree the private policy and end-user license agreement through providing free online games. The end-user license agreement is hidden in the private agreement, which means users need to click the seperated link to check it. After clicking it, Gamevance will be installed on the computer. In order to exchange for free online game service, users agreed to accept various ad promotion by Gamevance in terms of text link, banner ad or popups. The selection of ads is based on user's website browsing history and habits or interets.

family_cn_des:
KungFu系列病毒的特征非常典型，感染此病毒的手机会自动在后台静默下载并安装某些软件，造成用户流量话费损失以及系统全自动安装广告软件。当手机感染此病毒后使用常规安全软件无法彻底清除，甚至将手机恢复至出厂设置也无法解决问题。Android.KungFu整体架构由两个模块构成，第一个模块(Loader)会在宿主运行到特定场景时激活，随后执行提权操作，并加载第二个模块(Payload)，Payload模块则常驻内存，执行各种威胁手机安全的操作。
当Loader模块被激活后，首先会试图获得ROOT权限。根据宿主软件的不同，Loader会采用不同的策略，如果Loader宿主本身需要ROOT权限， Loader就会附着在宿主需要以ROOT权限执行的代码之后运行（例如一键VPN免费版，其中捆绑的Android.KungFu会嵌入在安装VPN的代码中）。如果宿主本身不需要ROOT权限，Loader会利用公开的漏洞（NPROC_RLIMIT）在后台静默获取ROOT权限（例如音乐随身听）。由于这个漏洞广泛的存在于Android2.1和2.2设备上，所以，即使手机没有ROOT权限，多数手机依然会受这个病毒威胁。
family_en_des: KungFu is a collection of malware that downloads and installs some software without user's permission, which results in traffic lose and installation of adware automatically. It is hard for normal security software to clear it out completely. Even retoring phones to factory settings cannot solve the problem. The whole architecture of Android.KungFu is consist of 2 modules. The first module -Loader- will be activated when the carrier runs under specific situation and then extracts privileges and downloads the second module (Payload). Payload module is resident memory and carries out operations that threatens the security of cellphones. When Loader module is activated, it tries to gain the ROOT privilege firstly. Loader will adopt different strategies according to the difference of carrier software. It exists widely in Android 2.1 and Android 2.2, so most cellphones are sitll being threatening by it, though these phones have no ROOT privilege.

family_cn_des: 这是一个广告软件，会修改注册表中关于浏览器的数据，弹出病毒作者指定的广告页面，干扰用户的正常工作。它的部分变种可能拥有远程控制或下载器的功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that can modify the browser data in the registry and pop out the specific ad page appointed by the virus writer. Parts of its variants might have functionalities of remote control and downloader.

family_cn_des: P2P-Worm.Win32.Picsys是一个利用Kazaa共享文件进行传播的蠕虫。“皮斯”运行后，自我复制到系统目录下，文件名是SystemConfig.exe。修改注册表，实现开机自启。在系统目录下创建Media文件夹，自我复制大量病毒文件到该文件夹下，通过修改注册表将Media文件夹保存到Kazaa共享文件夹下，实现网络共享传播。
family_en_des: P2P-Worm.Win32.Picsys is a collection of worm that spreads via Kazaa sharing files. After running, it replicates itself into system directory with SystemConfig.exe as the file name. It takes the following malicious actions: modifying the registry, reelizng boot startup, storing Media archive into Kazaa sharing file archive to realize network sharing propagation.

family_cn_des:
Shutdowner是一个专门强制关闭用户的电脑系统的木马家族。 
该病毒是一个专门强制关闭用户的电脑系统的恶意程序，运行后，它会自动地使电脑进入关机状态，给用户的电脑的正常操作造成困扰，由于电脑系统没有得以正常关闭，可能会造成大量文件数据的丢失以及文件系统出错等问题。 
该病毒运行后，会释放NetMonInstaller.exe和npf_mgm.exe等病毒文件,发送ARP攻击包，感染局域网里的其它电脑,造成无法上网。自动连接到hxxp://down.xxxx.cn/xxx站点,进行病毒下载。
family_en_des: Shutdowner is a collection of Trojan that shuts down user's computer system forcibly. After running, it  puts computer into shutdown stage automatically, which brings trouble to user's normal operation. It might result in large amounts of data lose and file system failure, because the computer system is shut down abnormally.                                             It releases malware NetMonInstaller.exe and npf_mgm.exe, infecting other computers in the LAN. It connects to hxxp://down.xxxx.cn/xxx to download malware.

family_cn_des:
P2P-Worm.Win32.SpyBot是一种在线网络聊天系统机器人（BOT）的开放性源代码蠕虫病毒，由于它的开放性和管理方式都来源于这些分布的机器人，这些广泛的机器人变量都有一些很微小的不同，通过远程用户在线聊天系统可以最多控制一台计算机的一些管理功能，同时它也有能力传播到点对点网络（P2P Networks）。
此病毒是透过 KaZaA 文件共享和mIRC 扩散的蠕虫，也会透过受感染计算机的后门而扩散。藉由连上特殊设定的IRC Server，W32.Spybot.Worm 可以执行不同后门功能，加入不同的频道倾听指令。
family_en_des: P2P-Worm.Win32.SpyBot is a collection of open source worm of online chat system BOT. Both the openess and management are from these distributed BOTs, so BOT variables have suttle difference. It can control several management functionalities of a computer, and also is able to spread to P2P Networks.                                                 It propagates via KaZaA file sharement and mIRC as well as backdoor of the compromised computer. After connecting to the specific IRC Server, it can execute different backdoor functionalities and join to various channels to stand by.

family_cn_des: 这是一个广告程序，它能收集用户计算机的信息，并弹出谎报系统漏洞的窗口恐吓用户，使用户购买上面所说的修复程序，该修复程序本身是个欺诈程序，并不能修复系统漏洞.
family_en_des: It is a collection  of malware that can collect user's computer information. It pops window of reporting system vulnerabilities to threanten user. Then it makes user buy the fixed programs which is fake and cannot fix the vulnerabilities.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Exploit]/JS.CVE-2010-0188是一类通过漏洞攻击用户系统的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                      CVE-2010-0188漏洞是Adobe Reader和Acrobat采用的开源TIFF图像解析库libtiff上存在的缓冲区溢出漏洞，远程攻击者通过诱使用户打开恶意TIFF图像文件来触发此漏洞，进而在用户系统上执行远程指令，控制用户系统。
family_en_des:
The family of CVE-2010-0188 is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
CVE-2010-0188 is the buffer overflow vulnerability existing in the open-sourced image resolver library—libtiff which is used by Adobe Reader and Acrobat. The remote attacker induces the user to open the malicious TIFF image to activate the vulnerability

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Powp是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Powp木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Powp is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Worm[Email]/Win32.Warezov是主要通过邮件传播的蠕虫。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                     Warezov（也被称为Stration或Stratio）是感染Windows系统的蠕虫。该家族的蠕虫的特点是变种生成速度非常快，最高时可达到每30分钟产生一个新变种。被感染的系统会访问指定的服务器跟新蠕虫版本。这一特点使传统的病毒特征码检测方式很难检测出此蠕虫。                        Warezov首次发现于2006年9月。该蠕虫主要通过邮件附件的方式进行传播，并且经常通过网络更新自身。网络安全公司F-Secure与网络服务商合作，关闭了蠕虫更新的服务器，防止其继续制作新变种。                                                   Warezov蠕虫采用了社会工程学的方法进行传播。带毒邮件通常声称用户系统已被感染，需要下载执行邮件附件进行修复，用户一旦打开邮件附件，其系统就被感染了。还有部分家族变种通过即时通讯工具发送URL链接进行传播。
family_en_des:
The family of Warezov is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Warezov, also called Stration or Stratio, is the family of worms infecting Windows. Its variants can be generated at an amazing speed. A new variant can be created every 30 minutes at the peak. The infected system will visit a specified server to download new variants, which makes it difficult to detect based on traditional virus-feature detection.
Warezov was first found in September 2006. It mainly spreads via email attachment and updates itself on Internet. It was due to the cooperation of F-Secure and ISPs that the update server of Warezov is shut down and prevented from generating new variants.  
Warezov employs social engineering to spread. The user may receive an email which claims that the user system has been infected and the user has to download the email attachment to recover the system. Once the email attachment is opened, the system will be compromised. Some variants of Warezov can even spread by sending URL via IM.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Tiny是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Tiny后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过控制僵尸网络进行多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但其不能自行传播，需要攻击者的控制。
family_en_des:
The family of Tiny is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Tiny backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Tolsty是自动下载其他恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                          Tolsty木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，实现开机启动。此木马能下载多种恶意程序并安装执行。此类木马常作为攻击的发起步骤，其下载的其他恶意程序作为攻击的后续，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。
family_en_des:
The family of Tolsty is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will change the system settings and realize the function of Autorun after the system booting. The Trojan is able to download and execute various malware which may do more damage to the system.

family_cn_des: RiskWare[RemoteAdmin]/Win32.WinVNC家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的风险软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                  WinVNC是VNC (Virtual Network Computing)软件的Windows版本。该软件能够通过RFB协议实现远程监视，一切键盘，鼠标的行为和显示器的数据都将被记录并传输。VNC最早是由英国剑桥的Olivetti & Oracle实验室开发的。VNC的最早版本和现在大部分的版本都是开源的。
family_en_des:
The family of WinVNC is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
WinVNC is the Windows version of VNC (Virtual Network Computing). It can use the RFB (Remote Frame Buffer) protocol to realize remote monitoring of keyboard and mouse events, record and transmit these data.   
VNC was originally developed at the Olivetti & Oracle Research Lab in Cambridge, United Kingdom. Most versions of it are open-sourced.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Scarsi是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Scarsi木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Scarsi is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Drowor的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                     Drowor家族内的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如，允破坏数据文件资料，强行终止杀毒软件运行等。
family_en_des:
The family of Drowor is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The variants in this family may have various threats such as damaging file and data, terminate antivirus functions and so on.

family_cn_des:
Trojan[FakeAV]/Win32.Onescan是伪装成反病毒软件故意歪曲用户计算机的安全状态的木马统称。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。
Onescan木马感染用户系统后，将修改系统设置，弹出窗口提示用户系统存在安全威胁，并要求用户购买杀毒软件。当用户支付金钱后，恶意软件将提示用户安全威胁已经清除。实际上，用户看到的是虚假的安全提醒，购买的也是虚假的安全软件。该家族部分变种会影响系统的正常运行，以此增强其安全威胁提示的可信度。
family_en_des:
The family of Onescan is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan disguises as anti-virus software and distorts the security status of the user system. After infecting a computer, the Trojan will modify the system settings, display pop-up to warn the present threat existing in the system. The user will be induced to buy the anti-virus software. After the payment successes, the software will claim that the system is clean and safe. But in actual, the warning and the software are all false. Some variants of the family may have a negative influence on the system’s running, thus increase the reliability of its warning.

family_cn_des:
PayPal家族是一种密码窃取类木马程序。该恶意代码是使用script脚本编写的网页文件，用来欺骗用户输入银行账号密码，从而窃取用户信息。
密码窃取类木马程序被用来窃取受感染系统中的用户账户信息，例如登陆记录和密码等。成功启动后，密码窃取类木马程序会搜索存储敏感数据或注册表的系统文件。若发现这样的敏感数据，该种木马程序会立即将信息发送至“幕后操纵者”。通常采用邮件、FTP（文件传输协定）、网页或其他方式来传输所窃取的数据。
family_en_des:
PayPal is a collection of Trojan-PSW program. It is a kind of web file that compiled by script. It is used to seduce user to enter bank account and password in order to steal user’s information.
Trojan-PSW programs are designed to steal user account information such as logins and passwords from infected computers. When launched, a PSW Trojan searches system files which store a range of confidential data or the registry. If such data is found, the Trojan sends it to its “master.” Email, FTP, the web (including data in a request), or other methods may be used to transit the stolen data.
action_des: PayPal家族是木马类程序。是使用script脚本编写的网页文件，用来欺骗用户输入银行账号密码，从而窃取用户信息。

family_cn_des:
Osirdoor家族是一种后门类的木马程序。该家族样本多使用VB编写。成功运行后，该木马程序会执行以下恶意行为：拷贝自身到系统文件夹中、添加自启动项、获取系统信息并将信息发送到远程服务器。
后门类木马能够暗中提供对受感染系统的远程访问，也能被用来执行DDoS攻击或安装其他木马或其他形式的恶意软件。这种木马还能在受感染系统中开启端口，因此会给用户系统带来更大的损伤。
family_en_des:
Osirdoor is a collection of backdoor Trojan whose samples are written by VB language. After successful running, it will carry out the following malicious behaviors: replicating itself into the system archive, adding startup options, obtaining and sending system information to the remote server.
A backdoor Trojan provides remote, usually surreptitious, access to affected systems. It may be used to conduct distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks, or be used to install additional Trojans or other forms of malicious software. It might also open ports on the affected system and thus potentially lead to further damage.
action_des: Osirdoor家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多使用VB编写，运行后会拷贝自身到系统文件夹下，添加自启动项，会获取系统信息，并将信息发送到远程服务器。

family_cn_des: SpyNet家族是一种黑客工具类程序，能够帮助黑客新手制造出后门程序，进而控制受感染系统。该家族样本多为远程控制类程序控制端，可以进行多种信息的配置，如：反虚拟机、反沙箱、生成名称等。同时，它能操控被控端。
family_en_des: SpyNet is a collection of hacker tool program that helps the green hackers in producing backdoor to control the compromised system. Most samples of this family are remote-control program control terminal, which can configure several kinds of information, such as anti-virtual machine, anti-sandbox, name generations and so on. Meanwhile, it can also control and operate the controlled terminal.
action_des: SpyNet家族是黑客工具类程序。该家族样本多为远程控制类程序控制端，可以进行多种信息的配置，如：反虚拟机、反沙箱、生成名称等。同时，可以对被控端进行控制，操作。

family_cn_des: Qhost家族是木马类程序。使用JS脚本编写，该家族样本被加载之后，可能会修改系统Host信息，影响用户对网站的访问。Qhost是一类改变Hosts文件内容以屏蔽某些网站的木马家族。该木马能够通过专门用于改变Hosts文件的黑客服务器来重定向细节从而实现对密码信息的窃取。
family_en_des: Qhost is a collection of malware that changes the Hosts file content to shield some websites. It can redirect details via specific hacker server so as to steal the passwords.                It is written by JS script. When it modifies the Hosts file, it affects the access of website from users.

family_cn_des:
Bluez家族是一种运行于Linux系统下的后门类木马程序。该木马成功运行后，会执行以下恶意行为：获取系统信息、连接远程服务器、等待指令信息并执行相应操作。
后门类木马能够暗中提供对受感染系统的远程访问，也能被用来执行DDoS攻击或安装其他木马或其他形式的恶意软件。这种木马还能在受感染系统中开启端口，因此会给用户系统带来更大的损伤。
family_en_des:
Bluez is a collection of backdoor Trojan that operates on Linux system. After successful running, it may carry out the following malicious actions: accessing the system information, connecting remote servers, waiting for instructions and executing the corresponding operations.
A backdoor Trojan provides remote, usually surreptitious, access to affected systems. It may be used to conduct distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks, or be used to install additional Trojans or other forms of malicious software. It might also open ports on the affected system and thus potentially lead to further damage.
action_des: Bluez家族是木马类程序。运行于Linux系统下，运行后，会获取系统信息，连接远程服务器，等待指令信息，并执行相应操作。

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Redosdru是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Redosdru木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
Redosdru is a family of Trojans performing various malicious behaviors. Redosdru is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to modify or delete data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the infected computer. The variants of the family may be designed according to different attacking purposes. Once the Trojan compromises a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Ciadoor是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Ciadoor后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过控制僵尸网络进行多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但其不能自行传播，需要攻击者的控制。
family_en_des:
The family of Ciadoor is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Ciadoor backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Microjoin是释放恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Microjoin木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放安装其他恶意程序。很多容易被查杀的恶意程序通过隐藏在此类木马内部以躲过反病毒软件的检测，进而感染用户计算机。此家族的部分变种还具有强制关闭杀毒软件的能力，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。
family_en_des:
The family of Microjoin is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a compute, the Trojan will release additional malware. Some malwares which are easy to be detected by anti-virus software hide behind the Trojan to do further damage to the system. Some variants of the family are able to shut down anti-virus software in a compulsive way.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Constructor]/Win32.Tibia是一类能够制作或生成恶意程序的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Tibia家族木马主要构造盗取网络游戏Tibia账号密码等信息的木马。Tibia是CipSoft制作的网络游戏，是网游产业发展早期非常著名的产品。此游戏发布于1997年，是一款免费游戏，但用户可以花钱购买其升级版本，解锁新的游戏内容。
family_en_des:
The family of Tibia is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Trojans in this family are mainly used to create new accounts and passwords of Tibia game which is online role-playing game created by CipSoft in 1997. The game is free, but players can purchase the updated version or unlock new games.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Beastdoor是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Beastdoor后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过控制僵尸网络进行多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但其不能自行传播，需要攻击者的控制。
family_en_des:
The family of Beastdoor is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Beastdoor backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Trojan/AndroidOS.Plangton是一类具有恶意广告行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                    Plangton是欧洲地区常见的手机恶意程序之一。一旦手机感染该恶意程序，会不断弹出各种广告信息，同时浏览器的书签也会被修改，其中可能包括一些诈骗性质的网页。
family_en_des:
The family of Plangton is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Plangton is a commonly seen mobile malware in Europe. Once a mobile phone is infected, it will display various ads. Meanwhile, the web browser’s bookmarks will be modified to redirect to some fraud websites.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.MMM是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                MMM木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of MMM is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to modify or delete data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the infected computer. The variants of the family may be designed according to different attacking purposes. Once the Trojan compromises a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Exploit]/HTML.DialogArg是一类通过漏洞攻击用户系统的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。攻击者通常利用某一软件的或者系统的漏洞在用户的计算机上执行恶意代码，进而感染用户系统。
family_en_des:
The family of DialogArg is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan exploits vulnerabilities in some software or system to execute malware and do damage to the system.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Proxy]/Win32.Qukart家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Qukart木马感染用户系统后，攻击者可以将用户的计算机作为数据中转站，进而在发动攻击时隐藏自身的真正地址。该木马的另一个常见用途是垃圾邮件的分发。
family_en_des:
The family of Qukart is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will take the infected computer as the data transfer station in order to protect its actual IP address from being detected when it performs the attacking action. Another function of the Trojan is to distribute spam emails.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Rootkit]/Boot.Pihar是一类使用了Rootkit技术的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                  RootKit本身并不具有破坏行为，它通常用来隐藏其他木马等恶意程序，使之逃过反病毒软件的检测。它功能强大，能够隐藏文件，注册表信息，网络连接信息，甚至是程序执行时的内存信息。
family_en_des: Trojan[Rootkit]/Boot.Pihar is  a collection of Trojan that uses Rootkit technique. It is characterized by code gene, and variants in this family share the same or similar source code and core technologies.            Rootkit has no malicous behavior, it is usually used to help other Trojans in avoiding the detection of antivirus software. It is so powerful that it can  hide files, registry information, network connection information and even the memory information.

family_cn_des: Backdoor.Win32.Torr 病毒是一个动态链接库文件(DLL)，从病毒的特征来看是一款远程控制的病毒原型，但又做了其他的一些修改，对棋牌游戏进行了监控，偷取帐号信息，与中毒的机器进行交互来完成相互之间棋牌帐号信息盗取与游戏币交易。其运行后会对系统进行Host文件劫持，仅仅针对棋牌游戏的网站进行劫持，自己伪造一台服务器，来处理伪造的棋牌网站相关信息，当正常的普通用户在不知道自己感染病毒的情况下访问网站会被暗地里链接到黑客转向的网站，若继续下载里面的游戏客户端进行游戏，在进行棋牌娱乐时就已经被盗取游戏币了，因为手段隐蔽所以普通用户很难发现。
family_en_des: Backdoor.Win32.Torr is a kind of DLL. It is the virus prototype of remote control from the view of virus characteristics, but changed a little. It monitors card games, steals accounts information and gets interactions with the compromised computer to finish the token deal. After running, it hijacks the Host file of the system. It disguises itself as a server to deal with the fake related information of the card game website. If users accessed the website when they are not aware of being infectes, they will be redirect to the attacker's website silently. Therefore, when users play card games, the game currency will be stolen. It is hard for common users to find out due to the covert means.

family_cn_des: Trojan-Banker.MSIL.Banbra是一个盗取在线银行用户帐号及密码的木马程序。该木马由Delphi编写经UPX压缩。中文俗称“斑布拉”，它运行后，在系统目录下创建多个病毒文件。修改注册表，实现开机自启。在已开启的窗口搜索与在线银行相关的字符串，一经发现边开始记录键击，并将盗取的用户机密信息发送到黑客指定的邮箱里。
family_en_des: Trojan-Banker.MSIL.Banbra is a collection of Trojan that can steal online bank accounts and passwords. It is written by Delphi and compressed by UPX. After being executed, it creates several virus files under the system directory. It also modifies the registry to realize startup. It searches strings that are related with online bank in the opened windows; then it will record the keystroke and send the stolen sensitive information to the specific mail box.

family_cn_des: Constructor.Win32.QQRob是一种QQ病毒生成器。这种恶意代码被攻击者用来盗取QQ帐号等信息。
family_en_des: Constructor.Win32.QQRob is a collection of QQ virus generator. It is used by attackers to steal QQ accounts.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.HacDef是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              HacDef家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.HacDef is a colletion of Trojan that makes use of vulnerabilities to realize remote control. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.  This family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/JS.DarDuk是一类自动下载其他恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          DarDuk家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des: Trojan[Downloader]/JS.DarDuk is a colleciton of Trojan that can download other malware automatically. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.             After infecting user's system, it will modify the system settings and download and execute several kinds of malware, which results in great damages to user's system.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Ruskill是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Ruskill家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。                                               Ruskill是一款有DDoS攻击能力的工具包。它在黑客网站上进行公开销售，部分黑客直接提供利用该工具的攻击服务，甚至有促销打折等活动。
family_en_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Ruskill is a colletion of Trojan that makes use of vulnerabilities to realize remote control. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.  This family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege.                                  It is a kind of toolkit with DDoS attack capability. It is sold publicly on the hacker website. Some attackers provide the attack service that uses this tool. There are promotion or sales.

family_cn_des: Worm[Net]/Win32.Kolab是一类主要通过网络传播的蠕虫。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                         kolab蠕虫会在局域网内建立服务器，引诱用户通过浏览器下载蠕虫。它还能感染移动存储设备，通过创建额外的服务项来实现开机自动运行。
family_en_des: Worm[Net]/Win32.Kolab is a collection of worm that spreads mainly through network. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                             It establishes server in LAN to seduce users to download worm via browser. It can also infect removable devices and realize startup through creating extra service options.

family_cn_des: Trojan[PSW]/Win32.Ruftar是一类盗取用户账户密码等信息的木马统称。此家族是是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                       Ruftar家族木马侵入用户系统后，会搜索存储账户密码信息的文件，找到后会通过邮件，FTP上传等方式将文件传送给木马操控者。
family_en_des: Trojan[PSW]/Win32.Ruftar is a collection of Trojan that steals user's account and password. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                               After intruding into the system, Ruftar will search files that store account and password. Then it sends the information to Trojan managers by e-mail or FTP.

family_cn_des: HackTool[Hoax]/Win32.FlashApp是一类伪装欺诈用户的黑客工具。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                         FlashApp通常对系统不具有任何危害。它通过警告信息等对用户进行欺骗，诱使用户购买其软件保护系统而使欺诈者获利，其出售的软件通常没有任何实际作用。
family_en_des: HackTool[Hoax]/Win32.FlashApp is a kind of hacktool that disguises itself to cheat on users. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                                FlashApp normally poses no risks to systems. It cheats users by warning information to make users buy its software protecive system. In this way, it helps attackers get profits. While the software it sells has no practical functionalities.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/PHP.Pbot是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Pbot家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/PHP.Pbot is a colletion of Trojan that makes use of vulnerabilities to realize remote control. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.             Pbot family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege.

family_cn_des: Swell家族是感染式程序。该家族样本多使用VBS编写，运行后会启动可执行程序，可能会查找系统中其它文件，写入恶意代码。
family_en_des:
Swell is a collection of infective Trojan that is written by VBS. After running, it will launch the executive programs and search for other files to write malware.                 Trojans are a type of malware that try to look innocent to convince you to install them on your PC.
They can steal your personal information, download more malware, or give a malicious hacker access to your PC.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Morkus是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Morkus木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Morkus is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.IRCNite是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   IRCNite后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过僵尸网络进行的多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但是其不是自行传播，而是需要攻击者的特殊命令。
family_en_des:
The family of IRCNite is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The IRCNite backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Flystub是释放恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Flystub木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放安装其他恶意程序。很多容易被查杀的恶意程序通过隐藏在此类木马内部以躲过反病毒软件的检测，进而感染用户计算机。此家族的部分变种还具有强制关闭杀毒软件的能力，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。
family_en_des:
The family of Flystub is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a compute, the Trojan will release additional malware. Some malwares which are easy to be detected by anti-virus software hide behind the Trojan to do further damage to the system. Some variants of the family are able to shut down anti-virus software in a compulsive way.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Ahea是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Ahea木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Ahea is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: RiskWare[NetTool]/Win32.PsKill家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的风险软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                           风险软件通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。                    PsKill软件主要用来结束进程。Windows资源管理器拥有结束进程的功能，但是PsKill软件功能更强，它可以直接结束远程系统的进程，无需在远程系统上安装任何软件。
family_en_des:
The family of PsKill is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Riskware is usually commercial, free and open-sourced. It has no malicious functions itself, but its vulnerabilities may be exploited by other viruses or Trojans.
The PsKill software is used to terminate processes. The function is even more powerful than that of Windows Explorer. It can terminate the process in a remote system without installing any software in the system.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Reveton是一类劫持用户系统并索要赎金的木马家族的统称。此家族是一个通过通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                     Reveton是2012年首次出现的一款勒索木马。该木马会显示一个伪装成警方的警告信息，告知用户其有违法行为，例如使用盗版软件，并需要交纳罚款。部分变种为了增强可信度，还同时显示用户的IP地址或者是用户摄像头的截图。                                    Reveton在2012年初出现于欧洲，其不同变种通常是在不同的地区传播，伪装成相应地区的法律机构。同年8月，Reveton伪装为FBI的新变种在美国和加拿大大量传播。
family_en_des:
The family of Revetonl is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Reveton first appeared in 2012 as a ransomware. It displays a police warning to claim that the computer user was involved in illegal activities such as downloading pirated software then calls for random. It may even display the computer's IP address or the webcam’s screenshot to convince the user. In August 2012, a new variant of Reveton disguises as FBI to call for random in America.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Dm是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Dm广告软件一般通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中，或是通过挂在网站上吸引用户点击进行传播。广告软件在安装进用户系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，防止被用户卸载。它一般通过系统弹窗或是修改浏览器主页进行广告，大部分的广告软件还会暗中收集用户的信息，例如浏览历史记录等，来研究用户的喜好，进而有针对性的推送广告。为了获取更多利益，该类软件制作者通常会使用很多黑客技术。
family_en_des:
The family of DM is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The grayware usually spreads by being bundled with other installation file or being hooked on some websites to attract users to click and install. It displays ads via pops-up or modifying the web browser’s homepage. It collects user data secretly to explore the user’s interests so as to prompt targeted ads. To obtain more profits, it will also employ some hacking techniques.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Diamin是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Diamin木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Diamin is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Dinwod是释放恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Dinwod木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放安装其他恶意程序。很多容易被查杀的恶意程序通过隐藏在此类木马内部以躲过反病毒软件的检测，进而感染用户计算机。此家族的部分变种还具有强制关闭杀毒软件的能力，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。
family_en_des:
The family of Dinwod is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a compute, the Trojan will release additional malware. Some malwares which are easy to be detected by anti-virus software hide behind the Trojan to do further damage to the system. Some variants of the family are able to shut down anti-virus software in a compulsive way.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Rootkit]/Win32.Necurs是一类使用了Rootkit技术的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                  RootKit本身并不具有破坏行为，它通常用来隐藏其他木马等恶意程序，使之逃过反病毒软件的检测。它功能强大，能够隐藏文件，注册表信息，网络连接信息，甚至是程序执行时的内存信息。
family_en_des:
The family of Necurs is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Necurs rooktkit has no malicious purpose itself, but it can help hiding other malware so that the anti-virus software is not able to find them. It can hide files, registry data, network connection and even memory data when program running.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Ransom]/Win32.PornoBlocker是一类劫持用户系统并索要赎金的木马家族的统称。此家族是一个通过通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                                                    PornoBlocker家族木马主要通过勒索用户使其制作者获利。侵入用户系统后，此木马会修改注册表项，通过系统进程启动自身。此外，它还会阻止任务管理器的启动，防止用户通过任务管理器终止木马进程。该木马运行时会在桌面显示覆盖整个桌面的解锁窗口，用户除了输入解锁码外，无法进行其他操作。解锁码需要用户向其中指定的号码发送收费短信才能够获取。
family_en_des: Trojan[Ransom]/Win32.PornoBlock is a collection of Trojan that hijacks user's system and demands ransom. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.             It maks attacker get profits by blackmailing users. After intruding user's system, it will modify the registry item and boot through system process. In addition, it also stops the booting of task manager in order to prevent user from terminating itself by starting the task manager.When running, it displays an unlock window covering the whole desktop. Uers cannot carry out  other operations except inputing the unlock code. The unlock code can only be gained by sending premium SMS to specific number.

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Ngrbot家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                     Ngrbot蠕虫一般通过邮件传播，邮件中会提供一个链接，用户点击该链接则会被感染。该蠕虫可以盗取用户FTP和浏览器的账户密码信息，也可以被攻击者利用进行DDoS攻击。它还会下载自身的更新和其他恶意程序。Ngrbot蠕虫的命名源于其代码中包含的信息“Ngrbot，running”。
family_en_des: Worm/Win32.Ngrbot is a collection of worm that is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                              It usually spreads through e-mails which contain links for users to click. It can steal the accounts and passwords of FTP and browser. It can be also used by attackers in DDoS attack. The name of Ngrbot comes from its code that contains the information of "Ngrbot，running".

family_cn_des: Firser家族是风险软件类程序。该家族多数样本带有合法数字签名，运行后，会下载其它软件进行安装，会弹出广告，可能会捆绑其它软件。
family_en_des: Firser is a collection of riskware. Most samples of this family have legal digital signatures. It will download other software to install after running. It pops up ads and may be bundled with other software.

family_cn_des: Grayware[Monitor]/Win32.SpectorPro是一个监视系统行为的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                  SpectorPro是一个用于监视显示器的软件。它安装进系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，记录显示器和用户操作的信息。这些记录能以类似视频的方式进行回放，从而窃取用户的隐私信息。
family_en_des: Grayware[Monitor]/Win32.SpectorPro is a collection of Grayware that monitors the system behaviors. t is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                      This family is used to monitor the browser. After installation, it hides itself and records the information of browser and user's operation. These records can be rerunned as videos to steal user's private information.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.DsBot是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Dsbot家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.DsBot is a colletion of Trojan that makes use of vulnerabilities to realize remote control. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.             Dsbot family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Vapsup是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Vapsup家族软件主要通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中进行传播，在安装时一般不告知用户其存在，在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。
family_en_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Vapsup is a collection of malware that can push advertisements by force. This family is characterized by behavior, and there might be no other relations other than being bundled with the installation file of other software among different  variants of this family.                                    This family usually propagates via bundling in the installation files of other software. It is installed without the knowledge of user. After installation, it appears as popup.

It is so powerful that it can  hide files, registry information, network connection information and even the memory information.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/JS.IstBar是一类自动下载其他恶意软件的木马。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          IstBar家族木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，下载多种恶意软件并执行，对用户系统造成很大损害。该木马通常下载能够盗取账号密码的其他恶意程序，从而使木马操控者获利。
family_en_des: Trojan[Downloader]/JS.IstBar is a collection of Trojan that downloads other malware automatically.  It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.            After infecting user's system, it will modify the system settings and download and execute several kinds of malware, which results in great damages to user's system. It downloads malware that can steal accounts and passwords in order to make profit for the attacker.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdTool]/Win32.MyWebSearch是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        MyWebSearch家族软件会修改注册表中关于浏览器的数据，弹出指定的广告页面，干扰用户的正常工作。该软件家族是由www.mywebsearch.com制作的，主要通过其他软件强制安装，监视记录用户浏览习惯，并将数据传到指定的服务器，使用户的隐私信息被窃取。
family_en_des: Grayware[AdTool]/Win32.MyWebSearch is a collection of malware that can push advertisements by force. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.             It may modify the browser-related data in the registry and pop specific ad pages to disturb user's normal work. It is written by www.mywebsearch.com and installed by other software forcibly. It sends the data to specific server, which makes user's private information be stolen.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Mudrop是一类释放恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          Mudrop家族木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放安装其他恶意程序，可能有自动下载，远程控制，强制关闭杀毒软件等行为，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.Mudrop is a collection of Trojan that releases malware. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                             After infecting user's system, it will download and install other malware or shut down the antivirus software forcibly, which results in great damages to user's system.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.AirAdInstaller是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        AirAdInstaller软件一般通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中，或是通过挂在网站上吸引用户点击进行传播。广告软件在安装进用户系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，防止被用户卸载。它一般通过系统弹窗或是修改浏览器主页进行广告，大部分的广告软件还会暗中收集用户的信息，例如浏览历史记录等，来研究用户的喜好，进而有针对性的推送广告。为了获取更多利益，该类软件制作者通常会使用很多黑客技术。
family_en_des:
The family of AirAdInstaller is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
The grayware usually spreads by being bundled with other installation file or being hooked on some websites to attract users to click and install. It displays ads via pops-up or modifying the web browser’s homepage. It collects user data secretly to explore the user’s interests so as to prompt targeted ads. To obtain more profits, it will also employ some hacking techniques.

family_cn_des: RiskWare[Server-Proxy]/Win32.CCProxy 家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的风险软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                           风险软件通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。              CCProxy于2000年6月问世，是一款国产代理服务器软件。主要用于局域网内共享宽带上网和ADSL共享上网。
family_en_des:
The family of CCProxy is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Riskware is usually commercial, free and open-sourced. It has no malicious functions itself, but its vulnerabilities may be exploited by other viruses or Trojans.
Released in June 2000, CCProxy is a homemade agent server used in broadband internet access in LAN and ADSL sharing network.

family_cn_des: Virus/DOS.Pixel的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                     Pixel病毒最早发现与保加利亚，一个希腊学生的电脑被此病毒感染，病毒来源于名为Pixel的希腊电脑杂志，杂志上发布的一个程序会生成一个包含病毒的.com文件。此病毒因此命名为Pixel。    Pixel病毒感染用户计算机后，会感染当前文件夹下的所有.com文件。该病毒定期检查系统时间，如果时间为奇数则显示提示信息要求用户购买Pixel杂志。
family_en_des:
The family of Pixel is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The virus first appeared in Bulgaria. A Greek student got the virus from Pixel, a Greek computer magazine. A BASIC program published by the magazine can generate a .com file with the virus. Once executed, the virus will infect all .com files. The virus will check the system time regularly, if it is an odd number, it will display a note to ask the user to purchase for the Pixel magazine.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Dropper]/Win32.SpyEyes是一类释放恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                          SpyEyes家族木马感染用户系统之后，会自动释放安装监视或盗取用户信息的恶意程序，对用户系统造成很大损害。
family_en_des:
The family of SpyEyes is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will release and install malware to monitor or stall user data and do damage to the system.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.CDur是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                CDur木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。

The family of CDur is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan/BAT.DelFiles是一类恶意删除用户数据文件的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                DelFiles木马感染用户系统后，会强行删除.exe、.doc或.com等为后缀的文件。进而能导致被感染计算机内的重要资料丢失或大部分应用程序无法正常运行。该木马能瘫痪用户的系统，威胁性很高。
family_en_des:
The family of DelFiles is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will delete .exe, .doc or. com files in a compulsive way. It will then cause the loss of important data and the abnormal state of most applications. The Trojan will disable the user system and is of high risk.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Ripinip是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Ripinip后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过僵尸网络进行的多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但是其不是自行传播，而是需要攻击者的特殊命令。
family_en_des:
The family of Ripinip is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Ripinip backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Grayware[Monitor]/Win32.ActualSpy是一个监视系统行为的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                  ActualSpy是一个用于监视用户操作的软件。它安装进系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，记录显示器和用户操作的信息，使用户的隐私受到很大威胁。
family_en_des:
The family of ActualSpy is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
ActualSpy is a software used to monitor user operations. After installed in a system, it will hide itself, record the screen data and user operations. It is of high risk to user privacy.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Packed]/Win32.CPEX-based是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                CPEX-based木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of CPEX-based is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Worm/Win32.Detnat是主要通过网络传播的蠕虫。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的蠕虫家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                          Detnat蠕虫感染用户系统后，会搜索计算机的网络资源状态，根据一定规则或是随机选取计算机尝试连接，连接成功则对其进行感染。该家族的部分变种还可以通过邮件附件，IRC聊天工具进行传播。该家族蠕虫主要感染计算机中的PE可执行文件，并能连接到指定地址接收黑客的命令。
family_en_des:
The family of Detnat is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a compute, the worm will check the status of the network resource and try to connect a remote computer according to some rules or in a random way. Once the connection is successful, the worm will infect the target. Some variants of the family can also spread via email attachment and IRC.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.RtkDL是自动下载其他恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                          RtkDL木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，实现开机启动。此木马能下载多种恶意程序并安装执行，下载的程序由攻击者写在代码中，或由木马自身到指定的网站查阅列表。此类木马常作为攻击的发起步骤，其下载的其他恶意程序作为攻击的后续，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。
family_en_des:
The family of RtkDL is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will change the system settings and realize the function of Autorun after the system booting. The Trojan is able to download and execute various malware which may do more damage to the system. The download program is written in codes by the attacker or can be downloaded from specified websites. The Trojan is of high risk to the user system.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Staget是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Staget木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。
family_en_des:
The family of Staget is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Padodor是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Padodor后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过僵尸网络进行的多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但是其不是自行传播，而是需要攻击者的特殊命令。
family_en_des: The Padodor backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Grayware[Monitor]/Win32.SCKeyLog是一个监视系统行为的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                              SCKeyLog是一个用于监视用户操作的软件。它可以通过邮件进行安装，安装进系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，记录显示器和用户操作的信息，使用户的隐私受到很大威胁。
family_en_des:
The family of SCKeyLog is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
SCKeyLog is a grayware monitoring user operations. It spreads via email. After running in a system, it will hide itself, monitor the screen and user operations. The grayware is of high threat to user privacy.

family_cn_des: Trojan/BAT.Renamer的家族是一个通过行为来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间可能除了都对文件进行改名之外没有任何联系。                               Renamer木马侵入用户系统后，会在硬盘中查找指定的文件，将查找到的文件改名更换目录隐藏，并伪造一个虚假的文件。
family_en_des: Renamer is a family of Trojans which share the same malicious behavior. After infecting a computer, the Trojan will search for some specified files in the system. After being renamed, these files will be saved in another directory. These files are then hidden from the user eyes.

Once the connection is successful, the worm will infect the target. Some variants of the family can also spread via email attachment and IRC.

After infecting a compute, the worm will check the status of the network resource and try to connect a remote computer according to some rules or in a random way. Once the connection is successful, the worm will infect the target. Some variants of the family can also spread via email attachment and IRC.  Some worms in the family can connect to a specified server to download various malware. It is of high risk to the user system.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.FakeMS的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                FakeMS家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
family_en_des: Trojan/Win32.FakeMS  is a collection of Trojan that is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology. family_cn_des: Trojan[FakeAV]/Win32.Windef的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                            Windef木马通常伪装成反病毒程序以欺骗用户，可能具有多种危害，例如对用户进一步欺诈，下载其他恶意程序，执行后门木马等。
family_en_des: Trojan[FakeAV]/Win32.Windef is a collection of Trojan that is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.                                            Windef usually disguises as antivirus program to fraud users and may have various risks, such as downloading other malware, executing backdoor Trojan and so on.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Gator是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Gator是由Gator公司制作发行的广告软件。它会收集新用户的信息，例如浏览器历史记录，并以收集到的信息为基础对用户推送广告。Gator公司自认为是基于网络行为营销的领军者，但它制作的软件几乎都被其他安全公司标为间谍软件。Gator公司于2003年更名为Claria，并于2008年彻底倒闭。
family_en_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Gator is a collection of malware that can push advertisements forcibly. This family is characterized by behavior, and there might be no other relations other than being bundled with the installation file of other software among different  variants of this family.                                            Gator is a kind of software made and released by Gator company. It can collect user's information (such as the browser history record). Gator is a so-called leading company in network marketing, while the software it made is marked as spyware by other security company. Gator company changed its name into Claria and was completely closed down in 2008.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.FirstInj是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              FirstInj家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.FirstInj is a colletion of Trojan that makes use of vulnerabilities to realize remote control. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.             FirstInj family uses vulnerabilities to open backdoor server when running. The Trojan managers opeatate user's computer through the client so as to gain the control privilege.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.BrainInst是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        BrainInst家族软件主要通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中进行传播，在安装时一般不告知用户其存在，在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。
family_en_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.BrainInst is a collection of malware that can push advertisements forcibly. This family is characterized by behavior, and there might be no other relations other than being bundled with the installation file of other software among different  variants of this family.                                    This family usually propagates via bundling in the installation files of other software. It is installed without the knowledge of user. After installation, it appears as popup.

Different variants of Siscos may have various threats such as downloading other malware automatically, allowing the attacker to make remote control and so on.

When running on a computer, the Trojan exploits vulnerabilities to open the backdoor server by which the attacker can make access to the computer.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Mufanom是自动下载其他恶意软件的木马统称。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                          Mufanom木马感染用户系统之后，会修改系统设置，实现开机启动。此木马能下载多种恶意程序并安装执行，下载的程序由攻击者写在代码中，或由木马自身到指定的网站查阅列表。此类木马常作为攻击的发起步骤，其下载的其他恶意程序作为攻击的后续，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。

After infecting a computer, the Trojan will change the system settings and realize the function of Autorun after the system booting. The Trojan is able to download and execute various malware which may do more damage to the system. The download program is written in codes by the attacker or can be downloaded from specified websites. The Trojan is of high risk to the user system.

family_cn_des: HackTool/Win32.Patcher家族是一个通过行为来定性的黑客工具家族，家族变种间除了都进行破解活动外可能没有任何关联。                                       Patcher主要被用来进行破解正版软件，破解后无需任何注册或是激活就可使用。此类软件通常具有一定的风险，部分黑客可能将木马等恶意程序和其打包在一起，利用免费引诱用户下载执行。
family_en_des:
Patcher is a family of hacktools defined according to the same behaviors of different variants. 
Patcher is usually used to decrypt copyrighted software. After that, no registering or activation is needed to use the software. This kind of tools is generally dangerous. Some hackers may bundle them with Trojans and induce users to download and execute them.

family_cn_des: Virus/Win32.Induc的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的病毒家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                        Induc病毒采用了与众不同的感染文件的方式。它感染用户系统后不会进行恶意攻击行为，也不直接感染PE可执行文件。它会反复检查受感染计算机上是否安装了Delphi软件。一旦发现用户计算机存在Delphi软件，则该病毒会注入Delphi中，使所有编译的文件都被感染。此家族病毒初期的变种代码较为原始，也不具有恶意行为，仅仅是传播方式较为特殊。但是之后的变种增加了新的功能，能执行自动下载等恶意行为，具有一定的威胁性。
family_en_des:
The family of Induc is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The virus has a different feature from other viruses. It does not perform any malicious behaviors or infect any PE files. It will repeatedly check if the computer has been installed with the Delphi software. Once the software is found, it will be injected with the virus. Then, all files complied by Delphi will be infected. The original variants of the virus are only special in their spreading ways, but the new variants of it are able to download additional malware to do more damage.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Spammy是利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马统称，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                                   Spammy后门木马主要用来获取对感染计算机的远程控制权限。此类木马允许攻击者进行全权控制，例如收发文件，删除数据，甚至重启计算机。攻击者在网络上大量散布木马，利用感染的计算机组成庞大的僵尸网络。通过僵尸网络进行的多种恶意行为，如散布其他恶意程序，推送广告等，攻击者可以获取可观的利益。该家族的部分变种还能通过网络传播，但是其不是自行传播，而是需要攻击者的特殊命令。
family_en_des:
The family of Spammy is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Spammy backdoor is mainly used to make access to the infected computer. The Trojan allows the attacker to take total control of the system, such as sending or receiving files, deleting data, or even reboot the computer. The attacker distributes the Trojans on Internet and develops a huge botnet by these infected computers. The botnet performs various malicious behaviors, such as distributing other malware and displaying pops-up to make illegal profits. Some variants of the Trojan can even spread via Internet. But they cannot spread by themselves, but by being controlled by the attacker.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.Look2Me是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        Look2Me软件一般通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中，或是通过挂在网站上吸引用户点击进行传播。广告软件在安装进用户系统后，会隐藏自身的存在，防止被用户卸载。它一般通过系统弹窗或是修改浏览器主页进行广告，大部分的广告软件还会暗中收集用户的信息，例如浏览历史记录等，来研究用户的喜好，进而有针对性的推送广告。为了获取更多利益，该类软件制作者通常会使用很多黑客技术。
family_en_des:
The family of Look2Me is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
The grayware usually spreads by being bundled with other installation file or being hooked on some websites to attract users to click and install. It displays ads via pops-up or modifying the web browser’s homepage. It collects user data secretly to explore the user’s interests so as to prompt targeted ads. To obtain more profits, it will also employ some hacking techniques.

family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.ChePro是一类具有多种恶意行为的木马。该家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                ChePro木马的恶意行为包括删除修改数据，监控网络连接，允许攻击者对用户系统进行远程控制等。该家族的变种可能根据不同的进攻目的而设计，一般具有多种恶意行为，一旦侵入用户系统，将会造成很大的破坏。   此家族木马流行于巴西和葡萄牙，主要被黑客用来盗取用户的银行账号密码，部分家族变种为了躲避反病毒软件的查杀，增添了地区的区分功能，即不会再巴西以外的地区或葡萄牙语以外的系统上执行。
family_en_des:
The family ofChePro is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
The Trojan is able to delete or modify data, monitor the network connection and allow the attacker to take remote control of the user system. The variants of the Trojan may be designed according to different attacking purposes. They perform various malicious behaviors. Once the Trojan infecting a system, it will cause great damage. 
This family of Trojans mainly spread in Brazil and Spain. They are usually used by hackers to steal bank accounts and passwords. To avoid being detected, part variants are able to distinguish among different languages to avoid from running on systems which are not Brazilian or Spanish.

family_cn_des: RiskWare[Downloader]/Win32.Dbjustping家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的风险软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                              风险软件通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。
family_en_des:
The family of Dbjustping is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
A riskware is usually commercial, free or open-sourced. It has no malicious functions itself, but the vulnerabilities it has may be exploited by other viruses or Trojans.

family_cn_des: Trojan[PSW]/Win32.Staser是盗取用户账户密码等信息的木马统称。此家族是是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                       Staser木马感染用户系统后，会搜索可能储存账户密码等信息的系统文件，如果发现该类文件，则通过邮件，FTP等方式将文件传送给木马操控者。该家族的部分变种还窃取指定软件的注册资料，对用户系统而言，威胁性较高。
family_en_des:
The family of Staser is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will gather system files which store accounts and passwords, then send them to the Trojan controller via email, FTP and other approaches. Some variants of it can even steal the register data of some specified software. It is of high risk to the user system.

family_cn_des: RiskWare[Hoax]/Win32.SMWnd家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的风险软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                              风险软件通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。

The family of SMWnd is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.

family_en_des: Solimba is a collection of riskware. Most samples of this family have legal digital signatures. It can pop up ads and modify the browser settings, which may affect user's normal experience.

family_cn_des: RiskWare/Win32.HideProc是一种具有一定风险的工具软件，通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。该软件存在一定的风险，其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。                          HideProc是用来隐藏进程的工具软件，常被攻击者用于隐藏病毒木马的进程，进而不被反病毒软件检测到。
family_en_des: HideProc is a software tool of certain risk. It is usually commercial, free or open-sourced. The software has no malicious functions itself, but the vulnerabilities it has may be exploited by other viruses or Trojans. HideProc is used to hide processes to protect Trojans or viruses from being detected.

The family of Ipamor is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
Different variants of Ipamor may have different features and perform different malicious behaviors such as damaging data and files, terminate anti-virus software and so on.

family_cn_des: Grayware[AdWare]/Win32.EZula是一个推送广告的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                        EZula家族软件主要通过捆绑于其他软件的安装文件中进行传播，在安装时一般不告知用户其存在，在安装进系统后，以弹窗等方式进行广告。软件制作者可以在黑市上出卖广告以获利。

family_cn_des: RiskWare[Hoax]/BAT.BadJoke家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的风险软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                              风险软件通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。                                         BadJoke软件通常对系统不具有任何危害。它通过制作虚假的信息和显示特殊情景来迷惑用户，实际上系统运行良好。此类软件经常被攻击者用来进行欺诈。

A riskware is usually commercial, free or open-sourced. It has no malicious functions itself. But the vulnerabilities it has may be exploited by other viruses or Trojans to make fake notes or warnings to cheat users. Users are likely to become victims of fraud if they are not careful enough.

family_cn_des: RiskWare[WebToolbar]/Win32.MultiBarDownloader是一种具有一定风险的工具软件，通常是商用、免费或开源的软件。该软件存在一定的风险，其本身并不具有恶意破坏的功能，但是存在漏洞等能被其他病毒或木马制作者所利用。                                                 MultiBarDownloader安装进用户系统后，会进行工具栏软件的推荐或广告，吸引用户安装。

The software is not malicious itself, but the vulnerabilities it has may be exploited by other viruses or Trojans. When running on a system, it will advocate software in toolbar and make profits by inducing users to install the advocated software.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Clicker]/Win32.Cycler是一类暗中访问网络资源的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Cycler木马侵入用户系统后，会像浏览器发送指定的命令或通过修改系统文件，使用户系统访问特定的网络资源（通常为网站）。此家族木马能被用来增加网站的点击量，或者针对特定目标进行DDoS攻击。部分攻击者可利用网页挂马方式安装其他恶意程序到用户系统。
family_en_des:
The family of Cycler is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
After infecting a computer, the Trojan will send commands to the web browser or modify the system files so that the system can visit some specified websites to increase the visiting traffic or make DDOs attacks on them. Some attackers are able to install other malicious programs on the user system by drive-by download.

family_cn_des: Trojan[Backdoor]/Win32.Nbdd是一类利用系统漏洞等实现远程控制的木马，此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                              Nbdd家族木马在用户计算机上运行时利用漏洞等缺陷开启后门的服务端。木马操纵者通过客户端来操作用户计算机，从而获得用户计算机的控制权。
family_en_des:
The family of Nbdd is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique.
When running on a computer, the Trojan will exploit vulnerabilities to open the backdoor server by which the attacker can make remote control of the user system.

family_cn_des: GrayWare/Win32.EgroupDial[Porn-Dialer]是一个能自行拨打付费电话的灰色软件家族。此家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的灰色软件家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                                                      EgroupDial软件执行后，会尝试拨打一个收费高昂的接入号码（通常为色情号码），给用户造成经济损失。此软件一般通过色情网站诱惑用户下载执行，或直接挂在网站上，当用户访问时自动执行。
family_en_des: GrayWare/Win32.EgroupDial[Porn-Dialer] is a kind of malware that can dial paid phones automatically. It is characterized by code gene. The variants of this family have the same or similar source code and core technology.              After being executed, it tries to dial a highly paid phone number (which usually is a porn number), which results in economy loss for users. It seduces user into downloading or executing through porn website.

family_en_des: Trojan[Downloader]/Win32.Adnur is a collection of Trojan that can download other malware automatically. It is characterized by code gene. family_cn_des: Trojan/Win32.Antavmu的家族是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或相似的源码和核心技术。                                                Antavmu家族的不同变种可能具有多种危害，例如自动下载其他恶意程序，允许攻击者进行远程控制等。
