It changes the registry settings to release the function of Auto-Run every time the system in on.

family_cn_des: Trsh家族是宏病毒，宏病毒是属于一种脚本型病毒，主要感染版本较低的OFFICE文档。
family_en_des: Trsh is a family of macro viruses which are a kind of script viruses. They mainly infect OFFICE files of low versions.

family_cn_des: Kromeser家族是木马类程序中的捆绑程序。该家族是用批处理编写的一个脚本文件，通过在批处理中写入可执行文件。并运行、添加，删除等打操作。
family_en_des: Kromser is a family of Trojans. They are software bundlers which are batch script files. The Trojan writes executable files in patch processing to perform malicious behaviors.

family_cn_des: Feri家族是木马类程序中的后门程序。使用DELPHI编写的，UPX加壳。具有连接远程服务器等待控制指令。有打开文件管理、文件下载上传、升级和DDOS等功能。
family_en_des: Feri is a family of backdoor Trojans written in DELPHI and packed by UPX. The Trojan connects with a remote server to receive and execute commands. The Trojan is able to open the file manager, upload and download files, make update and make DDOS attacks.

family_cn_des: Gertr家族是木马类程序。该家族为DLL文件，通常以注入的方式运行。运行后会判断系统进程中是否有浏览器并通过注入到这些浏览器中访问一些指定的URL地址进行获取数据。
family_en_des: Gertr is a family of Trojans. They are DLL files running in inserting manner. Once executed, the Trojan decides whether browsers are in the system processes and insert itself into the browsers to visit specified URL and obtain data.

family_cn_des: Ubup家族是木马类程序。添加系统自启动项，运行后无明显行为。一般配合其它程序一起执行。
family_en_des: Ubup is a family of Trojans. The Trojan adds Auto-Run item in system and has no obvious malicious behaviors. It is usually executed together with other programs.

family_cn_des: CVE-2013-1347家族是溢出程序。此家族为微软IE溢出程序， Internet Explorer 访问尚未正确初始化或已被删除的对象的方式中存在一个远程执行代码漏洞，该漏洞可能以一种攻击者可以在当前用户的上下文中执行任意代码的方式损坏内存。攻击者可能拥有一个特制的网站，旨在利用此漏洞通过IE浏览器，然后诱使用户查看该网站。
family_en_des: CVE-2013-1347 is a family of overflow programs in IE browser. The vulnerability enables the attacker to execute random code in current user context to do damage to memory. The attacker exploits the vulnerability to encourage the user to visit a specified website.

family_cn_des: Datcaen家族是木马类程序中的后门程序。该程序未经授权访问受感染的计算机。它发送系统信息和可以接受命令从远程C&C服务器。主要功能有上传、下载、升级、关机、删除和修改文件等。端口和C&C服务器不是固定的。
family_en_des: Datcaen is a family of backdoor Trojans. The Trojan makes access to the infected computer without the user authorization. It receives and executes commands from a remote C&C server, uploads the system data to the server. It has the functions of uploading, downloading, updating, shutting down the system, deleting and modifying files. It has varied and unfixed ports and servers.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行于java平台下；目前得到的该家族的样本为java编译的类文件；具有下载特征。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under JAVA platform. The current sample of this family is class file compiled in JAVA, which has the downloading characteristic.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行于x64系统下；具有下载并运行可执行程序、回传日志、更新主程序、更新选项、多种方法注入进程等功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under x64 system. It can carry out the following malicious actions: downloading and running the executive programs, uploading logs, updating the main program and options, injecting process with multiple methods.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。多数样本版本信息源文件名为DiskDefrag.exe（磁盘清理工具）；该家族样本使用vb编写；部分样本带有UPX壳；数据经过加密处理；暂无其它行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is written by VB. The source file names of most sample version information are DiskDefrag.exe. Some samples have UPX shell. The data is encrypted. There are no other malicious actions.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于黑客工具，为国外著名隐藏运行批处理脚本的命令行工具。一般配合其他恶意软件使用，达到隐藏恶意行为的目的。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that usually assists other malware to realize the purpose of hiding its mailiciou actions. It is the foreign command tool that hide the running batch scripts

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。运行于PHP网站环境下；具有执行命令、上传文件、文件管理，查看系统信息、SQL操作、自删除、MD5加密、BASE64加密等功能，黑客在入侵网站的过程中使用该类文件从webshell来获取系统权限。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under PHP network environment. Hackers can get the system privilege from webshell when they intruding websites by using the class file. It can carry out the following mailicious actions: executing commands, uploading files, file management, MD5 encryption, BASE64 encryption and so on.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于网络工具类。家族IEEN是以该工具名称命名。IEen是一款专业的远程控制软件，该工具能够借助135端口轻松连接到其它工作站，并监控其IE浏览器，在浏览器中的任何操作都会被监控。
family_en_des: It is a collection of nettool that collects your personal information, such as your browsing history, and uses it without adequate consent. IEEN is a kind of professional remote control software which can connect other work ports by 135 port and monitor their IE browser.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于蠕虫类，伪装自身图标为Facebook图标，具有UpdatesLTD数字签名，通过Facebook社交网站传播，运行后衍生多个文件，安装浏览器插件，可能会窃取Facebook用户信息。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that disguises itself as Facebook icon. It spreads by the socializing website Facebook with UpdatesLTD digital signature. It derives several files after running and installs the browser plug-in. It may steal user's Facebook information.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于64位平台下的风险程序类。运行于64位平台下；样本为比特币加密兑换工具Eobot；并无其它恶意行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that runs under win64 platfor. The samples of this family is the exchange tool Eobot with Bitcoin encryption. There are no other malicious behaviors.

family_cn_des: 该家族运行于DOS平台下，可感染DOS下16位程序。
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus that runs under DOS platform. It can infect the 16 bit programs in DOS system.

family_cn_des: 该家族为木马类，使用VBS脚本编写的。其功能是关闭系统中一些安全软件，例如：avp.exe、nod32.exe、nod32kui.exe等
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that opens a named pipe for communication with a remote attacker and attempts to terminate the Windows shell "explorer.exe" process. It is written by VBS. It can shut down some security software in the system, such as avp.exe, nod32.exe and nod32kui.exe.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标伪装为Facebook的Logo；该家族为自解压格式，将所有文件解压到%Temp%文件夹下，但由于可执行程序丢失，导致无后续行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is in self-decompression mode. The icon disguises as the logo of Facebook. It can decompress all the files into %Temp% archive. However, due to the miss of executive programs, it results in non-continuious actions.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于广告类软件。PricePeep可以收集私人信息和浏览器数据如浏览器历史记录等，中此广告件后浏览器会自动弹出广告并把用户指向PricePeep网站。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that can collect personal information and browser data (such as the history records of the browser). After being infected by it, the browser will pop ads up automatically and direct users into PricePeep website.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行后，弹出伪装窗口，显示需安装.net4.0，样本后台运行，释放可执行文件到%Temp%文件夹下；添加注册表启动项；具有网络行为。回传本地系统基本信息。网络特征：http_method="GET"&http_url_str^".php?ip="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26os="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26name="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26id="
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that pops fake window after running. It can release the executive files into %Temp% archive and add the registry option. Then it sends the basic information back to the local. The network characteristic is http_method="GET"&http_url_str^".php?ip="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26os="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26name="&http_url_str[0r]^"\26id=" .

family_cn_des: 该家族属代理木马类，运行时,会根据用户权限级别随机释放一个随机命名代理DLL组件并添加自启动项。
family_en_des: It is a Trojan that installs a proxy, detected as TrojanProxy:Win32/Hioles.C, to intercept communication from an affected computer with web email services provided by Hotmail, Yahoo! and Gmail. It can release a proxy DLL component by random and add the startups according to user's privilege level.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于蠕虫类。可以通过IRC等即时通信软件、可移动驱动器、邮件等进行传播；它会下载安装其它恶意程序；会窃取用户机密信息回传给服务器；会禁用杀毒软件等。
family_en_des:
This family of worms can steal your user names and passwords by spying on what you do online. They can block websites that are related to security updates and launch a limited denial of service (DoS) attack.
They spread via USB flash drives, instant messaging programs, and social networks.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。运行后会安装一个键盘记录器KeyloggerDiagnosticTool，记录键盘操作，并将计算机名称和log文件上传到http://www.mykeyloggeronline.com，弹出页面，并以pdf形式提供受害者机器上的记录下载。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that installs KeyloggerDiagnosticTool to record the keyboard operations and upload the computer name and log file to website http://www.mykeyloggeronline.com. Then it pops the pages and provides the download record of the infected computer.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于手机类恶意代码，该程序安装后无图标显示，运行时会屏蔽特定号码的短信，同时会后台下载安装未知软件，造成用户流量等资费的消耗。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that can shield messages from the specific numbers. There is no icon of it after being installed. It can download and install the unknown software at the backend, which results in the large comsumption of user traffic fee.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。该家族样本均为动态链接库文件，少量样本带有ASP壳，使用VC++编写；具有基本木马的特征：提升权限、访问远程链接、创建文件、创建进程等并具有窃取银行账号功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose samples are DLL files. Some of the samples have ASP shells. It is wirtten by VC++ with basic Trojan characteristics, such as promoting privileges, accessing the remote links, creating files, establishing programs and so on.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于风险程序类。图标伪装为360杀毒；运行出弹出伪装directdownloader的下载界面；释放多个可执行程序；添加注册表启动项；下载安装假的安全软件；提示用户注册后缴费使用。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware whose icon disguises as 360 antivirus software. It can pop up the download interface of directdownloader, adding the startup options of the registry, downloading and installing the fake software. Then it reminds users to pay for usage after registration.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于邮件类黑客工具。Homicide具有邮箱炸弹功能，使用Winsock通信，可用来发送垃圾邮件。
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that has the functionality of mail bomb. It communicates through Winsock and can be used to send junk mails.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于脚本类，通过嵌入到网页中时行传播。此脚本内部代码为加密的。运行后会弹也一个图片，内容为假冒的安全软件让用户购买。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that spreads by being embedded into web pages. The internal code is in cryption. It will pop a picture, of which the material is fake security software.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于手机广告类。该程序提供反向电话查询服务，但运行过程中会启动后台服务，会无提示私自获取用户联系人信息并通过FTP方式上传，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile adware that can provide reverse phone search service. It may launch the backend service during running. It will obtain user's contact information automatically and upload it by FTP, which results in privacy leaks.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于手机广告类。该程序捆绑了startapp广告件，该广告件可能会创建桌面快捷方式，修改用户浏览器书签，并获取手机设备等信息，同时修改手机的默认浏览器主页为searchmobileonline.com，建议用户谨慎使用。不过该广告件，一般会在程序启动时给出提示信息。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile adware that is bundled with startapp adware (It may create desktop shortcut, modify the browser bookmark and get the information of mobile device.). It changes the default browser homepage into searchmobileonline.com. It can give notice information when the program is lauched.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。已发现样均为EXE可执行程序；部分函数和数据以加密形式存在；具有添加服务、设置启动项、等待并接收服务器指令、回传信息、自删除等功能；该家族最重要的功能是下载并运行可执行程序，具有下载者类恶意代码特征。
family_en_des:
This backdoor Trojan can give a malicious hacker access to your PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标伪装为jpg格式图标；释放三个文件到%RECYKLER%\SYS64，分别为cmd.jpg（为配置文件）、dwm.exe（可执行恶意程序）、RealtkHDpnl.lnk（用于实现开机启动）；会发送TCP请求。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose icon disguises as jpg formate. It may release three files into %RECYKLER%\SYS64, which are cmd.jpg（configuration file）、dwm.exe（executive malicious program）、RealtkHDpnl.lnk. It may also send TCP request.

family_cn_des:
该族样本运行后，会经常弹出广告信息，还有可能会对破坏计算机数据；设置网络监听；生成配置文件；有网络下载行为。
该家族属于风险类。该家族的样本多带有ASP或UPX壳；会对计算机进程进行遍历，注入恶意代码到explorer.exe中；弹出IE窗口，显示广告；添加注册表启动项；会访问远程服务器，有网络行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus that pops up ads information. This program is used for malware-related actions. It may damage the computer data, setting network monitor, generating configuration files and downloading from the internet.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。图标伪装为“我的电脑”，带有UPX壳；在C盘下无限创建文件夹，文件名格式如下：S2Khackedyou%dtimes（%d为数据，从0开始逐次加1）。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose icon disguises as "My Computer" with UPX shell. It may create unlimited archives under C drive with the file name formate as follows: S2Khackedyou%dtimes（%d refers to data）.

family_cn_des: LOIC是一款面向于web应用程序的DoS/DDoS攻击工具，它可以用TCP数据包、UDP数据包、HTTP请求对于目标网站进行DoS/DDoS测试，不怀好意的人可能利用LOIC构建僵尸网络。LOIC是一个非常好的DoS/DDoS攻击工具。该工具来源为：http://sourceforge.net/projects/loic/files/loic/
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that targets web application. It can carry out DoS/DDoS tests on target websites by using TCP data pack, UDP data pack and HTTP request. People with evil purposes will make use of LOIC to establish botnet. The source of it is http://sourceforge.net/projects/loic/files/loic/ .

family_cn_des: 该家族为广告类。是Volaro工具栏，运行后会主动连接网络访问指定网页，有自动更新功能。
family_en_des:
This adware program displays ads as you browse the web.
It can be downloaded from the program's website, or it may be installed when you install other software.
It can open advertisements that appear independently and outside the context of the program, website, or other source the advertisements are promoting. After being executed, it may connects the network to access the specific websites automatically.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。MasterParadise是典型的木马工具，具有服务端与客户端；具有较多的恶意功能，如：具有获取被感染用户屏幕截图、文件操作功能、安装恶意软件、获取系统信息等等。
family_en_des:
This backdoor Trojan can give a malicious hacker access to user's PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information. It has several malicious functionalities, such as obtainning the screenshot of the infected users, file operation, install malicious software, stealing the system information and so on.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于风险程序类。该家族会自我复制到%windir%\AccessSolution\access.exe，并在桌面创建快捷方式，图标为IE，同时将快捷方式添加到IE浏览器收藏夹中；在IE缓存文件夹下释放ocx插件。
family_en_des:
This threat is part of the Win32/Banload family. Trojans in this family can download other malware onto your PC, including Win32/Banker and Win32/Bancos.
They can also steal your banking user names and passwords and send them to a remote attacker.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于木马类。样本运行后会加载一个驱动文件，创建系统服务；会加载一个动态链接库文件；由于两个文件缺失，导致后续分析无法进行。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that will download a drive file after running. It creats system service and downloads a DLL file. Due to the loss of two files, the following analysis cannot be carried out.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。使用JAVA作为开发语言；现有该家族的样本格式类型多样，如.jar、.class等；具有向系统文件夹自我复制能力；添加开机自启动；通过修改DNS来实现后门；删除样本原始文件。
family_en_des: It is a collection of backdoor Trojan that is developed by Java language. There are a variety of sample format types, such as .jar and .class. It has the capability of self-replicating to the system files. It realizes the backdoor function by modifying DNS and deleting the original files of sample.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。样本均为动态链接库；具有创建服务、等待并接收远程服务器指令、回传日志、添加相应注册表信息实现启动等功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of backdoor Trojan whose samples are DLLs. It has the following functionalities: creating services, waiting and receiving the remote server command, uploading logs, adding the corresponding registry information to launch.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于64位平台下的木马类。此家族具有捆绑功能，并含有后台自动下载功能。部分数据是经过加密处里的。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under 64-bit flatform. It has the functionality of bundling and downloading from the backend automatically. Part of the data is dealt with encryption.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于手机类恶意代码，该软件安装无图标，会拦截短信并将拦截的短信号码、内容及用户手机号等隐私信息上传到指定的网址，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can block the SMSs. Then it sends the blocked private information (such as SMS number, content and user's cell phone number) to the specific website, which results in privacy information leaks.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于广告类软件。DomaIQ家族名是根据其释放的文件名而来。运行后会弹出广告含有下载升级功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware. The family name DomaIQ is named according to the name of released file. It will pop out ads after running. It also has the functionality of downloading and upgrading.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于后门类。使用BorlandC++编写；部分样本带有ASP壳；具有连接C&C服务器、下载文件等功能。
family_en_des:
This backdoor Trojan can give a malicious hacker access to your PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于64位平台下的木马类。此家族具有勒索用户功能，部分数据是经过加密处里的。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that runs under 64-bit flatform. It has the functionality of blackmailing users. Parts of its data is under encryption.

family_cn_des: 该家族属于蠕虫类。增加开机启动项；具有联网行为；枚举系统磁盘，在磁盘生成隐藏文件；对外发送垃圾邮件；通过邮件进行传播。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that can carry out many malicious actions, such as adding startup option, connecting the network, enumerating system disks, creating hidden files on disks, sending junk emails and spreading through emails.

family_cn_des: Carej家族是手机类恶意代码，应用被利用签名漏洞植入了恶意包，后台下载恶意apk，联网获取指令，静默发送短信，同时会拦截指定短信，拦截指定来电。
family_en_des: This family is a collection of mobile malware that uses signature vulnerability to inject malware. It can download the malicious apk at the backend, connecting the network to gain commands, sending SMSs and blocking specific messages and calls.

family_cn_des: Svpeng家族是手机类恶意代码，感染其它应用程序，启动后激活设备管理器。联网接收远程指令控制，会获取用户短信，联系人，通话记录等信息并上传远程服务器，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: Svpeng is a collection of mobile malware that can infect other programs. It can activate the device manager. Then it receives the remote command controls by connecting the network. It also gets the information of user's SMSs, contacts and phone records and uploads the remote server, which results in privacy leaks.

family_cn_des: Cova家族是手机类恶意代码，软件运行后会隐藏图标，会在用户运行时后台发送扣费短信，并拦截回馈短信，拨打特定号码时会转向扣费号码，造成用户资费的消耗，同时也会上传用户收到的短信，泄露用户的隐私。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that can hide icons after running. It can carry out the following malicious actions: sending charging SMSs, blocking the feedback SMSs, turning to charging numbers when calling the specific numbers, uploading the SMSs that user has received to disclose user's privacy.

family_cn_des: Jokedoor家族是木马类程序，它是一个后门程序Joke软件生成的。可以用来进行分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)攻击,或者是被用来安装其它的木马。例如：它可能被用来安装一个下载者、代理或键盘记录等。它还可能影响系统开放的端口,从而有可能导致进一步的其他攻击。
family_en_des:
This backdoor Trojan can give a malicious hacker access to your PC. They can then use it in distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.
This threat can also install other malware, including threats that steal your sensitive information.

family_cn_des: Saonet家族是木马类程序，拷贝到系统文件夹下，通过修改注册表，实现添加IE按钮插件，实现广告推广。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of Trojan that can carry out ads promotion. It can add the IE button plug-in by modifying the registry.Trojans are a type of malware that try to look innocent to convince you to install them on your PC.
They can steal your personal information, download more malware, or give a malicious hacker access to your PC.

family_cn_des: Mogap家族是手机类恶意代码，程序伪装成系统应用，运行后删除图标，激活设备管理器使用户无法正常卸载，拦截短信，接受短信指令控制将收到的短信息以邮件的形式上传，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that disguises as system app. It deletes the icon after running and activates the device manager to make it harder for users to uninstall. It uploads the received SMSs in the form of email, which results in user's privacy leak.

family_cn_des: Badok家族是手机类恶意代码，app伪装为系统应用程序，运行后访问特定网址并且隐藏桌面图标。后台私自发送短信，拦截特定短信并上传至远程服务器，上传用户手机号码。删除特定短信并上传至远程服务器，造成隐私泄漏以及资费消耗。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that disguises as system app. It hides the desktop icon after running. Also, it carries out the following malicious actions: sending SMSs automatically, blocking specific SMS and sending to the remote server, which results in privacy leaks and fee charging.

family_cn_des: Engeneer家族运行后添加自启动项，拷贝到指定目录下，并以系统文件命名，开启本地大量端口对外发送UDP请求。
family_en_des: Engeneer is a collection of Trojan that can add startup option. Then it transfers to the specific directory and names the option in terms of system file. It can open large amounts of local ports and send UDP requests.

family_cn_des: Gumen家族是手机类恶意代码，运行后添加自启动项，拥有自动在后台联网下载推广软件并静默安装的能力，给用户造成资费消耗。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that can add startup option. It has the capability of downloading and installing adware at the backend, which brings economy consumption to users.

family_cn_des: Proxy家族是木马类程序，运行后会在系统文件夹下释放VBS脚本文件，并添加到开机启动项，会建立一个提供匿名访问互联网的代理服务器，VBS脚本向C&C服务器发送UDP请求，下载文件等操作。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can release VBS script file and add startup option. Then it creats a proxy server that provides anonymous access to the Internet. The VBS script sends UDP request to C&C server and downloads files.

family_cn_des: Steckt家族是蠕虫类。运行后该家族样本会拷贝自己到系统文件夹下并启动，设置文件属性为隐藏、只读，设置开机启动项，将样本添加到防火墙可通行列表，降低IE安全属性。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that can copy itself to the system archive. Then it sets the file attribute as hidden and read only. It then adds the sample to the practicable list of firewall to reduce security arribute.

family_cn_des: Neurevt家族是木马类程序，运行后添加自启动项，劫持Windows系统还原程序，拷贝自己到系统文件夹下伪装为系统文件启动，设置进程保护，防止进程被结束，向服务器发送信息。网络特征：http_method="POST"&http_url_str^".php"&http_msgbody="ps0="&http_msgbody[0r]^"\26ps1="&http_msgbody[0r]^"\26cs1="&http_msgbody[0r]^"\21cs2="&http_msgbody[0r]^"\26cs3="
family_en_des: Trojan:Win32/Neurevt.A is a trojan that changes some of your computer's settings and steals sensitive information from your computer. It might also allow a remote attacker to access your computer.

family_cn_des: Agent家族是木马类程序，运行后会调用ipconfig命令检测当前所在环境，运行C:\svchost.exe，并将其添加自启动项。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can call ipconfig command to detect the current environment. Then it runs C:\svchost.exe and adds the startup option.

family_cn_des: Tedroo家族是后门类程序，样本没有壳，但使用大量的加密的加解密运算。访问远程服务器，根据返回结果，执行相应的操作。带有无效的数字签名。网络特征：Match=http_method="GET"&http_url_str^"s_get_host.php?ver="
family_en_des: Tedroo is a collection of Trojan that sends spam email. It retrieves commands and configuration data from a remote server. It can access the remote server and carry out the corresponding operations according to the return result. The network  characteristic is  Match=http_method="GET"&http_url_str^"s_get_host.php?ver=" .

family_cn_des: Winlock家族是木马类程序，运行后，创建并运行批处理文件，添加自启动项，禁用进程管理器、关闭桌面、锁定cmd.exe。
family_en_des: Winlock is a collection of Trojan that can create and run batch file. It can carry out the following malicious actions: adding the startip options, disabling the program server, closing the desktop and locking cmd.exe.

family_cn_des: Dybalom家族是木马类程序，该家族样本具有反调试功能，用来窃取用户信息，禁用已安装的安全软件，安装其它恶意软件，会对一些应用程序进行监控，窃取数据。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that carrries the characteristic of anti-debugging to steal user's information. Then it disables the installed software and installs other malware. It can monitor the progress and steal data.

family_cn_des: Crazh家族是EXCE宏病毒,感染对象为MS-OFFICE文档EXCE格式文件,通过感染EXCE格式文件来执行一些特定的命令。
family_en_des: It is a collection of micro virus that can infect EXCE format file of MS-OFFICE document. In this way it can carry out some specific commands.

family_cn_des: Hisp家族是一个Office宏病毒。Office宏病毒感染数据文件创建使用应用程序在微软Office套件,包括微软的Word,Excel。宏病毒是已知的可执行其它程序，一旦被感染的文件被打开，一些宏病毒甚至可以通过电子邮件传播。宏病毒通常也经由交换被感染的文件或使用受影响的应用程序。宏观病毒可以修改默认的模板应用像MicrosoftWord来确保成功创建或打开的文件也被感染。
family_en_des: Hisp is a collection of micro virus. Office micro virus can infect data files and create applications, including Word and Excel.

family_cn_des: Crypt家族是VBS脚本木马类。此脚本为VBS脚本语言编写，内容中含有大里的加密代码。本身不具备自动传播，一般通过网络下载或是捆绑在其它程序中。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is written by VNS script language. There are large amount of encypted codes. It spreads by downloading from network or bundling with other programs.

family_cn_des: TPE-based家族是DOS系统下的感染式病毒。它感染系统中的EXE和COM格式文件。在无意中损坏或覆盖它们的主程序。具有高度破坏性,如破坏系统无法正常使用。
family_en_des: It is a collection of infectious virus that can infect EXE and COM files of the system. It can inadvertently damage or covert the main program, which is highly destructive, such as damaging the system to function unproperly.

family_cn_des: SpyMob家族是手机类恶意代码，该应用无实际功能，启动后会向用户推广一款间谍软件MobileSpy，传播恶意代码。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware with no practical functionalities. It will promote a kind of spyware named MobileSpy after being started so as to spread the malware.

family_cn_des: DarkManko家族是DOS系统下的感染式病毒。这并不是一个危险的非内存常驻加密寄生病毒。它在搜索到.com文件后，将自身写入到文件末尾。根据生成的新病毒显示一条中文消息，并终止计算机运行。该病毒包括以下文本字符串：JapanReseachInstituteOfSelfReproducingProgram[JRIOSRP-6]DarkManko3/5/95
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus under DOS system. It does not belong to the kind of dangeous non-memory-resident encrypted parasitic virus. When searched .com files, it writes itself into the end of the files. It shows a piece of chinese message according to the new virus and terminates the operation of computer. The virus contains the following text strings: JapanReseachInstituteOfSelfReproducingProgram[JRIOSRP-6]DarkManko3/5/95.

family_cn_des: MS05-020家族是漏洞利用工具。该漏洞利用工具可以生成利用微软MS05-020中的分级审查内存损坏漏洞进行破坏的病毒文件，InternetExplorer由于其处理分级审查文件的方法而存在一个远程执行代码漏洞。攻击者可以通过构造特制的分级审查文件来利用此漏洞。该工具运行后，会生成一个名称为rsaci.rat的病毒文件．这是一个安装恶意分级审查文件，如果用户继续点击，则可能允许远程执行代码。成功利用此漏洞的攻击者可以完全控制受影响的系统。
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that can exploit tools to generate virus file. The generated file can make damage to the vulnerability by using the content advisor memory of Microsoft MS05-020. There is a remote executive code vulnerability due to the approach of dealing with the content advisor files. The attackers can exploit the vulnerability by forming a special content advisor file. After being executed, it will generate a virus file named rsaci.rat.If users click it, the remote code will be executed. The attackers that exploit this vulnerability can control the affected system completely.

family_cn_des: Krolol家族是木马类。基于.NET平台开发，运行后拷贝自身到系统文件夹下，伪装为系统文件并启动，设置键盘钩子函数，获取键盘输入，对外发送TCP请求。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is developed on .NET platform. It will copy itself into the system file archive after running. It can also carry out the following malicious actions: disguising as system file , setting the keyboard hook function, obtaining the keyboard input, sending TCP request and so on.

family_cn_des: Zhelatin家族是蠕虫类程序，运行后复制自身到系统文件下并添加自启动项，降低IE安全属性。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that copies itself to the system file and adds the startup option to decrease I.E. security attribute.

family_cn_des: FlyStudio家族是间谍件，运行后会添加自启动项，软件中含有加密算法，会释放广告程序。
family_en_des: This threat can perform a number of actions of a malicious hacker's choice on user's PC. It can add startup option with encryption algorithm, which can release adware.

family_cn_des: Forav家族是手机恶意代码。该应用伪造银行激活码程序诱导用户下载安装，运行时会在后台私发短信激活应用，并能接受短信指令实现发送短信、拦截转发特定短信息、卸载自身等功能，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of mobile malware that disguises as bank activition program to lure users to download and install. It can send messages to activate applications and receive messages to realize the following functions: sending messages, blocking specific messages, uninstalling itself, which will result to privacy leaks.

family_cn_des: Kodbos家族是木马类程序。具有基于时间判断的反调试，代码中含有大量的ip地址。程序运行后对外发送大量网络数据包，具有DDOS攻击的特征。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that has anti-debugging function based on time determination. There are lots of IP addresses. It can send network data packages. It carries the characteristic of DDOS attack.

family_cn_des: Fsysna家族是木马类程序。在%Temp%文件夹下释放恶意代码，添加自启动项，发送网络请求。该家族部分样本是使用脚本语言AutoIt编写的，版本为3.3.8.1，代码中含有大量的加密。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can release malware under %Temp% archive. It can also send network request and add startup option. Parts of this family samples are written by script language AutoIt, of which the version is 3.3.8.1.

family_cn_des: Yourde家族样本多数与PDF文件格式相关。部分为PDF文件格式，利用JavaScript的解析漏洞，可以将恶意代码插入到PDF格式的文件中并执行。另外一些样本为可执行程序，代码中含有PDF的操作。
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus, the samples of which are similar with PDF file format. It uses JavaScript analysis vulnerability to insert malware into PDF file. The other parts of samples are executive programs. There are PDF operations in its code.

family_cn_des: BF家族是黑客工具类程序。运行于Linux平台，它可以用来扫描指定端口，打开端口，可以用来获取用户名、密码发送到远程服务器
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that operates on Linux. It can be used to scan specific ports. It opens ports to obtain user names and passwords in order to send to the remote server.

family_cn_des: Dowgin_F家族是木马类。该家族样本捆绑了yimob广告件，会采用通知栏通知方式弹出广告，此外还会在用户手机屏幕上匿名弹窗，强行推送广告，严重干扰手机正常使用。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is bundled with yimob adware. It pops advertisements by means of noticefication bar. Besides, it forcibly sends advertisements, which will disturb the normal usage of mobile phones.

family_cn_des: Climap家族是木马类程序。该家族样本被捆绑其它恶意包，会联网接收指令，有获取手机联系人，通话记录和地理位置等信息的行为，并上传用户信息到远程服务器，造成用户隐私泄露。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is bundled with other malware packages. It can connect the network to receive commands and carry out the following malicious actions: obtainning the contacts, records and locations, uploading the user information to the remote server, which will result in privacy leaks.

family_cn_des: Sacanph家族是木马类程序。运行后会拷贝自身到系统文件夹下并执行，降低IE安全属性，有网络行为。同时，具有窃取用户信息、证书的功能。网络特征：http_method="POST"&http_url_str^".php"&http_user_agent="Mozilla/3.0\20(compatible;\20Indy\20Library)"
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that steals URL history and user information from certain applications. It also modifies the Hosts file to prevent access to certain websites. Meanwhile, it can steal user information. The network feature is http_method="POST"&http_url_str^".php"&http_user_agent="Mozilla/3.0\20(compatible;\20Indy\20Library)" .

family_cn_des: Logon家族是木马类程序。该家族样本以服务的方式添加到系统中，设置自启动项，用来窃取用户信息，如：游戏帐号、银行信息、个人信息等，并回传到指定服务器。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that adds services to the system. It sets startup option to steal user's information, such as game accounts, bank information, personal information, and sends back to specific server.

family_cn_des: Sysrater家族属于盗号木马，其伪装成一个游戏外挂程序，在后台盗取指定的时候账号和密码。还会弹出一些指定的URL地址进行推广。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that disguises as a game cheating program to steal the specific accounts and passwords. It can also pops some specific URL addresses to promote.

family_cn_des: Shark家族是木马类。基于.NET平台开发，运行后拷贝自身到系统文件夹下，伪装为系统文件并启动，设置键盘钩子函数，获取键盘输入，对外发送TCP请求。主要对MSN账号密码进行盗取，并通过邮件或WEB发送。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is developed based on .NET platform. It copies itself to the system archive and disguises as system file. It sends TCP requests to obtain keyboard input. It steals MSN accounts and passwords and sends by emails and web.

family_cn_des: Slugin家族是感染式类型。该家族样本为被感染后的可执行文件，包括DLL和EXE。含有多个PE文件头，运行后会感染其它可执行文件，当感染成功后会发送邮件到指定邮箱，会消耗系统资源。
family_en_des:
This threat can install other malware, including Virus:Win32/Slugin.A!dll, which can give a malicious hacker access to user's PC.
It can spread through network or removable drives, such as USB flash drives. It can also spread via infected email attachments.

family_cn_des: Snowcap家族是木马类程序。图标伪装为IE网页文件。运行后添加系统服务，检测局域网环境，以批处理方式执行服务配置、文件拷贝、设置文件隐藏属性。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose icon disguises as IE web file. It adds system services, detecting LAN environment, executing service setting, file copy and setting file attributes.

family_cn_des: BrainInst家族属于广告件安装程序，通常为一个安装程序。该家族多数为pcperformer软件安装程序，运行后会在线自己动安装并扫描系统，扫描完成后会提示用户修复，需要在线购买才能正常使用。是一款假冒安全软件的恶意程序。
family_en_des: It is a collection of adware that disguises as a installation program. Most of this family are pcperformer installation programs. It can install and scan systems automatically . Then, it warns users to repaire by purchasing online.

family_cn_des: Edotex家族是感染式病毒。该家族样本图标伪装为文件夹样子。运行后会导致explorer.exe进行错误，会将系统中部分可执行文件写入恶意代码。
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus whose sample icon disguises as archive. It leads to the error of  explorer.exe. It also writes the executive files into malware.

family_cn_des: Miniwish家族是风险软件类。该家族样本为磁盘清理工具CleanCenter。在进行更新时，对所使用的下载函数、执行函数没有做有效处理，对更新的程序没有进行校验，可能会被恶意软件所利用。
family_en_des: Miniwish is a collection of riskware whose sample is the disk cleanup tool CleanCenter. It did not carry out valid process on downloaded functions and execution functions and not verify the updated programs. It might be used by malicious software.

family_cn_des: Fortnight家族是网页文件，里面嵌入了加密后的JS代码，运行后页面会跳转到其它网站链接，进行广告推广。
family_en_des: It is a collection of web file that is embedded with encrypted JS code. This threat can perform a number of actions of a malicious hacker's choice on your PC. It can swipe to other website links for ads promotion.

family_cn_des: Dervec家族是木马类程序。运行后执行添加服务，进程注入，获取系统服务相关信息，回传系统信息，将服务添加开机自启动。同时，具有反调试功能。
family_en_des: This threat can give a malicious hacker unauthorized access and control of your PC. It can carry out the following malicious actions: adding services, process injecting, accessing the relevant information of system service, uploading the information and adding the automatic startup option. Meanwhile, it has the functionality of anti-debugging.

family_cn_des: GetFaster家族是风险类程序。具有自动更新下载行为，该家族样本含有多个有效数字签名。含有广告推广链接，会修改浏览器默认设置。
family_en_des: GetFaster is a collection of riskware whose sample has several digital signatures. It can download and update automatically and modify the default settings of the browser.

family_cn_des: Agent家族是木马类程序。该病毒安装成功后自动运行于后台。病毒成功安装后，捆绑静默安装“ThemeInstallHelper”、“ThemeInstall”（文件包伪装成了“theme.mif”）。病毒可能在后台获取用户的IMSI、IMEI号码，将收集的信息发送到远端服务器，病毒在运行过程中频繁联网,消耗用户手机流量。
family_en_des: It is a generic detection for a number of trojans that may perform different malicious functions. The behaviors exhibited by this family are highly variable. This threat can access users' IMSI and IMEI number, and upload the information to the remote server. It connects the Internet frequently to consume uers's mobile traffic.

family_cn_des: SearchLink家族是间谍件程序。运行后会拷贝自身到系统文件夹下，释放两个动态链接库文件。添加浏览器插件，添加开机自启动项，修改IE默认设置。
family_en_des: It is a collection of spyware that copies itself into the system archive. It can release two DLL files, adding browser plug-ins and startup option, modifying IE default settings.

family_cn_des: Palsas家族是黑客工具类程序。该家族样本是由法国黑客编写的工具mimikatz，是一款轻量级的调试器，可以用来抓取Windows明文密码。
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that is written by the tool mimikatz compiled by Franch hacker. It can be used to capture the passwords of Windows.

family_cn_des: DiordSe家族是风险类程序。运行后释放RemoteDroidServer.jar文件，运行需要JAVA环境。该软件分为服务器部分和客户端部分，可以使用Android手机对电脑进行远程控制。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that can release RemoteDroidServer.jar file. Its running needs Java environment. It is devided into server part and client part. It can make use of Android mobile phone to control the computer remotely.

family_cn_des: Gorganic家族是间谍件程序。样本为AlexaToolbar的安装程序。AlexaToolbar为一款浏览器插件，含有广告推广，自动添加到IE工具栏，同时会安装其它插件。
family_en_des: It is a collection of spyware whose sample is the installation program AlexaToolbar. AlexaToolbar is a kind of browser plugin, which can be added to the IE tool bar and install other plugins.

family_cn_des: Ipend家族是间谍件程序。运行后会添加自启动项，具有网络通信行为，会修改IE主页相关信息。
family_en_des: It is a collection of spyware that can add startup option after running. It can carry out the following malicious actions: communication through network, modifying the relevant information in the IE homepage.

family_cn_des: Kidlogger家族是间谍件程序。Kidlogger是一款监控软件。用户可以用来配置相关信息，可用来进行监控网页访问、键盘输出和运程程序等，监控结果可能保存在本地或发送到邮箱。
family_en_des: It is a collection of spyware. This software watches what users do on PC, usually by recording the keystrokes or screen images. The monitoring results might be reserved in local or sent to mailbox.

family_cn_des: Chiqixi家族是木马类程序。运行后会降低IE安全属性，拷贝自身到系统缓存文件夹，开放系统端口，设置鼠标键盘钩子，获取用户的输入，具有网络行为。网络特征：http_method="GET"&http_url_str^".jsp?ad_id="&http_url_str^"\26from_type="&http_url_str^"\26rec_uid="&http_url_str^"\26url="
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can cut down the IE security attributes. It can also carry out the following malicious actions: copying itself into the system archive, opening the sytem port, setting the hook of mouse and keyboard, access the user's input. The network feature is http_method="GET"&http_url_str^".jsp?ad_id="&http_url_str^"\26from_type="&http_url_str^"\26rec_uid="&http_url_str^"\26url=" .

family_cn_des: Bodor家族是木马类程序。该家族多数样本图标进行了伪装，为自解压格式，运行后，释放AutoIt编译器、多个数据文件和一个批处理，调用批处理执行恶意代码的编译并运行。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose sample disguises as self-decompression pattern. It can release AutoIt compilor, several data files and a batch. Then it calls the batch to operate the compiling and running of malware.

family_cn_des: CryFile家族是木马类程序。样本多为安装程序，会释放大量文件到系统文件夹进行安装，并添加自启动项，降低IE的安全属性，弹出广告。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can release large number of files to the system archive for installation. It can also add the startup option, cutting down the security attribute of IE.

family_cn_des: Neoval家族运行后会释放恶意可执行文件到系统文件夹下。同时，修改注册表，当每次运行可执行文件时，都会先运行恶意程序，再由恶意程序调用可执行文件。
family_en_des: This virus spreads by attaching its code to other files on your PC or network.It can release the executive files into the system archive. Some of the infected programs might no longer run correctly.

family_cn_des: Ximad家族是木马类程序。该应用捆绑了Ximad广告件，会通过伪装其他知名应用的安装程序诱导用户下载推广软件。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is bundled with Ximad adware. It lures users to download the marketing software by disguising as installation program of other well-known applications.

family_cn_des: Behind家族是黑客工具类。通过构造Shellcode，利用程序的漏洞来执行，进行恶意操作。黑客常用来获取用户敏感信息，安装后门等。
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that executes by constructing Shellcode and making use of the program exploits. It is often used by malicious hackers to steal the sensitive information of user and install backdoor.

family_cn_des: Ingax家族是DOS系统下的感染式病毒。它感染系统中的EXE和COM格式文件。在无意中损坏或覆盖它们的主程序。具有高度破坏性,如破坏系统无法正常使用。
family_en_des: It is a collection of virus that operates on DOS system. It infects files with exe and com format. It inadvertently destroys or covers the main programs. It is of high destructive, for instance, the infected systems might no longer run correctly.

family_cn_des: Importer家族是感染式病毒。多数样本伪装为火狐浏览器的升级程序，具有反调试功能。运行后会查找可执行文件，并进行感染，写入恶意代码；会执行进程注入，来隐藏自己的行为。
family_en_des: It is a collection of infectious virus that disguises as the update program of Firefox Browser with anti-debugging functionality. It will search for the executive files to write in malware for infection. Then it carries out the process injection to hide its behaviors.

family_cn_des: Sk家族是木马程序，是运行在Linux平台下的后门软件。运行后会连接C&C服务器并等待服务器发来的指令，做进一步的操作，如：下载、升级、DDOS攻击和盗信息等。一般都是隐藏运行，能够躲避一些安全软件的查杀。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that operates on Linux platform. It connects C&C server to obtain the commands from C&C for further operation, such as downloading, upgrading, DDOS attacking and information stealing. It usually hides itself to avoid the detection of some kinds of security software.

family_cn_des: CoinMiner家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多与一些免费软件捆绑，运行后会在桌面生成一些图标，添加注册表信息，添加自启动项，主要用来获取用户敏感信息。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that is unable to spread of its own accord. It may perform a number of actions of an attacker's choice on an affected computer. Most samples of this family are bundled with some free software. It is mainly used to steal user's sensitive informaiton.

family_cn_des: Rhy家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多为IRC脚本类型，会接收IRC服务器指令执行恶意操作，如：获取系统相关信息、下载恶意程序、通过IRC进行传播、扫描当前局域网等。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that can receive IRC server command to carry out malicious operations, such as accessing system-related key information, downloading malware, spreading via IRC, scanning the current LAN and so on. Most of its samples are IRC script.

family_cn_des: OsMonitor家族是风险软件类。该家族多数样本带有ASProtect壳，为动态链接库文件，被加载会会设置钩子函数，对系统进行监控，获取系统敏感信息。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware with ASProtect shell. Its samples belong to DLL files that can set hook functions when being downloaded. It monitors systems to accessing the sensitive information.

family_cn_des: FakeHack家族是木马程序，是运行在php平台下的黑客工具。通过一些简单的配置可以生成木马程序，生成的木马程序有盗取信息等功能。
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that operates on php platform. It can generate Trojan programs by some simple configurations. The new generated programs has the functionality of stealing information.

family_cn_des: Farfly家族是木马类程序。该家族样本多为动态链接库，以服务的方式来运行，具有遍历进程、进程注入、网络连接等功能，还会下载其恶意代码并运行。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that drops various files detected as malware into a system. It also has backdoor capabilities that allow it to contact a remote attacker and await for instructions.

family_cn_des: CrazyMail家族是风险软件类。该家族样本多为CrazyMail6相关程序，可以用来发送大量邮件，可能会被人用来发送垃圾邮件，进行广告的传播。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware that can be used to send large amounts of emails. It might be used to send junk mails to promote advertisements.

family_cn_des: Palsas家族是黑客工具类程序。运行于64位平台下，该家族样本是由法国黑客编写的工具mimikatz，是一款轻量级的调试器，可以用来抓取Windows明文密码。
family_en_des: It is a collection of hacktool that operates on 64bit platform. It is written by the tool mimikatz compiled by Franch hacker. It can be used to capture the passwords of Windows.

family_cn_des: TD家族是感染式程序。运行于16位平台下，会感染COM和EXE等可执行文件的尾部，会感染硬盘的MBR，通过挂钩int21h达到驻留内存。
family_en_des: TD is a collection of infectious virus that operates on 16bit platform. It can infect the tail part of executable files with com and exe format as well as MBR. It realizes the goal of memory resident through hooking with int21h.

family_cn_des: USBDump家族是风险软件类。该家族样本可以用来提取U盘中的数据，将U盘做备份，样本中含有广告，会在运行时弹出广告。
family_en_des: It is a collection of riskware whose sample can be used to extract the data in flash disk. It can make backups for the flash disk. The sample contains advertisement and will pop up them during running.

family_cn_des: NetWiredRC家族是木马类程序。运行后每隔一段时间尝试连接远程服务器，具有遍历文件、记录键盘输入、获取计算机中证书信息、等待远程服务器指令等恶意代码，有明显的后门特征。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that allows unauthorized access and control of an affected computer. It carries out the following malicious actions, retrieving files, recording keystrokes, accessing the credential information, waiting for remote server commands. It has obvious backdoor characteristics.

family_cn_des: Prison家族是木马程序，具有BOT功能是一种通过IRC协议进行传播的后门程序。运行后会连接C&C服务器，C&C服务器会发给客户一些执行命令，如：下载、升级和信息收集等。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan that spreads by attaching its code to other files on user's PC or network. Some of the infected programs might no longer run correctly. It will connect the C&C server for the following execution commands: downloading, upgrading,  information collecting and so on.

family_cn_des:
Trojan/Win32.Bjlog[PSW]家族是一类通常用来盗取用户账户密码信息的木马。此家族木马是一个通过代码基因来定性的木马家族，家族变种之间具有相同或者相似的源码和核心技术。                       
Bjlog家族木马会利用图标伪装成图片文件迷惑用户点击运行，从而造成感染。该家族木马通过启动服务的方式加载病毒动态库，一旦加载成功就会主动连接至黑客，等待黑客的命令。                            “白金远控”是一款远程控制计算机的黑客软件，功能十分强大。其木马程序感染了目标计算机后，就可以实现远程文件管理、远程注册表管理、远程发送命令、远程查看屏幕、远程查看摄像头、开启远程桌面等功能，同时还会记录用户按键信息，盗取用户的账号密码。                         此软件是网路犯罪产业化的产品之一，有黑客专门负责更新和维护此恶意程序，避免其被反病毒软件查杀。黑客组织不仅能通过自己使用该软件盗取用户信息获利，还在网络上售卖该软件，使其他不具备黑客技术的人能使用该软件控制他人电脑，危害性很大。
family_en_des:
The family of Trojan/Win32.Bjlog [PSW] is defined according to code genes. The variants of the family share the same or similar source codes and core technique. 
They usually steal user accounts and passwords by disguising as image files to cheat users. They load a dynamic library of viruses by starting services. Once the loading succeeds, they connect to the hacker and wait for commands. 
The functions of this family are very powerful. Once infecting a target computer, the hacker is able to control files and registries, send commands, view the screen and the camera, start the desktop service, record the keystroke information and steal user accounts and passwords, all in a remote way.  
Moreover, this malicious software has been commercialized. Some hackers are specifically responsible for its update and maintenance to avoid the potential detection and killing of it by antivirus software. Not only be used by hackers to make illegal profits, the software can also be sold on the Internet to indulge potential criminals.
action_des: 窃取密码的远程控制工具

family_cn_des: Tigerbot家族是木马类。该家族样本为X卧底(间谍软件)，安装后无图标，会接受远程短信指令，向远程服务器发送通讯录、通话记录、短信记录、通话录音、GPS信息等用户隐私信息。
family_en_des: It is a collection of Trojan whose sample is undercover (spyware). It receives the remote SMS commands and send private information, such as contacts, phone records, phone recordings, GPS inforamtion and so on.

family_cn_des: Brutex家族是黑客工具类程序。运行于Unix系统下，样本类型为Shell脚本，是一种基于密码加密的暴力破解脚本，黑客常用来进行密码破解。
family_en_des:
It is a collection of hacktool that operates on Unix system. The sample belongs to Shell script, which is a kind of brute force script based on password encryption. This exploit uses a vulnerability in user's software to infect PC.
It's usually used to install other malware or unwanted software without user's knowledge.

family_cn_des: Hybris家族是蠕虫类程序。运行后，会在系统文件夹下系统动态链接库文件，替换系统中wsock32.dll，进行网络通信时，样本会搜集机器中的邮件地址，将自身作为附件进行传播。
family_en_des: It is a collection of worm that spreads by monitoring outgoing e-mail traffic and, when a legitimate e-mail is sent, follows that by sending a second email to the same addresses. That email contains a copy of the worm. It can download plug-ins via anonymous binary postings made to a particular newsgroup, thus changing the functionality.
